original:
Security Memo

Sierra Madre Employees,

At the request of Mr. Sinclair, please refrain from tampering with or destroying the Security Hologram emitters. Remember the Holograms keep us - and our guests - safe.

Thanks,

Sierra Madre Management
translation:
安保备忘录

马德雷山脉赌场全体雇员请注意，

根据辛克莱先生的指示, 请不要随意拆除或毁坏全息保安影像发生器。记住，全息影像的功能是保卫客人及全体工作人员的安全。

谢谢配合，

马德雷山脉赌场管理处

Kevin,

Make sure to set a separate security override for the hallway loudspeakers before you leave tonight. The last thing we need is our coms going down in the middle of a robbery.  Set it to 1837uC@n7Gu355.  That should prevent a lucky guess by some hack with a stolen security card.

Thanks,
Rubin
translation:
凯文,

你今晚离开前一定要给走廊的扬声器设置一个单独的安保控制密码。如果发生抢劫，通讯器这时突然报销，那可是我们都不希望看到的。把密码设置成1837uC@n7Gu355。这样应该就能防止有人通过破解偷来的安保卡猜出密码了。

感谢,
鲁宾

original: Dispenser Codes

original: Codes for the public dispensers arrived today. Sinclair instructed us in their use in case of emergency. Should be able to get stims and other treatments from the machines. Sinclair indicated it could dispense more based on the nature of the medical emergency or subject's condition.\n\nAmong the codes, he kept asking if we could make sure the code for Med-X was backed up. He must have said it three times, I don't think he realized it? Must be stress - made a backup of the code on this terminal just in case.
translation: 今天收到了公用自动售货机的兑换代码。辛克莱指导了我们该如何在紧急状态下使用，应该能够从售货机中获得兴奋剂和其他药品。辛克莱还说，如果发生紧急卫生灾害，或者有重病患者的话，它还可以提供更多医疗物资。\n\n他一直要求我们要备份好吗啡针X的代码。我觉得他至少说了三遍，他是不是自己都没注意到？看来他压力不小，为了以防万一，我已经将代码备份到了这台机子上。

original: Sinclair Visit
translation: 辛克莱来访

original: Sinclair did the rounds again today. Glad he left his ghostly entourage at the casino, those walking lightshows makes me wonder why he's even got us on staff when they could blast us in a second. Otherwise, Sinclair runs a tight ship, good to see in these days and times. Don't know how smart he is trying to make a resort to escape everything in the outside world, but rich guys can make it happen, even ones that've been hit hard like Sinclair has.
translation: 辛克莱今天又来了。很高兴他身边那帮幽灵似的随行人员这次没跟着来，不然我真的怀疑，既然这帮打扮得花里胡哨的家伙随时都能一枪崩了我们，他干嘛还要花钱雇我们当警卫。好在辛克莱是个很有手腕的人，放在这年头是个难得的好品质。也不知他盖了这座世外桃源般的游乐园究竟是聪明还是愚蠢，但有钱人根本不在乎这些，哪怕像辛克莱这种吃过大亏的有钱人也一样。

original:
To: Konrad Simmons

From: William Ennis

Simmons, the ventilation system is on the fritz again and I need to even out the power distribution manually for the new generator we're bringing online. It's positively sweltering down in that cramped little room, and you know I don't cope well with the heat, so I'd like to do the work remotely. What's the password for the back-up machine again?
translation:
收件人：康拉德·西蒙斯

发件人：威廉姆·恩尼斯

西蒙斯，通风系统又故障了，我得手动为刚启用的新发电机重新配电。那个狭小的配电房里真是闷热难耐，你也知道我怕热，所以我必须远程操作。备用机器的密码是多少来着？

original: Old man Ennis left his key on one of the consoles again, so making this note to remind myself to give it back next time I see him. We should stuff his locker full of Dandy Boy Apples or something. Maybe then he'd be less forgetful.
translation: 恩尼斯这老头子又把钥匙丢在控制台上了，所以我写了这个纸条，以便提醒我下次看到他时把钥匙还给他。也许我们应该在他的储物柜里塞上一堆俏男孩苹果派之类的零食，这样他就不会那么健忘了。

original:
To: William Ennis

From: Konrad Simmons

Damn it, Ennis, how many times do I have to tell you?  The password for the Remote Maintenance Terminal is T7GF0SEW.
translation:

发件人: 康拉德·西蒙斯

靠，恩尼斯，我还要告诉你多少次？远程维护终端的密码是T7GF0SEW。

original: Stupid system locked me out again. How am I supposed to remember the password if they keep making me change it every few months? Bah, I'll just write it down here so I don't forget.\n\nXHT68J09DS

我们竭诚欢迎您前来享受人生中最美好的时光！

马德雷山脉赌场管理处

original: Sierra Madre Security Memo 2
translation: 马德雷山脉安保备忘录2

original:
Complaint: Lost and Found 
Sierra Madre Security Log: 8:07AM
Guard on Call: Morris, Tyler
Describe the Incident: Mrs. Purvis daughter called down to ask if we happened to find her mother's purse, which she may have dropped during last night's "stroll." We found the purse on the main floor. None of the valuables were inside, may have been taken when the purse dropped, or Mrs. Purvis may have emptied the purse contents during last night's incident.
translation:
投诉：失物招领 
马德雷山脉赌场安保日志：上午8:07
值班警卫：泰勒·莫里斯
事件记述：普尔维斯太太的女儿打电话来询问我们是否有捡到她母亲的钱包，她可能在昨晚“散步”时弄丢了。我们在主楼找到了钱包。里面没有值钱物件，可能在钱包掉下去后被人偷走了，也可能是普尔维斯太太在昨晚的事件中自己将钱包掏空的。

original: Sierra Madre Security Memo
translation: 马德雷山脉安保备忘录

original:
Complaint: Mrs. Purvis/Drunk and Disorderly 
Sierra Madre Security Log: 11:02PM
Guard on Call: Morris, Tyler

Describe the Incident: 10PM, received complaints about noise in upper bar, then emergency call from the main floor cashier cage who reported (quote) "old bat on ceiling." Investigating, found guests cheering Mrs. Millicent Purvis, 72, who had climbed over the upper bar railing and was walking on the support beams, indicating loudly that she was (quote), "going to join the circus." She had already tripped over one Holo-Emitter (unhurt), and was inviting guests out on the beams so we could "use them like monkey bars." 

Climbed after her, cornered her near the rafter over the cashier's area, then brought Mrs. Purvis to holding and called her daughter to come escort her to her room. No damage done to rafters or the emitter. Mrs. Purvis's daughter was visibly agitated by the incident and too embarrassed to take any legal action saying that she (quote), "didn't want to cause any more trouble for Mr. Sinclair." Need to gate off the rafter area to prevent repeat incidents.
translation:
投诉：普尔维斯太太/醉酒闹事 
马德雷山脉赌场安保日志：下午11:02
值班警卫：泰勒·莫里斯

案件详情：晚上10点接到有关上层酒吧的噪音投诉，随后主楼出纳柜台打来紧急电话报告（引述）“天花板上有只老蝙蝠”。调查发现，客人们在为72岁的米莉森特·普尔维斯太太打气，她跨过了上层酒吧的护栏，正在沿着支撑梁行走，她大声表示自己正准备（引述）“加入马戏团”。随后她被一台全息影像发生器绊倒（未受伤），还邀请其他客人也到横梁上和她一起“耍吊杆”。 

我跟着普尔维斯太太爬上横梁，将她逼到出纳柜台上方的房梁边缘，并把她抓住，叫来了她女儿将她护送回房间。发生器没有受损。普尔维斯太太的女儿显然对这起事故十分生气，她尴尬地表示希望我们不要追究，她说（引述）“不想给辛克莱先生造成困扰”。有必要在横梁附近设立隔离带，以防类似事故再次发生。

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Mentats"
translation: 售货机代码 - "曼他特"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Wine"
translation: 售货机代码 - "葡萄酒"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Scotch"
translation: 售货机代码 - "苏格兰威士忌"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Vodka"
translation: 售货机代码 - "伏特加"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Med-X"
translation: 售货机代码 - "吗啡针-X"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Puesta del Sol Switching Station Gas Leak
translation: 日落镇开闭所毒气泄露

original: Admitted 3 workers from Puesta del Sol Switching Station. Exposed to some unidentified airborne toxin from the ventilation system. Caused severe lung and tissue damage, inhalation isn't the problem, it's absorbed through the skin. \n\nResearching its effects. The gas, whatever it is, may be building up in vents beneath the town. Asked foreman to look into source before government inspectors do.
translation: 接收了3名日出镇开闭所的工作人员。他们接触了通风系统中的某种不明有毒气体，导致了严重的肺部以及组织损伤。这些气体不仅能通过口鼻吸入，更关键的是它能渗透皮肤。\n\n研究了症状后，我认为，不管这种气体是什么，它都可能已经在小镇下方的通风管道中聚集。我已要求工头查清来源，别等到政府调查员介入。

original: Safety Suits Arrived
translation: 安全防护服已送达

original: Chemical suits arrived today. They're bulky, hard to talk and move in. It was difficult to unlock the clasps once in place, had to get one of the staff to help me out of it. I told the construction crew keep the suits ready while working in the switching station and to be careful with them, we only have a limited number. \n\nI asked Sinclair to order more in the event of a leak in the Villa, and prepared cost estimates for another gas leak to support my case. Didn't need to, he agreed to the request immediately, then asked if he could see the workers and make sure they were all right.
translation: 防化服今天到了。好大，穿上之后说话和行动都不方面。扣子搭好了就很难解开，得找个工作人员才能把我弄出来。我叮嘱施工人员，在开闭所工作时一定要备好防化服，并且一定小心使用，因为数量有限。\n\n我请求辛克莱订购更多防化服，以免毒气泄漏到别墅区。我还列出了一旦再次发生毒气泄漏后可能造成的损失，来支撑我的观点。但事实证明毫无必要，他立刻就同意了。他还提出要去看望受伤的工人。

original: Exhaustion
translation: 神经衰弱

original: Ms Keyes' insomnia seems to have gotten worse, so we ended up ordering the new Auto-Doc upgrades, must have cost Sinclair a fortune. The new programs for the Auto-Docs ameliorate the effects of exhaustion. Have already spoken to the staff about side effects and dangers of prolonged use - wanted to make sure they weren't using it to pull double-shifts.\n\nSinclair asked if these codes could be downloaded into the public dispensers. The codes aren't compatible, unfortunately. He said he'd "look into it." Guess his contacts at Big Mountain will be getting a call soon.
translation: 凯丝女士的失眠状况似乎愈发严重了，我们订购了新的自动医生升级程序，肯定花了辛克莱一大笔钱。自动医生的新程序可以有效缓解疲劳症状。我也把副作用和长期使用的危险性交待给了工作人员，希望他们不会使用这功能来延长加班时间。\n\n辛克莱问能不能把这些代码也加入公共售货机中。可惜代码并不兼容。他说会“想想办法”，我估计他很快就会给大山脉的联系人打电话。

original: Appointment Calendar
translation: 出诊日志

original:
Sinclair + Ms Keyes
<<Transmitted to Sierra Madre>>

Sinclair + Ms Keyes
<<Transmitted to Sierra Madre>>

Domino + Ms Keyes
<<Transmitted to Chief Physician's Terminal>>

Sinclair
Proposed moving 1 Auto-Doc to casino and scheduling visits. Sinclair agreed.
translation:
辛克莱 + 凯丝女士
>

辛克莱 + 凯丝女士
>

多米诺 + 凯丝女士
>

辛克莱
建议将1台自动医生搬去赌场，并安排出诊。辛克莱已同意。

original: Appointment Calendar
translation: 出诊日志

original: Ms Keyes showed up today (sans Sinclair), escorted by Mr. Domino. He explained to me Ms Keyes had developed a throat infection, and asked if the Auto-Doc could help. I asked about the Sierra Madre's Auto-Doc. He said he didn't want to "alarm" Sinclair.\n\nRan some tests. Ms Keyes' voice is fine, her loss of voice was more listlessness, symptomatic of excessive Med-X usage. When I tried to speak to her about it, Mr. Domino intervened. I warned them too much of the Chem could render a subject comatose, and Domino laughed. I lost my temper, and he said they'd return another time when I was in "better spirits." Despise that man.
translation: 凯丝女士今天在多米诺先生的陪同下到访（辛克莱没来），他向我解释说凯丝女士出现了喉部感染的症状，希望我能用自动医生替她治疗。我告诉他赌场里已经有一台了，他说他不想“惊动”辛克莱。\n\n我做了检查。凯丝女士的嗓子很好，她失声主要是由于疲劳，以及吗啡使用过量。我想多和她聊聊，却被多米诺先生打断了。我警告他们滥用药物可能会导致昏迷，多米诺居然笑了。我生气了，他说会等我“精神好些”的时候再来拜访。我鄙视这个男人。

original: Unpleasant Visit
translation: 不速之客

original: Domino stopped by to ask about the test results and Vera's voice. He seemed concerned she would lose her voice for the Gala Event. I told him if Ms Keyes was concerned, she should see me, and I would only disclose any medical information to her. I told him the Auto-Docs were more than capable of healing Ms Keyes voice if she developed any throat infection, and we could even operate if need be if she tore her larynx. He seemed satisfied by the news, apologized, amazingly enough, and left a bottle of wine as a token of his appreciation. I told him I felt it was inappropriate, he insisted. I dumped it in the trash.
translation: 多米诺又来问我薇拉嗓子的检查结果，他似乎担心她会在庆典晚会上失声。我告诉他，如果凯丝女士真的那么担心，她就应该亲自来见我，我只会向她本人透露病情。我还告诉他，如果真的是喉部感染，那自动医生完全能够治好；就算是声带撕裂，有需要的话我们也可以做手术。他似乎对这个回答很满意, 居然十分诚恳地向我道歉，还送了我一瓶酒以表感谢。我告诉他这不合适, 但他还是硬塞给了我。我把酒扔进了垃圾桶。

original: Notes on Emergency Protocols
translation: 关于应急制度条例的笔记

original: Been reading this over: "In the event of a fire, chemical leak, nuclear attack, or other threat to the casino, the interior and exterior doors will hermetically seal to prevent harm coming to the guests. During this time, Holograms will be deployed and assume threat status until the lockdown is ended."\n\nGuess can't be too careful these days. Still, what if there was another leak at the switching station? Not to mention the gas valves in the kitchen. If those got hit, the whole casino's a torch.
translation: 看到这段话：“若发生火灾、化学品泄漏、核打击，或其他针对赌场的威胁，内外门将会封闭，以防游客受到伤害。在此期间，全息影像将启动并评估威胁状况，直到封锁结束。”\n\n看来以后得多加小心了。可万一开闭所又发生泄漏怎么办？更别说厨房的瓦斯阀了。如果那些地方出问题，整个赌场都会炸锅的。

original: Security Measure Meeting
translation: 安保措施会议

original: Since you missed it, Sinclair outlined security measures today. Wasn't blind to what was happening in the news, wanted to take steps if the Chinese got a foothold on American soil. Ran us through the added functionality of the holograms, then explained the construction of the casino, its emergency protocols, and the broadcast signal we're using for the Gala Event. Guy's a nut job, still, seems to have the bases covered. Guess the isolation of the casino was intentional. Not sure what he's hoping to protect, sure seems obsessed with it.
translation: 你错过了今天的会议，辛克莱公布了安保措施概要。他对新闻报道里的情况很重视，如果中国军队入侵美国本土，他就要采取措施。他向我们介绍了全息影像的新功能，然后解释了赌场的构造、应急预案、以及我们在开幕晚会中使用的广播信号。这家伙虽然是个疯子，但准备工作倒是挺细致的。看来赌场的与世隔绝是有意为之，也不知道他要保护什么，只是感觉他把心思都用在了这上面。

original: Holding Cell
translation: 牢房

original: Nothing much to report. Pretty quiet tonight, even from Puesta del Sol. Imagine Morris up in the casino probably has more than enough with the guests coming in tonight, poor bastard.\n\nSet up the radios so I can listen in on the Gala Event when it fires up, and left one out for the prisoners. If Sinclair doesn't want us to be too strict with the guests tonight, I may just toss the key in the holding cage with anyone we pick up and let them unlock the door when they sleep it off.
translation: 没什么要报告的。今晚就连日出镇都很安静。想想莫里斯还要在赌场里应付那么多客人，老兄真可怜。\n\n我已经调好了收音机，这样就能收听庆典晚会了，我还特意在牢房里也装了一个。如果辛克莱今晚打算对客人们睁一只眼闭一只眼，我可能会把钥匙丢进牢房里，等那些被我们逮进来的家伙酒醒了之后，他们就可以自己找钥匙开门出去了。

original: Communications
translation: 通信

original: Set up the radio room downstairs to broadcast through the speakers. Don't want to miss tonight's performance, the receiver down there is stronger than the desk radios we have up here.\n\nStashed some supplies from the evidence room down there to celebrate once my shift is over. Way I figure it, the rest of the guards'll be too busy to check up on me.
translation: 我把楼下的广播室接好了，这样就能通过扬声器来放广播了。我可不想错过今晚的表演，下面的信号接收器比我桌上这台收音机要强得多。\n\n我还从证据室里顺了几样东西藏在楼下，等下了班就拿出来庆祝。我寻思今晚所有保安都很忙，应该查不到我头上的。

original: Prohibited Items
translation: 违禁品

original: Sinclair's prohibition list is going to be difficult to enforce and told him so. He claims we're getting an automated system that would confiscate items even the slightest bit radioactive or foreign and ship them back to the visitor's source address. Asked about items already in the Villa (didn't mention the construction crew) and he dismissed it.\n\nOf course, no sooner than Sinclair gives his prohibition speech, his pal swings by the same hour, asking how "hardnosed" we were going to be. Told me he couldn't guarantee he could keep me supplied if I didn't treat his "friends" with the same respect. Prick.
translation: 辛克莱的禁令很难执行，已经向他反映过了，他说会引进一套自动系统，进来的旅客身上只要携带一丁点放射性物质或外来物品，都会被没收然后寄回原址。我问他别墅区里已有的东西怎么办（没提到建筑工人的情况），他却避而不答。\n\n当然，就在辛克莱公布这条禁令后不久，他那位朋友就登门拜访了，还问我们是否打算“秉公执法”。他告诉我，如果我对待他的“朋友们”不像我今天对他那样毕恭毕敬的话，他就无法保证我的物资供应了。混蛋。

original: Security System Installation
translation: 安保系统装置

original: Sinclair installed a new security system for visitors coming into and out of the Villa - he doesn't seem to care too much about what they do when they're inside, only that we confiscate any personal items that could be dangerous or foreign, and make sure we know who enters and who leaves. Asked him again about watching the construction crews. He said that was a "Villa matter" (great, that means the Prick runs the show). As long as there were no more accidents among the crews, that's what he cared about. \n\nBarely tucked my flask under the desk before he showed up. He gets that disapproving look when he sees the hard stuff.
translation: 辛克莱为进出别墅区的游客安装了一套新的安保系统。他似乎不太在意游客在别墅区里干什么，只要我们能及时没收他们身上携带的任何危险或外来物品，并做好出入登记就行。我又问了他是否要多留意一下那帮建筑工人，他说那是“别墅区的内部事务”（真好，那个混蛋可以继续作威作福了）。只要工人不再出事故，他就无所谓。 \n\n他进来的时候，我差点没来得及把酒瓶子塞到桌子底下。他只要一看到酒就会立马摆出一张臭脸。

original: Inventory
translation: 物资库

original: Got the weapons and the mines in today, along with the shotguns and the ammo, enough to defend the Villa if trouble breaks out. Sinclair's taking the world situation seriously, even all the way out here... maybe more so because we're out here. \n\nHate to think if someone got their hands on half the stuff we have stored here. Enough military ordinance here to turn the Villa into a mine field.
translation: 今天进了一批武器和地雷，还有散弹枪和弹药，一旦发生骚乱，这些东西应该足够保卫别墅区了。辛克莱对国际局势非常担心，哪怕我们地处如此偏远的山区……也许正是因为偏僻才更要小心吧。\n\n这里储藏的军火哪怕有一半落入他人手中，后果都是无法想象的。这么多军备，足够把整个度假村变成雷区了。

original: Dispenser Report
translation: 售货机报告

original: Dispensers are up and running. Unlike most everything else, we've had few problems with them. I heard they'd been part of some World's Fair exhibit Sinclair had seen, so he contacted the researchers about the dispensers to see if he could use them here. \n\nTurns out, dispensers do more than supply convenience items: if there's an emergency or the threat of communist attack, codes can unlock ammo and repair kits for the dispensers. Stored back-ups of the codes in the contraband room, just in case.
translation: 公共售货机已经开始运行。和其他绝大多数玩意不一样，这些东西没给我们惹麻烦。我听说它们是辛克莱在某次世博会上相中的，后来他联系了售货机的研发人员，想把机器引进这里使用。\n\n事实证明，售货机的功能不仅限于提供便利商品，如果遇到紧急情况或者共产主义袭击，使用特殊代码就可以解锁售货机中的武器弹药和维修工具。我备份了一些代码放在违禁品室里，以防万一。

original: Special Orders
translation: 特殊代码

original: Those Vending Machines are something else - we got codes in today so we don't even need the demolition charges, or even more tool orders. You use these things at the Vending Machines, it unlocks construction equipment - even demolition charges and repair kits?
translation: 这些自动售货机的功能不一般，我们今天拿到了代码，以后我们都不需要炸药包，也不需要工具订单了。你可以在自动售货机上使用代码，它就会解锁一批工程物资，甚至包括炸药包和维修工具箱？

original: Stained Note
translation: 污损的笔记

original: Liquor shipment finally came in today - didn't realize working here would be like working in a dry state. Just need to keep it out of sight of security and Sinclair, and ought to take the edge off the day, keep it stashed in the back.
translation: 今天总算送了一批酒进来，没想到在这儿工作居然和在沙漠里没两样。不过得把酒藏在保安和辛克莱看不到的地方，可以用它来缓解一天的疲劳，就藏在后面好了。

original: Shipment Invoice
translation: 货物清单

original: Shipments got routed again, and what was meant for the casino restaurant ended up in the Villa main for the umpteenth time. Hauling those crates of knives up to the main lobby ain't going to be my job, especially with no cars.
translation: 货又送错了，原本要送赌场餐厅的东西又给送到别墅区来了，我都数不清是第几次了。我才不想把那几大箱子菜刀搬去赌场大厅，何况也没车。

original: Journal
translation: 日记

original: One thing about the liquor they're shipping in, it's making somebody talk - the big man came down today and told us that we have a sweet deal set up, and one slipped word in front of security can bring this all crashing down... for real.
translation: 他们偷运进来的酒哪儿都好，就是有个问题，会让人管不住自己的嘴。那位大人物今天又来告诉我们有笔大买卖，要是有人不小心在警卫面前说漏了嘴，这事可就彻底黄了……真的。

original: Survey Schedules
translation: 调研安排

original: Sinclair's coming tomorrow to check on the Villa's "progress," told the boys to look sharp for the suit. Not bringing the big starlet, though, so the boys were grumbling about that. \n\nBetter watch himself, might have a nasty fall in the switching station.
translation: 辛克莱明天要来检查别墅区的“进度”，我告诉工人们要收拾整齐，精神饱满一点。然而他没有带那位大影星来，伙计们似乎有点怨言。\n\n他自己最好小心点，否则搞不好也会在开闭所摔个大跟头。

original: Visit
translation: 视察

original: Sinclair was a lot more level than I was expecting. Especially after Mr. Yesterday's cracks. He's sharper than one of those knives, too. He asked a lot of good questions about the foundations, some I couldn't even answer, didn't bother him though. He knows engineering, that's for sure. Worried he's going to see through the Villa, see it for the cardboard town it is.
translation: 辛克莱比我想象的要高明得多，尤其是针对耶斯特戴先生留下的漏洞。他的嗅觉其实相当敏锐。他问了很多关于地基的问题，有些我都答不上来，但他倒是不太在意。他很懂工程，这是毫无疑问的。真担心他会看穿这一切，发现整个别墅区就是个纸糊的工程。

original: Contracts
translation: 合同

original: We have a sweet deal here. I let Mr. Yesterday know that, know that we might need to renegotiate our arrangement and move the % around. Left records in maintenance in case things got difficult, blow this deathtrap wide open. Agreed to discuss things in the switching station so we wouldn't be overheard.
translation: 谈了一笔好买卖，我已经告诉了耶斯特戴先生，我们可能要重新谈条件，把分成改一改。特意留了维修记录，以防将来惹上麻烦被人捅娄子。我同意把谈判地点定在到开闭所，这样我们就不会被人偷听了。

original: Promotion
translation: 晋升

original: This place is a safety inspector's wet dream. Or nightmare. Foreman ended up taking a fall in the switching station last night, broke one of his legs and his neck, but didn't die from it - he bled out before anyone found him. Bad luck - wasn't his shift, no idea what he was doing down there, but I'm surprised he fell and didn't have one of the platforms just collapse on him.
translation: 如果找个安检员来视察这个地方，那他要么会乐开花，要么会做噩梦。昨晚工头从开闭所的楼上掉下来了，腿和脖子都摔断了，但死因并不是这个，而是失血过多，他过了好久才被人发现。真倒霉，当时又不是他值班，不知道他在那里做什么，但我还是很惊讶，他掉下来的时候，他站的平台居然没有跟着塌下来砸到他身上。

original: Chat
translation: 聊天

original: Domino swung by today after the foreman's accident. Wanted to know how I was handling it, if the boys and I were doing all right. Guy's a snake, laying on the fake charm, trying to be one of us - he asked if we were being paid as "befits our skills." He said if we weren't, to come see him, he'd set us up. I'm not stupid, I seen the percentages, I know someone's making a killing off the corners we're cutting - sounds like Domino and construction are arm-in-arm. Don't matter to me as long as the cash gets left in the drawer every week.
translation: 工头出事后，今天多米诺突然来找我。他问我这件事的处理结果，还想了解我和其他工人的情况。那家伙就是个小人，假仁假义，想和我们套近乎。他甚至问我们拿的报酬是否“配得上我们的能力”，说什么如果工钱不合理，可以来找他，他可以安排。我又不蠢，我看过报表，我知道有人在偷工减料，感觉就是多米诺和建筑商在狼狈为奸。反正只要每周我能按时拿到工钱，这都不关我的事。

original: Damn Raid
translation: 该死的突击检查

original: Villa security showed up today and searched the place. Domino must've made the Chief mad, so this was payback. Had all our stashes tucked away when they arrived, didn't find much. Chief tried to be all hard with us about keeping our noses clean, ranted about "casino policy." \n\nThat Sinclair's a tight-ass. Sick of these spot-checks and stripped by the casino search programs every time I enter the Villa. What's his issue with chems? He could use some. So could that pretty bride-to-be, though she looks half-doped up with that expression of hers. Med-X from the looks of it.
translation: 别墅区的保安队今天来搜查了整个地方，多米诺肯定把警长惹毛了，他们是来打击报复的。好在他们来之前我们就把东西藏了起来，没被搜出多少。警长大声呵斥我们，叫我们少惹事生非，还说要遵守什么“赌场管理制度”。\n\n辛克莱这个铁公鸡。每次我进别墅区都要过一道搜身程序，动不动就抽查、没收，搞得人精疲力竭。他和成瘾性药品到底有什么仇？我看他自己就该嗑点药，还有他那个漂亮的未婚妻也是。虽然从她那副昏昏沉沉的表情来看，估计也嗑过不少吗啡。

original: More Explosives
translation: 又有炸药运来了

original: More demolition charges showed up today - checked with Mr. Yesterday, he didn't know squat about the shipment, was only interested if anyone had made a buck off it. These something Sinclair ordered, or is it another cock-up like the knives? We got more than enough explosives already - what, is high-and-mighty planning to blow up the road to this place so no one can get up here?
translation: 今天又送来了一批炸药包。和耶斯特戴先生确认过了，他完全不知道这批货的事，只关心是不是有人在靠这玩意捞油水。一定是辛克莱订购的，或者是像上次那批菜刀一样又搞错了？我们的炸药实在太多了，上头是不是计划着要把来这儿的路炸飞，好让任何人都进不来啊？

original: Vending Machine Installation
translation: 安装售货机

original: Oversaw the streetside Vending Machines installation today, all working, mostly because the casino crew was running the show. \n\nFinally complained to the Chief about the machines. They feel like a "company store." We only get a few casino chips with the paycheck, so we can barely buy anything. Chief says he's not sure the chips were Sinclair's idea, only if we had any problems with the machines, let him know immediately.
translation: 今天监督了街边自动售货机的安装，一切正常，主要因为负责安装的是赌场里的员工。\n\n终于和警长抱怨了下机器。他们感觉就这东西就像是“内部超市”。我们发工资时只领到了几个赌场筹码，所以几乎买不起任何东西。警长说他也不知道发筹码是不是辛克莱的主意，只知道机器一旦出问题，就要立刻向他报告。

original: Search and Seizure
translation: 搜身与扣押

original: After another "discussion" with the Puesta del Sol crew, told Chief it'd be difficult to enforce the prohibition list, let alone the searches. Chief had the Gala on his brain, said Sinclair put construction of the Villa more important than patting down the construction crews for liquor and chems as long as they didn't hurt anyone or each other. Got a little hot under the collar, Chief did too, told me to walk it off.\n\nThis whole thing stinks. Chief's barely got time for me, now Sinclair's turning a blind eye to things in the Villa because his friend's running the show?
translation: 又一次找日出镇的工人们“谈话”之后，我告诉警长，禁令很难执行，更不用说搜身了。警长满脑子就想着开幕晚会，他说辛克莱更重视的是别墅区的建设进度，只要那些建筑工人不会伤害到他人或者自己，就没必要检查他们身上的酒精和成瘾药品。我有些恼火，警长也一样，他把我轰了出去。\n\n整件事都糟糕透了。警长不肯听我的意见，连辛克莱也对别墅区的状况视而不见，难道就因为那地方是他朋友负责的吗？

original: No More Parking Tickets
translation: 不用开停车罚单

original: One good thing about this assignment - no more writing parking tickets. Sinclair's laid out the streets so narrow, cars can't even come into the Villa. Resources being what they are, he may not want folks to waste gas coming here. Cuts down on traffic noise, too. Chief says it's more than that, says Sinclair wanted the Villa to be "reclusive." \n\nLong as I don't have to worry about double-parking snobs or Chryslus gas-hogs clogging the Villa, I could care less. Wonder how he expects folks to get here, though. Seems extreme, even for privacy.
translation: 干这活有一个好处，就是不用再开停车罚单了。辛克莱把街道布置得很窄，车子根本开不进来。毕竟资源宝贵，他可能想让人们少浪费一点汽油，也可以减少一些交通噪音。警长说不仅如此，辛克莱还希望这个别墅区可以“遗世独立”。 \n\n只要不用操心那些乱停车的小市民以及大排量的克莱斯勒汽车堵塞街道，这些事情我都无所谓。可他要让客人怎么到这儿来呢？哪怕是为了与世隔绝，也做得有点过了吧。

original: Gas Leak
translation: 毒气泄露

original: Ventilation's all shot to hell, which is going to be a problem when summer hits. The pipes backed up, the chambers started spewing out this red dust cloud, like rust - whatever it was, caused the guys to start choking and vomiting. It's like the place was getting sprayed for roaches, 'cept the bug spray was hitting us. Got the boys to the Clinic, put them out of commission. Mr. Yesterday said he couldn't justify having them paid, but he'd see what he could do "on the side." Sounds like he was going to get them some chems - and a little green for keeping their mouths shut.
translation: 通风系统全部失灵了，等到夏天会出大事的。管道堵了，室内开始涌出红色的尘埃云，像铁锈一样，人闻了就会窒息呕吐。这地方就好像被喷了蟑螂药，但被杀的蟑螂是我们。我把那几个小伙子送去诊所，让他们停工了。耶斯特戴先生说这些人没资格拿到工钱，但他会想办法“私底下”解决。听上去他打算用成瘾性药品和钱来堵他们的嘴。

original: Second Shifts
translation: 又起风波

original: The boys hit by the gas are still out, everyone's pulling more work in as a result, and grumbling's starting. Mr. Yesterday's been keeping the hard liquor and chems coming under Sinclair's eye, isn't helping. We need those boys back. We have another chemical leak like that, no more construction for the rest of the year.
translation: 被毒气呛倒的几个人都还在昏迷中，于是每个人的工作量都增加了，开始有人抱怨。耶斯特戴先生瞒着辛克莱运了不少烈酒和违禁药进来，但作用不大。我们需要的是那些工人，要是再发生一起毒气泄漏事故，今年就别想再施工了。

original: Suits are Here
translation: 防护服到了

original: Those new chemical suits came in today, so we could check out the ventilation chambers, see how that cloud cocktail formed. Suits are kind of creepy looking, hard to talk in them, so we had to use sign language to actually make sense of each other. At least we can check out the pipes and ventilation chambers now.\n\nGas worries me, though. Really messed the guys up. If the chambers get backed up again hate to see that gas get out, wipe out the Villa.
translation: 新的防化服今天到了，我们打算穿着它去检查通风控制室，想搞清楚这些有毒混合物是怎么形成的。防化服的样子很怪异，在里面很难讲话，所以我们只能用手语来互相交流。至少现在我们可以检查通风系统了。\n\n但这些毒气还是很令我担心。受伤的工人们情况不妙。我可不想看到管道里再冒出这种气体，那样整个别墅区都要完蛋。

original: Maintenance Report
translation: 维修报告

original: Didn't take long to find the problem. Heading down the main pipe, we hit traces of the gas - not the full red stuff like last time, though, minor blessing. The kicker was despite the sealant, it still got inside the suit, turns out the gas eroded the metal of the suit's locks. So not only did one of the boys get exposed, everyone who went down there got locked in their suits.
translation: 我们没花多久就发现了问题所在。顺着主管道往下，我们追踪到了那些气体。老天有眼，不像上次那么浓烈。意外的是，尽管防护服都打了密封胶，可毒气还是能钻进来，原来这种毒气会腐蚀防护服上的金属锁扣。光是有个小伙子吸入了毒气还不要紧，现在好了，下去的所有人都被困在了防护服里。

original: Suit Damage
translation: 防护服破损

original: Sure, the Docs at the Clinic got mad, but we didn't have any choice if we wanted to get medical attention after that gas hit us. So we cut his suit open with one of those surplus steak knives (things could cut through a T-bone like it was hot butter). Rest of us tried to pry the locks on our suits, finally had to use the knives on ours, too.\n\nCan't wait until this job is over and we can let the Villa collapse on itself. They'll be too busy at the casino anyway.
translation: 虽然诊所的大夫们生气了，可我们没别的办法，被毒气袭击后，想要自救就只能这么做。于是我们用牛排餐刀把他的防护服割开 （这玩意切丁字骨就像切热黄油一样简单）。剩下的人本来尝试撬开防护服上的锁扣，但最后也还是得用刀子。\n\n真想早点干完活走人，这别墅区塌就塌了吧，反正他们只顾着赌场。

original: Infrastructure
translation: 基础设施

original: As shoddy as the support beams are for most of these buildings, the ventilation system's worse, and the problems they had over at Puesta... sure, when you count our bonuses, it's good, but not when the workers are coughing to death. Hate to see what this place spits out if someone let the ventilation system chug along for a few years, we'd have another Greener Pastures on our hand, easy, and a pile of bodies beyond it.
translation: 这些建筑的支撑梁大部分质量低劣，通风系统的情况更是糟糕。他们在日落镇也发现了不少问题……当然，论奖金咱们是赚爆了，可工人们会被活活呛死的。要是让这通风系统再继续运转几年，都不知道这地方会变成什么样。到时候咱们就是第二个绿草垃圾填埋场，满地都是死人。

original: Personal Log
translation: 个人日志

original: Mr. Yesterday says they can get the incident hushed up, after all, no one really saw what happened when the patio collapsed, and the balcony along with it... we can also see about getting the medical reports at the clinic deleted, too, it's all good. Still, I'm getting nervous - whole thing's a big gamble, won't be long before people see the Villa for what it is, sand barely held together with spit and glue. We're protected legal-wise, even so, this is criminal. It's like he doesn't want this place to last.
translation: 耶斯特戴先生说他可以把事故压下来，毕竟没人看到天井和阳台倒塌时的情况……诊所的医疗报告也都删除了，一切正常。但我还是很紧张，这简直是一场豪赌，人们很快就会发现整个别墅区的真相，它就是一个用唾沫和胶水糊起来的豆腐渣工程。我们披着合法的外衣，干的却是谋财害命的勾当。感觉他巴不得这地方早点塌掉。

original: Journal Page
translation: 日记纸页

original: ...town's going to get built, it just ain't built to last. Casino might be a different story, it's like a bank vault to the sky, but that's just me. It's a big show for someone, hope Sinclair survives this one.
translation: ……小镇慢慢盖起来了，可建筑质量却惨不忍睹。但赌场是另一回事, 它就像一座坚实的地下金库, 不过这只是我的个人想法。有人想借这个地方中饱私囊，希望辛克莱能平安度过这次危机。

original: Torn Journal Page
translation: 日记残页

original: ...seems kind enough, signed my poster, and even the promo photo. Kind of a sad look to her, though, like she wasn't really there. And she almost ran when Mr. Domino slipped his arm through hers, and he wasn't even looking at her, like she was a bag hanging on his arm. Something wrong between those two, not sure if Sinclair sees it, but I do.
translation: ……人还不错，她在我的海报上签了名，连宣传照上也签了。不过她似乎情绪有些低落，显得心不在焉。多米诺先生挽她胳膊时，感觉她甚至想把他甩开。多米诺先生也不屑于瞧她一眼，仿佛她就是个挂在胳膊上的手提包。这两人有些不对头，不知道辛克莱看没看到，但我看到了。

original: Stained Page
translation: 脏兮兮的笔记

original: Not going to rat me out for what happened in the Villa - I'm not the one who laid the foundation, and I'm not going to take the fall for the supports, either. They try and pin this on me, I'll let them all know what's really going on with the construction contracts.
translation: 休想让我当这次别墅区事故的替罪羊，我又不是打地基的人，柱子也不是我造的。他们想让我背黑锅，那我就让他们知道施工合同上是怎么写的。

original: Status Report
translation: 情况报告

original: ...the Villa's like cardboard, but the casino? That place isn't built for people to just gamble, it's a place for them to take cover if the big ones hit. Those doors can be hermetically sealed, and whatever they got lining the floors screws up anything not hooked up direct by wires. \n\nWord is, while Mr. Yesterday got the Villa covered, Sinclair's locking up the Sierra Madre like a golden trap.
translation: ……别墅区的建筑就像纸糊的一样，但赌场呢？我看那里不光是给人赌博的，简直就是拿来躲避原子弹的。每扇门都可以封上，而且他们不知在楼板里铺了什么玩意，所有非有线的传输信号都会遭到干扰。\n\n虽然耶斯特戴先生糟蹋了别墅区的工程，但据说辛克莱已经把赌场建成了一座密不透风的城堡。

original: Personal Log
translation: 私人日志

original: Asked the Foreman how come no one's wised up yet, and he just winked, said we got someone watching out for us, an ace in the hole. As long as we're good until showtime, this whole Villa's going to be the biggest con of all time. That's because half the maintenance shipments aren't coming through - Sinclair's too blinded by that Starlet to see beyond the casino, so we're able to cut corners when we need to, and no one's going to look too close at the budgets while the casino's big opening is underway, and after that, we'll be long gone.
translation: 我问工头，怎么现在都没人过问那件事，他只是冲我眨了眨眼，说我们留了后手，有高人罩着我们。只要顺利竣工，那么这个别墅区就将变成有史以来最大的豆腐渣工程，因为有一半的维护设备都没有送来。辛克莱已经被那个女影星迷得神魂颠倒，根本顾不得赌场外面的事。我们几乎在每个地方都偷工减料，而赌场上下正忙着筹备开幕庆典，根本没人会仔细核对预算单。等庆典结束的时候，我们早就远走高飞了。

original: Vera Keyes' "Let the Bright Tomorrow in" Song (II)
translation: 薇拉·凯丝的"去往远方"歌曲录音(II)

original: This is a fragment of Vera Keyes' melody, "Let the Bright Tomorrow in."
translation: 这是薇拉·凯丝的歌曲《去往远方》的片段。

original: Vera Keyes' "Let the Bright Tomorrow in" Song (III)
translation: 薇拉·凯丝的"重新开始"歌曲录音(III)

original: This is a fragment of Vera Keyes' melody, "Let the Bright Tomorrow in."
translation: 这是薇拉·凯丝的歌曲《重新开始》的片段。

original: Vera Keyes' "Let the Bright Tomorrow in" Song (I)
translation: 薇拉·凯丝的"愿阳光洒满明天"歌曲录音(I)

original: This is a fragment of Vera Keyes' melody, "Let the Bright Tomorrow in."
translation: 这是薇拉·凯丝的歌曲《愿阳光洒满明天》的片段。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Return SA Armor"
translation: 售货机代码 - "退还安保护甲"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines that allows a user to return the selected item for Sierra Madre Chips.
translation: 这是一串限量发货代码，可在自动售货机上为用户退还指定物品，将其重新兑换成马德雷山脉赌场使用的筹码。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Stimpak"
translation: 售货机代码 - "治疗针"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Return Outfit Item"
translation: 售货机代码 - "退还服装"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines that allows a user to return the selected item for Sierra Madre Chips.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上为用户退还指定物品，将其重新兑换成马德雷山脉赌场使用的筹码。

original: Vault Turret Terminal Password
translation: 避难所炮塔终端密码

original:
Don't use this unless strictly necessary.

The Vault is off-limits. There is no reason to enter it unless your clearance is personally approved by Mr. Sinclair.

Still, if anything were to go wrong with those security systems, use this password in the Turret-Defense terminal inside the Vault's Chamber:

"HeartArrow"

Lou Martin

M&M Construction Inc.
Crew Chief.
translation:
不到万不得已的话最好别这么做。

避难所禁止入内。除非你得到了辛克莱先生的亲自批准，否则也没必要进入。

不过，如果安保系统出现任何问题，可以在避难所金库的炮塔防御终端上使用这个密码：

“爱心箭”

卢·马丁

M&M建筑公司
员工主管

original: Vera Keyes' Audition
translation: 薇拉·凯丝的音频

original: Dean Domino's Blackmail Evidence
translation: 迪安·多米诺勒索的证据

original: Vending Machine Code - "Automatic Rifle - Upgraded Internals"
translation: 售货机代码 - "自动步枪升级构件"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt increases the Automatic Rifle's rate of fire.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品可以提升自动步枪的射速。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Hologram Rifle - Reinforced Components"
translation: 售货机代码 - "全息步枪强化组件"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt appears to improve the condition of the Hologram Rifle.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品似乎能提升全息步枪的耐久度。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Bear Trap Fist - Heavy Duty Springs"
translation: 售货机代码 - "捕熊夹拳套重型弹簧"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt looks as if it can increase the damage the Bear Trap Fist does.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品似乎能提升捕熊夹拳套的伤害。

original: Toxic Samples
translation: 毒云样本

original: Boy, am I ever glad to be out of that damned suit! Almost lost a few men today getting enough samples together for the eggheads to take a look at.
translation: 天哪，我真高兴能脱掉那该死的防护服！为了收集足够的样本去给那些书呆子们化验，今天有几个人差点没了。

original: Vera Keyes' Medical Report
translation: 薇拉·凯丝的医疗报告

original:
/Sinclair Access 301
Subject: Keyes, Vera
Condition: Terminal

Sinclair, 

There's not much more we can do for Miss Keyes except keep her comfortable. Her exhaustion will persist, as will the insomnia.

Recommend continuing Med-X/Superstim treatments. This is not a viable long-term solution. The pain will persist and increase over time, and the dosages she's currently taken already carry the risk of overdose. Based on discussions, I also fear allowing Miss Keyes access to those amounts of Chems may lead to purposeful overdose, and recommend psychiatric evaluation as well.
translation:
/辛克莱病历 301
患者: 薇拉·凯丝
状态: 病危

辛克莱，

我们已经无法再为凯丝女士做什么了，只能尽量缓解她的痛苦。她全身疲乏和失眠的症状都会持续。

建议继续使用吗啡针X/超级治疗针进行治疗。但这并不是长久可行的解决方案。痛苦不会消失，只会随着时间加剧，并且她目前采用的剂量已经有过量的风险。基于会诊结果，我还担心让凯丝女士接触如此多的成瘾性药品，可能会导致她刻意滥用药物，建议同时进行心理状况评估。

original:
Dear Mr. Elijah,

Congratulations on your winning luck at the Sierra Madre Casino! We have set up your payment of Sierra Madre Chips to be automatically delivered at the dropbox you specified every three days.

Thank you and we hope you enjoyed your stay!

Sincerely,

The Sierra Madre Management
translation:
亲爱的以利亚先生,

恭喜您在马德雷山脉赌场博得好彩! 我们每隔三天会将免费代金券邮递到您指定的信箱中，您可以使用代金券在马德雷山脉赌场的自动售货机中兑换筹码。

感谢您的光临，祝您旅途愉快!

此致,

马德雷山脉赌场管理处

original: Hologram: Installation and Maintenance 1.1
translation: 全息影像：安装和维护 1.1

original: Welcome, and on behalf of your friends at N.E., we thank you for purchasing the latest in service and security technology.\n\nIf you encounter any problems, contact our urgent care service representatives at any time during the weekdays from 10 to 2 on Tuesdays and Thursdays. If no one is there to respond to your emergency, leave a message and one of our trained representatives will return your call in the next three to four working days.
translation: 欢迎，谨代表国家电力的全体员工，感谢您购买我们最新的服务与安保系统。\n\n若遇到任何问题，请在工作日周二到周四的上午10点到下午2点间致电我们的紧急售后服务热线。若无人应答，请留言，我们的专职技术代表会在3至4个工作日内向您回电。

original: Hologram: Service Protocols 2.3
translation: 全息影像：服务规章 2.3

original:
Holograms are programmed with service protocols and security protocols.

Service protocol holograms perform a specific function - greeters, simple vendors, or in the case of the Sierra Madre casino itself, even monitoring gambling tables. These service holograms follow simple routines, and are incapable of performing any security function.

Holograms cannot move beyond range of their emitters and are best when used for a simple, localized function.
translation:
全息影像的内置程序包括了服务协议与安保协议。
预装了服务协议的全息影像可以执行特定的功能，例如担任迎宾员，小商贩，甚至是马德雷山脉赌场的荷官。这类全息影像的行为只会遵循固定模式，不具备安保功能。

全息影像无法移动到发生器的有效范围之外，建议仅让其承担活动范围较小的简单工作。

original: Hologram: Security Protocols 2.4
translation: 全息影像：安保规章 2.4

original: Security protocol holograms do just as the name implies: provide security. They perform this function better than most conventional security guards.
translation: 顾名思义，预装了安保协议的全息影像可以提供安保服务。它们的表现比绝大多数普通保安都要优秀。

original: Hologram: Addendum: Appearance 2.4.1
translation: 全息影像：附录：外观 2.4.1

original: Security holograms have been programmed with the case-specific Sierra Madre protocols.\n\nNot only do security holograms look like Sierra Madre personnel, they will respond to threats or unauthorized personnel just as conventional security guards would.
translation: 安保型全息影像内置了专为马德雷山脉赌场定制的服务协议。\n\n安保型全息影像的外貌不仅与马德雷山脉赌场的工作人员相似，还会像普通警卫那样对各类非法闯入者与威胁采取措施。

original: Hologram: Security Protocols 2.5
translation: 全息影像：安保规章 2.5

original: Security holograms use field of view sensors to perceive their environment and to aid in pathing. While later versions will feature upgrades that allow for a 360 degree perception arc, the memory cells in current hologram emitters can only perceive their environment in a cone in front of them.\n\nThey can, however, change facing as needed and scan their environment for unauthorized activity. It is best to purchase security hologram emitters in pairs to cover a full view of the environment, as trespassers could conceivably use hologram blindspots to gain access to unauthorized areas!
translation: 安保型全息影像采用视觉传感器来感知周遭环境，规划行动路线。虽然后续版本可实现360度全方位侦测，但目前全息影像发生器的记忆单元只能允许其感知前方锥状视野范围内的物体。\n\n然而，安保型全息影像可以根据需要改变朝向，扫描周遭环境中的一切违规行为。建议成对购买安保型全息影像发生器，以实现视野的全域覆盖，因为闯入者可能会借助视野盲区溜进禁止进入的区域！

original: Hologram: Threat Detection 2.6
translation: 全息影像：威胁探测 2.6

original:
If security holograms detect unauthorized guests or detect criminal action, they will display a warning "caution" color to the target.

If you believe they ever display this color in error, immediately move away from the hologram's field of view until they resume their normal protocol. If the behavior persists, they will enter engagement mode, turn red, and attempt to subdue targets with their discharge beams.

Note: As requested in the service contract, N.E. has installed EBE systems in all Sierra Madre security hologram emitters.
translation:
一旦安保型全息影像侦测到非法闯入人员或其他违规行为，它们就会立刻改变颜色，向目标发出警告。

如果你认为安保型全息影像出现误报，请立即离开全息影像的视野范围，直至它们恢复正常状态。如果不停止相关行为，它们就会进入战斗状态，通体变为红色，并尝试使用电击光束来制服目标。

注意: 根据服务合同要求，国家电力已在所有马德雷山脉赌场的安保型全息影像身上安装EBE系统。

original: Hologram: Threat Response 2.6.2
translation: 全息影像：威胁反应 2.6.2

original: Often, an intruder's natural response is to attack a security hologram, either with fists or with a weapon. Fortunately for the hologram owner, all such assaults are useless against security holograms! They cannot be wounded, damaged, or harmed unless their emitter is destroyed.\n\nAttackers spending the time to look for emitters will usually be rendered unconscious by a hologram's discharge beams before they can disable them, so there is nothing to fear.
translation: 通常情况下, 闯入者的自然反应是用拳头或者武器攻击安保型全息影像。但买家大可放心，这些攻击对安保型全息影像都是无效的！他们不会受伤、受损或报废，除非发生器被摧毁。\n\n即便攻击者大费周章地去寻找发生器，也通常会在拆除发生器之前就被全息影像用带电光束制服，所以没什么好担心的。

original: Hologram: Security Patrols 2.7
translation: 全息影像：安保巡逻 2.7

original: As with service holograms, security holograms cannot leave emitter range. They will pursue a target to the emitter's perimeter, however. This usually allows a target to be subdued, and should present no obstacle to casino security.
translation: 与服务型全息影像一样，安保型全息影像也不能离开发生器的有效范围。但它们会在发生器允许的边界内追踪目标，这通常足以制服目标，也不会对赌场正常的安保构成障碍。

original: Hologram: Hologram Emitters 5.0
translation: 全息影像：全息影像发生器 5.0

original: Hologram emitters are sturdy, yet can still be damaged or broken if enough force is applied. In addition, while they are protected inside sturdy space age alloys, their circuits are vulnerable to being tampered with. If this occurs, refer to the repair manual that comes with the hologram installation guide. Please call customer support services if this occurs. Do not attempt to repair the emitter yourself!\n\nWarning: Do not approach an emitter that may have been tampered with! If you must, please wear reflective maintenance gear or metal armor in case of hologram malfunction, and make sure that you can move beyond a hologram's field of view in case problems arise.
translation: 全息影像发生器十分坚固, 但遇到巨大外力时仍有可能损毁。此外，尽管发生器外部包裹着由航天材料制成的外壳，但其内部线路却很容易受到损坏。若出现此类情况，请参阅全息影像安装指南中附带的维修手册，并致电售后服务热线。切勿自行修理！\n\n警告: 请勿靠近损坏的发生器! 若有必要，请穿戴反射式维修护甲或金属制护甲，以防全息影像发生故障。确保你可以随时移动到全息影像的视野之外，以防出现问题。

original: Hologram: Maintenance 8.3
translation: 全息影像：维护 8.3

original: Holographic greeting and security technology requires service from trained professionals and routine maintenance. While the emitters maintain a charge for theoretically hundreds of years, damage can occur and circuits can erode over time. As part of the Security Madre exclusive contract, we have delivered on the custom energy recycling emitters requested by the Sierra Madre financiers and Mr. Sinclair.
translation: 全息影像服务与安保技术需由受过专业培训的人员进行日常维护。虽然理论上发生器的电力足够支撑数百年，但随着时间推移也可能发生故障，线路会遭到腐蚀。根据马德雷山脉赌场专属安保协议，我们已应马德雷山脉赌场投资人辛克莱先生的要求为其定制了可再生能源发生器。

original: Sinclair: E.B.E
translation: 辛克莱: E.B.E

original:
Mr. Sinclair,

I took the points you raised in the call today to heart, and I hope my answers offered some reassurance. What we are providing is an exclusive, comprehensive technology, but more importantly, we want to address the concern you raised for protecting your guests from threats, specifically the growing communist threat from the Chinese.

Security is N.E.'s top concern. There is no reason to provide a service that you cannot defend, and should the current world situation lead to increased hostilities, an Emergency Broadcast Emitter has been placed inside select hologram emitters at the Sierra Madre. In case of nuclear attack, holograms will defend their stations with lethal force to protect the guests under their charge.

If you wish to make sure that those who come to your Villa and casino have the means to defend themselves, I assure you, you need look no further than the E.B.E., it is a proven technology, and anyone who decides to attack you or your guests will regret any aggression.

Martin T. Harris

P.S. Any chance we could ask you to have Ms Keyes sign an autograph for us? It won't reduce the price, although I could see about sending a few extra systems your way.
translation:
辛克莱先生，

对于您今天在电话中提出的问题，我十分关心，希望我的答复能缓解您的顾虑。我们不仅提供专属、全面的技术服务，更重要的是，我们也致力于解决您的担忧，保护您的客人免遭尤其是来自于共产主义中国日益严峻的威胁。

安全向来是国家电力最为关心的问题。我们绝不可能向您提供毫无防护措施的服务。为了应对当前国际形势恶化可能引发的后果，我们已在马德雷山脉赌场的部分全息影像发生器中安装了紧急广播发生器（E.B.E.）。一旦遭遇核打击，全息影像将会使用致命武力坚守岗位，保护其范围内的所有客人。

如果您希望每一位到访赌场与别墅区的客人都能得到妥善保护，我向您保证，E.B.E.是您最佳的选择。这是一项久经检验的技术，如果有人试图对您或者您的客人不利，那么这项技术必定会让他后悔。

马丁·T·哈里斯

附笔：不知可否让凯丝女士给我们寄张签名照？虽然没法打折，但我可以考虑多送您几套系统。

original: Warning: Elevator Protocols
translation: 警告：电梯规章

original: Warning: If Vault security is disabled and the Vault terminal is breached, the elevator will automatically return to the Suites and lock permanently in place. After that, there is no way to operate the elevator, and the Vault area is sealed off. As requested by Mr. Sinclair, there is no manual or terminal override once the elevator is locked. Once initiated, it cannot be undone.\n\nUntil that time, the elevator may be operated freely from the terminal above.
translation: 警告：如果避难所安保措施被禁用，且避难所终端遭到入侵，电梯就会自动返回套房并永久锁定。之后无法再使用任何手段操纵电梯，且避难所区域会被封锁。应辛克莱先生的要求，电梯一旦锁定，无论使用手动或终端都无法强制启动。该机制一旦激活，无法解除。\n\n除该情况外，皆可使用上面的终端来操作电梯。

original: Worker's Note
translation: 工人的笔记

original: This job doesn't pay enough, working down here with those walking lightshows gets on my nerves. And the elevator... does Sinclair know how dangerous it is to have the elevator lock like that? If someone accidentally trips the deadman's switch inside his Vault... even Sinclair himself... this whole place becomes a big metal coffin. Lou tried to tell him and Sinclair said it would be "user error."
translation: 这份工作钱太少了，而且成天和那些四处晃悠的闪光幽灵在一起，搞得我神经紧张。至于那架电梯……辛克莱知不知道把电梯锁上会有多危险？万一有人不小心触发了他避难所里的机关…哪怕是辛克莱自己…这个地方就会变成一个巨大的铁棺材。马丁和他反映过这个问题，辛克莱却说这种风险由“用户自行承担”。

original: Vault Security Protocols
translation: 避难所安保规章

original: Warning: In the event Vault security is disabled by any means and the private terminal in the Vault is accessed, the Vault will enter a lockdown state. At this time, the elevator will return to the Suites and cannot be accessed again. As requested by Mr. Sinclair, there is no manual or terminal override once the elevator is locked. Once initiated, it cannot be undone.
translation: 警告：一旦禁用避难所内的安保措施，且访问过避难所中的私人终端，避难所就会进入锁定状态。随后电梯将返回行政套房且无法再次使用。应辛克莱先生的要求，电梯一旦锁定，无论使用手动或终端都无法强制启动。该机制一旦激活，无法解除。

original: Extracted Holotape
translation: 提取的全息磁带

original:
<This Holotape looks like it was ripped from a terminal drive.>

Vera,

If you're reading this, I know what you and Dean had planned tonight on the eve of the Gala Event. I loved you very much, and whatever possessed you to choose Dean's arm over my hand is beyond me. Whether it was greed or lust, it has led you here and will forever keep us apart. I hope it leaves you as empty as you left me. As much as you sought what was inside the Sierra Madre, now it will keep you.

The door has sealed, the elevator has left, and not even your voice will unlock it. This casino was my gift to you, and you now will be its heart for all time.

Sincerely,

Frederick Sinclair
translation:
<这盘全息磁带的内容似乎是从一台终端的硬盘里截取出来的>

薇拉：

如果你读到这封信，说明我已经知晓了你和迪安今晚在开幕庆典时的计划。我很爱你，我不明白你为何要选择和迪安同流合污，而不是和我在一起。无论是出于贪婪还是情欲，它把你引到这里，也彻底切断了我们的情分。我希望你一无所有，正如你对我做得那样。无论你在马德雷山脉寻求的是什么，你都无法带走了。

铁门已经锁上，电梯也离开了。即便用你的声音也无法再启动它。这座赌场就是我给你的礼物，而你将永远留在它的心中。

此致，

弗雷德里克·辛克莱

original: Vera
translation: 薇拉

original:
Vera, if you're reading this, my fears have come to pass, and this is an apology.

I hope you realized what my last words meant to you. If so, they have led you here, and this place will keep you safe. I know what they meant for me, and I fear they have trapped me here.

I have extracted the previous entry after our conversation tonight. It can't have been easy for you, and I am sorry for all I've put you through in silence. I know while you do not love me, you did not mean any malice in what you did.

I knew about your plans to rob the casino with Dean before you told me. Hearing it from you didn't make it any easier. For what it's worth, I am glad you told me yourself, and I understood the tapes he had in his possession.

I do not think either one of you realized what your addiction stemmed from, however, and that is the tragedy in this. I suspect the world would not have believed you, regardless, so I respect your desire to keep it from others.

When first building this Villa, this casino, I meant it for you. As the world seemed to race headlong toward war, it became part of my desire to protect you. The loans, the funding I poured into the casino's construction...

I knew it would not matter when war came for us. It was my means of creating a shelter, a defense if the world was bombarded in radiation and bombs.

When Dean revealed his plans inadvertently through our introduction, I realized what had happened, and how I had been tricked. For a time, my thoughts were dark. I changed the casino vault from a shelter to a trap, as I knew the first one to enter would be Dean. He would die down here, and it would have been by his own hand.

I fear, however, that I overstepped myself, and the only safe place in the casino is the Vault. I have tried to rewire the systems, change the protocols, and I cannot. I will do one last check on the pipes by the edge of the outside platform and see if anything can be done. I fear it is useless.

If you come down here, do not access my personal accounts entry.

It contains only a message for Dean, and it will seal the door and you will have no way out - even the elevator is designed to automatically return when the door is closed, and it will lock in place.

There should be enough in the Vault to sustain you until help arrives. I have ensured that there is enough medical supplies down here to keep you comfortable.

The holograms should defend the casino from any attackers, and the hologram beacon in the Villa will broadcast an emergency signal so that others know you are here.

When danger has passed, rescue will come.

I hope you were able to read this, and know that I loved you.

Frederick Sinclair
translation:
薇拉，如果你看到这段文字，说明我的恐惧成为了现实，以下是我对你的道歉。

我希望你能理解之前我对你说的话。如果你真的听懂了，那么当你来到这里时，你的人身安全就可以得到保障。我也明白那些话的分量，但恐怕这些话已经把我困在了这里。

我们今晚谈话后，我已经将前一篇信息的记录取走了。我明白你的不易，我很抱歉让你默默承受了这么多。我知道你虽然不爱我，但你的所作所为并没有恶意。

其实我早就知道你和迪安抢劫赌场的计划，可听你亲口说出这些时，我心里还是不好受。不管怎么说，我很高兴你愿意对我和盘托出，我也知道他手上握有不少录音磁带。

我想你们两个都没有意识到你药物上瘾的原因，这才是悲剧所在。我估计外界也不会相信你的说辞，但无论如何，我尊重你保密的意愿。

我最初建造这座度假村，这座赌场，就是为了你。这个世界似乎正在加速滑向战争的泥潭，所以我希望能保护你。我大肆举债，花费了无数金钱建设了这个赌场……

我知道当战争来临时，这一切都无关紧要了。我用自己的方式建好了一座避难所，一旦世界遭到核弹和辐射的洗礼，这就是我的保险。

当迪安在介绍中无意间透露了他的计划时，我突然明白过来，意识到自己被耍了。有一段时间，我的想法变得十分阴暗。我把赌场的避难所改造成了一个陷阱，因为我知道第一个进去的人会是迪安。他会死在那下面，而这都是他咎由自取。

可我害怕了，我担心我做过头了。这赌场中唯一安全的地方就是避难所。我试着重接系统，修改协议，可没有用。待会我要最后检查一遍外面平台边缘的管道，看看有没有别的办法。但我担心这也是无用功。

如果你来到这里，千万不要进入我的个人账户。

里面只包含了一条给迪安的信息，如果打开它，大门就会封锁，你就没有办法再出去了，就连电梯也被设置成在大门关闭后自动回程，并且无法再启动。

避难所里有足够的物资，能让你坚持到救援到来。我也放置了足够多的药品，可以缓解你的痛苦。

全息影像会保护赌场不受外来攻击，别墅区里的全息影像塔也会播放求救信号，这样人们就会知道你的下落。

当危机过去之后，救援就会到来。

我希望你能够读到这篇文章，记住，我曾经爱过你。

弗雷德里克·辛克莱

original: Sinclair's Personal Accounts
translation: 辛克莱的个人账户

original:
Dean,

If you're reading this, this is goodbye. You will have many years to read this message. Why you have smiled in my face and held a dagger to me, I do not know. You were rich, respected... even admired, loved by many. When you finally pass away down here, either by your own hand or starvation, know that your greed has led you here, for no reason I can understand.

You have made a habit in using others for your own ends. Now, the Sierra Madre is your reward. Whether you used blackmail or force - or even played to Vera's greed, it will not help down here in the Vault. Greed has led you here. I hope it leaves you as empty as you left me.

The door has sealed, the elevator has left. Even Vera's voice will not unlock it. Know that on the night of the Gala Event I shall raise my glass and whisper, "Fortunato."

In pace requiescat,

Frederick Sinclair
translation:
迪安：

如果你读到这封信，那这就是我对你的告别。往后的许多年，你都可以慢慢咀嚼这段文字。为何你当面对我阿谀逢迎，背地里却要捅我刀子，我不明白。你有钱，又有名望……甚至受人敬仰，众星捧月。当你最终在这里死去的时候，不管是你自己动的手还是活活饿死，我希望你明白，是贪婪将你引上绝路的，而其中的原因我实在无法理解。

你习惯利用他人来为自己谋利。现在，马德雷山脉就是我赠予你的奖赏，我不管你当初对薇拉究竟是怎样的威逼利诱，在这座避难所里通通没用。贪婪将你引到这里，我希望它让你一无所有，正如你对我一样。

铁门已经锁上，电梯也离开了。即便用薇拉的声音也无法再启动它。等到开幕庆典的当晚，我会为你举起酒杯，轻声念出：“福图那托”。

祝你安息，

弗雷德里克·辛克莱

original: I've started analyzing samples of the Cloud that surrounds the Sierra Madre. Preliminary results are promising. I need to perform a proper atmospheric analysis, that requires I travel there directly. Still, the sample I have collected in my chemistry set is enough to keep my experiments running. The Cloud Residue replenishes slowly, and I have to limit the gathering of samples to its rate of growth, allowing me to restock once per day.
translation: 我已经开始分析马德雷山脉赌场中弥漫的毒云样本。初步结果看上去不错，我需要再进行一次合理的大气分析，这需要我亲自出发去一趟。不过，我收集到的化学样本已经足够继续进行实验了，毒云残渣补充得很缓慢，我必须让样本的采集量低于它的增长率，这样每天才能进行一次补充。

original: These Knives!
translation: 这些菜刀！

original: These knives are sharp, too sharp! One of the chefs almost lost their thumb when dicing vegetables, and we're losing cutting boards at a rate of at least one per day. The knives just slice right through them! Running out of dishrags to mop up the blood.
translation: 这些菜刀实在太锋利了! 一位主厨在切菜的时候差点砍断了大拇指，而且我们每天都要剁坏一块砧板。这些刀甚至能直接劈穿砧板！抹布全都用来擦血了。

original: Another Shipment?
translation: 又来一批货？

original: Another (!) shipment of kitchen knives for the Cantina Madrid came in today, with their new "space age" alloy polymer material. We've got way more than we need for the Gala Event, even if everyone had 3 steak knives! But it's always the best for Sinclair, always, always, always, always, he insists everything must be perfect.
translation: 今天餐厅又新进了一批（！）菜刀，就是用所谓的“航天材料”制成的那种。我们手头的菜刀数量已经远远超过了开幕庆典的需求，给每个人配三把牛排刀都够了! 但辛克莱根本不在乎，他永远、永远、永远、永远都要求一切必须完美。

original: Too Hot!
translation: 太烫了！

original: One of the cooks noticed their knife was glowing the other day. They'd left it on the stove top, and the metal started glowing red - and it didn't cool down! What kind of "Space Age" metal is this Cosmic Knife made of? It kept glowing hot for several hours, and then the knife was so weak that when we tried to use it, it simply snapped. Guess that's why the metal's not used in rockets!
translation: 这几天有个厨师发现菜刀会发光。他们把菜刀落在了炉子上，结果这玩意居然开始冒红光，还无法冷却！这大宇宙菜刀用的究竟是哪门子的“航天材料”啊？闪了几小时的光后，它的刀身就变脆了，我们随便一使劲，它就断了。难怪这种金属没用在火箭上!

original: Recipe: Super-Heated Knife!
translation: 图纸：高热厨刀！

original:
Played around with this the other day, and:

1 Cosmic Piece-of-Shit Knife
1 Pilot Light
1 Hot Plate
Something to hold the damn thing to cook evenly

Pre-heat oven to 450 degrees
Take 1 Knife, leave on stove!
Let simmer for 5 minutes
Watch as Knife glows red-hot
Put Knife on table, melts table
Sue scientist who made damn thing
Give it to the military?
translation:
前几天不小心整出了这玩意，材料有：

1把大宇宙狗屎刀
1个点火器
1个电磁炉
再找个东西夹着这该死玩意让它能均匀受热

把炉子加热到450度
拿一把刀，扔到炉子上!
煲5分钟
看着刀发出炽热的光
把刀放在桌子上，桌子熔化了
该起诉发明这该死玩意的科学家
还是把它交给军方？

original: Sierra Madre - Complimentary Voucher
translation: 马德雷山脉 - 代金券

original:
This voucher grants the bearer:
"Compliments of the House!"

Enjoy your...
<Casino Chips>
...in good health and vitality.

[Abuse will result in the
denial of all "Complimentary"
status.]
translation:
本代币券持有者可获得：
“免费大礼包！”

特奖励您…
<Casino Chips>
…祝您身体健康。

[违规使用将撤销持有者的所有奖励]

original: See you in hell asshole
translation: 下地狱吧混蛋

original:
Hope you're about dead when you read this Sierra Madre out of reach 
Could've had it all, followed that white-arrow-graffiti bastard down here
Left those beartraps as presents for you on trail hope you liked them shithead
Hit my own tripwire you came to take what's mine??? Too bad, I got the last laugh 
Speakers'll kill you before you get out then we'll settle things in hell
Sierra Madre's treasure's mine mine mine
translation:
希望你读到这已经快死了遥远的马德雷山脉赌场
本来要成功了，跟着那个满地画白箭头的混蛋下来这里
把那些捕熊陷阱当礼物送给你了希望你喜欢你这白痴
踩到了自己的绊索你想抢走属于我的东西??? 
可惜，是我笑到最后
喇叭会在你逃走前就炸死你到时候咱们地狱里见吧马德雷的宝藏是我的我的我的

original: Vending Machine Code - "Hologram Rifle - Focusing Lense"
translation: 售货机代码 - "全息步枪 - 光学聚焦"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt appears to increase the Holorifle's damage.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品似乎可以提升全息步枪造成的伤害。

original: Vending Machine Code - "Hologram Rifle - Advanced Calibration"
translation: 售货机代码 - "全息步枪 - 高级校准器"

original: This is a restricted dispenser code for use in the Vending Machines.\n\nIt increases the Holorifle's damage.
translation: 这是一串限量配货代码，可在自动售货机上使用。\n\n该物品可以提高全息步枪的伤害。

original:
Dear Mr. Elijah,

Congratulations on your winning luck at the Sierra Madre Casino! Your Complimentary Voucher will automatically delivered at the dropbox you specified every three days and can be redeemed at any Sierra Madre Vending Machine.

Thank you and we hope you enjoyed your stay!

Sincerely,

The Sierra Madre Management
translation:
亲爱的以利亚先生,

恭喜您在马德雷山脉赌场博得好彩! 我们每隔三天会将免费代金券邮递到您指定的信箱中，您可以使用代金券在马德雷山脉赌场的自动售货机中兑换筹码。

感谢您的光临，祝您旅途愉快!

此致,

马德雷山脉赌场管理处
