original: Gas Tank
translation: 气罐

original: Spear Projectile
translation: 飞矛

original: Gas Bomb
translation: 气罐炸弹

original: Armed Demo Charge
translation: 武装样品包

original: Salida del Sol Courtyard
translation: 日出镇庭院

original: GREETING
translation: 问好

original: Be patient, I'm going. {To herself but chiding the player}Maybe {emph}you should know when to let go.
translation: 耐心点，我要过去了。 {To herself but chiding the player}或许{emph}你也该学会放手。

original: {Cold, her voice is slightly torn, still healing up.}You made it, good. I'm getting tired of waiting for you - and Elijah. {Beat}Surprised? Yeah... I made it here, just like you did.
translation: {Cold, her voice is slightly torn, still healing up.}你来了，很好。我实在是不想再等你，也不想再等以利亚了。{Beat}很惊讶吗？没错…我和你一样，也来到了这里。

original: {Relieved, voice thick from surgery}You made it, good... <Coughs>ugh.. {Winces}Hurts to talk. I'll keep this quick in case my... voice goes out.
translation: {Relieved, voice thick from surgery}你来了，很好…… <咳嗽>呃……{Winces}发出声音都难受，我会说得快一些，免得待会又哑了。

original: {Frowns, a little defeated}You're back. You sure you still want me here, collars and all? {To herself, rueful}Not much for waiting around with a bomb around my neck.
translation: {Frowns, a little defeated}你回来了？你还要我戴着项圈在这儿等吗？ {To herself, rueful}脖子上套个炸弹在这儿干耗，可做不了什么事啊。

original: I... {coughs}I wish you luck in the Vault. Elijah... he's tough to pin down.
translation: 我…{coughs}祝你在避难所里一切顺利，以利亚…可不是个好惹的对手。

original: [Christine is looking at the Fountain, her eyes narrowed. She then scans the courtyard perimeter, gauging the distance.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看着喷泉，眯起了双眼。她扫视着庭院的周边，似乎在测量距离。]

original: [She glances at your wrist, then back at the Fountain.]
translation: [她看了一眼你的手腕，然后又转向喷泉。]

original: [The woman before you looks disoriented, pained - she blinks a few times, then winces, as if the act of blinking causes her pain.]
translation: [站在你面前的女人似乎有些神情恍惚，脸上充满了痛苦。她眨巴了几下眼睛，身体不受控制地颤抖起来，似乎连眨眼的动作都会加剧她的痛苦。]

original: [Christine points at the sky, makes a fist, then makes an explosion gesture with her fingers.]
translation: [克莉丝汀指指天空，握紧拳头，张开手比了个爆炸的动作。]

original: [Christine shakes her head, narrows her eyes, then points at your compass.]
translation: [克莉丝汀摇摇头，眯起眼睛，指了指你的指南针。]

original: [Christine motions to you, points at the door uneasily, then makes a pulling motion with her hand. She seems hesitant to go near it.]
translation: [克莉丝汀靠近你，吃力地指向门，做出拉拽的姿势，她看起来有些犹豫，似乎不愿靠近那扇门。]

original: {Return Greeting, Neutral}[Christine looks at you warily.]
translation: {Return Greeting, Neutral}[克莉丝汀警惕地盯着你。]

original: {Return Greeting, Disliked}[Christine glares at you.]
translation: {Return Greeting, Disliked}[克莉丝汀怒视着你。]

original: {Return Greeting, Liked}[Christine raises an eyebrow.]
translation: {Return Greeting, Liked}[克莉丝汀竖起了一条眉毛。]

original: [The flickering Hologram stares at you expectantly.]
translation: [全息影像用闪烁的眼神充满期待地望着你。]

original: {DUPE: Dog, Slightly malicious}Dog will obey. Dog will stay here... for now.
translation: {DUPE: Dog, Slightly malicious}狗听你的。狗就暂时…先呆在这儿了。

original: {DUPE: Firm, eager}Things here... are... under control. {Beat, anger}Find the one that dragged us here, end him.
translation: {DUPE: Firm, eager}一切……又回到了掌控之中。 {Beat, anger}把那个绑架我们的人找出来，干掉他。

original: {DUPE: God Calm, trying to make sense of this, takes a breath, recovering}Thank you... for whatever you have done. I will remain here, need to get my strength back.
translation: {DUPE: God Calm, trying to make sense of this, takes a breath, recovering}谢谢你……所做的一切。我想先在这里待一会儿，恢复一下元气。

original: {Wincing, angry, fighting to stay in control and force Dog down and kill player, vicious}...Hnnnhrhhh... my voice... won't work, won't hold him, down, doesn't matter, won't help...
translation: {Wincing, angry, fighting to stay in control and force Dog down and kill player, vicious}……哼啊……我的声音……起不了作用，控制不了它，一点效果都没有……

original: {Wincing, trying to stay in control, struggling, wants help}...Hnnnhrhhh... he's gotten too strong, too scared... even my own voice won't help...
translation: {Wincing, trying to stay in control, struggling, wants help}…哼啊……他太强大了，太害怕了…我的声音没有作用了…

original: {Hears the player}You...? Master... no, not Master. {Beat, gets angry}Dog remembers you. {Slow anger}Left Dog in cage, mean to Dog... now, Dog...
translation: {Hears the player}你…？是主人吗？不，不是主人。 {Beat, gets angry}狗记得你。{Slow anger}你把狗丢在笼子里，对狗很不好…现在…狗要……

original: {Badly wounded, at end of fight}You... you hurt Dog, keep hurting him. Dog hungry, not want to hurt any more... not want to...
translation: {Badly wounded, at end of fight}你……你伤害了狗，不停伤害他。狗很饿，狗不想再受伤了……不想了……

original: {Dog likes player, hears the player}You...? Master... no, not Master. {Beat, gets sad}Dog remembers you. {Slow realization he may hurt someone he likes, conflicted}Kind to Dog... Dog can't...
translation: {Dog likes player, hears the player}你…？是主人吗？不，不是主人。 {Beat, gets sad}狗记得你。 {Slow realization he may hurt someone he likes, conflicted}你对狗很和气……狗不能……

original: {Dog likes player, wounded badly stops combat}Kind to Dog... then hurt Dog... you hate Dog, hate...
translation: {Dog likes player, wounded badly stops combat}开始对狗很好……然后又伤害狗……你讨厌狗，恨他……

original: {Confused}Master? Dog not hear you come in... too hungry, now... at cage door? {Beat, nods}Master, Dog is listening now you are close and he can {emph}hear you over hunger.
translation: {Confused}主人？狗没听到你的声音…狗太饿了…在笼子旁边吗？ {Beat, nods}主人，狗现在能听清你讲话了， {emph}就算很饿也听得到。

original: {Low rumbling}I'll wait here until there's fires in the sky.
translation: {Low rumbling}我会在这儿等着的，直到天空出现火光为止。

original: {Slightly subduded, doesn't like being here}Dog is waiting.
translation: {Slightly subduded, doesn't like being here}狗会一直等的。

original: {God Voice Waiting at Gala Event}You better have brought enough meat. {Under his breath, even angrier}I can feel Dog's teeth tearing at my ribs, hungry to get out.
translation: {God Voice Waiting at Gala Event}你最好尽快把足够的肉带来给我。{Under his breath, even angrier}我能感到狗的牙齿正撕扯我的肋骨，急切想要钻出来。

original: {Dog confused, momentary blackout}Why Dog eyes go black for bit. {Suspicious}You talk to other voice?
translation: {Dog confused, momentary blackout}为什么狗的眼睛黑了一下？ {Suspicious}你和另一个声音讲话了吗？

original: {Dog not free, impatient, make this more threatening than normal}Dog wants {emph}out... Dog is {emph}hungry.
translation: {Dog not free, impatient, make this more threatening than normal}狗想要出去……狗饿了。

original: {Dog not free, return, impatient}Let Dog {emph}out. Hungry, {emph}hate being in here.
translation: {Dog not free, return, impatient}让狗出去。狗很饿，{emph}狗讨厌留在这里。

original: {Act 2 Gala Event Start, Looking around, maliciously curious}So here we are. A row of switches all lined up. How familiar...
translation: {Act 2 Gala Event Start, Looking around, maliciously curious}我们到了，一排连着的开关，好熟悉……

original: {Cold evil, teasing}...these switches won't move themselves, after all... there must be some {emph}trick to it. {Colder, lower taunt}Now that I'm here... what do you expect me to do?
translation: {Cold evil, teasing}.……这些开关需要人来扳动，其中应该……有些门道吧。 {Colder, lower taunt}那现在这个情况……你想让我做什么呢？

original: {Act 2 Gala Event Start, frustrated that he's about to be asked to do something he doesn't want to}Why are we here? Dog not want to be here... place too much like a cage for Dog.
translation: {Act 2 Gala Event Start, frustrated that he's about to be asked to do something he doesn't want to}为什么我们要到这里？狗不喜欢这里……太像笼子了……

original: {Quiet, this is a little creepy in its hopefulness}If Dog was fed like last time, Dog would listen. If the feeding was quiet.
translation: {Quiet, this is a little creepy in its hopefulness}如果狗能像上次那样吃得饱饱的，狗就听你的话。不过你拿来的食物可不能乱动。

original: {God: Act 2 Intro}{Curious}So... are we on our way to somewhere else...? A Gala Event, perhaps?
translation: {God: Act 2 Intro}{Curious}所以…我们这是要去干啥啊…？是去参加盛世庆典吗？

original: {Dog: Act 2 Intro}Where are you taking Dog? {Shakes head}Dog doesn't want to leave, heard Master... saw Master in sky.
translation: {Dog: Act 2 Intro}你要把狗带到哪儿去？{Shakes head}狗不想走，狗听到主人的声音了…主人就在天上…

original: And when Master not there... woman at fountain... {slight wonder, child-like insistence}she is made of lines and light, want to watch.
translation: 主人不在的时候……喷泉里就会出现那个女人…… {slight wonder, child-like insistence}她是由灯光和细线构成的，狗想见她。

original: {Malicious, disgusted, "clever" is insulting}If it isn't the clever one. {Snarls, not a question}What do you want?
translation: {Malicious, disgusted, "clever" is insulting}这不是我们的小天才吗？{Snarls, not a question}你有什么事？

original: {Slightly hopeful}You are the nice voice... kind to Dog. You keep the other Voice quiet.
translation: {Slightly hopeful}你是个很好的人……对狗很好……你让另一个声音安静下来了……

original: {Slightly fearful, then angry}Remember you... you were mean to Dog, make Dog sleep... and other Voice come out.
translation: {Slightly fearful, then angry}狗记得你……你对狗很不好，让狗睡着了…还放另一个声音出来。

original: Hnh. Dog remember you.
translation: 嗯，狗记得你。

original: {Do Not Record - default Elijah Talking Activator response - Speakers, Intercoms}[You get no response.]
translation: {Do Not Record - default Elijah Talking Activator response - Speakers, Intercoms}[没有任何回应。]

original: {Act 1 Start - Contemptuous, commanding}Are you listening? Good. From now on, when I talk, {emph}listen - and follow my instructions.
translation: {Act 1 Start - Contemptuous, commanding}听得见吗？很好，从现在开始，我说话的时候，给我认真听，并且严格照我吩咐的去做。

original: Play stupid, play clever, make the mistake of saying "no?" That collar on your neck'll go off and take your head with it.
translation: 要是装傻充愣，耍花招，或者胆敢说个"不"字，你脖子上的项圈就会立刻爆炸，让你脑袋开花。

original: {Act 1 incomplete}You've returned. Why? Gather the three as I've instructed, then I will have more for you - {emph}not before.
translation: {Act 1 incomplete}你怎么回来了？把我说的那三个人带过来，我才会给你进一步指示，现在我们没什么好说的。

original: {Act 2 Start - Pleased}Good, well done... now, for the festivities, {colder}and your parts in all this.
translation: {Act 2 Start - Pleased}很好，干得不错……那么接下来，就该说说庆典仪式，以及你们几个的分工了。

original: The owner of the Sierra Madre... {disgusted, thinks this was an idiotic move}for whatever reason... keyed the Grand Opening to the Gala Event itself.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场的主人……不知出于什么原因……将赌场的开业仪式与“盛世庆典”绑定在了一起。

original: It needs to be fired off in order for the casino doors to open. {Grumbles}As I've discovered, {emph}one person can't do it.
translation: 想要打开赌场大门，就必须先启动这个盛世庆典。而我发现，这件事单凭一个人是做不到的。

original: So, get your team into position indicated on your Pip-Boy, then trigger it properly.
translation: 所以，你要带着你的队友，到哔哔小子的地图上标记的地方去，再用合适的步骤启动仪式。

original: You're so close now, don't let me down. {Beat}Otherwise, I'll have to rely on the {emph}next team.
translation: 你离成功只有一步之遥了，别让我失望。{Beat}否则，我就只能指望{emph}下一支队伍了。

original: {Slight anticipation, he's not used to doing anything more than bark orders}You. You're in the vault... finally. {Slightly incredulous, rasping laugh, then quiet, almost reverent}After all this time. The Sierra Madre... mine.
translation: {Slight anticipation, he's not used to doing anything more than bark orders}你，总算进入避难所了。 {Slightly incredulous, rasping laugh, then quiet, almost reverent}过了这么久，马德雷山脉赌场终于……是我的了。

original: {Becomes protective}Don't move, don't go into the vault. {Realizes what that means}And don't {emph}touch anything else... {cold}there may be more traps down there... {snarling, hates he has to wait}another security system.
translation: {Becomes protective}别动，别进金库。 {Realizes what that means}也不要 {emph}碰任何东西……{cold}那里也许还有其他陷阱……{snarling, hates he has to wait}甚至可能配备了另一套安保系统。

original: {Dismissive, authoritative, ending conversation.}Enough talking.
translation: {Dismissive, authoritative, ending conversation.}说的够多了。

original: {Snarling, frustrated}Whoever designed the Sierra Madre... their obsession with messing with frequencies and signals...
translation: {Snarling, frustrated}不管是谁设计了马德雷山脉赌场……他们对于各种频率和信号真的是很痴迷…

original: {TAUNT: Cold, final battle is imminent}I'm coming down - I'll meet you face to face at the vault entrance. {Warning}If you resist, I'll use the collar, even if it puts the vault at risk.
translation: {TAUNT: Cold, final battle is imminent}我这就下来，我会在避难所的入口和你见面。{Warning}如果你敢违抗我，我就引爆项圈，即便将整个避难所炸毁都在所不惜。

original: {COMPLIANT IN CONTROL: Sense of entitlement, in control}I'm coming down - I'll meet you face to face at the vault entrance. {Warning}No tricks. If you prove troublesome, well... {smiles, slow}there's always the collar.
translation: {COMPLIANT IN CONTROL: Sense of entitlement, in control}我这就下来，我会在避难所的入口和你见面。{Warning}别和我耍花招，你要是敢给我惹事……别忘了你脖子上的项圈。

original: {ANGRY IN CONTROL: Cold, final battle is imminent}I'm coming down, forget the Sierra Madre security, I'll find you myself. {Warning}Try to break into the vault, I'll set off the collar.
translation: {ANGRY IN CONTROL: Cold, final battle is imminent}我这就下来，赌场的安保设施根本没用，我要亲自干掉你。{Warning}你要是敢闯入金库，我就引爆项圈。

original: {Pauses, respects this, cautious}Curious? You must be. We have time, now that you've done your work. {To himself}And our interactions have been too one-sided, even for my tastes.
translation: {Pauses, respects this, cautious}好奇吗？你肯定很好奇吧。你已经完成了自己的使命，我们有的是时间。 {To himself}不过，即便是以我的性格来衡量，咱们之间的交流也未免过于简单了。

original: {Takes a breath, resets tone}Ask! {Beat}You still have time.
translation: {Takes a breath, resets tone}问吧！{Beat}你还有时间。

original: This is the place you need to go when everyone is in place. {Quiet}Until then... nothing more than a diseased view of the Sierra Madre.
translation: 等到所有人都就位之后，你就到这里去。 {Quiet}在那之前……我们也只能继续盯着这令人烦躁的马德雷山脉赌场发呆。

original: Can you hear me...? Damn transceivers... {To himself}let me link the collars to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
translation: 能听清我说话吗…？该死的收发器……{To himself}我得把项圈和塔上的扩音器连起来…好了…行了。

original: {Cold, menacing}So you showed. Felt the collar start kicking again as soon as the elevator doors rattled open.
translation: {Cold, menacing}你终于露面了，电梯门开的时候，我感觉到项圈又开始动了。

original: Think you're going to up-stage me, here at the Sierra Madre? I don't think so. Now that I'm inside... well, I don't need you anymore.
translation: 这儿可是马德雷山脉赌场，你居然想在这儿抢我的风头？别做梦了。既然我已经进来了……你对我也就没用了。

original: {Calls out, a little nervous, but relieved}Finally, a friendly face... hey! Partner! Up here.
translation: {Calls out, a little nervous, but relieved}总算看到一张熟悉的面孔了！嗨！伙计！这儿呢！

original: {Uncomfortable, like someone standing in a mine field}In a bit of a predicament here... had to duck backstage, take a powder, the audience is a little... {frowns}murderous tonight.
translation: {Uncomfortable, like someone standing in a mine field}我遇到了些小麻烦…只能先溜进后台躲着，今晚的观众实在有些…{frowns}过于热情了。

original: {Cold, menacing}All right, you're resourceful, I'll give you that - it's going to take a lot more than juggling keys and shooting speakers to stop me.
translation: {Cold, menacing}好吧，你很厉害，我承认这一点——但要想阻止我，光会偷钥匙和打坏喇叭可不够。

original: As I see it? All I need to do is kill you, then make a run for the exit. You do the same, you'll be clawing at the lock until your head blows off.
translation: 依我所见呢，我现在只要干掉你，再从这儿跑出去就行了。你也可以学我这么干，但最后结果无非是你扒着紧锁的大门，绝望地看着自己的脑袋被炸开花。

original: So maybe you and I should have a little chat - just like we did when you first waltzed into town.
translation: 所以，不妨聊两句？就像你刚到镇上，咱们第一次见面时那样。

original: {Relieved}Those electric ghosts aren't the kind of audience I like at the best of times - {to himself}at least the ones in the Villa had manners.
translation: {Relieved}我才不乐意让那些电子幽灵来当我的观众呢，至少别墅区里的那些还懂点礼貌。

original: {Frowns, looking around}Don't even know how I ended up here... guess the casino still recognizes guests even after all this time, huh? {Snorts}How's that for history.
translation: {Frowns, looking around}我完全不知道自己是怎么到这儿来的…看来过了这么久，赌场的来宾智能识别系统还在运作。真是优良传统。

original: {Under his breath, relieved, after battle in the theater}Not going to be performing {emph}here again, that's for sure. This place is a dump! Lousy acoustics.
translation: {Under his breath, relieved, after battle in the theater}我再也不想在这里表演了！{emph}这里简直糟透了！音响差到不行！

original: {Player tries to talk in the middle of combat}Not now, we got bigger problems.
translation: {Player tries to talk in the middle of combat}别说话，我们有更大的麻烦要解决。

original: {Just heard Elijah booming over the radio}Was that him floating above the Fountain, the boss man? The one who put these bowties on our necks?
translation: {Just heard Elijah booming over the radio}喷泉上漂着的那位就是整件事的幕后老大咯？是他把炸弹套在我脖子上的？

original: {Uneasy}Sure does like to make a presentation... wish he'd keep it down, or else the Ghost People are going to swarm the gates, Vera Hologram or no.
translation: {Uneasy}这家伙还挺爱出风头的……希望下次他能低调点，不然那些鬼人迟早会冲出来把我们吞了的，连薇拉的影像都阻止不了它们。

original: {Player hasn't talked to Dean for the first time and isn't in his seat}Have a seat, and then we'll talk.
translation: {Player hasn't talked to Dean for the first time and isn't in his seat}先坐下，我们再聊。

original: The Sierra Madre. {Smiles, slightly amused}Mmm... beauty, isn't she. She the one who invited you here?
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场。 {Smiles, slightly amused}嗯…她可真美啊，不是吗？是她邀请你来的？

original: Or maybe you didn't catch her voice on the radio. {"You"}Woke up, confused, like some of the others. {Pauses, shrugs}Least {emph}you're still breathing.
translation: 也可能你不是从收音机里听到她的声音的。{"You"}只是和其他人一样，醒来后发现自己莫名其妙就到这儿了。{Pauses, shrugs}不过至少，你还有气儿。

original: {Confidentially}By the way, don't get up or make any sudden motions, no matter how uncomfortable that chair gets... the cushion's just for show.
translation: {Confidentially}对了，那椅子坐着可能不大舒服，但无论如何，别起身，也别轻举妄动……那垫子只是个装饰。

original: {Doesn't like player}I'll hold up my end, don't you worry. {To himself}We get to the Sierra Madre, it'll be a different tune, trust me.
translation: {Doesn't like player}我说话算话，你不用担心。{To himself}但是等我们进了马德雷赌场，可就要风水轮流转了，相信我。

original: {Irritated, basically asked to be a roadie}"Hold the wires, Dean." {Beat}Talk about being a second stringer.
translation: {Irritated, basically asked to be a roadie}"守着这些电线吧，迪安。" {Beat}感觉我就像个替补队员。

original: {At Gala position - Studying a barren rooftop with sparking wires}So {emph}this is where I'm supposed to put on the show? {Beat, mumbling}Played better venues, let me tell you.
translation: {At Gala position - Studying a barren rooftop with sparking wires}所以这里就是给我准备的舞台？{Beat, mumbling}我给你讲，我平时演出的地方可比这里好多了。

original: {Studying wiring along the roof}What's that there... wiring? Looks... {frowns}looks like it's tied to the sound system in the Villa, {looks down}except for that snipped section there.
translation: {Studying wiring along the roof}那是什么？电线吗？看上去…{frowns}它连接了整个别墅区的音响系统， {looks down}只有这块儿，已经断掉了。

original: {Frowns}So... what, I stand here, hold the two ends in my hands, and tap them together like cymbals?
translation: {Frowns}所以，你打算让我站在这儿，两手各执一段电线，然后像上下镲片那样把它们接在一块儿？

original: {Dean likes the player}Didn't think much of our chances, now I'm thinking I was wrong. What's the next step?
translation: {Dean likes the player}本以为没戏了，看来是我想错了。下一步干什么？

original: {Dean hates the player}Well, now, if it isn't my ball, chain, and dog collar rolled all into one.
translation: {Dean hates the player}哎呀，这不是那位老喜欢折腾和使唤我的大人物吗？

original: {Dean's neutral to the player}You have that sad, questioning look in your eye. Not sure talking to me's going to make it any better.
translation: {Dean's neutral to the player}你满脸都是悲伤而疑惑的表情，感觉我也没法让你喜笑颜开。

original: [The holographic cashier faces you, flickering. It seems to be waiting for you to speak.]
translation: [全息收纳员的身姿在你面前闪烁，它似乎正等着你开口。]

original: {INTERCOM}The cleaners will knock twice. Make sure they're thorough.
translation: {INTERCOM}清洁工会敲两下门。记得放他们进来。

original: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
translation: 玩家扔手雷

original: Watch where you're chucking those things!
translation: 扔的时候小心一点！

original: [Christine covers her ears.]
translation: [克莉丝汀捂住了耳朵。]

original: {Snarling, when grenade is thrown}Don't waste those - save one for when they get close.
translation: {Snarling, when grenade is thrown}别浪费——留几个等它们靠近了再用。

original: {Responding to a grenade being thrown, makes howl like a bomb dropping.}Arooooooooo!
translation: {Responding to a grenade being thrown, makes howl like a bomb dropping.}啊哦哦哦哦哦哦！

original: {Slightly wistful, quiet}A little party favor before the grand finale.
translation: {Slightly wistful, quiet}大幕落下前再添一场压轴戏是吧。

original: [Christine points at mine, then taps her temple.]
translation: [克莉丝汀指了指地雷，然后敲了敲自己的太阳穴。]

original: {Grim, pleased}Thinking ahead... good.
translation: {Grim, pleased}打提前量…不错。

original: {Curious}Want Dog to fetch bomb-thing? Or not touch?
translation: {Curious}你想让狗把那些炸弹拿过来吗？还是别碰它们？

original: Don't be ridiculous - point that somewhere else, will you?
translation: 少跟我开玩笑，你能不能别拿这玩意指着我？

original: [Christine frowns, points at your collar, then hers.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉，指了指你的项圈，又指了指她的。]

original: {Cold evil, player's pointing a gun at him}I didn't take you for suicidal.
translation: {Cold evil, player's pointing a gun at him}你该不会是想找死吧？

original: {Curious, player is pointing a gun at him, he doesn't understand what it means}Don't shoot. Bullets hurt.
translation: {Curious, player is pointing a gun at him, he doesn't understand what it means}别开枪。子弹打到会很痛。

original: Hello
translation: 你好。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Come back if you need something.
translation: 如果你需要什么就回来吧。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Shrugs, dismissive}I'd shed a tear, but I'm sure we'll be chatting again.
translation: {Shrugs, dismissive}先让我擦下眼泪吧，不过我敢说我们很快就会再见面的。

original: That's enough for now.
translation: 就到这吧。

original: {DUPE}{Shrugs, dismissive}I'd shed a tear, but I'm sure we'll be chatting again.
translation: {DUPE}{Shrugs, dismissive}先让我擦下眼泪吧，不过我敢说我们很快就会再见面的。

original: That's enough for now.
translation: 就到这吧。

original: Attack
translation: 攻击

original: Time to cash this one out.
translation: 该做个了结了。

original: {Frustrated, under his breath}Godammit.
translation: {Frustrated, under his breath}见鬼。

original: {Frustrated, under his breath}Batting a thousand, that's us.
translation: {Frustrated, under his breath}以一敌百说的就是我们。

original: {Frustrated, under his breath}Used to open in Paris. Paris. Now this.
translation: {Frustrated, under his breath}想当年我可在巴黎开过个唱，巴黎啊，现在居然混到这步田地。

original: {Frustrated, under his breath}Can't believe I left the apartment for this.
translation: {Frustrated, under his breath}真不敢相信我离开自家房间后居然干起了这个。

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, and her stance changes.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，改变了姿势。]

original: {Eager howl}Hrrhrhhhhnnnh!
translation: {Eager howl}哼嗯嗯嗯哼！

original: {Cold, ruthless}Something needs to die.
translation: {Cold, ruthless}有些东西非死不可。

original: {As if stung}Ah!
translation: {As if stung}啊！

original: [Christine takes the blow, doesn't flinch.]
translation: [克莉丝汀身中一击，但她没有退缩。]

original: Hnh!
translation: 哼啊！

original: Ennh!
translation: 嗯嗯！

original: Flee
translation: 逃跑

original: Valor, you're up - discretion and me, we're outta here.
translation: 你有种你自己冲吧，我的理智告诉我还是走为上计。

original: [Christine shakes her head, waves at you to follow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀摇摇头，挥手示意你跟上。]

original: {Panting, worried}Hnnnh-hnnnh-hnnh.
translation: {Panting, worried}哼哼—哼嗯哼。

original: Find a defensible position, we'll kill them there.
translation: 找个便于防守的位置，我们在那儿干掉他们。

original: Steal
translation: 偷窃

original: {Sarcastic}If you find a place to pawn that, go right ahead.
translation: {Sarcastic}如果你能找到典当它的地方，那就偷吧。

original: {Cold, knowing}Greed took the others - go on, keep it. {Low, threatening}I'll get it back eventually.
translation: {Cold, knowing}贪婪已经吞噬了其他人，你留着吧。{Low, threatening}反正我最后会拿回来的。

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, then shakes her head and waves you off.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起了双眼，摇摇头，向你挥手告别。]

original: {Curious, then low, defensive growl}Hnnnh? Rhnhhhrrrr...
translation: {Curious, then low, defensive growl}哼嗯？啊呜呜呜嗯嗯…

original: Take from me again, and I'll leave you for the Sierra Madre.
translation: 你要是再敢从我这里偷东西，我就把你丢给马德雷山脉。

original: Fine, fine - don't want us both blowing up anyway.
translation: 好，好—我也不想让我俩全被炸飞。

original: [Christine checks herself, stops attacking, looks angry, points at collar.]
translation: [克莉丝汀检查了自己的伤势，停止了攻击，她看上去十分愤怒，指了指她的项圈。]

original: {Confused}Hnnnr? {Shrugs, whatever}Hnnn.
translation: {Confused}哼嗯嗯？{Shrugs, whatever}哼嗯。

original: Next time, I'll break your legs and hang you from the Madre gates.
translation: 再有下次，我就打断你的腿，把你挂在马德雷赌场的大门上。

original: Assault
translation: 突击

original: What're you doing that for? {Beat, angry, vicious}Fine, let's settle this.
translation: 你干嘛？{Beat, angry, vicious}算了，那就动手吧。

original: [Christine points at your collar, then hers.]
translation: [克莉丝汀指了指你的项圈，又指了指自己的。]

original: {Surprised, then low, threatening growl}Hnnhh? Hrnnnnn.
translation: {Surprised, then low, threatening growl}哼嗯嗯？哼。

original: {Evil, cold}If this is how you want to die, then so be it.
translation: {Evil, cold}你这么想死的话，那就成全你。

original: Murder
translation: 杀人犯

original: {Roar as he smashes something through a wall}Hnnnhhhr!
translation: {Roar as he smashes something through a wall}哼哼啊啊 啊！

original: {Angry}Die.
translation: {Angry}死吧。

original: {Mixing an explosive, slightly eager}Let me whip up a special cocktail...
translation: {Mixing an explosive, slightly eager}让我来给你调一杯特制的鸡尾酒……

original: [Christine waves for you to get back, makes throwing motion.]
translation: [克莉丝汀示意你退后，做出投掷的姿势。]

original: {Chuckling to himself, playfully, as he readies explosive}Hnnnh-Hnnnh-Hnnnh.
translation: {Chuckling to himself, playfully, as he readies explosive}哼哼—哼——哼哼哼。

original: {Growls}Let sound and thunder answer this.
translation: {Growls}就用巨响来回应这一切吧。

original: {Just found a bomb in his pocket}Whoa! Whoa, whoa, {emph}whoa!
translation: {Just found a bomb in his pocket}哇哦！哇！啊！{emph}哇啊！

original: [Christine makes frantic motions with her hands.]
translation: [克莉丝汀发狂般作出一连串看不懂的手势。]

original: {Warning howl, pained/surprised}Hhh-hhh-hhhhnnn!
translation: {Warning howl, pained/surprised}哼——哼哼——哼！

original: {Loud, commanding}Look out.
translation: {Loud, commanding}当心。

original: StartCombat
translation: 战斗开始

original: {Eager, pleased, snarl}Food!
translation: {Eager, pleased, snarl}吃的 ！

original: {Slightly evil, cruel}Dog was getting hungry.
translation: {Slightly evil, cruel}狗开始饿了。

original: {Under his breath}Kill this one before they call others.
translation: {Under his breath}把它干掉！不然它会召集更多同伴过来。

original: I'll end you.
translation: 我会了结你的。

original: {Irritated}Of {emph}course, it was getting too quiet.
translation: {Irritated}我说这地方怎么这么安静呢。

original: {Irritated}Going to need a hand here, "partner."
translation: {Irritated}我需要帮忙，"好搭档"。

original: [Christine's eyes narrow, stance changes.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，改变了姿势。]

original: Death
translation: 死亡

original: {To himself}Vera, sweetheart... see you soon.
translation: {To himself}薇拉，宝贝……我马上就能再见到你了。

original: {To himself}Guess a fat lady's singing somewhere.
translation: {To himself}似乎有位胖女士正在唱歌。

original: {To himself}You win, Sinclair.
translation: {To himself}你赢了，辛克莱。

original: {To himself}So much for the Sierra Madre.
translation: {To himself}看来我进不了马德雷山脉了。

original: [Christine clutches her collar as she falls, clawing at it.]
translation: [克莉丝汀倒下时仍然紧紧抓着自己的项圈不放。]

original: :: Death cry ::
translation: ::死亡的哀嚎::

original: Finally, the howling will end.
translation: 那声音总算停下来了。

original: {Howl on the hunt}Arrrrrroooooooooo!
translation: {Howl on the hunt}啊呜呜呜呜呜呜！

original: Rhhhhhhrrrrrrr!
translation: 呃啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: Let's kill them, Dog.
translation: 干掉它吧，狗。

original: {Malicious}Ah, guests. Their mistake.
translation: {Malicious}啊，客人们。自作自受啊。

original: Jackpot!
translation: 中头奖了！

original: Just couldn't mind your own business...
translation: 你要是乖乖待着不就没事了吗…

original: [Christine motions to you, points.]
translation: [克莉丝汀做了个招呼你的手势，指向了某个地方]

original: {Catches a whiff of something}Hnh? Smell something.
translation: {Catches a whiff of something}哈？我闻到了什么。

original: {Under his breath}Something's moving, moving.
translation: {Under his breath}有东西在动，在动。

original: {Cold}Trespassers.
translation: {Cold}入侵者。

original: Something's out there.
translation: 那儿有东西。

original: Sounds like we got a tourist.
translation: 貌似有客人了。

original: What was that?
translation: 什么声音？

original: [Christine holds up her hand, pauses, then starts scanning the area.]
translation: [克莉丝汀举手示意停下，然后开始扫视整片区域。]

original: Enough - the Sierra Madre is our target, not its ghosts.
translation: 够了，马德雷山脉赌场才是我们的目标， 别管那些幽灵了。

original: Perhaps they ran. If not... we'll see them soon.
translation: 那家伙大概逃了…反正也跑不了多远。

original: {Dismissive grunt}Hnh.
translation: {Dismissive grunt}哼。

original: {Shakes head, thought he saw something}Sierra Madre's playing tricks with me now.
translation: {Shakes head, thought he saw something}马德雷赌场又在耍我了。

original: Forget this, let's focus on getting into the casino.
translation: 算了，我们还是专心研究怎么进入赌场吧。

original: [Christine does one final scan, then shakes her head, and motions forward.]
translation: [克莉丝汀最后扫视了四周，摇摇头，做了个前进的手势。]

original: {Hopeful}Do good? Eat now?
translation: {Hopeful}表现好吗？可以吃东西了吗？

original: {Affirmative growl}Hnnnrrh, all done, all gone.
translation: {Affirmative growl}嗯，结束了，都死了。

original: Finished here.
translation: 完事儿了。

original: {Malicious, just murdered someone}That felt... good.
translation: {Malicious, just murdered someone}感觉…真好。

original: Nice finish.
translation: 干得漂亮。

original: Leave 'em wanting more.
translation: 意犹未尽的感觉。

original: [Christine scans the area, then relaxes slightly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀扫视了整片区域，然后微微放松了下来。]

original: {Frowns}Where are they? Not done yet.
translation: {Frowns}去哪儿了？这事儿还没完呢。

original: {Worried he's going to be punished}Lost them.
translation: {Worried he's going to be punished}找不到人了。

original: {Under his breath}Where did you go?
translation: {Under his breath}你去哪儿了？

original: No matter where you run, I'll find you.
translation: 跑到天涯海角我都会找到你的。

original: Lost, but not forgotten.
translation: 跑得了和尚跑不了庙。

original: Now where did you go?
translation: 你到底去哪儿了？

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，摇了摇头。]

original: {Dismissive}Hnnf.
translation: {Dismissive}哼。

original: Madre's playing tricks on me. Whoever it is, they're gone.
translation: 马德雷又骗了我，那家伙不见了。

original: Guess they skedaddled. {To himself}Sounds good to me.
translation: 也许那家伙已经逃走了，{To himself}挺好。

original: [Christine scans the area, then shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀扫视了整片区域，然后摇了摇头。]

original: {Dismissive}Nothing.
translation: {Dismissive}什么都没有。

original: {Rumbling, eager}Food's back.
translation: {Rumbling, eager}食物回来了。

original: {Eager}Hunt's on.
translation: {Eager}狩猎开始了。

original: Should've stayed lost.
translation: 你不该出现的。

original: {Under his breath}Won't get away again.
translation: {Under his breath}我不会再失手了。

original: {Shakes head}Back like a bad habit.
translation: {Shakes head}逃不出我的手掌心。

original: Thought they'd bailed.
translation: 还以为他逃走了呢。

original: [Christine's eyes narrow, points.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，指向一个方向。]

original: {Growls}Hnnnrrrrrrrrrrrr.
translation: {Growls}哼嗯嗯——

original: {Snarling, knows someone's near by}Hnnnnrrrrrr...
translation: {Snarling, knows someone's near by}哼嗯嗯……

original: Whatever it is, it's still out there. Waiting.
translation: 不管那是谁，它肯定还在附近。

original: {Malicious, talking to self}It'll come to us, Dog. Just wait. We'll kill it together.
translation: {Malicious, talking to self}它还会回来的，狗。别急，我们会一起把它干掉的。

original: {Quiet}Still out there.
translation: {Quiet}它还在那里。

original: I can hear you moving, whoever you are.
translation: 我不知道你是谁，但我听见你的脚步声了。

original: [Christine raises her hand, and starts scanning the area.]
translation: [克莉丝汀抬起手，开始扫视整片区域。]

original: Where is the food?
translation: 吃的呢?

original: Dog hungry, please come out.
translation: 狗饿了，求你快出来吧。

original: {Under his breath}Where are you?
translation: {Under his breath}你在哪儿？

original: I'll find you, you can't hide.
translation: 别想躲起来，我会找到你的。

original: Still looking... although I'm all for following suit and leaving.
translation: 在找呢……虽然我觉得应付一下就好，还是正事要紧。

original: {Under his breath}Vanished like a Maxis act.
translation: {Under his breath}玩什么大变活人呢。

original: [Christine scans the area intently.]
translation: [克莉丝汀专注地扫视整片区域。]

original: END MUSIC {plays when player triggers Vera Hologram in lobby or unlocks vault access}
translation: 结束音乐 {plays when player triggers Vera Hologram in lobby or unlocks vault access}

original: Post-Gala Villa
translation: 盛会开幕布置别墅区

original: <AUDIO: Dean's radio freq opener.>{Mikey, might make a few sec of crackling, static, or radio knob whirring/tuning, dupe it for other companions radio intro openers for simplicity.}
translation: <音频：迪安电台频率开启.>{Mikey, might make a few sec of crackling, static, or radio knob whirring/tuning, dupe it for other companions radio intro openers for simplicity.}

original: <AUDIO: Signal whirring, as if connecting, a little different than the other companions, because it's Elijah's collar.>{Because Elijah is inside casino, it's noticeably more scrambled&distorted. Sound effects related to PBoy would work fine if scrambled.}
translation: <音频：信号声，当连接时，和其相比会有一点不同，因为它是以利亚的项圈.>{Because Elijah is inside casino, it's noticeably more scrambled&distorted. Sound effects related to PBoy would work fine if scrambled.}

original: {Spoken as Starlet, soft, this is the farewell message as the player turns and says goodbye}Wait a moment, before you go.
translation: {Spoken as Starlet, soft, this is the farewell message as the player turns and says goodbye}在您离开之前，请您稍等一下。

original: {Spoken as Starlet. Pleased, as if addressing a crowd}Everyone, please, may I have your attention.
translation: {Spoken as Starlet. Pleased, as if addressing a crowd}各位来宾，请注意。

original: {Spoken as Starlet, charming, beckoning, beginning a commercial}Has your life taken a turn? Do troubles beset you? Has fortune left you behind?
translation: {Spoken as Starlet, charming, beckoning, beginning a commercial}您的生活遭遇挫折了吗？您被烦恼所困扰了吗？命运抛弃了你吗？

original: <AUDIO: Christine's radio freq opener.>{Mikey, might make a few sec of crackling, static, or radio knob whirring/tuning, dupe it for other companions radio intro openers for simplicity.}
translation: <音频：克里斯汀电台频率开启.>{Mikey, might make a few sec of crackling, static, or radio knob whirring/tuning, dupe it for other companions radio intro openers for simplicity.}

translation: <音频：信号声，当连接时，和其相比会有一点不同，因为它是以利亚的项圈.>{Because Elijah is inside casino, it's noticeably more scrambled&distorted. Sound effects related to PBoy would work fine if scrambled.}

original: Dean
translation: 迪安

original: Spooky Audio!
translation: 幽灵电台！

original: Wait here.
translation: 在这等着。

original: {Nods, but slight worry}Don't be long.
translation: {Nods, but slight worry}别去太久了。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Irritated}Whatever you're planning, hurry.
translation: {Irritated}不管你有什么打算，都快点。

original: {Squats down, heels, agreeing tone}Hrnnh. Dog will wait.
translation: {Squats down, heels, agreeing tone}嗯，狗会好好等着的。

original: Let's trade equipment.
translation: 我们交易装备吧。

original: {Eager}Let's deal.
translation: {Eager}我们来交换吧。

original: [Christine nods, adjusts her gear.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点了点头，调整了她的装备。]

original: {Evil}All of your weapons will do. And your stims.
translation: {Evil}给我件武器吧，还有药品。

original: {Affirmative}Dog fetches... will share... have food?
translation: {Affirmative}狗找到了很多东西…可以分给你…有吃的吗？

original: Enough about tactics.
translation: 不说战术了。

original: Fine. "Tactics" means "stay out of sight" around here anyway.
translation: 好吧。反正 "战术"的意思就是别让人看到。

original: [Christine nods, waits.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头，等待着。]

original: {Slight frustration}Fine. What else?
translation: {Slight frustration}好吧，还有什么？

original: {Nods}Hnnh-nnn. Dog not sure he remember anyway.
translation: {Nods}嗯哼，反正狗不一定能记得住。

original: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
translation: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

original: {Rolls eyes}Oh, you bet. I'll flank them... might take me a while, though, so you just hold tight.
translation: {Rolls eyes}哦，好的，我会从侧面包抄他们……可能会花点儿时间，你可要撑住咯。

original: [Christine nods, makes a half circle with her hand.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头，用手画了一个半圆。]

original: {Malicious, pleased anticipation}I'll watch over you.
translation: {Malicious, pleased anticipation}我会掩护你的。

original: {Slightly disappointed}Hnn.
translation: {Slightly disappointed}哼。

original: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
translation: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

original: Enough gum-flapping, Madre's not getting any younger.
translation: 别再废话了，马德雷赌场可是在一天天老去呢。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Slow, threatening}If you mean into the casino, then - yes.
translation: {Slow, threatening}要进赌场了吗，很好。

original: {Eager, chomping at the bit}Hnhhr!
translation: {Eager, chomping at the bit}哼！

original: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
translation: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

original: All right.
translation: 好的。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: Go on - but keep it quick.
translation: 继续说吧，不过快一点。

original: {Agrees}Hnnh-hnnn.
translation: {Agrees}哼——哼。

original: Stay close to me.
translation: 紧跟着我。

original: {Nods}Like dancing with your shadow.
translation: {Nods}我会和你形影不离的。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Slow, evil}If you're sure.
translation: {Slow, evil}听你的了。

original: {Pleased}Hrnnnh, Dog will be kin. Like others in night.
translation: {Pleased}嗯，狗会和你相亲相爱的。就像其他人在晚上做的那样。

original: Stick close to me.
translation: 紧跟着我。

original: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
translation: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

original: You're the one who dragged me out of my apartment, so yeah, I'm keeping close. So what?
translation: 是你把我从家里拽出来的，我当然要跟紧你了，有什么问题吗？

original: [Christine tilts her head slightly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀轻轻歪了歪头。]

original: {Irritated}What is it? {Snarls}It won't matter in the end.
translation: {Irritated}什么意思？{Snarls}算了，反正也无关紧要。

original: {Confused}Hnnh?
translation: {Confused}嗯哼？

original: I want you to use ranged weapons.
translation: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

original: {Nods, totally lying}I'll be sure to cover you, don't you worry.
translation: {Nods, totally lying}我会掩护你的，别担心。

original: [Christine nods, closes one eye and slowly pulls an invisible trigger.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头，单眼紧闭，手做出扣扳机的样子。]

original: {Snarls, frustrated}While I'm in control, my ability to use his hands is... difficult.
translation: {Snarls, frustrated}只要是我控制着这副躯体，我就没办法灵活应用双手。

original: {Slow, confused, then gives in}Dog will try... trigger and sight... Dog prefer to hit with bear trap.
translation: {Slow, confused, then gives in}狗试试吧…扳机和瞄准镜……狗更喜欢用捕熊夹来揍人。

original: Switch to a melee weapon.
translation: 切换到近战武器。

original: Boxing's not really my thing. I prefer the gentle touch... but all right, it's your show.
translation: 我可不太会打拳啊，我更乐意轻轻抚摸对方……不管没关系，你说了算。

original: [Christine nods, and her stance changes slightly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点了点头，她的站姿轻微地发生了变化。]

original: {Snarls}To warn you, as long as I'm in control, my coordination... suffers.
translation: {Snarls}丑话说在前头，只要我控制着这副躯体，我的动作……就不会很协调。

original: {Surprised, then agrees}Dog good at smashing things that move with bear trap.
translation: {Surprised, then agrees}狗很擅长用捕熊夹来揍人。

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 让我们谈点别的。

original: {Slight irriation}Sure, let's jaw all day and all night, why not?
translation: {Slight irriation}是啊，咱们就这么瞎耗时间，不也挺好的嘛？

original: [Christine frowns, taps the back of her wrist, then circles her finger.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱起眉头，敲了敲手背，又画了个圈。]

original: {Low, seductive evil}And what do you want to discuss now?
translation: {Low, seductive evil}你还想聊什么？

original: {Nods}Hnnnh... Dog is listening.
translation: {Nods}嗯……狗听着呢。

original: That's all. Let's get going.
translation: 就这样。我们走吧。

original: If that's all, let's shake a leg.
translation: 讲完了？那就活动活动筋骨吧。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Snarls}Good... you were starting to bore me.
translation: {Snarls}很好…你已经让我开始感到无聊了。

original: {Nods, affirmative}Dog hears you, will follow.
translation: {Nods, affirmative}狗明白了，狗会好好听话的。

original: I want you to change your combat style.
translation: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

original: Style's not something you just change, friend.
translation: 风格这玩意可不是你说变就能变的，朋友。

original: [Christine looks at you and waits.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看着你，等着你发言。]

original: {Warning}As long as I am in control, fighting... is difficult. I'm not the... beast he is.
translation: {Warning}只要我控制着这副躯体，就很难…战斗。我没有…他那么凶残。

original: {Puzzled}Hrnnnh? What do you want?
translation: {Puzzled}哼嗯？你想怎么样？

original: Let's talk about your tactics.
translation: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

original: {Curious, suspicious}Tactics? What, we going to get into a shootout soon, or...?
translation: {Curious, suspicious}战术？怎么，咱们马上要打仗了吗…？

original: [Christine raises an eyebrow suspiciously.]
translation: [克莉丝汀狐疑地扬起了一条眉毛。]

original: Tactics? Why don't you let me worry about that - you just follow along, I'll take care of you.
translation: 战术？干嘛不把这个问题交给我来考虑呢，你只要乖乖听我的就好，我会保护你的。

original: Hnnrrh? What do you want Dog to do?
translation: 嗯？你想让狗做什么？

original: Let's get going.
translation: 我们走。

original: Music to my ears.
translation: 求之不得呢。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Evil, draws this out threateningly}Good. I was growing... impatient.
translation: {Evil, draws this out threateningly}很好，我都开始……不耐烦了，

original: {Agreeable, been told to follow}Rhhhr. Dog will follow.
translation: {Agreeable, been told to follow}嗯，狗会好好跟着你的。

original: It's time for us to part ways.
translation: 我们该分道扬镳了。

original: You sure? I mean... look, you can't just tell me to walk now, you know. That's... well, not very friendly.
translation: 你确定？不是啊，你怎么能这么随便就把我打发走……这样…很不友好。

original: [Christine raises an eyebrow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀挑起了一边眉毛。]

original: {Slow, testing}You... want us to split up. All... three of us?
translation: {Slow, testing}你…想和我们分道扬镳？我们三个？

original: {Sad, questioning}Why you send Dog away? Dog hear you right?
translation: {Sad, questioning}为什么要赶走狗？狗一直都听你的话啊？、

original: I think we should travel together.
translation: 我觉得我们应该同行。

original: Lose the second-stringer, and I'll make the time.
translation: 你先把身边那家伙踢去替补席，再来找我吧。

original: Strike up the band, Domino's back in town.
translation: 好戏开始，我多米诺又回来啦！

original: [Christine glances at your companion, shakes her head, then raises her index finger.]
translation: [克莉丝汀瞟了一眼你的同伴，摇摇头，竖起了中指。]

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Disgust}I'll only travel with you... get rid of the other piece of meat, then we'll talk.
translation: {Disgust}我不希望身边还有除了你之外的第三人……你先把那家伙赶走，否则我们免谈。

original: I'll follow you. For now.
translation: 我就暂且跟着你吧。

original: {Shakes head, player already has a follower}Nnnn-Nnn... too many, Dog waits until you lose one... {beat}maybe let Dog feed?
translation: {Shakes head, player already has a follower}不…不…人太多了，你先把另一个人赶走，再来找狗{beat}…或者，你也可以把那家伙喂给狗？

original: {Affirmative}Dog is ready. Where we go?
translation: {Affirmative}狗准备好了，我们要去哪儿？

original: {Eager snarl, on the hunt}Arrrooooooooooohnhrhnhr.
translation: {Eager snarl, on the hunt}啊呜呜呜呜呜呜啊啊啊。

original: {Eager snarl, on the hunt}So hungry.
translation: {Eager snarl, on the hunt}好饿。

original: {Eager, pleased, draw this out}Time to feed.
translation: {Eager, pleased, draw this out}该吃东西了。

original: {Irritated}So be it.
translation: {Irritated}那就来吧。

original: Don't have {emph}time for this.
translation: 我可没时间玩这套。

original: {Irritated}Just wanted a little peace and quiet.
translation: {Irritated}我只想要片刻的清静。

original: {Under his breath}Time to make some music.
translation: {Under his breath}该起音乐了。

original: {Under his breath}Strike up the band.
translation: {Under his breath}好戏开始。

original: {Irritated}Great.
translation: {Irritated}很好。

original: [Christine's eyes narrow, stance changes.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛，换了个姿势。]

original: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
translation: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

original: {Relieved}That's a relief. {Beat, changes tone to false confidence}I-I mean, not like I care. I'm fine on my own.
translation: {Relieved}那可太好了。{Beat, changes tone to false confidence}其实吧，我无所谓的。我自己一个人也能行。

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, then shrugs.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，耸了耸肩。]

original: {Snarls, low}Make up your mind.
translation: {Snarls, low}先自己做好决定吧。

original: {Pleased he's not fired}Dog stays.
translation: {Pleased he's not fired}狗可以留下了。

original: Yes, I'm sure.
translation: 是的，我确定。

original: I can't say it hasn't been fun... {quiet}well, I can, but I'll save it for my memoirs.
translation: 和你在一块的这段经历实在算不上有趣……好吧，也不能这么说，将来我会把它写进回忆录里的。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: I'll make more progress on my own - just don't get us killed.
translation: 我自己也能行的——只要不死就行。

original: {Dismissed, whines a bit like a whipped dog}Dog will leave.
translation: {Dismissed, whines a bit like a whipped dog}狗要离开了。

original: I hear you.
translation: 明白了。

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: {Slightly amused}Very well.
translation: {Slightly amused}很好。

original: {Affirmative growl}Hhh-hhnn. Dog hears you.
translation: {Affirmative growl}嗯—嗯，狗听清楚了。

original: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
translation: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

original: {Relieved}All you, trust me.
translation: {Relieved}全听你的。

original: [Christine raises an eyebrow, then shrugs.]
translation: [克莉丝汀扬起眉毛，耸了耸肩。]

original: {Delivered as if he wants to kill the player himself later on}As long as you don't get yourself killed.
translation: {Delivered as if he wants to kill the player himself later on}只要你不自己找死就行。

original: {Confused, then shrugs}Only if save pieces for Dog...
translation: {Confused, then shrugs}能给狗留几块肉吗…

original: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
translation: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

original: {Scoffs}Yeah, right. {Beat}Oh, you're serious. You bet.
translation: {Scoffs}好的。{Beat}哦，你要来狠的，行吧。

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起双眼，点了点头。]

original: {Pleased}Of course... murder's in our blood.
translation: {Pleased}当然了……杀戮可是我们的本能。

original: {Low growl}Hrrrrrrrrrrr... Dog will do that.
translation: {Low growl}咕咕咕…狗会照做的。

original: Who was this Father Elijah to you?
translation: 以利亚对你来说是什么人？

original: I would say he was my tutor, but that doesn't cover it.
translation: 我把他当成我的导师，但还不止于此。

original: After my parents passed, he looked after me. The whole Brotherhood brought me up, really, but he made sure of it.
translation: 我父母去世后，他就一直照顾我。是兄弟会把我拉扯大的没错，但这都要归功于他的领导。

original: I never had a grandfather - not that I knew, anyway - but Elijah was in some ways what I'd imagine a grandfather to be.
translation: 我没有祖父——反正我也不认识他——但以利亚在某些方面确实很符合我心中祖父的形象。

original: Where is he now?
translation: 他现在在哪里？

original: I don't know. Last time anyone saw him was in the battle at HELIOS One. I wasn't there.
translation: 我不知道。他最后一次现身是在保卫太阳神一号的战斗中。我当时不在那里。

original: He gave orders to hold the plant until it could be reactivated. But he ran out of time. The NCR overran it. Everyone thought he was dead.
translation: 他下令坚守设施，直到其重新启动。可他没能争取到足够的时间。NCR最终占领了电站。大家都以为他死了。

original: But I got a note from him at a comm station. That's... how he liked to talk, even to me. He wasn't good at face-to-face.
translation: 但我在一个通讯站发现了他留下的笔记。他……喜欢用那种方式交流，甚至和我谈话时也是如此。他不善于与人当面说话。

original: {Frustrated, in pain}I'm bleeding green here, any ideas?
translation: {Frustrated, in pain}我的血都要流干了，能想想办法吗？

original: [Christine winces, clutches her side.]
translation: [克莉丝汀疼得呲牙咧嘴，护住了自己的身体。]

original: {Whimpering, in pain}Hnnnhrrrrrhn.
translation: {Whimpering, in pain}哼嗯嗯。

original: Head swimming. Can't hold myself... {takes a breath}together much longer.
translation: 脑子发昏…{takes a breath}感觉撑不了多久了。

original: Uh... could use a little boost here.
translation: 呃…我觉得我还可以抢救一下。

original: Great, spilling my guts out to everybody.
translation: 真棒，马上我的肠子就要流得满地都是了。

original: [Christine winces, then tries to hide it.]
translation: [克莉丝汀疼得呲牙咧嘴，但她还是努力保持镇定。]

original: {Sad, in pain}Hrrrrrrn.
translation: {Sad, in pain}呃哼。

original: {Frustrated}Losing blood.
translation: {Frustrated}我流血了。

original: Wake
translation: 醒来

original: {Getting up after being knocked unconscious}Don't want to repeat that number.
translation: {Getting up after being knocked unconscious}我可不想再做返场表演了。

original: {Getting up after being knocked unconscious}Feels like someone played my head like a trombone.
translation: {Getting up after being knocked unconscious}感觉我的脑袋里刚刚有一支喇叭在响。

original: [Christine shakes her head, gets quickly back on her feet.]
translation: [克莉丝汀晃了晃脑袋，迅速爬了起来。]

original: [Christine quickly leaps to her feet, narrows her eyes, and scans the area.]
translation: [克莉丝汀鱼跃而起，她眯起双眼打量着四周。]

original: {Waking up after getting knocked out}Nnnnnn... eyes went black.
translation: {Waking up after getting knocked out}唔嗯…刚才眼前黑了一下。

original: {Waking up after getting knocked out, quiet}Good thing Dog wake up and not other voice.
translation: {Waking up after getting knocked out, quiet}还好醒来的是狗，而不是另一个声音。

original: {To himself}At least I woke up instead of remaining in the dark.
translation: {To himself}至少我还能醒过来，而不是继续呆在黑暗里。

original: Whatever it is, I want to kill it.
translation: 不管动手的是谁，我一定要杀了那个家伙。

original: They're cutting through this like paper!
translation: 这护甲薄得就像纸片一样！

original: [Christine quickly taps what she's wearing, makes a hatchet motion.]
translation: [克莉丝汀快速敲打着身上的护甲，做出了砍杀的姿势。]

original: Song and dance might work better than what I've got.
translation: 来一段歌舞可能都比我手上这个劳什子管用。

original: [Christine taps her weapon angrily, assumes defensive stance.]
translation: [克莉丝汀恼怒地敲打着武器，做出防御的架势。]

original: {Frustrated howl}Hrhhhnnnhh!
translation: {Frustrated howl}呵啊啊啊啊！

original: {Snarling, commanding}Can't hurt this one, give me something that {emph}will.
translation: {Snarling, commanding}用它伤不了人，需要一件更厉害的武器。

original: Bullets all cashed out here!
translation: 子弹全打光了！

original: [Christine taps her gun in frustration.]
translation: [克莉丝汀焦急地敲打着自己的枪。]

original: {Confused that gun stopped spitting bullets}Hnnnrh?
translation: {Confused that gun stopped spitting bullets}嗯哼？

original: Too many targets, not enough bullets.
translation: 目标太多，子弹不够打了。

original: Yeah... that's the sweet stuff.
translation: 哎呀…真是舒服极了。

original: [Christine checks herself, gives the thumbs up.]
translation: [克莉丝汀检查了身上的上口，竖起了大拇指。]

original: {Just got healed, slightly surprised}Hnh. Better.
translation: {Just got healed, slightly surprised}嗯，好多了。

original: {To himself, amused}Physician, heal thyself.
translation: {To himself, amused}医者也能自医。

original: Crippled
translation: 残废

original: {Under his breath}Can finally park in handicapped spaces now.
translation: {Under his breath}终于可以到残疾人专用车位去停车了。

original: [Christine taps herself, then waves her hand - she looks in pain.]
translation: [克莉丝汀拍打着自己，挥舞着双手，她看上去非常痛苦。]

original: {Pained cry, crippled}Hhrrnnnnnhhh!
translation: {Pained cry, crippled}呵啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: {Frustrated that the host body is malfunctioning}Dog's damaged.
translation: {Frustrated that the host body is malfunctioning}狗受伤了。

original: Unff!
translation: 呃啊！

original: [Christine's eyes blank, and she falls.]
translation: [克莉丝汀两眼一翻，倒在了地上。]

original: Hnnh.
translation: 额

original: Rrr!
translation: 啊啊！！

original: Nnnf!
translation: 嗯啊！

original: Hnnhr!
translation: 呃啊！

original: Hnnhr!
translation: 呃啊！

original: Regenerating
translation: 治愈中

original: Feeling the music.
translation: 感觉真不赖。

original: Spring's back in my step.
translation: 我的身手又变得轻盈了。

original: [Christine blinks, takes a breath, then nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眨眨眼，深吸一口气，然后点了点头。]

original: {Disappointed, no pain = bad}Pain's going away.
translation: 疼痛消失了。

original: Finally - pain's gone, can focus.
translation: 不疼了，可以集中注意力了。

original: Ah! Get a rug, put me out, something!
translation: 啊！快去找张毯子，我身上着火了！

original: [Christine begins to beat at the flames on her body.]
translation: [克莉丝汀开始扑打身上的火焰。]

original: {Howling as on fire, low then builds}Hrnnnnooooo!
translation: {Howling as on fire, low then builds}吼啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: {Disgusted, on fire, but shrugging it off like not worth his time}Fire.
translation: {Disgusted, on fire, but shrugging it off like not worth his time}火。

original: Frenzy
translation: 狂暴

original: Let's bring down the house!
translation: 来个满堂彩吧！

original: [Christine's face peels back in a snarl.]
translation: [克莉丝汀的脸因愤怒而扭曲在一起。]

original: Rhhhharrrhhh!
translation: 呃啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: {Cold, low}That's done it.
translation: {Cold, low}该结束了。

original: Poison
translation: 中毒

original: {Warning}I can help you in the Cloud, not for long, though.
translation: {Warning}我可以帮你穿过毒云，虽然不能维持太久。

original: {Warning}Don't dive in for too long, only so much I can do to help.
translation: {Warning}别待太久了，我只能帮你这么多。

original: [Christine looks at you, touches her throat, frowns.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看着你，皱起眉头，轻抚着自己的咽喉。]

original: Hnnhrr... air smells bad.
translation: 呃啊……空气糟透了。

original: {To himself}Eyes stinging.
translation: {To himself}眼睛好痛。

original: {Low}Won't get rid of me {emph}that easily.
translation: {Low}别想轻易{emph}甩掉我。

original: {Low}Trying to lose me in the Cloud? Not a chance.
translation: {Low}想把我丢在毒云里吗？门儿都没有。

original: {Dismissive}Get a porter, carrying someone's bags - not my style.
translation: {Dismissive}你去叫个门童吧，我不喜欢给别人提包。

original: [Christine puts her palm flat and lowers it to the ground, shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀摊开双手，将手臂伸向地面，然后摇了摇头。]

original: {Cold, evil}Allying with you is already more of a burden than I can bear.
translation: {Cold, evil}与你合作对我来说已经是十分沉重的负担了。

original: {Negatory, asked to carry too much, then whines a bit, like he's like to help but can't}Hnnh-Nnn. Dog can't carry any more.
translation: {Negatory, asked to carry too much, then whines a bit, like he's like to help but can't}嗯啊，狗拿不了更多东西了。

original: {Quiet, to himself}This crouching's hell on my knees.
translation: {Quiet, to himself}一蹲下来，我的膝盖就像受刑一样难受。

original: [Christine crouches down.]
translation: [克莉丝汀蹲下了。]

original: {Irritated}Wish I had a Stealth Boy instead of this bear trap.
translation: {Irritated}不想要这个捕熊夹，要能有个隐身小子就好了。

original: {Evil, threatening}Right behind you.
translation: {Evil, threatening}我会跟紧你的。

original: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}Hnnnn. Dog is following.
translation: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}嗯，狗会跟着你的。

original: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}No have wrist-collar now - Dog still good at not be seen.
translation: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}即使没有戴手环——狗也能很好的隐藏自己。

original: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}How Dog hunted back West. For Lou.
translation: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}以前狗在西部时，就是这样给中尉干活的。

original: It's better you don't. Let me hold onto it.
translation: 你最好不要看，让我收起来。

original: {Irritated}Fine. I guess it doesn't matter anyway, keep it. I won't ask again.
translation: {Irritated}好吧。我猜它也没多重要，收着它吧。我不会再问你要了。

original: Would you mind if I looked at the message?
translation: 你介意我看看这则消息吗？

original: Just mad ramblings. He didn't make much sense.
translation: 只是些不知所云的疯话。

original: Oh god. He... {sighs}I guess he was lost a long time ago. Even at the end...
translation: 哦，上帝。他……{sighs}我想他在很久以前就迷失了。即使到最后……

original: Still... thanks for bringing word. At least, now I know.
translation: 还是……感谢你的转达。至少我现在知道了。

original: He explained the search for the Sierra Madre... healed him.
translation: 他说对马德雷山脉赌场的搜寻……治愈了他。

original: {Drifting, dismissive}Hmm. Unlikely. He was a little too focused on gears and diodes... tech was the cure-all.
translation: {Drifting, dismissive}嗯。不太可能吧。他很痴迷于齿轮和二极管……他觉得技术才能治愈一切。

original: Can you unlock it for me first? He was... vague on that point.
translation: 你能先把它解开吗？他的表达有些……含混不清。

original: {Sadly accepting}Yeah. Yeah. Thought as much. He'd been fading away for a long time.
translation: {Sadly accepting}是，是。所见略同。他已经神志不清很长一段时间了。

original: Some last words - a message. Nothing important.
translation: 一些遗言，一则消息。没什么重要的。

original: {Waiting for player to step out of simulator}What was on it? What did he say?
translation: {Waiting for player to step out of simulator}内容是什么？他说了些什么？

original: {Still a little dizzy}Sorry... feel a little out of it. Head's spinning a bit...
translation: {Still a little dizzy}对不起……感觉有点难受。头有点晕……

original: {Surprise, knowledge downloading}Oh. Oh!
translation: {Surprise, knowledge downloading}哦，哦！

original: {Blinking, just gained downloaded defense programs}I think he left me a gift. {Quiet}Maybe I can use it better than he did.
translation: {Blinking, just gained downloaded defense programs}我想他还给我留了一件礼物。{Quiet}也许我能用得比他更好。

original: What did he say to you?
translation: 他都跟你说了些什么？

original: {Confused, a little disoriented}The parts I understood? Didn't matter. Past all the garbage, all it amounted to was goodbye.
translation: {Confused, a little disoriented}你是说我理解了的那部分？没什么。去掉那些没用的话，总结起来就是告别。

original: {Watched a goodbye message, slightly choked up}That was... that was hard to watch.
translation: {Watched a goodbye message, slightly choked up}这……这怎能让人忍心看完。

original: You should watch it.
translation: 你应该看看这个。

original: {Given a farewell message}All right, I'll watch it.
translation: {Given a farewell message}好吧，我会看看的。

original: You should listen to this.
translation: 你应该听听这个。

original: He left this holo-message. Here.
translation: 他留下了这个全息留言。给你。

original: Where did you get this?
translation: 你从哪弄到的？

original: {Wary}Guess I was right about the bad news, huh? Same look Elder McNamara always gave me when I was up for promotion.
translation: {Wary}看来我猜对了，是个坏消息，是吧？你的表情就跟麦克纳马拉长老要提拔我时一样。

original: Did he say anything when you met him? Anything...{about me, stops herself}anything at all?
translation: 你遇到他时他有没有说什么？什么事……{about me, stops herself}什么事都没说吗？

original: {Default Choke Node}...it doesn't matter. He died when we all retreated to Hidden Valley. I didn't expect to see him again, no one did.
translation: {Default Choke Node}……无所谓了。他在我们向隐谷撤退时就死了。我没想过还能再见到他，没人想过。

original: I had to trap him inside a Pre-War... prison.
translation: 我不得不把他困在一座战前的……监狱里。

original: Trapped him? Where?
translation: 困住了他？在哪里？

original: I had to kill him.
translation: 我不得不杀了他。

original: You killed him? {Beat}But...
translation: 你杀了他？{Beat}但是……

original: I found Elijah.
translation: 我找到了以利亚。

original: {Surprise, player found someone she thought was dead}You did? Where? Oh my God, I mean... I thought... I don't even know what I thought might have happened to him.
translation: {Surprise, player found someone she thought was dead}真的吗？在哪里？天啊，我的意思是……我以为……我都不敢相信还能听到他的消息。

original: {Wary}But... you don't have a "this is good news" expression on your face.
translation: {Wary}但是……从你的表情来看，似乎不是什么好消息啊。

original: Meet me at the Fountain, then we'll go from there.
translation: 到喷泉处等我，我们再出发。

original: All right, come with me.
translation: 好吧，跟我来。

original: {Player has no companion, Christine comes along.}[Christine nods, and steps slightly behind you, waiting.]
translation: {Player has no companion, Christine comes along.}[克莉丝汀点点头，轻轻的在后面跟着你，等待着。]

original: Just die, tired of listening to you anyway.
translation: 死去吧，我不想再听你说话了。

original: {Cold, determined}Silence suits me fine. When your master shows, I'll deal with him, too.
translation: {Cold, determined}对我来说，沉默确实更合适。等你的主子现身时，我也一样会把他收拾掉。

original: Just glad you're safe. Hold up here, I'll take care of Elijah.
translation: 很高兴你没事。在这里等着，我去干掉以利亚。

original: {Studies player, thinks the player is worth it}Good luck. He's... not an easy opponent. If I can, I'll help. {Beat, thinking}Might be able to figure something out using the Sierra Madre's computer systems.
translation: {Studies player, thinks the player is worth it}祝你好运。 他可不好对付。我会尽力帮你的。{Beat, thinking}或许我可以找出赌场电脑系统里的漏洞。

original: What do you want to say?
translation: 你想说什么？

original: {Takes a breath}I've been hunting the one who hijacked your Pip-Boy, Elijah, for... some time.
translation: {Takes a breath}那个入侵了你哔哔小子的人，以利亚，我追杀他……有些时间了。

original: {Deadly serious}He {emph}cannot leave the Sierra Madre alive. What he's done... what he's done here is nothing compared to what he's done in the past.
translation: {Deadly serious}决不能让他活着离开马德雷山脉。他在这儿……在这儿所做的事情，和他过去犯下的罪行相比，简直是小巫见大巫。

original: The only way to bring him out is if you get to the vault... he won't allow you to go down there {emph}alone. That's when we kill him.
translation: 想要引他出来，唯一的方法就是进入避难所…他肯定不会让你独自进去的。那就是我们动手的绝佳时机。

original: You could have said something sooner.
translation: 你可以早点说的。

original: {Reluctant}Wasn't sure until now I could trust you. Now I know.
translation: {Reluctant}之前我不知道能否信任你。现在我明白了。

original: Look, when I woke up here... however that happened... I had this key on me - I think it belongs to her.
translation: 听着，我醒来的时候…我也不知道究竟怎么回事…反正我发现兜里装着一把钥匙，我觉得应该是她的。

original: Haven't had a chance to use it yet - might open the dresser, or the safe - didn't have time to experiment with it before you arrived. Here you go.
translation: 不知道这是用来开哪儿的，也许可以打开衣橱或者保险箱，在你来之前我也没时间试验。先给你吧。

original: {Reluctant}Wasn't sure until now I could trust you. Now I know.
translation: {Reluctant}之前我不知道能否信任你。现在我明白了。

original: I know Elijah needs to be dealt with, just let me handle it.
translation: 我知道必须干掉以利亚，交给我处理就好。

original: {Dog Dead: Narration}When Dog fell in the Sierra Madre casino, two died as one.
translation: {Dog Dead: Narration}狗笨重的身躯在赌场中倒下，与他共生的人格也随之死去。

original: {Narration}Dog died hungry, alone, frightened.
translation: {Narration}他死在了饥饿、孤独与恐惧之中。

original: {God-Voice, Narration}The voice in his head died with him. Screaming. Furious. {Beat, emph}Enraged.
translation: {God-Voice, Narration}而他脑海里的那个声音，也在尖叫、咆哮与愤怒中，与他一同消亡。

original: {Narration, sad but happy}But the voice was gone, and Dog was grateful.
translation: {Narration, sad but happy}那声音消失了，狗却充满了感激。

original: {God-Voice, Narration, sad quiet - like losing a handicapped younger brother}At least Dog was dead and the voice needed to watch over him no more.
translation: {God-Voice, Narration, sad quiet - like losing a handicapped younger brother}至少狗死了之后，那个声音也无需再时刻盯着他了。

original: {Narration}In the moment before their lives ended, the wall between the two personalities fell. The two became silent as they saw the chain between them.
translation: {Narration}在他们的生命行将结束前，那道横亘在两个人格之间的高墙轰然倒塌。目睹了彼此之间的联系后，两个灵魂都沉默了。

original: {God-Voice, Narration}Hunger and control are twin greeds, something Dog and his shadow had never realized.
translation: {God-Voice, Narration}饥饿与支配不过是贪婪孕育的一对孪生子，狗和他的另一个人格至死也未能理解这一点。

original: {Dog Alive, God Alive: Narration}Dog forgot himself, as did the voice that raged within him. After their passing, a new voice spoke within the mutant's shell.
translation: {Dog Alive, God Alive: Narration}狗和他体内那狂躁的声音一起忘记了自我。他们消失后，一个新的声音在这变种人的躯壳中诞生了。

original: {Narration}It was difficult for the voice to remember the two it once was... there was the beast, Dog consumed by hunger...
translation: {Narration}这声音无法再回想起自己的过往…印象中曾有一只野兽，被饥饿所驱使……

original: {Narration}...and the other in reverse... the one consumed by control.
translation: {Narration}…还有另一个声音…不肯放下自己的控制欲。

original: {Narration}Both were driven by need for the other. The Courier brought them together, somehow, joined the two into one.
translation: {Narration}两个灵魂原本彼此互补，针锋相对。但邮差却让他们走到了一起，将他们合二为一。

original: {Narration}All that happened at the Sierra Madre, was a faint memory to the new personality... like a flickering light in the clouds of the mind.
translation: {Narration}对这新的人格来说，所有关于马德雷山脉赌场的记忆…都化为了浓雾中摇曳的一束烛光。

original: {Narration}The new voice did not think of the Courier again until the battle at the Divide reached his ears.
translation: {Narration}直到发生在大裂谷的那场战斗传到耳边，这个声音才想起了邮差的名字。

original: {Slow, reverent - this is quietly dramatic, ends on a sad downnote}The battle between the two couriers, beneath the torn skies and the Old World flag... {quiet, slower}each bearing a message for the other.
translation: {Slow, reverent - this is quietly dramatic, ends on a sad downnote}在残破的天空下，背负着旧世界的旗帜，两位邮差展开了宿命的对决... {quiet, slower}彼此都携带着给对方的一段口信。

original: {Narration}And the mutant prayed the Courier that had saved him... had been saved in return.
translation: {Narration}于是变种人开始为那个曾经拯救过他的邮差祈祷……希望吉人自有天助。

original: {Dog Alive: Narration}Dog, free of the voice inside his head and no longer waiting on the voice of the Master, wandered back West.
translation: {Dog Alive: Narration}狗摆脱了脑海中的声音，没有了主人的吩咐，他开始向西流浪。

original: {Narration}His hunger never ended. Often, small communities would suddenly vanish.
translation: {Narration}他的饥饿感从未消失。时不时会传出一些小村落突然集体失踪的消息。

original: {Narration}They were assumed to have been hit by Wasteland creatures and dragged away... dogs, Brahmin, and humans alike.
translation: {Narration}人们普遍猜测这些地方遭到了废土生物的袭击…无论狗、双头牛还是人类，都无一例外惨遭毒手。

original: {God Alive: Narration}Freed of both Dog and the one who held Dog's leash, the other voice resumed control. First the mind, then finally, the mutant's shell.
translation: {God Alive: Narration}狗不在了，那个企图奴役他的人也消失了，脑海里的声音终于获得了主导权，从思想和肉体上完全控制了这个变种人。

original: {Narration}His first act was to tend to the scars on the body with careful hands, slowly healing all the scars except the ragged name torn on his chest.
translation: {Narration}他做的头一件事便是小心地治疗这副伤痕累累的躯体，让伤疤逐步痊愈。不过，那个刻在胸口的潦草名字，他并没有去碰。

original: {Narration}He briefly thought of remaining at the Sierra Madre. But it was a monument built by humans, representing something he no longer needed.
translation: {Narration}一开始，他想继续留在马德雷山脉，但很快就改变了主意。这是人类留下的遗迹，他已经不再需要了。

original: {Narration}He began walking west, in search of others like him. As he did, he spoke of the courier who had set him free and allowed his life to begin again.
translation: {Narration}于是他开始向西进发，寻找自己的同类。每当遇见自己的族人，他便会和他们讲起那个曾经解救过他、赋予了他新生的邮差的故事。

original: {Christine Dead: Narration}Christine, scarred by her hunt for Elijah and unable to let him go, perished in the Sierra Madre Casino.
translation: {Christine Dead: Narration}克莉丝汀为了追杀以利亚而身心俱疲，未能放下执念的她最终死在了在马德雷山脉赌场。

original: {Narration}She never completed her mission, nor did she stop to consider what had driven her to accept the mission in the first place.
translation: {Narration}她没有完成自己的使命，也从未停下脚步思考过究竟是什么驱使她接下了这个任务。

original: {Narration}Obsession is another form of greed, a lesson that Christine never learned.
translation: {Narration}执念不过是另一种形式的贪婪，只可惜克莉丝汀至死都没能明白这个道理。

original: {Christine Alive: Narration}Christine, her mission complete, found new purpose as the Sierra Madre's warden. She watched over it silently - by choice.
translation: {Christine Alive: Narration}克莉丝汀完成了使命，也找到了新的人生目标，她成为了马德雷山脉赌场新的看守者。为了守护这里，她决定保持沉默。

original: {Narration}Over time, the Ghost People came to see her as one of the Holograms. They would watch, silently, as she walked among them.
translation: {Narration}随着时间推移，鬼人们渐渐把她当成了全息影像。每当她从身边走过时，它们便会安静地注视着她。

original: {Narration, a little tender here}At times, Christine thought of the Courier, who had kept Elijah's hand from her throat.
translation: {Narration, a little tender here}有时，克莉丝汀会想起那位邮差，正是那个人从以利亚的魔掌中解救了自己。

original: {Narration}The Courier reminded her of the {slight emph}other courier she had met in the Big Empty, and wondered if the two had found each other at last.
translation: {Narration}而那位邮差又令她回忆起了自己曾在大山脉遇到的另一位邮差，她不禁好奇这两人是否有朝一日会相遇。

original: {Narration, quiet}She did not think of them again until she heard the legends of the Divide.
translation: {Narration, quiet}她渐渐淡忘了这件事，直到有一天，她听说了发生在大裂谷的传奇。

original: {Slow, reverent - this is quietly dramatic, ends on a sad downnote}The Divide, where the two messengers, the two couriers, fought beneath an ancient flag, at the edge of the world.
translation: {Slow, reverent - this is quietly dramatic, ends on a sad downnote}在裂谷中，两位邮差，两位信使，在世界的边缘，在古老的旗帜下，展开了较量。

original: {Dean Dead: Narration, a little wistful at the memory}Dean Domino, entertainer, singer... thief... had his last show on the Sierra Madre stage.
translation: {Dean Dead: Narration, a little wistful at the memory}迪安 ·多米诺，艺人、歌手…窃贼…在马德雷山脉赌场的舞台上，他献上了人生的告别演出。

original: {Narration}The heist he spent over two hundred years planning fell apart, just as the first, by underestimating his partner's strength.
translation: {Narration}两百年苦心积虑的抢劫计划最终付诸东流，如同当初一样，他低估了自己同伙的实力。

original: {Narration}Not long after the Courier left the Villa, the lights in the theater shut off, one by one.
translation: {Narration}邮差离开别墅区后不久，剧院的灯便一盏接一盏熄灭了。

original: {Narration}Only Dean's Hologram remained on stage, singing silently to an empty room.
translation: {Narration}只剩下迪安的全息影像仍站在舞台中央，静静地对着空无一人的剧场歌唱。

original: {Narration, sad shaking of head, end on a downnote}Still... as consumed as he had been with its riches and ruin, the Sierra Madre had held him captive long ago.
translation: {Narration, sad shaking of head, end on a downnote}也许…沉沦在马德雷山脉的财富与废墟之中的他，早已剩下了一副空皮囊。

original: {Dean Alive: Narration, slightly upbeat}Dean Domino, entertainer, singer... thief... explored the Sierra Madre not long after he was rescued by the Courier.
translation: {Dean Alive: Narration, slightly upbeat}迪安 ·多米诺，艺人、歌手…窃贼…在被邮差救下后不久，他走遍了整个马德雷山脉赌场。

original: {Narration}Once he left the theater, the Sierra Madre recognized him as a guest, and many doors opened to him. He had to admit, it had been built to last.
translation: {Narration}离开剧院后，马德雷山脉赌场将他视为了贵宾，许多大门在他面前敞开。他不禁感叹，这里的一切确实坚固。

original: {Narration}During his search, he came across the final records of Vera and Sinclair, and realized what happened the night the bombs fell.
translation: {Narration}在探索时，他意外发现了薇拉和辛克莱留下的最后记录，终于明白了核弹落下当晚发生的事情。

original: {Narration}He felt strangely sad for a moment, and he had no idea why.
translation: {Narration}刹那间，一股莫名的哀伤涌上心头，可他却不知这股哀伤从何而来。

original: {Narration}Shrugging it off, his mind turned instead to where the Courier had come from. Vegas still survived, out there in the Mojave.
translation: {Narration}他将这思绪抛诸脑后，转念又想起了邮差来的地方。维加斯还没有消亡，她依然矗立在莫哈维沙漠中。

original: {Narration}Its sights, sounds... and casinos, ripe for the taking.
translation: {Narration}那里流光溢彩、歌舞喧嚣…也有繁华的赌场，令人垂涎欲滴。

original: {Narration, slightly upbeat}So giving the Sierra Madre one last nod and a wink, he set off beyond the Cloud to begin again.
translation: {Narration, slightly upbeat}于是，他对着马德雷山脉赌场献上最后的致意，转身走出毒云，踏上了新的旅途。

original: <Lie> We'll take the elevator up, see if there's another way to do this. After you.
translation: <撒谎> 我们坐电梯上去，看有没有其他解决办法。你先走。

original: [Christine smiles slightly in relief, and moves to the elevator.]
translation: [克莉丝汀轻松地微笑着，向电梯走去。]

original: All right, let me see if I can find another way to do this without sending you down there.
translation: 好吧，我找找别的办法，这样你就不用下去了。

original: [Christine smiles slightly in relief, and nods. She opens her mouth slightly, then closes it, frustrated.]
translation: [克莉丝汀笑了，似乎松了口气。她点点头，张开嘴好像想说点什么，又沮丧地合上了。]

original: [She points at you, then makes a fist and puts it against her chest and nods.]
translation: [她指着你，然后握拳放在胸前并点头。]

original: I need you to go down to the manual bypass room to regulate the power.
translation: 我需要你下到配电室去，重新分配电力。

original: [Christine glances at the elevator, her expression becomes worried, then she looks back at you, then reluctantly shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀瞥了一眼电梯，露出了担忧的神情，然后她看向你，勉强地摇了摇头。]

original: I need you to stay here and fire off the Gala Event.
translation: 我要你留在这里启动盛世庆典。

original: Unless you get some Hologram guards lit up in the courtyard below? No dice.
translation: 除非你在下面的院子里部署一些全息守卫，否则没门。

original: {Like told to wait in a DMZ}Whoa, whoa, whoa... in the middle of town here? Alone? On a {emph}rooftop, with a big lightshow in the air?
translation: {Like told to wait in a DMZ}喂，喂…你要我待在镇中心？只身一人傻站在屋顶上，身后的夜空中还噼里啪啦地闪着烟花？

original: {Sarcastic}Tell you what - why don't you just find one of those Cosmic steak knives so I can slit my wrists, be less {emph}painful checking out that way.
translation: {Sarcastic}我看你啊，倒不如直接塞给我一把大宇宙菜刀，让我就地割腕得了，这样起码还能死得痛快一点。

original: I'd like help with something else.
translation: 我还有别的事情。

original: [The Hologram waits.]
translation: [全息影像看着你。]

original: 20 Chips for 20 Pre-War Bills.
translation: 20美元战前钞票换20个筹码。

original: [You count out the bills on the counter. A panel flips, followed by slow, steady series of clicks, and a stack of chips rise up from the panel.]
translation: [你把数好的钱放在柜台上。桌板翻了过去，紧接着是一阵缓慢而均匀的咔嗒声，一堆筹码随着桌板升了上来。 ]

original: Let me have 5 Chips for 5 Pre-War Bills.
translation: 我要用5美元战前钞票换5个筹码。

original: [You set the bills on the counter. A panel flips, there is a single whir, a click, then a panel rises up with a handful of Sierra Madre Chips.]
translation: [你把钞票放在柜台上。桌板翻了过去，你听到了嗡嗡的响声和清脆的咔嗒声，随后桌板升起，几枚筹码出现在你眼前。]

original: Uh... 1 Chip for 1 Pre-War Bill.
translation: 唔…1美元战前钞票，换1个筹码。

original: [You place the bill on the counter. A panel rotates, and the bill is replaced with a single Sierra Madre Chip.]
translation: [你把硬币放在柜台上。桌板翻转了过去，你的钞票变成了一枚马德雷山脉赌场筹码。]

original: That's all for now. Thanks.
translation: 就这样吧，谢谢。

original: [The Hologram nods, gives a stiff farewell wave.]
translation: [全息影像点点头，僵硬地与你挥手道别。]

original: Can I turn in my Sierra Madre Chips for Pre-War Money?
translation: 我可以把马德雷山脉赌场筹码换成战前货币么？

original: [The Hologram points at the table before you. As you set the chips down, the tabletop rotates, and with a whir, Pre-War bills slide out.]
translation: [全息影像指了指你前面的桌子。你把筹码放下，桌板瞬间翻转，伴随着嗡嗡的响声，一沓战前钞票从里面滑了出来。]

original: I want to exchange Pre-War money for some Sierra Madre Chips.
translation: 我想用一些战前的钞票来换马德雷山脉赌场的筹码。

original: [The Hologram makes a gesture, seems to be indicating amounts and figures.]
translation: [全息影像做了个手势，看起来像是在说明金额和数量。]

original: {THEATER: Player has rescued Dean}Are you all right?
translation: {THEATER: Player has rescued Dean}你还好么?

original: {Relieved}Yeah, now. Talk about a captive audience. {Frowns, thinking it over}Or captive entertainer? Eh - whatever.
translation: {Relieved}还好吧。原来这就是所谓的让观众流连忘返啊。或者应该说是让艺人下不来台？随你怎么说吧。

original: {Confused}What did you just do... can't access the protocols. {Beat, under her breath}Didn't even think Elijah could break Madre security... hnh. Must be a Scribe, too.
translation: {Confused}刚才你做了什么…无法访问安保协议。{Beat, under her breath}连以利亚都无法破坏马德雷的安保系统……嗯，一定也是个学士。

original: {Confused}Security's down...? Hnh. {Frowns, wasn't expecting this}Doesn't matter, won't help you.
translation: {Confused}安保系统关闭了…? 嗯。 {Frowns, wasn't expecting this}没关系，你一样完蛋。

original: {Pained}If it's who I think it is, this is Christine... recovered. {Starts getting voice back, surveying room, professional}In what looks like an Old World hotel room, high class, two rooms - {beat}exit's sealed.
translation: {Pained}应该是你吧，我是克莉丝汀…我恢复了。{Starts getting voice back, surveying room, professional}现在我被困在一个看起来像旧世界宾馆的的高档两室套房里，{beat}出口被封住了。

original: Floor's got holographic security. {Beat, recalling info, under her breath}Not latest tech, field of view targeting systems, primitive. {Under her breath}Familiar.
translation: 这层到处是全息保安在巡逻。{Beat, recalling info, under her breath}不是最新型号，用的还是扇形视野追踪系统，很原始。{Under her breath}很熟悉。

original: Floor looks like it protected the guests too well. {Somber, dead body}Checked the Suite, found the holographic woman from the Villa Fountain.
translation: 看来这一层对客人的保护有些过度了。{Somber, dead body}我在套房里转了一圈，发现了别墅区喷泉投影里的那个女人的尸体。

original: Picking up that interference frequency, same as the Villa, floor's live with speakers and radios. Keep an ear out, watch the walls.
translation: 我发现了频率扰动，和别墅区的一样，这层布满了喇叭和无线电。所以千万要竖起耳朵，注意四周的墙壁。

original: Doors on this floor are all operated manually in an emergency, place is locked up tight. {Beat, under her breath}Must be keycards around somewhere.
translation: 由于启动了应急机制，这一层的门全部只能手动操作，整个楼层封得死死的。{Beat, under her breath}附近肯定有门卡。

original: {Frowns, to herself}Looks like security systems did more to kill the people here than the Bomb did. {Beat}Hope there's a way out of this casino.
translation: {Frowns, to herself}看起来这里的安保系统杀的人比核弹还多。{Beat}希望有办法可以逃离赌场。

original: {Pained}What's with my collar... Elijah? Or... no, it's you. Even better. {Beat, gathering strength}This is Christine, voice back. You got off on the wrong floor, you're trapped.
translation: {Pained}我的项圈是怎么回事…以利亚？…不，是你。来得正好。{Beat, gathering strength}我是克莉丝汀，我的声音恢复了。你走错楼层了，现在你被困住了。

original: {Angry, grim}Hope you can make it past security. I've been looking forward to taking care of you since the Gala Event.
translation: {Angry, grim}希望你不会被安保系统干掉。自打盛世庆典结束后，我就一直想亲手解决你。

original: You and Elijah were working together this whole time. Should've known, just from your actions, you have his... outlook on things.
translation: 你和以利亚狼狈为奸。我真该早点看出来，从你的行为判断，你和他的…完全就是一类货色。

original: Hope you aren't dead yet... although I'm sure my collar would let me know. I could just detonate it now, but saving it for someone special.
translation: 希望你还没死…虽然我只要摸摸项圈就能知道你的情况。我现在可以马上引爆项圈，但我还是打算为你留着。

original: {Snarls, impatience breaking through}Did you {emph}really think you could steal from me? {Beat, cold, slower}The Sierra Madre is {emph}mine.
translation: {Snarls, impatience breaking through}你真以为你可以偷走我的东西吗？马德雷山脉赌场是我的。

original: {Elijah's furious about fallen for a trap & vengefully sets bomb collar tick - 10 seconds to get out at the end of this line.}You think you've outsmarted me? You can't get away. You're the one on a leash, you always were.
translation: {Elijah's furious about fallen for a trap & vengefully sets bomb collar tick - 10 seconds to get out at the end of this line.}你觉得自己比我聪明么？你逃不掉的。你不过是只待宰的羔羊，从一开始结局就已经注定。

original: {Cold}You think you've escaped... no. No, you were never out of reach... my hand was always around your neck.
translation: {Cold}你觉得自己逃出生天了吗？……不，不，你永远别想逃出我的手掌心…你的性命掌握在我手里。

original: {Furious, determined, as he starts running programs}This entire structure is mine to command. Security... weapons... all this technology - mine. {Beat, evil and pleased}Now - you die.
translation: {Furious, determined, as he starts running programs}整栋楼都听命于我。安保系统…武器...所有这些科技，我都能操纵。{Beat, evil and pleased}现在，去死吧。

original: Alarms... what... {snarls, realizes he's been set up, emph}you. Think you can run, think you can trick {emph}me?
translation: 警报…怎么... {snarls, realizes he's been set up, emph}是你。你以为自己逃得掉吗，你居然敢耍我？

original: {Slight surprise}Eh? What's this.
translation: {Slight surprise}嗯？怎么回事。

original: {Elijah's dying - he curses you, and collapses in agony.}Think you've won? You've won {emph}nothing.
translation: {Elijah's dying - he curses you, and collapses in agony.}觉得自己赢了？你根本没赢。

original: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}You came all this way... but you lost as soon as you arrived here.
translation: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}你大老远跑来…可你一到这里，就迷失了自我。

original: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}I'm not without weapons of my own... let me show you.
translation: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}我可不是手无寸铁…让你见识一下吧。

original: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}Struggle all you want... the Sierra Madre will be your grave.
translation: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}尽情挣扎吧…马德雷山脉就是你的坟墓。

original: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}Time is against you. It always was.
translation: {Elijah taunts you, during combat scene against him, or the sentry turrets of the Vault}时间永远不在你这一边。

original: {Snarls, pissed}Aaah... Pre-War {emph}junk. I'll put you down myself.
translation: {Snarls, pissed}啊啊啊…战前的垃圾！我要亲手解决你。

original: {Irritated, under his breath, player's putting up a fight}Don't have {emph}time for this.
translation: {Irritated, under his breath, player's putting up a fight}没时间和你纠缠了。

original: Pre-War tech... so easy to control, just like your Pip-Boy. Turrets, Holograms, they're all just toys.
translation: 战前科技…太容易控制了，如同你的哔哔小子。无论安保炮塔还是全息影像，都只是玩具而已。
