original: {Contemptuous, superior}I'll have the Sierra Madre kill you for me. {Beat, then slower, more menacing}You can't beat all the casino's defenses... it's only a matter of time now.
translation: {Contemptuous, superior}我可以借助马德雷山脉的力量来杀死你。{Beat, then slower, more menacing}你不可能破坏赌场所有的安保措施…你的死不过是时间问题。

original: {Contemptuous, superior}Staying in the Vault? Think it'll protect you? No... I don't think so.
translation: {Contemptuous, superior}你想蜷缩在避难所里？以为它会保护你吗？不…我可不这么认为。

original: Unlock it, give it back, then shut up.
translation: 打开它，交还给我，然后闭嘴。

original: Yes. It was entrusted to me, not you.
translation: 对。这是给我的，不是给你的。

original: Here you go.
translation: 拿去吧。

original: Did it make any sense?
translation: 里面说了些什么？

original: It's a message. The news is up to you.
translation: 是一条信息。想不想听由你自己决定。

original: There's something I wanted to pass along.
translation: 我有些东西要转交给你。

original: He's dead.
translation: 他死了。

original: He's trapped, no chance of him escaping.
translation: 他被困住了，永远也逃不出来。

original: I had to kill him before he hurt others.
translation: 为了避免他害人，我只能杀了他。

original: {Dog voice, frightened}Get away while you can, before he comes back.
translation: {Dog voice, frightened}你快走吧，不然他要回来了。

original: {Dog voice, frightened, rocking back and forth}Makes Dog hurt self.
translation: {Dog voice, frightened, rocking back and forth}狗会伤害自己的。

original: {Dog voice, whispering, frightened}Master, help me, Master, help me. Please.
translation: {Dog voice, whispering, frightened}主人，救救我，主人，救救我，求你救救我。

original: {Dog voice, frightened, sad}Don't let him make me hurt myself. Hurt keeps him away.
translation: {Dog voice, frightened, sad}别让他逼我自残。我自残，他就不会出现了。

original: {Dog voice}So hungry.
translation: {Dog voice}好饿啊。

original: {Dog voice, frightened}I'll be good this time, I promise, Master, just keep him away.
translation: {Dog voice, frightened}我这次一定乖乖的，我发誓，主人，只要别让他靠近我。

original: {Dog voice}Noise makes my stomach hurt.
translation: {Dog voice}吵得我胃痛。

original: {Dog voice}Turn the noise off.
translation: {Dog voice}把噪音关掉。

original: {Dog voice}Puts Dog in the cage, hiding downstairs.
translation: {Dog voice}把狗放进笼子里，把梯子藏起来。

original: {Dog voice}He's watching, waiting for you to try and let me go.
translation: {Dog voice}他在观察，等着你把我放出去。

original: {Dog voice}So hungry.
translation: {Dog voice}好饿。

original: {Commanding, spoken in God's voice}Dog, back in the cage.
translation: {Commanding, spoken in God's voice}狗，回笼子里去。

original: {God: Impressed, player jumped through his hoops, evil, amused. Curious}What have we here? {Beat, slight mock disappointment}You weren't who I was expecting. I'm disappointed.
translation: {God: Impressed, player jumped through his hoops, evil, amused. Curious}瞧瞧谁来了？ {Beat, slight mock disappointment}你不是我要等的人，我很失望。

original: {Appraising player, suspicious}Still... even if you aren't my intended guest, you take direction. Good. You can't have been an idiot to figure out how to release me from my cage...
translation: {Appraising player, suspicious}不过…虽然我等的不是你，但你还是听从了我的指引。很好。既然你懂得如何把我从笼子里放出来，说明你也不是个傻子。

original: {Looking at player's Pip-Boy and collar}...or perhaps you are, with that leash on your arm {emph}and the one around your neck... {mocking, evil}with our collars and manacles, why, we may as well be kin.
translation: {Looking at player's Pip-Boy and collar}…又或者你确实是个傻子，毕竟你的胳膊和脖子上都绑着东西……{mocking, evil}瞧瞧我们身上的项圈和镣铐，呵，咱俩都可以算是同类了。

original: {Malicious, whispering}Knew you would come, below the cage... down to where {emph}I am. {Beat, lower}Maybe you saw the letters I scratched on the Villa walls.
translation: {Malicious, whispering}我料到你会来，到笼子下面来…来找我吧{Beat, lower}。估计你已经看到了我刻在别墅区墙上的字了。

original: {Malicious, encouraging taunt}A little farther. Follow my voice... that's it. {Beat}The one in the cage? Dog. {Slight anger}I had to lock him up. He keeps... disobeying me.
translation: {Malicious, encouraging taunt}再往前一点。顺着我的声音走…就是这样。{Beat}笼子里那个？那是狗。{Slight anger}我必须把他锁起来，因为他总是……不听我的话。

original: That's me, there, on the table. The disk. {Beat, soft, creepy}My voice.
translation: 我在这里。看啊，桌子上，那盘磁带。{Beat, soft, creepy}那就是我的声音。

original: {Warning}Can't take any chances, though... you may be some victim who simply stumbled down here. If so, can't let you let Dog out... no, not yet.
translation: {Warning}不过为保险起见…也许你只是个误打误撞闯进来的倒霉蛋，如果是这样，我就不能让你把狗放出来…不，不行。

original: {Imperious}If you're who I think you are, you came to fetch Dog, use him to drag others here. {Beat, cruel}Now I'll use {emph}you - {emph}and that Pip-Boy you're wearing.
translation: {Imperious}而假如我的推测正确，那你应该是要来带走狗的，你想利用他来绑架其他人。{Beat, cruel}现在我要利用 {emph}你，和你手上的哔哔小子。

original: {Taunting}You're smart. Clever. The key to Dog's cage is simple. Take my voice to the cage above. {Beat}Let me speak to the beast inside.
translation: {Taunting}你很聪明。非常聪明。打开笼子的方法非常简单。把这盘磁带拿到上面的笼子旁边，播放它。{Beat}让我和笼子里那个怪物说话。

original: Then you and I... {emph}we can talk.
translation: 然后我和你…{emph}我们就能交谈了。

original: I don't have time for this. Get in the damn elevator.
translation: 我没空和你扯皮。赶紧进电梯。

original: [Christine shakes her head, more insistently this time. She points at the elevator, then downwards, then holds herself tightly and shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀这次更加坚定地摇了摇头。她指了指电梯，然后走了下来，紧紧抱住双手，并摇了摇头。]

original: I've found a way to do the bypass from here. You should be able to just use the terminal over there.
translation: 我找到方法了，在这上面就可以操作。你只需要负责那台终端就行了。

original: [Christine nods gratefully. She glances in the direction of the terminal, looks at you, smiles, gives a thumbs up.]
translation: [克莉丝汀感激地点了点头。她向终端的方向瞥了一眼，然后看着你，给了一个赞许的微笑。]

original: [Christine motions to you, points at the door uneasily, then makes a pulling motion with her hand. She seems hesitant to go near it.]
translation: [克莉丝汀招呼你过去，艰难地指了指门，然后用手做了一个推的动作。她似乎很犹豫，不敢靠近它。]

original: Well, if I can get here, others will be, soon enough. Fountain's the safest place.
translation: 既然我能找到这里，那其他人迟早也会找来。喷泉是最安全的地方。

original: That's... a good point. All right, let me grab some smokes, and I'll meet you at the Fountain.
translation: 这……说得有道理。好吧，我先去拿几包烟，然后咱们喷泉边上见。

original: Fine. Get up and follow me.
translation: 好吧。起来跟着我。

original: All right... partner.
translation: 好吧…搭档。

original: All right, all right... but you already got company, so tell you what - I'll meet you at the Fountain.
translation: 好吧，好吧…但是你已经有了同伴。这样吧，我去喷泉处等你。

original: Any reason you can't find your way there?
translation: 你为什么不敢自己过去？

original: I know what's out there. It's why I've planted a mine field, shotguns, and explosives all the way on the road to my little boudoir here.
translation: 我知道外面有什么。所以我才会在离家门不远的路上布置一大堆地雷、霰弹枪和炸药机关。

original: So we go together, or we're not going at all. I'll split my hand in Blackjack when the time's right, I'm not splitting up in this town, trust me.
translation: 要么我们一起走，要么哪儿也别去。虽然我玩21点时绝不会错过分牌的机会，但我也知道在这镇上绝不可以分头行动，相信我。

original: We'll find out more about our "contract" back at the Fountain.
translation: 回到喷泉那去吧，到时候我们就会知道这笔“生意”的具体内容了。

original: Fine. Get up and follow me.
translation: 好吧。起来，跟我走。

original: I think you can manage walking there without me. Now get going.
translation: 就算没我陪你，你也可以自己走到那儿去的。走吧。

original: Wait, wait... wait just a minute. I'm not walking out there on my own.
translation: 等，等等…等一下。我可不想一个人在外面。

original: Meet at the Fountain, and we'll hear what the next step is.
translation: 在喷泉处集合，我们就会知道下一步该怎么做了。

original: Not leaving me much choice. The Fountain, huh? {Beat}Hope the Hologram's still working and the battery's running strong.
translation: 我也没得选。喷泉是吧？{Beat}希望那里的全息影像还在运行并且电量充足。

original: I'll follow you, I'm not going alone, trust me. Not like I'm a coward or anything, I'm not running around town without an escort.
translation: 我跟着你，我不会单独行动的，相信我。并非我胆小，我只是不喜欢在无人陪同的情况下在镇上乱跑。

original: I'm serious. One of the locals catches us, we aren't coming back - and I'd like to keep an eye on you.
translation: 我是认真的。要是被那些土著逮着，我们就完了，而且……我也要监视你。

original: It's starting to make sense, now that I've met you.
translation: 从我遇到你之后的遭遇来看，这种事似乎也说得通。

original: {Laughs}All right, all right... looks like marriage finally caught me.
translation: {Laughs}啊哈哈哈！好吧，好吧…看来还真是躲不掉的姻缘啊。

original: I'm listening... partner. What's next, if we're death-til-we-part?
translation: 那我就听你的吧…伙伴。下一步你要干啥？该不会是要和我厮守到天荒地老吧？

original: I only need you breathing. Push me, I'll bring you to the point of death, then leave you.
translation: 我只要你会喘气就行。再逼我的话，我会打得你只剩一口气，然后把你扔在地上自生自灭。

original: Agree to come with me now, or I get up from this chair and kill us both, shaped-charge or no.
translation: 你必须跟我走，不然我就从这椅子上站起来，管它是不是锥形炸药。反正我可以拉你陪葬。

original: Forget this, I'm leaving.
translation: 算了，我走了。

original: Either deal with me as an equal, or I walk.
translation: 要么咱俩公平交易，要么我就走人。

original: Just like all the rest. Strolling in here, thinking you own the place. I've been here longer than {emph}any of you tourists.
translation: 你和其他人一样，以为自己手眼通天，能当这儿的老大。其实我在这儿待的时间比你们任何一个游客都长。

original: Trust me, I'm letting you off easier than the Sierra Madre ever would. Nobody's going to miss you... whoever you are, you're old news.
translation: 相信我，比起马德雷山脉赌场，我已经算是很客气的了。无论你是谁，不会有人想念你的…再见咯。

original: I think you're bluffing. I'm getting up, right now.
translation: 我觉得你在虚张声势。我这就站起来。

original: Uh... look, maybe we can make some sort of... deal, you and me.
translation: 呃……听着，也许咱们可以做笔……交易，如何？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Frowns, suspicious}What are you talking about?
translation: [成功] {Frowns, suspicious}你这话是什么意思？

original: Your negotiation skills assume you're bargaining from a position of strength.
translation: 听你说话的口气，难道你以为自己才是强势的一方吗？

original: [FAILED] The hand's been dealt, {emph}that's the deal. You going along with my terms, or do you want your brains to be wallpaper?
translation: [失败] 我的牌已经打完了，条件都摆在这里，你不同意也得同意，还是说你想让自己的脑浆溅得满墙都是？

original: Our collars... these "neckties" are linked. I die, you die.
translation: 我们戴的项圈…你所谓的“领带”，它们是连在一起的。我死了，你也会死。

original: That's an interesting clause. {Frowns}That's a real bad contract you have. We have.
translation: 这说法可太有意思了。看来咱们俩遇到了霸王条款啊。

original: I'm not going to help you.
translation: 我不会帮你的。

original: That so?
translation: 就这样？

original: I'll cooperate. What do you want?
translation: 我愿意合作。你有什么要求？

original: {Slightly friendlier, let's-make-a-deal}Good, good - then we're in business. I may be a betting man, but I like it when the odds are in our favor.
translation: {Slightly friendlier, let's-make-a-deal}很好，很好，这才是上道的人。虽然我生性好赌，但我还是更喜欢顺风局。

original: If you're here with who I think, then I'd rather have you on my side than his. An... ace in the hole.
translation: 我知道背后指使你的人是谁，与其听他的，不如站在我这边，这样我就能有张…底牌了。

original: You want to live, I want what's in the Madre. Real simple.
translation: 你想活命，而我只想得到马德雷山脉的宝藏。就这么简单。

original: Misund...? Ummm.
translation: 会什么悟？呃……

original: Christ, if that collar blows, I don't know if you'd know the difference, you'd probably still keep walking around with that dumb, blank look.
translation: 老天啊，是不是项圈炸了，你也不会有任何反应，我估计到时候你还要继续顶着那副愚蠢而茫然的表情四处晃荡呢。

original: {Different than other one - speaking to an idiot, so emphasis is different}Just because I work in entertainment, doesn't mean {emph}I'm a moron.
translation: {Different than other one - speaking to an idiot, so emphasis is different}虽然我做的是艺人行当，但不等于我就是个傻子。

original: I'm listening.
translation: 我在听。

original: You've got my attention. For the moment.
translation: 那我就暂且听你说两句吧。

original: Look - I need your help to get into the Sierra Madre.
translation: 听着，我需要你帮我进入马德雷赌场。

original: {Irritated, bad side starts coming out}Oh, of course you do. Now, it's like we're married with these big wedding rings around our necks.
translation: {Irritated, bad side starts coming out}哦，你居然会要我帮忙。感觉咱们真像一对夫妻，所以脖子上的这玩意就是结婚戒指咯。

original: So why don't you hear {emph}my proposal first, before you start talking about what {emph}you need.
translation: 既然你想要我做事，为何不先听听我的意见呢？

original: Uh... you... probably want to hear my side of things.
translation: 唔…你不妨听听我的意见？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Pleased}And that's what I've missed - a rapt audience.
translation: [成功] 多教人怀念啊，居然来了一位全神贯注的听众。

original: I'll save my questions for the end - please, go on.
translation: 那你先说吧，我待会再提问。你继续。

original: [FAILED] You don't listen too good, do you? {Colder}Makes me think whatever you have to say isn't worth my time.
translation: [失败] 看来你根本没有认真听我说话，就你这种态度，哪怕你有意见，我看也是狗屁。

original: Get up without my permission, I'll blast your ass so far through your head, it'll turn the moon cherry pie red.
translation: 没我的允许，你不准站起来，否则我会炸得你从屁股到脑袋全面开花，内脏和血肉比翼双飞。

original: So - let's keep this sweet and polite, and finish our conversation with no misunderstandings.
translation: 所以，咱们还是尽量保持礼貌，来一场友好而亲切的会晤吧。

original: Just because I work in entertainment, doesn't mean I'm a moron.
translation: 虽然我做的是艺人行当，但不等于我是个傻子。

original: I heard my necktie beeping, I know what that means - I'm part of this somehow. I want out of this contract.
translation: 我一听到脖子上那领带在响，就明白是怎么回事了。肯定是有什么情况找上我了，但我不想趟这浑水。

original: {Colder}And if you put me in it, I'm not going to be too happy. So whatever's going on here, if you're part of all this? You're taking orders from me.
translation: {Colder}如果你非要逼我，那我只能来硬的了。我不管究竟唱的是哪一出，但既然有你的份，那你就得听我的。

original: {Talking level with the player, relieved to be saved}I'm not an idiot. I know the reason I'm in here now is because of the old guy - and you.
translation: {Talking level with the player, relieved to be saved}我不是傻子。我知道我现在之所以落到这步田地，纯粹是因为那个老头子，还有你。

original: {Rueful}And {emph}you're wearing a collar, so I trust you a {emph}little more than the old guy. {Beat, throw this line away}He's more controlling than I'd like.
translation: {Rueful}但你戴着项圈， 所以和那老头子相比，我更信任你。他的控制欲实在有些旺盛。

original: {Whispering}Thing is, here's where being my {emph}partner pays off. See, I know how to get into the casino vault.
translation: {Whispering}而且，和我做搭档的好处这时候就体现出来了。你看，其实我知道进入赌场避难所的方法。

original: So here's the short of it - piece together Little Miss Vera Keyes' song in the right order? {Beat, spreads hands}Sierra Madre opens its legs, we're in business.
translation: 捡半截说吧，我们只要把薇拉姑娘的歌曲片段以正确的顺序拼接在一起，马德雷赌场就会像小妞一样张开双腿，然后我们就能大功告成了。

original: Hnh?
{Frowns}Great, a moron - just what I need. {Beat}Look? That seat you're sitting in? It's a {emph}bomb. Go boom.
translation: {Frowns}太棒了，好死不死居然来了个傻子。{Beat}听明白了么？我说你屁股下的那把椅子，它是个炸弹。会炸的。

original: The chair's... an explosive? But...
translation: 这椅子……会爆炸？可是…

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Impressed}Sounds like you've done some blue collar construction work in your life, your Ma must be proud. Still...
translation: [成功] {Impressed}看来你以前下过工地，当过蓝领啊，你妈妈一定引以为傲吧。不过……

original: Better be a shaped charge, or you're going to kill both of us.
translation: 希望你说的“锥形炸药”是真的，否则咱俩就要一块儿上天了。

original: [FAILED] "Butt" is right. That heart-shaped charge in the stuffing will cause just the right amount of bleeding.
translation: [失败] 没有什么“可是”。这垫子里的锥形炸药只会让坐在上面的人毙命。

original: Not one for sitting when the clock's ticking.
translation: 时间宝贵，我没空坐着。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你在说啥？

original: Might be a bit rude, but that chair you're sitting in - it's got a shaped charge in the seat cushion.
translation: 虽然这么说可能有些唐突，不过还是提醒你，你屁股下的椅垫里装了锥形炸药。

original: What can you tell me about the Villa and the town?
translation: 你可以说说别墅区和这个小镇的情况吗？

original: Residential area, clinic, police station - should keep away from the police station, it's a Ghost People hangout.
translation: 这里是住宅区，有诊所、警察局。不过你最好远离警察局，那里有很多游荡的鬼人。

original: Salida del Sol, Puesta del Sol are East Town, West Town. "Sunrise" and "Sunset." {To himself, irritated}Or were when the streets and sky weren't covered with toxic gas.
translation: 东边和西边的镇子分别叫做“日出镇”和“日落镇”，用的是西班牙语起的名。以前街道和天空还没有被有毒气覆盖，这么叫倒合适。

original: Ghost People don't come into the Villa much. West Town and East Town, though... they're thick with the Cloud {emph}and Ghost People. Like hunting grounds.
translation: 鬼民不太常出现在别墅区。但西镇和东镇就不同了…里面的毒云很浓，鬼人也多，简直就像是狩猎场。

original: Tell me about the Cloud.
translation: 和我说说毒云吧。

original: The Cloud? Showed up after the Bomb. {Frowns}I think. I got used to it in small doses. Now, it covers the city.
translation: 毒云？我想应该是核爆之后出现的吧。我已经习惯了吸入少量的毒云。现在整座城市都被它笼罩了。

original: {Slightly sad for a moment}Over the years, it kept climbing up out of the Sierra Madre, until it was curtains for the sun. Didn't see the sky again.
translation: {Slightly sad for a moment}这么多年来，毒云持续不断地从马德雷山脉赌场中涌出，甚至遮蔽了太阳。我已经很久没见过阳光了。

original: Doesn't seem to bother the Ghost People. Can't see through it too well, though, so sometimes I can use the Cloud for cover... if I get desperate.
translation: 毒云似乎对鬼人没有影响，不过它们在毒云里视线不太好，所以如果遇到危急情况…有时我会用毒云作掩护。

original: Where can I find these cards?
translation: 我在哪里可以找到这些小卡片？

original: Around. Don't have much use for them myself, not worth the risk to get them.
translation: 周围找找看吧。那些东西对我来说没什么用，不值得为它们冒险。

original: I got all the basics covered, as long as I have the chips to pay for them. I don't need much.
translation: 反正只要身上还有足够的筹码，我就能满足日常所需。我不需要太多东西。

original: What other items can you get out of the machines?
translation: 你还能从机器里得到别的东西么？

original: If it's an emergency, you can get chems for any... uh... condition. Sinclair left that for doctors and trained professionals, not the common folk.
translation: 发生紧急情况时，你还可以从中获得一些…呃…常用药品。这是辛克莱特意为医生和受过系统训练的专家准备的，不开放给普通民众。

original: Even security and maintenance could get special supplies out of them. Staff had codes on little cards they could use to unlock them.
translation: 甚至连保安和维修人员都可以利用它们来获取特定的装备。员工小卡片上写着代码，可以解锁这些物资。

original: How did he describe it?
translation: 辛克莱是怎么介绍它的?

original: Called it "self-sufficient." Like he was doing the residents a favor. Right.
translation: 辛克莱说它的作用是实现“自给自足”，说得好像他在给这儿的老百姓做慈善一样。

original: Grifters?
translation: 吞金兽？

original: Sinclair made sure if you spent money here, it went {emph}one direction - although that's not how {emph}he described it.
translation: 辛克莱用它们将人们的钱财全都掠进了自己的口袋，虽然他向公众介绍的时候不是这样说的。

original: I've never seen machines like those before.
translation: 我以前从没见过像那样的机器。

original: {Took vending machines for granted, realizes player may not}Yeah, well, machines like those weren't unusual before the Bomb. Maybe to you, they're amazing, to me, they're grifters without the personality.
translation: {Took vending machines for granted, realizes player may not}是吗，在核大战以前这种机器一点儿也不稀罕。也许在你看来它们很神奇，但对我来说，它们就是一堆没有感情的吞金兽。

original: What are the Vending Machines all over town?
translation: 镇上这些自动贩卖机是干什么的？

original: Those little company stores? Sinclair's toy boxes, put in a casino chip, get a treat, {angry at self}like you're some dog doing tricks.
translation: 那些内部商店？它们是辛克莱的玩具箱，只要投入赌场的筹码，你就能得到一些小奖品，就像耍把戏的狗一样。

original: Take any of the casino chips, put 'em into the machine, and you'll get something out - a snack, a cola, something to mend a tear in your shirt.
translation: 随便拿几个赌场的筹码，塞进机器里，你就可以从里面得到各种东西，比如零食、可乐、甚至缝补用的针线。

original: Sometimes you have to know exactly what to ask for, other times, there's codes for... eh, unconventional items. For emergencies.
translation: 有时你得先想清楚自己要什么，其他时候呢，为了应对紧急情况，也会有一些兑换代码，来满足特殊的……呃，需求。

original: Is there anything else about them I should know?
translation: 还有其他建议可以告诉我吗？

original: {Dean gets deadly serious here, his fear should foreshadow end of Act 2}Whatever we do - don't rile them up. Normally, there's only a few, maybe a pack. There's more out there, a lot more.
translation: {Dean gets deadly serious here, his fear should foreshadow end of Act 2}无论如何，千万不要招惹它们。一般情况下，你只会遇到两三个，最多也就一帮。但其实，它们的数量非常多。

original: If they find out someone's trespassing, it'd be shaking a hornet's nest. Don't want to think how many of them could fill these streets.
translation: 一旦它们发现有人入侵，那就和捅了马蜂窝差不多。我不敢想象到时候街上会涌出多少鬼人。

original: {After asking 1 Q}I had other questions.
translation: {After asking 1 Q}我有其它的问题。

original: {Slight irritation}Of course you do. Let's hear 'em.
translation: {Slight irritation}十万个为什么啊。问吧。

original: It's your time, and if you want to spend it chatting, not much I can do about it.
translation: 反正时间都是你的，你想把这么宝贵的时间花在聊天上，我也没什么可说的。

original: {Opener}I had questions I wanted to ask.
translation: {Opener}我有问题要问。

original: All right, keep it short, we don't have a lot of time.
translation: 好吧，长话短说，我们没有那么多时间。

original: Focus?
translation: 专注？

original: Always had the Sierra Madre to keep my mind occupied.
translation: 我的心无时不刻都向往着马德雷山脉。

original: Most folks, they don't have the same drive, the same need. Not worth my time. Pretty much Ghost People before the Bomb, now Ghost People after.
translation: 这里的大多数人，他们没有我这样的动力，也没有我这样的坚持，不值得我浪费时间。核弹落下前，他们就已经犹如一帮行尸走肉，如今它们不过是做实了这个称呼。

original: Where did they come from?
translation: 它们是从哪里来的？

original: {Slight exasperation, as if he's thought about this a lot, then tries to recall Hamlet quote}Friend... "there's more mysteries in heaven and earth..." wait, no, "there is more between heaven and earth..." oh, forget it.
translation: {Slight exasperation, as if he's thought about this a lot, then tries to recall Hamlet quote}朋友…“世界之大，无所不能……”等下，不对。“世界之大，一无所…”算了。

original: I'd sooner ask what makes me an undying son of a bitch than spend any thought as to why {emph}they crawled to life here.
translation: 与其花时间深究这帮家伙为啥能一次次复活，我倒更想知道为何我会变成一个老不死的混蛋。

original: I'm counting myself lucky I still have my faculties - they sure don't. Then again, they may not have had the... focus I do.
translation: 我算走运的了，身体机能一切正常，它们肯定不是这样。而且，它们应该也没有我那么…专注。

original: I'm not a bad shot. I could probably kill one.
translation: 我枪法不差，杀掉一两个应该没问题。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Studying player}Well... you seem like you know how to handle yourself. All right.
translation: [成功] {Studying player}嗯…看来你的身手不错。好吧。

original: Once, I fired a lucky shot, hit a gas tank one was holding. Blew his arm off at the shoulder... and he didn't get back up after that.
translation: 有次我侥幸射中了一个鬼人身后背着的气罐。炸飞了他的胳膊..然后他再也没有站起来。

original: So if you're {emph}that good, don't aim for the head - aim for their bombs. And if you can wait until his buddies are close by, even better.
translation: 所以如果你真的枪法好，那别瞄头，瞄准它们背后的炸弹。要是你能等到它们离近了再射，那就更好了。

original: I'm a fair shot. One shot, one kill is how I handle problems.
translation: 我是个精明的枪手。我喜欢一发子弹消灭一个敌人。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, well, "probably" is something a gambler says, not a survivor. I'd keep your pistol where it belongs - in the holster.
translation: [失败] 行吧，听上去有赌的成分，不像是强者会说的话。我还是保管好你的手枪吧——让它乖乖待在枪套里。

original: How tough are they?
translation: 它们有多么难缠？

original: You shoot them, they get back up. You stab them, they get back up.
translation: 就算你用枪放倒它们，它们也还是会重新爬起来。用刀子捅它们，它们也依然会爬起来。

original: That's why I have explosives all over this place - unless you blow them up, chop them up, disintegrate 'em, {shakes head}the Ghost People don't go down.
translation: 所以我才到处安放炸药，除非把它们炸飞、剁碎，或者熔解掉，否则这些鬼人是不会死的。

original: Not enough bullets in the town to spend on them. So unless you're a real good shot, save one for yourself right before they catch you.
translation: 这个镇上没有足够的子弹来对抗它们。除非你是个神枪手，否则我还是建议你给自己留颗子弹，万一跑不过它们，就自行了断。

original: Have you tried to deal with them?
translation: 你就没想过办法对付它们吗？

original: Tried talking to them, bribing them, leaving food - nothing. In the years since, they haven't changed their approach, but I sure have.
translation: 我尝试过和它们说话，讨好它们，给它们留吃的，一点用都没有。这么多年，它们的行为丝毫没变，可我却变了。

original: They catch you, they drag you into the Cloud, and you're not coming back out. {To himself}After that, having your necktie go off would be mercy.
translation: 一旦它们抓住你，把你拖到毒云里，你就再也回不来了。{To himself}遇到这种情况，还不如我脖子这“领带”直接爆炸来得更痛快些。

original: My advice? Stay out of their way, they don't die easy.
translation: 所以我个人建议，离它们远一点，这些家伙的命也很硬。

original: Is anyone else alive around here?
translation: 这儿还有其他活人么？

original: {Choosing his words carefully, the locals are, well, zombies}"Alive's" a tricky word. The locals, the Ghost People? Not sure it applies to them.
translation: {Choosing his words carefully, the locals are, well, zombies}"活人"是个很微妙的字眼。你说本地那些鬼人吗？不知用这词形容它们是否合适。

original: They're a little... uncivilized. They don't talk much. As in, at all.
translation: 它们的行为有些……野蛮。而且它们不善言辞。不对，它们根本就不说话。

original: Have other people shown up in search of the Sierra Madre?
translation: 其他人也来寻找过马德雷山脉赌场吗？

original: Tourists, you bet. They don't stay long... and they don't stay alive long.
translation: 那些都只是游客。他们基本不会待太久…而且他们也活不长。

original: If they survive the Cloud, the Ghost People, the traps, then greed takes over, and they start sizing each other up for funeral suits.
translation: 即便他们能躲过毒云、鬼人和重重的机关陷阱，他们最终也会被贪婪所吞噬，开始自相残杀。

original: You're coming with me, or else.
translation: 跟我走，否则别怪我不客气。

original: That's not going to work for me.
translation: 你这套对我没用。

original: Look, together we can get out of this.
translation: 听着，只有我们齐心协力才能离开这里。

original: [She shakes her head - once, then crosses her arms.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，叉起了胳膊。]

original: If your collar goes off, mine goes off, it's better if we guard each other.
translation: 如果你的项圈爆炸了，我的也会爆炸，所以咱们最好合作。

original: We need to cooperate if we're going to get out of here.
translation: 想要离开这里，我们就必须合作。

original: What do you mean by that?
translation: 你这是什么意思？

original: [She shakes her head again and draws a line in the air between the two of you.]
translation: [她再次摇了摇头，用手在她和你中间划出了一条线。]

original: Look, we can have this not-talk later, let's go.
translation: 以后再聊这个也不迟。我们走吧。

original: Enough of this shit, we need to move.
translation: 妈的我受够了，咱们得离开这里。

original: Let's just say we're in this together.
translation: 我直说吧，咱俩现在是一条绳上的蚂蚱。

original: [She frowns, narrows her eyes, then slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [她皱起眉头，眯着双眼，缓缓地摇了摇头。]

original: Unless you want to lose your head, stop.
translation: 住手！你的脑袋会被炸飞的。

original: It's a bomb collar - mess with it, it'll go off.
translation: 那是一个炸弹项圈，你乱搞的话，它会爆炸的。

original: Don't do that!
translation: 别这样！

original: [She looks surprised. Then notices your collar, and raises an eyebrow.]
translation: [她看起来很惊讶，随后她留意到了你的项圈，眉毛立了起来。]

original: If you attack me, you'll regret it.
translation: 你要是对我动手，你会后悔的。

original: What's the matter?
translation: 怎么了？

original: This isn't what it looks like.
translation: 不是你想的那样。

original: [The woman opens her mouth again, winces, then frowns and drags a finger across her throat in a slow motion. She looks more angry than pained now.]
translation: [女子又一次颤抖着张开了嘴，接着皱起眉头，用手指轻抚着喉咙。现在她的神情与其说是痛苦，不如说是愤怒。]

original: [Frowning, she touches her throat again, gently, then her hand brushes her collar, then her frown deepens.]
translation: [她皱着眉头又一次抚摸起自己的喉咙，她的手碰到了项圈，顿时眉毛变得更加扭曲起来。]

original: [Her eyes narrow as she traces the edge of the collar until she finds the lock. She begins to press it with her fingers.]
translation: [她眯起双眼，顺着项圈的边缘摸索着，随后发现了项圈上的锁。她开始用手指按压锁扣。]

original: What happened?
translation: 发生了什么？

original: Look, I'm here to help.
translation: 听着，我是来帮忙的。

original: [She looks shaken. As she glances at the Auto-Doc, she recoils, and her mouth opens - but again, nothing comes out.]
translation: [她瞟了一眼自动医生，身体因恐惧而蜷缩，她又张开了嘴，但依然没发出任何声音。]

original: [She looks back at you, and her hands clench into fists - her eyes narrow, and she takes a step back, studying you.]
translation: [她重新看向你，握紧了拳头。她眯起双眼，后退了一步，打量着你。]

original: Did somebody cut your vocal cords?
translation: 有人切断了你的声带么？

original: Looks like someone carved a roadmap across your face.
translation: 看起来像是有人在你的脸上刻了一个地图。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Are you all right?
translation: 你还好么?

original: [She looks at you, blinks again, then opens her mouth - but nothing comes out.]
translation: [她看你，又眨了眨眼，然后张开嘴巴，却没有发出声音]

original: [She touches her throat, then traces the scar beneath the chin, and her eyes widen in alarm.]
translation: [她抚摸了自己的喉咙，又摸了摸下巴上的疤痕，惊恐地睁大了眼睛。]

original: Have a seat - came all this way, least I can do is let you rest your feet for a second.
translation: 坐吧，你走了那么远的路，也该让我尽下地主之谊，让你歇歇脚吧。

original: Just sit there on my little casting couch - more a chair, really, but I prefer up-and-comers to relax when I interview them.
translation: 就坐在那张沙发上吧，其实应该叫凳子，不过我还是希望在和你这样的后起之秀面谈时，气氛能轻松一点。

original: You're my guest. If you're going to be rude, you can show yourself out. {little quieter}Probably won't tap-dance no more when you leave, but that's on you.
translation: 你是我的客人，但如果你不懂礼貌，我也可以请你出去。至于离开时你要不要跳着踢踏舞出去，随便你了。

original: You standing there is making me nervous. Sit down, will you?
translation: 你站在那里让我很紧张。坐下来，可以么？

original: Have a seat.
translation: 请坐。

original: {1 - Sad, sing song}...going to make casino burn, no more being...
translation: {1 - Sad, sing song}…我要烧掉赌场，不必再……

original: {2 - "No more being..."}...back in the cage. Stop what you're doing, we can...
translation: {2 - "No more being..."}…回到笼子里了。快住手，我们可以……

original: {3 - "we"}...can hear you now. {Beat, cold}Not much longer, not...
translation: {3 - "we"}…可以听见你了。{Beat, cold}不必了，不必了……

original: {4 - snarling, "you're not..."}...listening to me. {Frustrated, furious, emph}Tired of being your minder, tired...
translation: {4 - snarling, "you're not..."}…听我说。 {Frustrated, furious, emph}我不想再照顾你了，不想再...

original: {5 - "tired"}...of putting Dog to sleep, he wakes up in cage, hungry, Dog wants...
translation: {5 - "tired"}…让狗沉睡，他每次都饿着肚子从笼子里醒来，狗想要...

original: {6 - "wants"}...to protect you, always wanted to protect you, the reason I have to take control is...
translation: {6 - "wants"}…保护你，我一直想保护你，我之所以想控制这具躯体，是因为…

original: {7 - "The reason I have to take control is..."}...Master. Master set me free, Dog needs to...
translation: {7 - "The reason I have to take control is..."}…主人，主人把我放了出来，狗必须...

original: {8 - "You need to"}...listen to me. {Sudden moment of weakness, slight plea}If you do this, we {emph}both...
translation: {8 - "You need to"}…听我说。 {Sudden moment of weakness, slight plea}如果你这么做的话，我们 {emph}都会…

original: {9 - "We both"}...die. Dog wants to die. Don't care anymore, tired of you, tired of place. Master will...
translation: {9 - "We both"}…死。狗想要去死。狗一点也不在乎，受够了你，受够了这个地方。主人会...

original: {10 - "Master will"}...help us. Please let me help us. If you don't, then you're...
translation: {10 - "Master will"}…救我们的。请交给我吧。如果你不肯，那你就会…

original: {About to set fire to the kitchen, killing himself}All fire now. Burn away voice, leave Dog in peace.
translation: {About to set fire to the kitchen, killing himself}到处都是火。用火把那个声音赶走，狗就能获得安宁了。

original: {Furious, but also afraid}No! {Tries to be commanding}Dog, get back in the c-{"cage," doesn't finish as explosion rocks kitchen}
translation: {Furious, but also afraid}不！ {Tries to be commanding}狗，回笼子——{"cage," doesn't finish as explosion rocks kitchen}

original: I haven't found enough yet.
translation: 我还没有找到足够多的肉。

original: {God voice, snarls}Then {emph}nothing's going to keep me here... we need bait, or the beast is going to wake up, and you'll never see the Sierra Madre.
translation: {God voice, snarls}那我坚持不了多久的…我们需要诱饵, 否则野兽就会觉醒，你就再也见不到马德雷山脉赌场了。

original: Yes, this should be enough.
translation: 是的，这应该就够了。

original: {God voice, pleased}You're good at fetching... this should keep him where he belongs. {Beat}For now. I'll wait... send the signal, we'll be ready.
translation: {God voice, pleased}你还挺会找东西的…这样应该就能安抚他了。我会暂时留在这里…只要你发信号，我们随时待命。

original: All right, let's get out of here.
translation: 好吧，我们离开这里。

original: Very well... lead on.
translation: 非常好…带路吧。

original: You already have someone in your shadow... I'll meet you at the Villa Fountain.
translation: 你已经有人跟着了... 我会到别墅区的喷泉下面等你。

original: Meet me over at the Fountain, we'll plan our next move.
translation: 到喷泉那里等我，我们会计划下一步行动。

original: Very well... to the Fountain and its ghost, then.
translation: 好吧……那我就去喷泉和那个幽灵作伴吧。

original: How about 500 Chips for 500 Pre-War Bills?
translation: 500美元战前钞票换500个筹码怎么样？

original: [You set the stack of bills down. A panel flips, there is a whir, series of clicks, and a stack of chips rises up in place of the bills.]
translation: [你放下一沓钞票。桌板翻了过去，你听到钱币拍打的呼啸和一连串咔嗒声，然后一叠筹码就从原本放钱的地方冒了出来。]

original: 100 Chips for 100 Pre-War bills.
translation: 100美元战前钞票换100个筹码。

original: [You place the bills on the counter, a panel flips, taking the bills with it... and 100 Chips appear in their place.]
translation: [你把钞票放在柜台上，桌板一翻，钞票不见了…取而代之的是100个筹码。]

original: Collect Comps
translation: 取回代金券

original: [The Hologram cashier nods, then a section of the tabletop slides away, and a package rises from it.]
translation: [全息出纳点点头，桌面的一侧滑开了，一个包裹从里面弹了出来。]

original: [The Hologram cashier nods, then a section of the tabletop slides away, and a package rises from it.]
translation: [全息出纳点点头，桌面的一侧滑开了，一个包裹从里面弹了出来。]

original: [The Hologram cashier nods, takes a step back, then the whole tabletop slides away. A package slowly rises from the opening, steam trailing from it.]
translation: [全息出纳点点头，后退了一步，整张桌面滑开。一个包裹冒着蒸汽缓缓从桌子下面升了上来。]

original: {Quiet, slightly nervous}Let's head through the hole in the wall there - if we go backstage, we avoid the locals.
translation: {Quiet, slightly nervous}我们从墙上的那个洞里穿过去吧。只要绕到后面去，就可以避过那些本地居民了。

original: {Contemptuous, commanding}Are you listening? From now on, when I talk to you, pay attention.
translation: {Contemptuous, commanding}听见我的声音了么？从现在起，我和你说话的时候，你要认真听讲。

original: I've left markers on your Pip-Boy - find the three other collars in town - 8, 12, and 14, get them to the Fountain. Obey me, and you can {emph}all go free.
translation: 我已经在你的哔哔小子里做了标记，找到镇子里其他三个戴项圈的人——8号，12号，和14号，把他们带到喷泉这里来。只要照我说的做，你们{emph}都会获得自由。

original: You could have left the Sierra Madre. Left this Villa, joined your own kind.
translation: 你其实可以离开马德雷山脉赌场，离开以利亚，去找你的同类。

original: Sierra Madre's mine, my heart's right where it belongs.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场是我的，我的心永远和它在一起。

original: {Taunting}You can't abide it. There's no heart. You hate it, I can hear it in your words.
translation: {Taunting}这不是你的真心话。其实你讨厌这里，我可以从你的语气里听出来。

original: Sounds like you need your hearing checked. Sierra Madre, it's meant for me.
translation: 那我建议你去检查一下自己的耳朵。马德雷山脉赌场，是我命中注定的归宿。

original: Touched by radiation, and you choose to spend your time here. You could have just left... but you're too obsessed to let go.
translation: 你受了辐射，还选择留下来。你大可以直接离开…可你却沉迷于那些财宝，不肯放手。

original: I used to know a ventriloquist with more skill than you. At least he had the sense to know his own name, without carving it into his chest.
translation: 我曾经认识一个比你厉害的腹语术大师。至少他记得自己的名字，不必把它刻在自己的胸口。

original: Mirrors tell me my name when needed... and I have a name for you, several. Thief, coward... showman. Radiation couldn't kill the truth, could it.
translation: 我只要照镜子就能知道自己的名字…但我倒是有个名字可以送给你，不，应该有好几个。小偷，懦夫…假把式。哪怕辐射也无法抹去这些事实。

original: The truth, buddy, is this: you and me, we're now family as long as we got these bowties on. So watch your mouth, you don't scare me.
translation: 伙计，眼下只有一条事实，那就是咱俩只要还戴着这项圈，就是一条绳上的蚂蚱。所以你说话小心一点，你吓不倒我。

original: Where the hell did you get this one. "Dog?" What, so you don't forget your name?
translation: 你到底是从哪里搞到这玩意的？"狗？"你就用这种方式来记住自己的名字？

original: {Curious, slow}I don't remember you. Who are you.
translation: {Curious, slow}我不记得你，你是谁？

original: A little slow, huh? Uh... Dean. Dean Domino. I... live here.
translation: 你反应有点慢啊？呃…迪安。迪安·多米诺，我…是住这儿的。

original: You look like food, smell like food. Dog - hungry.
translation: 你看起来挺好吃，闻起来也挺好吃。狗……饿了。

original: All right, pal, you stay in your corner, I'll stay in mine. {Beat}Do not leave me alone with this thing.
translation: 好吧，朋友，你就呆那儿别动，我也不会乱动的，行吗？{Beat}千万别让我和这玩意独处。

original: Look, you obviously {emph}hear good - even if you aren't much of a talker.
translation: 听着，虽然你不太爱说话，但明显你的听力很不错。

original: [Christine's eyes narrow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起了眼睛。]

original: Don't get me wrong, that's a plus in my book.
translation: 别误会，在我看来这可是加分项呢。

original: [Christine eyes narrow to slits.]
translation: [克莉丝汀的眼睛眯成了一条线。]

original: Still, are you getting any shred of your voice healed up, or...? Like anything?
translation: 不过，你就从没想办法治好自己的嗓子吗，还是说……？没想过？

original: Look, you obviously {emph}hear good - even if you aren't much of a talker.
translation: 听着，虽然你不太爱说话，但明显你的听力很不错。

original: {Gently bringing it up, worried she remembers him}Eh... those scars? What happened, somebody... something carve you up, or...?
translation: {Gently bringing it up, worried she remembers him}呃……你身上那些伤疤，怎么了？是有人…故意弄的，还是...?

original: [Christine frowns, tilts her head slightly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱着眉头，轻轻歪了歪头。]

original: {Testing the waters}Damn shame, hate to think if someone put you in there. Who bailed you out again, the new guy? Interesting.
translation: {Testing the waters}真可怜，居然有人会把你丢在那种地方。是谁救你出来的？新来的那个人吗？有意思。

original: So... what's your story, beautiful?
translation: 所以…你有什么故事吗，小姐？

original: [Christine studies Dean, frowns.]
translation: [克莉丝汀打量着迪安，皱起了眉头。]

original: Don't... uh... don't talk much, do you?
translation: 你…呃…不太爱说话，是么？

original: [Christine shakes her head slowly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀缓缓的摇了摇头。]

original: {Sighs, irritated at being rebuffed}All right, then. I'll just wallflower it over here.
translation: {Sighs, irritated at being rebuffed}好吧，我还是继续当个花瓶好了。

original: {Curious}Someone wanted to cut your voice, little doll. Or they didn't finish their work, or didn't know how to.
translation: {Curious}有人想要让你变成哑巴，小娃娃。他们要么是没来得及这么做，要么就是不懂得该怎么办。

original: [Christine frowns.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱起了眉头。]

original: Oh, it wasn't me... I have no use for your neck beyond what encircles it. {Snarls, to himself, disgruntled}The lack of screams when I finally kill you... that is what I'll regret.
translation: 噢，又不是我干的…我对你的脖子没有任何兴趣，除了它上面围着的那圈玩意。{Snarls, to himself, disgruntled}要是我最后杀你的时候听不到尖叫声…那我才会感到后悔呢。

original: {Amused, evil}What's this? Why... it's a little doll. {Mock curiosity}Were you carved by a craftsman, {taunting, evil}or mauled by a drunk who didn't know his tools?
translation: {Amused, evil}这位是谁？哎呀……原来是个小娃娃。 {Mock curiosity}你是被哪位工匠给雕成这样的，{taunting, evil}还是被一个不识好歹的醉汉给划拉成这样的？

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, gets into a combat stance.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛， 摆出了一副要开打的架势。]

original: {Chuckles}I'm not going to hurt you... yet. Much. Scars tell a story, some old, some new... {slow}and the one on the throat is fresh and red.
translation: {Chuckles}我不会碰你的…至少现在不会。这些伤疤的背后似乎藏着不少故事，有些旧了，有些还很新…{slow}比如喉咙上的那些，还留着血丝。

original: {Getting angry}Stop looking at me, you idiot. I can hear your stomach growling from here, I don't like it.
translation: {Getting angry}别再盯着我看了，大白痴。我大老远就能听见你的肚子叫唤，我不喜欢那种声音。

original: {Slow question, starts getting evil}Run from Dog? Dog knows how to hunt. Dog will find you, tear you apart.
translation: {Slow question, starts getting evil}你想摆脱狗？狗可是捕猎能手。他会找到你，把你撕成碎片。

original: That a bet you want to take? Cause I'll see that and raise you a few bullets to the skull.
translation: 你想和我赌谁的命更硬？那尽管来吧，我会用子弹在你的脑门上多开几个洞。

original: Dog's been shot before, many times. Won't stop me from catching you.
translation: 狗以前已经被射伤过很多次。区区一点疼痛是无法阻止他追杀你的。

original: I hope you've got this one under control, because he's giving me a nasty itch on my trigger finger.
translation: 希望你好好管教一下这家伙，不然下次我会忍不住扣扳机的。

original: Why are you so carved up - {frowns, a little incredulous}that a {emph}bear trap on your arm?
translation: 你怎么浑身伤痕累累的，{frowns, a little incredulous}你胳膊上套了一个捕熊夹吗？

original: {Slow, to himself}Reminds me, keeps the voice out of my head. He can't talk when the pain's howling at me.
translation: {Slow, to himself}这东西可以把那个声音赶出我的脑子。当我疼痛难忍的时候，他也不能说话。

original: Eh... wait, so you're not just slow, you're screwy, too? {Rolls eyes}Some crew we are... we are never getting into the Sierra Madre.
translation: 呃……等一下，所以你不仅仅反应迟钝，连脑子也有问题？{Rolls eyes}瞧瞧咱们这班人…恐怕是永远也进不了马德雷山脉赌场咯。

original: Dog is hungry. {Frowns at Dean}Tired of your voice... when do we eat?
translation: 狗饿了。{Frowns at Dean}听你说话都累了…我们什么时候吃东西？

original: Don't like the way this guy is looking at me. You better be his leash.
translation: 我不喜欢这家伙盯着我的眼神。你最好拴紧他。

original: {Soft, slow}I... we... hope you've enjoyed your stay.
translation: {Soft, slow}我…我们…希望您享受这段旅程。

original: {Soft, slow}Farewells can be a time of sadness. Letting go... difficult. {Beat, quiet}As a guest of the Sierra Madre, you know that truth more than anyone.
translation: {Soft, slow}告别也许令人伤感，放手…也很难。 {Beat, quiet}作为马德雷山脉的贵宾，相信您一定比他人更清楚这个道理。

original: {Soft}Frederick Sinclair believed one's life could be made anew every day, that fortunes were more than the wealth in your hands.
translation: {Soft}弗雷德里克·辛克莱相信，生命中的每一天都能可以焕然一新，一个人拥有的财富远不止手中的金钱。

original: {Soft, becomes more tender}Love. Life... family, those to care for, and those who will care for you.
translation: {Soft, becomes more tender}还有爱、生活…和家庭，以及那些与你心心相印的人们。

original: {Soft, becomes more tender}To those who know these joys, the Sierra Madre holds little they don't already have.
translation: {Soft, becomes more tender}对于能够理解这些幸福的人来说，马德雷山脉中也许并没有他们需要的宝藏。

original: {Firm}Out in the world, beyond these walls, {emph}that is your chance to begin again.
translation: {Firm}唯有高墙之外的世界，{emph}才是您真正从头再来的地方。

original: {Quiet}I hope you'll return, in happier times. {Beat, final farewell}Until then, the Sierra Madre... and I... will hold you in our hearts.
translation: {Quiet}希望下次再会时，您的人生能变得更加美满富足。{Beat, final farewell}在那之前，马德雷山脉…与我…会一直将您铭记于心。

original: Guests, and residents of the Villa alike, I ask you to step outside and look to the night sky.
translation: 各位贵宾，各位别墅区的居民，请与我一同走向户外，眺望今晚的夜空。

original: It's the moment you've been waiting for, the reason we're all here - the Gala Event, the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre Casino.
translation: 这是你们期待已久的时刻，也是我们欢聚于此的原因。这场庆典，标志着马德雷山脉赌场的盛大开幕。

original: You are the ones who have made this momentous occasion possible, and for that, we thank you.
translation: 是你们令这一伟大的时刻变为现实。在此，我们向您表示衷心的感谢。

original: So raise your glass in celebration - {emphasize these lines, see script notes}let music fill the streets, fireworks light the sky, and promise of new beginnings fill your hearts.
translation: 就让我们举杯庆祝——{emphasize these lines, see script notes}让音乐在街巷中流淌，让焰火照亮整个天空，让内心满溢新的希望。

original: No matter what your fortunes, no matter what your cares, let go this night, and begin again.
translation: 无论富有贫穷，无论高低贵贱，今晚，都请您放下手中的一切，迎接新的开始吧。

original: {Slightly teasing}I suggest you hurry, though - the gates of the Sierra Madre are open, but only for a brief time.
translation: {Slightly teasing}不过，建议你们加快脚步，虽然马德雷山脉的大门已经敞开，但它开放的时间并不长。

original: {Mock sinister}After that, the doors will close for the evening's festivities, and won't open again until morning.
translation: {Mock sinister}之后，为举办庆典活动，大门将会暂时关闭，直到次日清晨才会再度开启。

original: {Draw this out}If so, the Sierra Madre Casino, in all its glory, is inviting you {beat}to Begin Again.
translation: {Draw this out}如果是这样，满怀荣光的马德雷山脉赌场邀请您开启新的人生。

original: Come to a place where wealth, excitement, and intrigue await around every corner.
translation: 在这里，数不尽的财富，激情和秘密正等待着您。

original: Stroll along the winding streets of our beautiful resort, make new friends... or rekindle old flames.
translation: 您可以沿着度假区美丽的街道在微风中漫步，结交新的朋友…重燃旧的激情。

original: Let your eyes take in the luxurious expanse of the open desert, under clear starlit skies. Gaze straight on into the sunset from our Villa rooftops.
translation: 在星光璀璨的天空下尽情领略沙漠广袤的美景，在别墅区的天台上欣赏壮丽的夕阳。

original: Countless diversions await.
translation: 还有无数娱乐设施正等待着您。

original: Gamble in our casino, take in the theater, or stay in one of our exclusive executive suites that will shelter you - and cater to your every whim.
translation: 您可以在我们的赌场中豪掷千金，在剧院里陶冶情操，或是入住我们的高级行政套房，在这里实现您的一切突发奇想。

original: So if life's worries have weighed you down... if you need an escape from your troubles... or if you just need an opportunity to begin again, join us.
translation: 如果生活的重担压得您喘不过气…如果您需要一个摆脱烦恼的心灵港湾…或是一个机会来开启新的人生，那就加入我们吧。

original: Let go and leave the world behind at the Sierra Madre grand opening, this October. {Beat}We'll be waiting.
translation: 在这个金秋十月，让我们放下一切，在马德雷山脉的开业庆典上欢聚一堂。我们诚挚恭候您的光临。

original: I've been trapped in here for some time, then you come along and let me out. {Studying the player, suspicious, evil}So... you opened my cage for a reason. Now... I want to know why.
translation: 我被关在这里已经有段时间了，然后你才来把我放了。 {Studying the player, suspicious, evil}所以…你打开笼子，想必是有原因的。现在，我想知道为什么。

original: {You have questions?}Of course you do. {Beat, sinister}And so do I.
translation: {You have questions?}你当然有很多疑惑。{Beat, sinister}我也有。

original: Dog and I take turns in the cage... one steps out, the other goes back in. Now - what do you want?
translation: 我和狗轮流待在笼子里... 一个出来，另一个就进去。所以，你有何贵干？

original: {Low, cold, hates Dog's self-mutilation}Do you see these wounds of his, covering his skin...the bear trap on his arm? He placed his own hand in it.
translation: {Low, cold, hates Dog's self-mutilation}你看到他浑身上下遍布的伤口…还有他胳膊上的捕熊夹了吗？是他自己把手伸进去的。

original: The name he carved in his chest? To remind him of who he is, he inflicts pain on himself to silence me, when all I try to do... Hrr!
translation: 他还在胸口刻上了自己的名字，好时刻提醒自己是谁。为了不让我出声，他不断地摧残自己的肉体。而我只是想…啊！

original: {Quiet, more to himself}...he cuts, hurts, and tries to murder me out of him. He won't succeed. Just makes me angrier.
translation: {Quiet, more to himself}…他故意弄伤自己，就为了将我从他的身体里赶走。他不会成功的，这只会让我更加愤怒。

original: Dog is the beast, we simply change cages. {Glances around}Like the ones here.
translation: 狗是一头野兽，我们只是交换了一下牢笼。 {Glances around}就像眼前这间笼子一样。

original: {resuming control, with effort, gritted teeth}...hrnnn... will kill us {emph}both unless you do something. Never felt him so strong before, he won't listen to my voice. He's... he's...
translation: {resuming control, with effort, gritted teeth}…咕…除非你找到办法，否则他会把我们都杀了。他以前从来没有这么固执，他不听我的。他…他…

original: ...hungry. {Evil, greedy}Come here, or Dog will chase you, break you until you no run anymore.
translation: …饿了。{Evil, greedy}过来，否则狗会追你到天涯海角，直到把你腿打断，让你再也跑不动。

original: {resuming control, with effort, gritted teeth}...hrnnn... listen to you... can't hold him back much longer... tell him... to pull on his chain, as hard as...
translation: {resuming control, with effort, gritted teeth}…咕…听到了吗…我再也无法阻止他了…告诉他…一定要拷上锁链，紧紧地……

original: {quiet}...Dog can. {Beat}What Master wants, Dog can do. {Quiet}Please don't be mad with Dog...
translation: {quiet}…将狗拴住。{Beat}无论主人有何吩咐，狗都会去做。 {Quiet}请不要对狗发怒……

original: {resuming control, with effort, gritted teeth}...live anymore. Sick of being inside, sick of hearing his stomach screaming at me, and...
translation: {resuming control, with effort, gritted teeth}…不活了。 我受够了，我不想再待在里面，我也不想再听他的肚子对我叫唤而且...

original: ...Dog is tired... Dog tired of fighting, being here... {getting rage back}Tired of {emph}you keeping Dog caged here.
translation: …狗已经厌倦了... 厌倦了厮打，厌倦了这里... {getting rage back}厌倦{emph}了你把狗关在笼子里。

original: ...both of us are. Tell him to listen to me. Then we can get out of this... finally... and...
translation: …我们都厌倦了。让他听我的话。只有这样，我们才能最终…解脱...并且…

original: {slightly mesmerized}...now Dog is listening to voice, your voice only.
translation: {slightly mesmerized}…从今往后，狗只听从你的声音。

original: {Generic Affirmation for Safety: Dog}Uh-huh.
translation: {Generic Affirmation for Safety: Dog}嗯哼。

original: {Generic Negatory for Safety: Dog}Nnn-nnn.
translation: {Generic Negatory for Safety: Dog}唔嗯。

original: Who locked you in that cage?
translation: 是谁把你关在笼子里的？

original: {Chuckles}Locked myself in. Could feel myself... letting go. Dog's howling getting louder. {Frustrated}It happens when he's hungry and no one's around to tell him... no.
translation: {Chuckles}是我自己关的。我当时觉得自己…不太稳定。狗叫得越来越凶。{Frustrated}当他肚子饿，又没人制止他的时候，就会发生这种事。

original: That name carved on your chest... are you Dog?
translation: 刻在你胸口的那个名字...你是狗么?

original: {Dismissive, brutal}The carving's a reminder, for mirrors {to himself}and for Dog. {Disgust, to himself}Dog, who you heard coming in, howling and hungry, as always.
translation: {Dismissive, brutal}刻字是为了让我照镜子时能够提醒自己，也是为了提醒狗。{Disgust, to himself}狗，就是你进来时听到的那个声音，他始终在饿着肚子咆哮。

original: What happened to your voice?
translation: 你的声音怎么了？

original: I'm the voice of reason. I sleep sometimes... down in the basement, in the cage. {Snarling, downnote}Now that {emph}I'm awake, {emph}Dog goes back in the cage.
translation: 我的声音代表了理智。有时候…我会在地下室的笼子里沉睡。{Snarling, downnote}现在{emph}我醒了，{emph}狗也就回到了笼子里。

original: {Smug, superior}Dog knows I'm here, but can't do anything about it. {Beat}I'm his... conscience. Keep him tame, keep him from hurting us... doing foolish things.
translation: {Smug, superior}狗知道我在这儿，但他奈何不了我。{Beat}我是他的…良知。是我驯服了他，让他不会伤害我们…不会随意做傻事。

original: How did you end up in the Auto-Doc?
translation: 你怎么会躺到自动医生的手术台上的？

original: [She moves her finger in a circle, frowns, then drags her hand down over her eyes. She raises them again, points to you.]
translation: [她用指头划了一个圈，皱了皱眉头，然后把手放下来盖住了眼睛。紧接着她又举起手，指向了你。]

original: Where were you before?
translation: 你之前在哪里？

original: [She moves her finger in a wider circle, then raises her hand over her eyes.]
translation: [她把手指摆成更大的圈，然后把手举过双眼。]

original: I... don't understand.
translation: 我…不是很明白。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, looks impressed.]
translation: [成功] [她点点头，似乎对你十分赞赏。]

original: Wait... that's a Brotherhood of Steel symbol, right? You're a Scribe?
translation: 等下…你比的是钢铁兄弟会的标志，对么？你是个学士？

original: [FAILED] [She shakes her head, then nods in the direction of the casino again.]
translation: [失败] [她摇了摇头，然后又示意你看向赌场。]

original: So you cut your own hair off?
translation: 所以是你自己把头发剪掉的？

original: I can't restore your voice, we'd need a real Auto-Doc to do that.
translation: 我没办法让你重新说话，我们得找个货真价实的自动医生来行。

original: [She shivers slightly, and shakes her head.]
translation: [她微微颤抖着摇了摇头。]

original: So the Auto-Doc cut your voice box, not your scalp.
translation: 所以自动医生割断了你的喉咙，但没有把你剃光头？

original: [Christine nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀点点头。]

original: The Auto-Doc didn't do that?
translation: 不是自动医生干的？

original: [She touches one of the scars on her cheeks, shakes head. Then touches the scar on her neck, and nods.]
translation: [她摸着脸颊上的一道伤疤，摇了摇头。随后她又摸着脖子上的伤疤，点了点头。]

original: Were you researching something?
translation: 你在找什么东西吗？

original: [She shakes her head.]
translation: [她摇了摇头。]

original: Were you looking for something?
translation: 你在找什么东西吗？

original: How the hell did you get out here?
translation: 你到底是怎么从这里出去的？

original: [She shrugs. Then she points to you and shrugs.]
translation: [她耸耸肩，接着指了你，又耸了耸肩。]

original: [BOS] You were a Brotherhood of Steel Scribe?
translation: [钢铁兄弟会] 你以前是钢铁兄弟会的学士么？

original: [She nods. She looks impressed.]
translation: [她点点头，似乎对你十分赞赏。]

original: No, wait, I want to hear this. You were bald before?
translation: 等等，这件事我得搞清楚。你以前就是光头么？

original: [She nods with an exasperated look, then makes a circle with her hands, repeats it twice more, then raises her hands and waves them like wings.]
translation: [她愤怒地点点头，然后用手反复的画了三个圈，接着举起双手，像翅膀一样挥动着。]

original: [She puts both hands in front of her, then makes a motion with her hands as if writing something.]
translation: [她把双手放在身前，摆了一个正在写东西的姿势。]

original: Wait, the Auto-Doc didn't shave you bald?
translation: 等一下，不是自动医生把你剃成光头的？

original: [She waves her hand, then shakes her head - she then nods in the direction of the casino.]
translation: [她摆了摆手，摇头，示意你看向赌场。]

original: I don't understand why they shaved you bald.
translation: 我不明白他们为什么把你剃成光头。

original: [Christine looks blankly at you. Then touches her head, smiles, then shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀茫然地看着你。她笑着摸了摸头，随后也摇头表示不解。]

original: Looks like someone set the bone saws to run random.
translation: 看起来是有人故意给你动刀子的。

original: [She shakes her head... then pauses, and shakes her head again, then looks exasperated.]
translation: [她摇摇头，停顿了一会儿，又摇了摇头，神情显得非常愤怒。]

original: {After asking 1 Q}I had other questions.
translation: {After asking 1 Q}我还有别的问题。

original: [She looks exasperated, then waves her hand in a circle in front of her.]
translation: [她看起来很绝望，在身前用手挥了一个圈。]

original: [She raises an eyebrow, then tilts her head slightly.]
translation: [她竖起眉毛，头微微一歪。]

original: [She frowns, then cups her hand to her ear.]
translation: [她皱了皱眉头，将手拱起来放在耳边。]

original: I had questions I wanted to ask.
translation: 我有些问题想问你。

original: [Christine glances straight up, frowns, then turns back to you and taps her wrist.]
translation: [克莉丝汀直直的看着前方，皱了皱眉头，然后像你转过身并割了自己的手腕]

original: That Auto-Doc really carved you up.
translation: 那个自动医生看来把你害得不轻。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods... slowly, then puts her hand in front her throat, closes it slowly, then points at you.]
translation: [成功] [她慢慢…点了点头，然后把手放在喉咙前，缓慢合上，又指着你]

original: Those facial scars weren't done by the Auto-Doc - the throat scar was.
translation: 你脸上的伤口和自动医生无关，但你喉咙上的伤疤是它造成的。

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, narrows her eyes, and looks at you.]
translation: [失败] [她皱起眉头，眯着眼睛看着你。]

original: {THEATER: Dean fight}This is where it ends, Dean, give up.
translation: {THEATER: Dean fight}到此为止了，放弃吧，迪安。

original: I can take a chump like you even if I didn't have eight lives lined up behind me, and a rising soundtrack. So put your dancing shoes on - let's go.
translation: 对付你这种级别的蠢货，我用不着八条命，也用不着播放慷慨激昂的背景音乐。既然你这么喜欢出洋相，那就来吧。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}How did you get up there?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}你是怎么到那里的？

original: {Slight nervous}No idea... woke up here, thought I was dreaming for a second... right back on stage, the mic...
translation: {Slight nervous}不知道….我醒来后，一开始还以为自己是在做梦…梦见自己重回舞台，拿起麦克风...

original: Thought I was back at the Fronds... {to himself}well, except no audience, used to pack theaters back then... so stepped up on the stage, check things out...
translation: 我甚至一度以为自己又回到了碎叶赌场……{to himself}只是台下没有观众，我早习惯了座无虚席的剧院…于是我走上舞台，想看看究竟怎么回事。

original: Then suddenly Holograms walked out of the wings... and they started raising their hands to their heads all creepy-like, {emph}not a good sign.
translation: 谁知那些全息影像突然就从舞台侧边冒了出来…它们一个个把双手举过头顶，那样子相当渗人，我顿时感觉非常不妙。

original: <AUDIO: Christine after Executive Suits, killed her. Static.>{Nothing but a flatline signal.}
translation: <音频： 克里斯汀到行政套房后，杀死她. 噪音>{Nothing but a flatline signal.}

original: <AUDIO: Needs radio filter for this, and ambient sounds outside suites after Christine has been saved and is speaking to herself.>{Mikey, we'll dupe Christine's radio barks while she's in the Exec Suites with her voice back and add a filter.}
translation: <音频： 需要电台渗入此内， 在克里斯汀被救并且自言自语后，让周围声音适应她的声.>{Mikey, we'll dupe Christine's radio barks while she's in the Exec Suites with her voice back and add a filter.}

original: <AUDIO: Christine in Executive Suites.>{Christine breathing, normally, she sounds like she's walking around and doing stuff. Any ambient sounds from the suites should be duped.}
translation: <音频：克里斯汀在行政套房中.>{Christine breathing, normally, she sounds like she's walking around and doing stuff. Any ambient sounds from the suites should be duped.}

original: <AUDIO: Christine after Executive Suites, still lost voice.>{Christine breathing normally, calm. Any ambient sounds from the suites should be duped.}
translation: <音频：克里斯汀在行政诉讼后， 仍然失声.>{Christine breathing normally, calm. Any ambient sounds from the suites should be duped.}

original: [STATIC] {Static Sound}
translation: [静电声] {Static Sound}

original: [Christine frowns.] {This will need some sound effect.}
translation: [克莉丝汀皱了皱眉头。] {This will need some sound effect.}

original: Oh, it wasn't me... I have no use for your neck beyond what encircles it. {Snarls, to himself, disgruntled}The lack of screams when I finally kill you... that is what I'll regret.
translation: 噢，又不是我干的…我对你的脖子没有任何兴趣，除了它上面围着的那圈玩意。{Snarls, to himself, disgruntled}要是我最后杀你的时候听不到尖叫声……那我才会感到后悔呢。

original: [Christine's eyes narrow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起了眼睛。]

original: Don't get me wrong, that's a plus in my book.
translation: 别误会，在我看来这可是加分项呢。

original: [Christine eyes narrow to slits.]
translation: [克莉丝汀的眼睛眯成了一条线。]

original: Still, are you getting any shred of your voice healed up, or...? Like anything?
translation: 不过，你就没有想点办法治好自己的嗓子吗，还是说……？想过吗？

original: {Curious}Someone wanted to cut your voice, little doll. Or they didn't finish their work, or didn't know how to.
translation: {Curious}有人想要让你变成哑巴，小娃娃。他们要么是没来得及这么做，要么就是不懂得该怎么办。

original: <AUDIO: If the player hasn't dropped Christine off at the Gala Event and she is alone at the fountain, this will be crackling silence.>{Clicking or Christine breathing, "normally" for her.}
translation: <音频：如果玩家不在盛会开幕时抛下克里斯汀，并把她留在喷泉广场， 那么这将会打破宁静. >{Clicking or Christine breathing, "normally" for her.}

original: <AUDIO: After Gala Event, not Act 3 yet.>{Frantic beating on the elevator door, desperate breathing, sounds of Gala event in streets above, muted.}
translation: <音频：在盛会开幕事件后， 还没有达到3.>{Frantic beating on the elevator door, desperate breathing, sounds of Gala event in streets above, muted.}

original: <AUDIO: If the player has left Christine at the Gala Event in a "good" way, this is the signal that will play.>
translation: <音频: 如果玩家在盛会开幕事件里以“好”的方式抛弃克里斯汀，就会播放这个信号。>

original: <AUDIO: If the player has left Christine at Gala Event and she hates the player, she'll bang on the doors of the elevator to be let out.>{Hammering on door, desperate, her breathing ragged and panicked.}
translation: <音频： 如果玩家在盛会开幕事件里抛弃克里斯汀并让她怀恨在心， 她会通过重击电梯大门方式企图逃出去.>{Hammering on door, desperate, her breathing ragged and panicked.}

original: [STATIC] {Static Sound}
translation: [静电声] {Static Sound}

original: <AUDIO: Mikey, this line needs to dupe the horrible saw-like whirring sound effects of Christine's Auto-Doc in the Clinic, so the PC can track it.>
translation: <音频: 麦克，这句台词需要重复诊所里克里斯汀的自动医生发出的类似锯子的可怕呼啸声效，这样玩家就能追踪到它了。>

original: [Christine narrows her eyes, gets into a combat stance.] {Since this is a radio conversation there should be some shuffling sounds}
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛， 摆出了一副要开打的架势。]

original: {Chuckles}I'm not going to hurt you... yet. Much. Scars tell a story, some old, some new... {slow}and the one on the throat is fresh and red.
translation: {Chuckles}我不会碰你的…至少现在不会。这些伤疤的背后似乎藏着不少故事，有些旧了，有些还很新…{slow}比如喉咙上的那些，还留着血丝。

original: [Christine studies Dean, frowns.]
translation: [克莉丝汀打量着迪安，皱起了眉头。]

original: Don't... eh... don't talk much, do you?
translation: 你…呃…不太爱说话，是么？

original: [Christine shakes her head slowly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀缓缓的摇了摇头。]

original: {Sighs, irritated at being rebuffed}All right, then. I'll just wallflower it over here.
translation: {Sighs, irritated at being rebuffed}好吧，我还是继续当个花瓶好了。

original: [Christine frowns, tilts her head slightly.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱起眉头，轻轻歪了一下脑袋。]

original: {Testing the waters}Damn shame, hate to think if someone put you in there. Who bailed you out again, the new guy? Interesting.
translation: {Testing the waters}真可怜，居然有人会把你丢在那里头。是谁放你出来的？新来的那个吗？有意思。

original: {Amused, evil}What's this little doll? Were you carved by a craftsman, little doll, or were you mauled by a drunk who didn't know his tools?
translation: {Amused, evil}这个小娃娃是谁？ 小娃娃，你是被工匠雕刻成这样的，还是被一个不识好歹的醉汉给弄成这样的？

original: So... what's your story, beautiful?
translation: 所以…你是怎么了，美人？

original: {Gently bringing it up, worried she remembers him}Eh... those scars? What happened, somebody... something carve you up, or...?
translation: {Gently bringing it up, worried she remembers him}呃……你身上那些伤疤，怎么了？是有人…故意割的，还是...?

original: <AUDIO: After freeing Christine, she's at the fountain or at the Clinic alone.>{Normal Christine breathing.}
translation: <音频： 在释放克里斯汀后， 她要么是在喷泉广场或者就是独自在诊所里.>{Normal Christine breathing.}

original: [STATIC] {Static Sound}
translation: [静电声] {Static Sound}

original: <AUDIO: Dean's collar goes off, boom, flatline. No actual dialogue needed here.>
translation: <音频： 迪安的项圈炸开了，轰隆一声， 当场暴毙. 此处无声胜有声. >

original: Got to say this for Sinclair, he sure knew how to keep things locked down, the tight-assed prick.
translation: 不得不说，辛克莱这小子在看管宝贝方面真的很在行，不愧是个一毛不拔的铁公鸡。

original: Where the hell did everyone else go?
translation: 其他人都去哪儿了？

original: Wonder what happened to the suckers. {Frowns}Might have gotten taken away, like I did? Hnh.
translation: 不知道那几个傻瓜怎么样了。说不定也和我一样被抓走了？

original: {Looking around}Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
translation: {Looking around}唔。这个剧院和过去相比几乎没什么变化。

original: {Under his breath, after battle in the theater}Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure.
translation: {Under his breath, after battle in the theater}我是不准备继续在这里表演了。

original: {Frustrated}First time on stage in a hundred years, and it has to be this?
translation: {Frustrated}这可是我时隔百年后首次登台亮相，结果就这？

original: Need some help here... and that audience is {emph}not looking friendly.
translation: 谁帮我一把…那位观众似乎不是很安分。

original: Hope my partner fared better than I did... better not have left me high and dry, get-even's not going to be pretty.
translation: 希望我的搭档处境比我好一些…最好别让我孤立无援，否则我做鬼也不会放过那家伙。

original: That audience... better lay low, get a feel for the crowd.
translation: 那位观众…最好低调一点，考虑一下周围人的感受。

original: Good thing, someone walks in here, they're toast.
translation: 棒极了，有人进来了，他完蛋了。

original: I am out of here... well, not to the Villa, just out of the damn theater first chance I get.
translation: 我要离开这里…不是去别墅区，反正只要离开这个剧院就行。

original: {Looking around}This place... hasn't changed at all.
translation: {Looking around}这个地方……根本就没变嘛。

original: {Slow question, starts getting evil}Run from Dog? Dog knows how to hunt. Dog will find you, tear you apart.
translation: {Slow question, starts getting evil}你想摆脱狗？狗可是捕猎能手。他会找到你，把你撕成碎片。

original: That a bet you want to take? Cause I'll see that and raise you a few bullets to the skull.
translation: 你想和我赌谁的命更硬？那尽管来吧，我会用子弹在你的脑门多开几个洞的。

original: Dog's been shot before, many times. Won't stop me from catching you.
translation: 狗以前已经被射伤过很多次。区区一点疼痛是无法阻止他追杀你的。

original: Hope you've got this one under control because he's giving me a nasty itch on my trigger finger.
translation: 希望你好好管教一下这家伙，否则下次我一定会忍不住扣扳机的。

original: {Mutters}Didn't come all this way to get conned by some tourist.
translation: {Mutters}好不容易走到这一步，绝不能栽在区区一个游客手里。

original: {Angry}We'll see who's holding the cards in the end...
translation: {Angry}看看究竟是谁能笑到最后吧……

original: The joke's on you, "partners." You aren't getting to the prize without me.
translation: 你这是自作聪明，"伙计们"。没有我，你们拿不到大奖的。

original: {Sighs}This is a fine how do you do.
translation: {Sighs}这可真是教人心寒哪。

original: {Grumbles}Should have blown up that seat cushion right when they sat down, would've been a better end than this.
translation: {Grumbles}真该在那家伙坐下的时候就引爆座垫，就不会落到这个下场了。

original: {To himself}Just finish the last job, Dean. It's all you've wanted, just hang in there.
translation: {To himself}把活干完，迪安。你想要的就在眼前，再坚持一会儿。

original: {Himself}Keep your head down, Dean, don't let the locals see you.
translation: {Himself}保持低调，迪安，不要让当地人看到你。

original: Sinclair, you better appreciate all I do to screw you over.
translation: 辛克莱，你真该感谢我为了扳倒你所做的一切。

original: That tourist is better than most. Probably won't matter.
translation: 那个游客比大多数人都强，也可能也没啥大不了的。

original: {Mutters}Town's going to be filled with Ghosts when the sky lights up.
translation: {Mutters}等到天亮的时候，整个镇子都会布满鬼人。

original: The linked collars is a new trick. Can't say I like it much.
translation: 把项圈连在一起倒是个新花样。但我不喜欢。

original: Waiting for the fireworks. {Beat}Just like last time.
translation: 等着看烟花吧，{Beat}就像上次一样。

original: Can't wait to see their faces when they find out what the lock is. Just gotta wait 'em out.
translation: 等他们发现门锁的情况时，不知道会是什么表情。等着看好了。

original: Place is going to be swarming with the masks when the sky lights up.
translation: 等到天亮的时候，这里的鬼人就会满大街都是了。

original: {himself}Not much time to get to the gates before they shut the door and turn folks away.
translation: {himself}在他们关闭大门并驱散当地人之前，我们没有多少时间到达大门那里。

original: Holy Mary, Mother, and Joe - now {emph}there's a show.
translation: 我的老天啊，演出开始了。

original: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}All right, now - I'm out of here.
translation: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}好吧，我要离开这里了。

original: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}If the Ghost People didn't know we were here before, they know now.
translation: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}这下鬼人可就都知道我们的位置了。

original: Someone struck up the band. {To himself, grumbling}A band of tortured cats.
translation: 演出开始了。 {To himself, grumbling}简直就像是虐猫演出。

original: What kind of casino has two Grand Openings?
translation: 什么样的赌场会举办两次开业庆典？

original: {Cold, to himself}This is your last hurrah, Sinclair, I promise you.
translation: {Cold, to himself}辛克莱，我向你保证，这是你最后一次欢呼了。

original: Just my luck.
translation: 撞了大运了。

original: Luck's finally shining down on me.
translation: 幸运女神终于眷顾我了。

original: You wait, beautiful. Keep that gate open for me, Dean'll be there soon.
translation: 你等着，美人儿。给我留着门，迪安马上就来。

original: Sierra Madre, sweetheart, Dean's coming home.
translation: 马德雷，我的甜心，我回家了。

original: {Getting angry}Stop looking at me, you idiot. I can hear your stomach growling from here, I don't like it.
translation: {Getting angry}别再盯着我看了，你这个大白痴。我大老远就能听到你肚子叫唤，我不喜欢这种声音。

original: <AUDIO: Dog dies in the Kitchen, boom, then flatlines, just an explosion and flatline is needed.>
translation: <音频： 疯狂死在厨房， 轰隆一声， 接下来就是死一般的寂静， 除了爆炸和死亡什么也不剩下.>

original: {1G}I... {chuckles, not unkindly, more relieved}he's asleep. Finally. {To himself}Shhhhhh.
translation: {1G}我... {chuckles, not unkindly, more relieved}他睡着了。终于。{To himself}嘘。

original: {2G - Tired, serious, no malice}Dog... all I wanted was for you to listen to me, let me care for you. Keep you from hurting yourself...
translation: {2G - Tired, serious, no malice}狗…我只想让你听话，让我来照顾你吧。我不想让你伤害自己…

original: {3G - Stronger, to himself}Now I can. And one day, when you're ready, I'll let you out. When you're calm, and we... understand each other.
translation: {3G - Stronger, to himself}现在我有能力了。将来有一天，等时机成熟，等你能冷静下来，我们…可以相互理解时，我会再把你放出来。

original: {4G}And we're at peace, you and I, mind and instinct. Then the world will be ready for us.
translation: {4G}只有这样，我和你，理智和本能，才能彻底达成和解。那时，我们才能共同面对这个世界。

original: {1D}Hello? Voice? You there? {Waits, deliver this as a snarl}It's Dog...{confused}...Dog can hear himself. Voice is... is in cage? Locked.
translation: {1D}嗨？声音？你在么？ {Waits, deliver this as a snarl}剩下狗了...{confused}…狗只能听到自己的声音。声音…关进笼子了？被锁起来了。

original: {2D - Frowns, building determination}Now Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid. {Beat}And... {frowns}hungry. {Emph}More hungry.
translation: {2D - Frowns, building determination}现在狗能说话了。狗不再害怕了。 {Beat}狗...{frowns}很饿。比以前更饿了。

original: {3D - Slightly unsettling here}Dog find food... tear apart food, eat. Chase it down, can't run, feed. Finally, until Dog is full.
translation: {3D - Slightly unsettling here}狗要去找吃的…把食物嚼碎，吞掉。狗要追赶猎物，到它跑不动为止，再吃掉它。狗要吃到肚子饱了为止。

original: {1B}What is this place?
translation: {1B}这是什么地方？

original: {2B}Feel strange, like... sleeping. On my neck, is this... a chain? I... {recognition, looks down and sees the name carved there}what's carved on my chest.
translation: {2B}好奇怪，感觉像…做梦一样。我脖子上的是…链条么？我... {recognition, looks down and sees the name carved there}我胸口刻了什么？

original: {3B}"God." No... not God. Something in reverse... hnh. Was that one of them...?
translation: {3B}"神" 。不…不是神。要倒过来看…唔。哪个才是正确的呢……？

original: {4B}Should rest, get my strength back... then explore this place, see what it holds.
translation: {4B}我想先休息一下，恢复体力…再四处看看，搞清楚这个地方。

original: {1 - Sad, sing song}...going to make casino burn, no more being...
translation: {1 - Sad, sing song}…我要烧掉赌场，不必再……

original: {2 - "No more being..."}...back in the cage. Stop what you're doing, we can...
translation: {2 - "No more being..."}…回到笼子里了。快住手，我们可以……

original: {3 - "we"}...can hear you now. {Beat, cold}Not much longer, not...
translation: {3 - "we"}…可以听见你了。{Beat, cold}不必了，不必了……

original: {4 - snarling, "you're not..."}...listening to me. {Frustrated, furious, emph}Tired of being your minder, tired...
translation: {4 - snarling, "you're not..."}…听我说。 {Frustrated, furious, emph}我不想再照顾你了，不想再...

original: {5 - "tired"}...of putting Dog to sleep, he wakes up in cage, hungry, Dog wants...
translation: {5 - "tired"}…让狗沉睡了，他每次都饿着肚子从笼子里醒来，狗想要...

original: {6 - "wants"}...to protect you, always wanted to protect you, the reason I have to take control is...
translation: {6 - "wants"}…保护你，我一直想保护你，我之所以想控制这具躯体，是因为…

original: {7 - "The reason I have to take control is..."}...Master. Master set me free, Dog needs to...
translation: {7 - "The reason I have to take control is..."}…主人，主人把我放了出来，狗必须...

original: {8 - "You need to"}...listen to me. {Sudden moment of weakness, slight plea}If you do this, we {emph}both...
translation: {8 - "You need to"}…听我说。 {Sudden moment of weakness, slight plea}如果你这么做的话，我们 {emph}都会…

original: {9 - "We both"}...die. Dog wants to die. Don't care anymore, tired of you, tired of place. Master will...
translation: {9 - "We both"}…死。狗想要去死。狗一点也不在乎，受够了你，受够了这个地方。主人会...

original: {10 - "Master will"}...help us. Please let me help us. If you don't, then you're...
translation: {10 - "Master will"}…救我们的。我可以帮助我们两个。如果你不肯，那你就会…

original: {Surprised}Hnh. The human pulled it off.
translation: {Surprised}哼。那个人类成功了。

original: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
translation: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。

original: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
translation: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。

original: {Impressed}The human did it. {Evil}Good.
translation: {Impressed}那个人类做到了。 {Evil}很好。

original: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
translation: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。

original: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
translation: 不管是不是朋友，都该到大门那儿去了。

original: {To himself}Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
translation: {To himself}焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。

original: {Eager}Coming for you, human... you just wait.
translation: {Eager}我来了，人类…你在那里等着就好。

original: Madre's mine.
translation: 马德雷是我的。

original: {Himself}So hungry.
translation: {Himself}好饿啊。

original: {Himself, a little scared}Insides growling.
translation: {Himself, a little scared}肚子在叫。

original: :: Mournful whining to self ::
translation: :: 自己悲泣 ::

original: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
translation: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}希望那声音不要再回来了。太凶了，太糟了。

original: :: Stomach rumbling.::
translation: :: 胃不停地响着。::

original: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
translation: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。

original: Sierra Madre's mine, my heart's right where it belongs.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场是我的，我的心永远和它在一起。

original: {Taunting}You can't abide it. There's no heart. You hate it, I can hear it in your words.
translation: {Taunting}这不是你的真心话。其实你讨厌这里，我可以从你的语气里听出来。

original: Sounds like you need your hearing checked. Sierra Madre, it's meant for me.
translation: 那我建议你去检查一下自己的耳朵。马德雷山脉赌场，是我命中注定的归宿。

original: You could have left the Sierra Madre. Left this Villa, joined your own kind.
translation: 你其实可以离开马德雷山脉赌场，离开以利亚，去找你的同类。

original: Where are lights. Dog want to see the lights.
translation: 灯光在哪里？狗想看见灯光。

original: Can't wait to see the lights.
translation: 好想马上见到灯光。

original: :: Impatient Growl ::
translation: :: 不耐烦地嚎叫 ::

original: {Scared}Hurry up, Dog doesn't like being here.
translation: {Scared}快一点，狗不喜欢待在这里。

original: {Crude rhyme}Got to go... Casin-oooo.
translation: {Crude rhyme}应该去...赌场。

original: Didn't... we do this before? Can't remember.
translation: 我们以前……是不是这么干过？记不得了。

original: Want show and lights and yelling to start.
translation: 想看灯光表演，想对着它们大叫。

original: :: Weeping. ::
:: Whimpering ::
:: Howling in frustration ::
translation: :: 沮丧地嚎叫。 ::

original: Please let me out.
translation: 请放我出去。

original: Dog is sorry, sorry, sorry.
translation: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。

original: What did I do?
translation: 我做错了什么？

original: {Hypnotized by light show in sky}Lights and fire.
translation: {Hypnotized by light show in sky}灯火通明。

original: {Quiet}Pretty.
translation: {Quiet}太美了。

original: {Frowns}Lots of noise.
translation: {Frowns}太吵了。

original: {Curious}Where is Master? Did Master make fires in the sky?
translation: {Curious}主人在哪里？天上的烟花是主人放的么？

original: {At festival}:: Delighted clapping ::
translation: {At festival}:: 高兴地拍手 ::

original: Nooooooooooo!
translation: 不！

original: :: Howling, frightened. ::
translation: :: 吼叫，吓坏了。 ::

original: Let me out, let me out!
translation: 放我出去，放我出去！

original: Noise hurts, noise {emph}hurts!
translation: 噪音很吵， {emph}很吵！

original: Streets are hurting my ears!
translation: 街上的声音吵得我耳朵疼！

original: Too bright, too bright.
translation: 太亮啦，太亮啦。

original: {Urgent}Hurry, we're targets out here.
translation: {Urgent}快一点，我们要变成活靶子了。

original: Almost inside. Finally. {Beat, himself}Then I can get rid of the baggage.
translation: 终于能进去了。接下来，我就可以抛掉这份累赘了。

original: {To himself}Quiet, Dog, stay in the cage.
translation: {To himself}安静，狗，待在笼子里。

original: {Disgust}Sick of these Old World deathtraps.
translation: {Disgust}受够了旧世界的这些陷阱。

original: {Low, eager}The Sierra Madre's almost mine.
translation: {Low, eager}马德雷山脉赌场眼看就是我的了。

original: {Snarling}They better not try and leave me here...
translation: {Snarling}他们最好不要把我丢在这里……

original: {To himself}When this festival fires, I'm the first one in the door.
translation: {To himself}等到焰火点燃时，我要第一个跑向大门。

original: Last time I ever deal with human trash...
translation: 这是我最后一次和垃圾人类打交道了……

original: After the Bomb, still slaves to technology, events, Pip-Boys, collars... hnnnr.
translation: 核爆以后，我们依旧被科技、娱乐、哔哔小子和项圈奴役着…哼。

original: I'll whip you for this, Dog. I'll crush your cage with you inside it for making me go through this.
translation: 狗，我要惩罚你。你让我受了这份罪，我要把你连同笼子一起碾碎。

original: All this - if I get inside the Sierra Madre, it's all worth it. All of it.
translation: 我受了这么多苦，只要能进入马德雷山脉赌场，那它们就是值得的。

original: As soon as those collars go off... we'll settle things, yes.
translation: 一旦那些项圈爆炸…事情就解决了，对。

original: {Impressed}The human did it. {Evil}Good.
translation: {Impressed}那个人类做到了。{Evil}很好。

original: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
translation: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。

original: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
translation: 不管是敌是友，都该到大门那儿去了。

original: {To himself}Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
translation: {To himself}焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。

original: {Eager}Coming for you, human... you just wait.
translation: {Eager}我来了，人类…你在那里等着就好。

original: Madre's mine.
translation: 马德雷是我的。

original: {Surprised}Hnh. The human pulled it off.
translation: {Surprised}哼。那个人类成功了。

original: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
translation: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。

original: Gate won't be open for long.
translation: 大门不会开太久。

original: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
translation: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。

original: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
translation: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。

original: Used to know a ventriloquist with more skill than you, at least he had the sense to know his own name without carving it into his chest.
translation: 我曾经认识一个比你厉害的腹语术大师。至少他记得自己的名字，不必把它刻在自己的胸口。

original: Mirrors tell me my name when needed... and I have a name for you, several. Thief, coward... showman. Radiation couldn't kill the truth, could it.
translation: 我只要照镜子就能知道自己的名字…但我倒是有个名字可以送给你，不，应该有好几个。小偷，懦夫…假把式。哪怕辐射也无法抹去这些事实。

original: The truth, buddy, is this: you and me, we're now family as long as we got these bowties on. So watch your mouth, you don't scare me.
translation: 伙计，眼下只有一个事实，那就是只要咱俩还戴着这个项圈，就是一条绳上的蚂蚱。所以你说话小心一点，你吓不倒我。

original: Touched by radiation, and you choose to spend your time here. You could have just left... but you're too obsessed to let go.
translation: 你受了辐射，还选择留下来。你大可以直接离开…可你却痴迷于那些财宝，不肯放手。

original: :: Impatient Growl ::
translation: :: 不耐烦地吼叫 ::

original: :: Weeping. ::
:: Whimpering ::
:: Howling in frustration ::
translation: :: 沮丧地吼叫 ::

original: Please let me out.
translation: 放我出去。

original: Dog is sorry, sorry, sorry.
translation: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。

original: What did I do?
translation: 我做错了什么？

original: Let me out, let me out!
translation: 放我出去，放我出去！

original: {Himself}So hungry.
translation: {Himself}好饿啊。

original: Don't like this place. Want to go back, {quieter}back to the base. {Beat, quiet}Or the Church, miss the Church.
translation: 不喜欢这个地方。我想回去，回到基地。 {Beat, quiet}或者教堂，我想念教堂。

original: {Himself, a little scared}Insides growling.
translation: {Himself, a little scared}肚子在叫。

original: :: Mournful whining to self ::
translation: :: 自己悲泣 ::

original: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
translation: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}希望那声音不要再回来了，坏坏。

original: {Rocks on legs}Where is Master? Did he go away? {Apologetic}Dog will be good this time.
translation: {Rocks on legs}主人去哪里了？他走了么？狗下次一定会听话的。

original: {Slight disgust}Swallowed something bad. Taste like burnt wires.
translation: {Slight disgust}吞了不好的东西。味道像烧坏的电线。

original: :: Stomach rumbling.::
translation: :: 肚子不停地响。::

original: Can't believe the idiot swallowed his collar.
translation: 真不敢相信这个白痴吞下了项圈。

original: What's taking that human so long.
translation: 那个人类怎么这么久。

original: {To himself}If that human wasn't wearing a collar...
translation: {To himself}如果那个人类没有带项圈...

original: Wonder what that human's insides would look like laid out over the fountain.
translation: 不知道喷泉上面那个人类的内部构造是什么样的。

original: {To himself}Might be able to rip the Pip-Boy off his arm without killing him. Hmm.
translation: {To himself}也许可以在不杀他的情况下把哔哔小子从他的胳膊上扯下来。唔。

original: Air tastes like copper. {Beat, smiles}Or Old World gold.
translation: 空气中有一股铜臭味。也许是旧世界的黄金。

original: Almost got away... then the idiot's hunger screws it up.
translation: 眼看就要逃出去了…那个白痴却因为饥饿掉链子了。

original: {To himself}Quiet, Dog, stay in the cage.
translation: {To himself}安静点，狗，在笼子里待好。

original: {Curious, slow}I don't remember you. Who are you.
translation: {Curious, slow}我不记得你，你是谁？

original: A little slow, huh? Uh... Dean. Dean Domino. I... live here.
translation: 你反应有点慢啊？呃…迪安。迪安·多米诺，我……住这儿。

original: You look like food, smell like food. Dog - hungry.
translation: 你看起来挺好吃，闻起来也挺好吃。狗……饿了。

original: All right, pal, you stay in your corner, I'll stay in mine. {Beat}Do not leave me alone with this thing.
translation: 好吧，朋友，你就呆那儿别乱动，我也不会乱动的，行吗？{Beat}千万别让我和这东西独处。

original: {Slow, to himself}Reminds me, keeps the voice out of my head. He can't talk when the pain's howling at me.
translation: {Slow, to himself}这东西可以让那声音离开我的脑子。当我疼痛难忍的时候，他也不能说话。

original: Wait, so you're not just slow, you're screwy, too? {Rolls eyes}Some crew we are... we are never getting into the Sierra Madre.
translation: 呃……等一下，所以你不只是反应迟钝，脑子也有问题吗？{Rolls eyes}瞧瞧咱们这班人…恐怕是永远也进不了马德雷山脉赌场了。

original: Dog is hungry. {Frowns at Dean}Tired of your voice... when do we eat?
translation: 狗饿了。{Frowns at Dean}听你说话都累了…我们什么时候吃东西？

original: Don't like the way this guy is looking at me. You better be his leash.
translation: 我不喜欢这家伙看我的眼神。你最好拴紧他。

original: Where the hell did you get this one. "Dog?" What, so you don't forget your name?
translation: 你身上的字是从哪儿来的？"狗？" 怎么，这样你就不会忘记自己的名字了？

original: Why are you so carved up - {frowns, a little incredulous}that a {emph}bear trap on your arm?
translation: 你怎么浑身伤痕累累的，{frowns, a little incredulous}你胳膊上套的是一个捕熊夹吗？

original: {Irritated}You'd think it was Spring the way tourists keep rolling in.
translation: {Irritated}这么多游客涌进来，还以为是春天来了呢。

original: {Impressed}That one's got a head on their shoulders. {Beat}For now.
translation: {Impressed}总算来了个有点脑子了。{Beat}虽然只是暂时吧。

original: {Frowns, to himself}Hope that tourist is hurrying, haven't got all day.
translation: {Frowns, to himself}希望那个游客动作快一点，我可没那么多时间。

original: {Frowns}At least this one seems like a straight shooter. {Beat}Or sucker.
translation: {Frowns}这家伙要么是个直肠子，{Beat}要么就是个傻子。

original: {Frowns}That tourist crosses me, they'll regret it. {Beat, shrugs}Even if they don't, they still might.
translation: {Frowns}那个游客竟敢惹我，他会后悔的。{Beat, shrugs}即使没有，也可能会后悔的。

original: {Shakes head, disappointed in self}Should never have set that radio signal on repeat.
