translation: {Shakes head, disappointed in self}真不该反复播放电台。

original: Can you hear me? Signal should be stronger in here. I'll set this on loop... {warning to player}just in case I need to step away for a moment.
translation: 能听到吗？ 这里的信号应该强一些。我会把这段语音调成循环播放... {warning to player}以免我有事不在。

original: When the bombs hit, this casino sealed up like an Emperor's tomb. If you don't know what that means, never mind, it means we're trapped.
translation: 核弹落下的时候，整座赌场就像皇陵一样被牢牢封上了。如果你听不懂这句话也没关系，反正我的意思是，我们现在被困住了。

original: So - get the power running to the main floor. That'll open the elevators and unlock the doors.
translation: 所以，你得想办法重启主楼的电力，这样电梯才会启动，各扇门的门锁也会解除。

original: {Mutters, detour to himself}The ones that didn't strip their gears when they locked into place, Old World junk. Shoddy workmanship.
translation: {Mutters, detour to himself}不过也只有锁芯没断的门才能打得开，旧世界的垃圾。粗制滥造的玩意。

original: Once the power's on, then I'll tell you your next steps. Just get this part done, and then listen.
translation: 等通电之后，我会告诉你下一步怎么做。先把这件事办完，再来找我。

original: If you're wondering where your crew is, well... the casino saw them as guests. Which means they all got assigned to their floor. {Frowns}Just like mine.
translation: 至于你的其他队友嘛…赌场把他们当成了客人，已经将他们送往不同的楼层了{Frowns}。就像我一样。

original: Don't worry about them, they're of no use if you can't get the power running.
translation: 别担心他们，如果恢复不了电力，他们也没有用处。

original: All I need is you for the rest of this. Which means we just need to deal with them, one by one, and then the Vault's... {backstabbing implication, he's not going to share}ours.
translation: 剩下的事情，我只需要你一个人来做就够了。因此我们得把其他人处理掉，然后避难所就会是……{backstabbing implication, he's not going to share}我们俩的了。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}Ha! You got the power on, excellent. {Pleased}You were quite a find, glad my trap in the desert caught you before time ran out.
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}哈！你恢复了电力，很好。{Pleased}你真是个不可多得的人才，幸好我在大限将至之前，用设在沙漠里的陷阱逮到了你。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}And also glad you didn't come across this place first, might have plundered it first... can't have that. Like at HELIOS. And Hoover Dam.
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}也庆幸老天没有让你提前发现这个地方，否则也许会被你捷足先登……这可不行。太阳神一号和胡佛大坝就是前车之鉴。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}All right, setting this on repeat in case you're some idiot-savant braincase and need the reminder...
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}好吧，为了避免你过于健忘，需要他人随时在耳边提醒，我已经把这段语音设为了循环播放……

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}So, my greedy friend, we've got some unfinished business. I'm not one to share, and there's loose ends we need to wrap up first.
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}那么，我这位嗜财如命的朋友，我们还有些事情没有完成。我这人并不喜欢同他人分享财富，所以首先，我们必须要收拾掉不必要的人。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}The rest of your team is on different floors. They got assigned there, ushered there based on the casino's records as to the best "fit."
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}你的同伴们已经分散到别的楼层去了。赌场会根据记录将他们引导到“合适”的楼层。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}Don't ask me how, Pre-War {emph, disgust at "casino"}casino security and escort systems aren't my specialty.
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}别问我这是什么原理，我对战前赌场的安保和接待系统研究得并不透彻。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}Go to each floor, and kill them. I don't need them anymore... well, now that you're here.
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}现在你就到各楼层去杀了他们。我已经不需要他们了…有你一个就足够了。

original: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}We don't need anyone... except each other. Together, we'll crack the Sierra Madre, and we can both leave this place behind.
translation: {SCRIPT: Power's on in Main Floor}不用太多人……只要我们俩。我们携手合作，一定能破解马德雷山脉的秘密，一起离开这里。

original: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}Now... if anything about our little heist went smoothly, you'd go to the Vault... {irritated}except it's locked by some code I'm not familiar with.
translation: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}好了…如果这场抢劫进展顺利的话，那么接下来你就该前往避难所了...{irritated}只可惜，避难所被锁上了，而加密的方式我并不清楚。

original: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}The door to the casino vault is hidden in the Executive Suites, without the means to unlock it, it's useless.
translation: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}通往赌场避难所的大门就藏在行政套房里，如果没办法打开门锁，那我们所有的努力就白费了。

original: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}Find a way to open it, bypass the code, then we'll talk.
translation: {SCRIPT: Dealt with Everyone}找到打开它的方法，破解大门的密码，然后回来向我复命。

original: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}You did it... a voice lock. Why would he have done that? Uh! Never mind.
translation: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}你成功了…居然是声控锁。他为什么要搞这种东西？啊！算了。

original: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}Now I just need you to go below, look around. See if there's any {emph}other surprises down there.
translation: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}现在我要你坐电梯下去，侦察一下里面的情况。看看有没有什么{emph}别的惊喜。

original: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}I'll be along once you've found the Vault. No need risking myself just yet.
translation: {SCRIPT: Elevator Door Unlocked}等你找到了金库，我就去与你会和。目前我还不想拿自己的性命开玩笑。

original: {Wild Wasteland only}End of line.
translation: {Wild Wasteland only}通话结束。

original: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}What the hell was that?
translation: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}出什么事了？

original: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}The Gala Event... finally. Probably wake up half the things in town.
translation: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}盛世庆典...终于开始了。镇上一半的鬼人大概都会被惊动吧。

original: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}Power's fluctuating in here... getting some systems waking up, good, good.
translation: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}能量出现波动…系统启动了，很好，很好。

original: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}Now all they have to do is just get here. Tired of waiting.
translation: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired}现在他们只要进来就行了。我已经等得不耐烦了。

original: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}Hurry... hurry... you just need to get inside, I'll handle the rest. Come on, you fools.
translation: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}快点…快点…你们快进来，剩下的我来处理。来啊，你们这群蠢材。

original: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}Not far now... soon, the Sierra Madre's mine. Doors won't hold open forever... just like the last time. Come on.
translation: {SCRIPT: Gala Event has fired, urgency here}过不了多久…马德雷山脉赌场就是我的了。大门可不会一直敞开…上次也是这样。动作快点。

original: All right, now everything's coming together...
translation: 好吧，事情终于有转机了……

original: Just need to keep their gears turning a little while longer...
translation: 只需要让它们的齿轮再多转一会…

original: {Grunts}Can't believe this old Pip-Boy saved me. {Beat, under his breath}Even if it led me to that damn signal in the first place.
translation: {Grunts}真不敢想信这个老旧的哔哔小子救了我。 {Beat, under his breath}不过也是它先害得我跟着那个该死的信号走到这儿来的。

original: Good thing the new recruit had a Pip-Boy, too, probably stole it from a Vault 21 dweller. {Beat}Still, a thief's just what I need for this.
translation: 真不错，新来的那家伙手上也有一个哔哔小子， 大概是从21号避难所的居民手里偷来的。{Beat}我也正好需要一个小偷。

original: If only the others would've obeyed orders half as well as this one... should have thought of linking the collars together the first few times.
translation: 之前那帮人要是能和现在这家伙一样听话，哪怕就听一半……我早就该想到把项圈接在一起的。

original: Good thing I can still hook into the Villa speakers by remote...
translation: 好在我依然可以远程遥控别墅区的喇叭…

original: Damn Hologram tech. Worthless as security... better as weapons.
translation: 混蛋全息影像科技。用在安保上一文不值…更适合做武器。

original: What the hell are they doing out there. Hurry up, you idiots, I don't have a few more years to waste.
translation: 你们到底在干嘛。快一点，你们这些白痴，我可没剩下几年时间了。

original: Outwitted by doors. Hermetically sealed doors don't protect anyone, all they do is seal us in.
translation: 居然被几道大门给难倒了。密封的门保护不了任何人，只会把我们关在里面。

original: {Frustrated, grumbling}Why the owner tied all of this to the Gala Event, insanity... backwards thinking, having a {emph}festival be your key. No wonder the bombs fell.
translation: {Frustrated, grumbling}为什么这儿的拥有者会将大门的开关和盛世庆典连接在一起……现在想想，居然将一场晚会作为自家开门的钥匙，难怪要挨核弹。

original: {Himself}Still can't figure out why I lost the signals...
translation: {Himself}还是不明白我为什么会丢掉信号…

original: There's no reason why it could have gone wrong, had it all planned out... {Snorts, pissed}maybe it was the curse of the Sierra Madre.
translation: 不可能会出问题啊，一切都计划好了... {Snorts, pissed}也许这就是马德雷山脉的诅咒。

original: {Coughs a bit, clears his throat.}Damn Cloud still in my lungs, rattling around.
translation: {Coughs a bit, clears his throat.}该死的毒云还在我的肺里转悠。

original: <AUDIO: Clatter of wrench dropping>{Dropped a wrench on the ground}Dammit, get back here.
translation: <音频： 扳手掉下的咔嗒声>{Dropped a wrench on the ground}该死，给我回来。

original: Good thing I installed radios in the collars, Pip-Boy's letting me pick them up.
translation: 好在我已经往项圈里安装了无线电接收器，哔哔小子可以让我找到它们。

original: What the hell is 21 doing now... hnh.
translation: 21号现在到底在干嘛…唔。

original: {Irritated, judgmental}Fool better not decide to sleep. Vitals go down, I'll get someone else to do this job.
translation: {Irritated, judgmental}那蠢货最好不要想着睡觉。要是丢了性命，我就再去找别人来吧。

original: Unnn... sitting too long. Damn arthritis.
translation: 唔…坐的时间太长了。该死的关节炎。

original: Come too far to go back now. Too far.
translation: 走得太远，不能回头了。太远了。

original: Hnh. Going to wipe the slate clean. Kimball, the Republic... Hardin, McNamara, my "brothers." Then I'll head back West.
translation: 哼。要把他们统统消灭。金博尔，共和国…哈丁，麦克纳马拉，还有我的"兄弟们" 。然后再往西。

original: Better loop some instructions in case something happens.
translation: 最好将一部分指令循环播放以备不测。

original: Going to get inside this place if it's the last thing I do.
translation: 就算剩下最后一口气，我也要进去。

original: Running out of volunteers. Last ones couldn't see beyond their own greed.
translation: 快要没有志愿者了。上一队人马被贪婪蒙蔽了双眼。

original: If only people would do what I say, wouldn't need these damn collars to keep them in line. Keep going for each other's throats like dogs.
translation: 如果人们肯听我的话，就不需要用这些项圈来约束他们了。他们总是像狗一样互相撕咬。

original: Wish I... still had that damn Holorifle. Spent forever making it... need to find it when this is all done.
translation: 真希望…那把全息步枪还在我身边。为了研制它，我花费了无数心血…等这一切都结束，我就去把它找回来。

original: {1st Time Police Station}What are we doing in here? Planning to toss me in a cell?
translation: {1st Time Police Station}我们来这儿干嘛？你想把我丢到牢里么？

original: {1st Time Residential}Going to be sad to leave the Residential District. {Beat}Well... not really.
translation: {1st Time Residential}要离开住宅区了，真叫人难过啊。{Beat}好吧……其实也没所谓啦。

original: {2nd Time Residential}Sure left a lot of traps around. Sometimes I forget where they are.
translation: {2nd Time Residential}我在这儿确实装了很多机关，有些连我自己都忘了。

original: {1st Time Salida, North}As worse as the other places are? This section of town is the most dangerous.
translation: {1st Time Salida, North}和其他地方一样糟糕？小镇的这一块是最危险的。

original: {2nd Time Salida, North}We need to get out of here - come alone if you want, don't drag me here.
translation: {2nd Time Salida, North}我们不能在这儿待，你要来你自己来，别拉我下水。

original: {3rd Time, Salida, North}Hear there's a belltower and church to the North... filled with Ghost People.
translation: {3rd Time, Salida, North}听说北面有座钟塔和教堂...里面全是鬼人。

original: {1st Time Ruined Cafe}The cafe survived? {Beat}How about that. Had great coffee - and one of the waitresses? Rhonda? Piece. Of. Work.
translation: {1st Time Ruined Cafe}咖啡馆居然没塌？{Beat}真是不得了。这儿的咖啡挺不错的。还有个女服务员，好像叫郎达？长得可俊了。

original: {1st Time Salida/Puesta}Do {emph}not leave me here.
translation: {1st Time Salida/Puesta}别{emph}把我留在这里。

original: {2nd Time Police Station}Never liked the Chief here, real stickler for "policy."
translation: {2nd Time Police Station}我一点也不喜欢这里的警长，他实在太有“原则”了。

original: {3rd Time Police Station}Made off with a lot of mines, shotguns, and explosives from here... wasn't easy with the Ghost People around.
translation: {3rd Time Police Station}我从这里顺走了不少地雷、霰弹枪和炸药……附近的鬼人不少，可累死我了。

original: {1st Time Switching Station: Mumbling to himself}Got a worse grease smell down here than Danny Parker's hair on Opening Night.
translation: {1st Time Switching Station: Mumbling to himself}这地方比丹尼·帕克首演那天晚上抹的发油还要难闻。

original: {1st Time Clinic}What are we doing here for? This place is... well, it's haunted.
translation: {1st Time Clinic}我们来这里干嘛？这个地方……这个地方闹鬼啊。

original: {2nd Time, Clinic}Seriously, we should get out of here. The Security Holograms... shoot on sight, and you can't even hurt them.
translation: {2nd Time, Clinic}说实在的，我们应该离开这里。那些安保全息影像一看到人…就会发动攻击，而你根本伤不到它们。

original: {Salida}Salida del Sol - "Sunrise." {Beat}Not much to look at now.
translation: {Salida}日出镇，现在早就看不到日出了。

original: {Testing the player, insinuating}You sure came a long way to rob this place. Guess greed is in the blood.
translation: {Testing the player, insinuating}你大老远的跑来，就为了抢这里的宝贝。看来你真是够贪的。

original: {In any interior}Breath of fresh air in here... literally. {Beat}If you need to take a breather from the Cloud, this is a good spot.
translation: {In any interior}这里面…居然还有新鲜空气。{Beat}如果你不想再吸毒云了，倒是可以来这儿换个环境。

original: {Sizing place up, liking it}Might be a nice place to hole up for a while.
translation: {Sizing place up, liking it}这地方不错，可以用来暂时藏身。

original: {Salida/Puesta}Check the fountains, might have some wishes... er, chips we can snag.
translation: {Salida/Puesta}看看喷泉底下，说不定可以发现一些许愿的……呃，筹码。

original: {Salida/Puesta}Watch the ground for bear traps and {emph}any openings for tripwires.
translation: {Salida/Puesta}小心地上的捕熊夹{emph}和门口的绊线。

original: {Salida/Puesta}{To himself, irritated}Ghost People.
translation: {Salida/Puesta}{To himself, irritated}鬼人。

original: {Salida/Puesta}If I ever had to come here, I stuck to the overhangs and roofs - like sidewalks up there.
translation: {Salida/Puesta}要是我一个人来这儿，我一定会选择爬上屋檐和屋顶，在上面穿行。

original: {Switching Station}Like a toxic ashtray down here.
translation: {Switching Station}这里像个毒烟灰缸。

original: {Switching Station}{Thinking}Find a way to get this place hopping again... would clean all the toxic gas out of Puesta del Sol.
translation: {Switching Station}{Thinking}如果能想办法让这地方重新启动…就能把日落镇里的毒气全都净化掉。

original: {Switching Station}Stinks down here. {To himself}And I can barely smell anything.
translation: {Switching Station}这里散发着恶臭。{To himself}要知道我的嗅觉已经很差了。

original: {Sarcastic}Sure glad one of us knows what you're doing.
translation: {Sarcastic}还好我们俩中有一个人头脑清醒。

original: You know, this used to be a nice town. {Beat}Well, nice enough.
translation: 你知道么，这镇子本来挺不错的。{Beat}相当不错。

original: When in doubt, step quiet - and watch {emph}where you step.
translation: 如果你犹豫了，就放慢脚步，注意脚下。

original: Where there's a bear trap, Ghost People aren't far behind.
translation: 有捕熊夹的地方，往往附近会有鬼人徘徊。

original: Watch out if you see a prize lying around - the Ghost People leave "supplies" as traps.
translation: 如果你看到地上有好东西，一定要小心，鬼人喜欢把“物资”放在地上当诱饵。

original: Getting real tired of tourist season - no offense, but you guys are lowering the bar.
translation: 我非常讨厌旅游旺季，无意冒犯啊，我就是觉得你们拉低了这个地方的档次。

original: {Random comment}Cloud wasn't always here. Grew over the years, even without cars or factories.
translation: {Random comment}以前没有毒云的。尽管汽车和工厂早都消失了，可毒云却还是越来越浓。

original: Sierra Madre may wait. Not me.
translation: 就算马德雷山脉屹立不倒，我也实在等不下去了。

original: {Slight impatience}Sierra Madre's not getting any younger.
translation: {Slight impatience}马德雷山脉正在一天天凋敝。

original: What's next?
translation: 下一步怎么做？

original: I want to know more about the Master.
translation: 我想知道更多关于你主人的情况。

original: I need you to get to your Gala Event position.
translation: 我要你做好启动盛世庆典的准备。

original: Maybe {emph}Dog will obey you. {Beat, emph on "I'm"}I'm not as easily broken.
translation: 或许 {emph}狗会服从你。但我可不会那么轻易服从。

original: {God}That's enough for now.
translation: {God}先聊到这里吧。

original: {Evil, smiling}We'll see.
translation: {Evil, smiling}那就之后再说。

original: Who's this Old Man who brought us here?
translation: 把我们抓来的那个老头是谁？

original: {Dog}I had questions for you.
translation: {Dog}我有问题问你。

original: {Nods, obedient}Yes, Master.
translation: {Nods, obedient}好的，主人。

original: {God}I had questions for you.
translation: {God}我有问题要问你。

original: I'm sure you do.
translation: 我随时可以解答。

original: {Irritated}You'd think it was Spring the way tourists keep rolling in.
translation: {Irritated}这么多游客涌进来，还以为是春天来了呢。

original: {Impressed}That one's got a head on their shoulders. {Beat}For now.
translation: {Impressed}总算来了个有点脑子了。{Beat}虽然只是暂时吧。

original: {Frowns, to himself}Hope that tourist is hurrying, haven't got all day.
translation: {Frowns, to himself}希望那个游客动作快一点，我可没那么多时间。

original: {Frowns}At least this one seems like a straight shooter. {Beat}Or sucker.
translation: {Frowns}这家伙要么是仗义。{Beat}要么就是个傻子。

original: {Frowns}That tourist crosses me, they'll regret it. {Beat, shrugs}Even if they don't, they still might.
translation: {Frowns}那个游客要是敢惹我，一定会后悔的。{Beat, shrugs}就算不惹我，可能也会吧。

original: {Shakes head, disappointed in self}Should never have set that radio signal on repeat.
translation: {Shakes head, disappointed in self}真不该反复播放电台。

original: {Downnote, wrapping up}It's letting go.
translation: {Downnote, wrapping up}真正难的是放手。

original: You've heard of the Sierra Madre Casino.
translation: 你一定听说过马德雷山脉赌场。

original: {Sniffs, slightly confused, to himself}Something... wrong in the air.
translation: {Sniffs, slightly confused, to himself}这里的味道…不太对劲。

original: {Coughs, getting her voice back}The quick... the quick scribe... jumped over the lazy paladin.
translation: {Coughs, getting her voice back}敏捷…敏捷的学士…跳过了懒惰的圣骑士。

original: {Warming up her new voice, a little tender}Mi-mo-mih.
translation: {Warming up her new voice, a little tender}咪-哞-咪。

original: {Warming up her new voice, a little tender}This is Knight Christine Royce, of the Brotherhood... {emphasizes last two words}Christine Royce.
translation: {Warming up her new voice, a little tender}我是兄弟会的骑士克莉丝汀·罗伊斯... {emphasizes last two words}克莉丝汀·罗伊斯。

original: {Coughs, warming up her voice}Ugh... feels like a sore throat - after chewing on nails.
translation: {Coughs, warming up her voice}唔…嗓子好像发炎了，仿佛咬了指甲似的。

original: {Coughs, beats}Sounds like I smoked a mile of cigarettes.
translation: {Coughs, beats}我的声音听起来像个老烟鬼。

original: {Shakes head, feeling bleh}Feels like the Cloud crawled in my mouth and died.
translation: {Shakes head, feeling bleh}感觉吃了一嘴的毒气。

original: {Testing out how words sound}Chris-tine. Chris-tine. Hello. Hello. Hello.
translation: {Testing out how words sound}克莉斯-汀。克莉斯-汀。喂。喂。喂。

original: [Christine makes a sweeping motion of the room, does a deep inhalation, then gives a thumbs up.]
translation: [克莉丝汀环顾了房子四周，深吸了一口气，竖起了大拇指。]

original: [Christine sniffs the air, then gives a thumbs up.]
translation: [克莉丝汀对着空气嗅了嗅，竖起了大拇指。]

original: {Confined space}[Christine's breathing quickens, and her eyes dart around the walls.]
translation: {Confined space}[克莉丝汀呼吸变得急促，她的双眼在四周的墙壁上快速扫视着。]

original: {Confined space}[Christine seems to be sweating heavily, and her hand is twitching slightly. She looks ready to bolt.]
translation: {Confined space}[克莉丝汀看起来流了很多汗，她的手轻微地抽搐着，好像时刻准备要逃。]

original: [Christine nods at the ground, points at her eyes, then points at the ground again, as if in warning.]
translation: [克莉丝汀对了地面点了点头，指着她的双眼，然后又指向了地面，像是在警告什么。]

original: [Christine motions at ground, makes a snapping motion with her hand, then taps her eyes and pantomimes walking slowly, looking in front of her.]
translation: [克莉丝汀指向地面，用手打了个响指。然后她敲了敲自己的眼睛，比划着蹑手蹑脚的动作，直勾勾地瞪着前方。]

original: [Christine scans the area. She seems on edge, checking the arcades and arches for movement.]
translation: [克莉丝汀扫视了这个区域。她看起来很紧张，边走边检查四周的走廊和角落。]

original: [Christine makes a motion of loading a fake gun, then suiting up.]
translation: [克莉丝汀做了一个给枪上膛的动作，摆好了架势。]

original: {Slight frustration}Can't believe I came all this way to have my voice stolen.
translation: {Slight frustration}真不敢相信我走了这么远的路，居然把自己的声带给搞丢了。

original: {THEATER: Dean fight}So, what, you're going to risk blowing off your own head to kill me?
translation: {THEATER: Dean fight}你想干嘛？难道你不惜自己脑袋开花也要杀了我？

original: {Smug, confident}No, I'm not. {emph}I'll get out in time - you won't. {Already planning ahead, as if free and clear already}Once I kill you, exit stage left, and my collar will go quiet.
translation: {Smug, confident}不，我才不会死呢。{emph}我会逃出去，而你…等我杀了你，我就立刻从后台跑出去，这样我的项圈就不会爆炸了。

original: {THEATER: Dean fight}All the world's a stage. Soon your brains will be all over it.
translation: {THEATER: Dean fight}这个世界就是一个舞台，很快你的脑浆就会洒得满世界都是。

original: {THEATER: Player has rescued Dean}Don't have time for the song and dance, Dean.
translation: {THEATER: Player has rescued Dean}迪安，我们现在没时间手舞足蹈。

original: I know you didn't do it out of the goodness of your heart. So... instead of empty words and a flourish, let me give you something more useful.
translation: 我知道，你救我并不是因为大发善心，这样吧…我可以给你点实在的好处，如此一来咱俩也算互不相欠了。

original: {THEATER: Player has rescued Dean}Yeah, lucky us. Love getting shot at by Pre-War ghosts.
translation: {THEATER: Player has rescued Dean}是啊，我们够走运吧。老是被一帮战前的幽灵追着打。

original: Look, I'm more about the short goodbyes than long thankful speeches... {sincere}but I appreciate you bailing me out of a tight spot there - partner.
translation: 听着，虽然我这人不太擅长说客套话，但我还是要感谢你救我脱离了险境——搭档。

original: I know you didn't do it out of the goodness of your heart. So let me give you something a little more practical - a way we both come out ahead.
translation: 我知道，你救我并不是因为大发善心，这样吧…我可以给你点实在的好处，如此一来咱俩也算互不相欠了。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}Casino security hit you like it hit me when you reached the lobby?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}所以你一进大厅，保安就把你打翻了，和我一样？

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}Do you know what happened to the others?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}你知道其他人怎么样了吗？

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}If you think you can take me, come down and try it.
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}就凭你也想杀我？那就来试试啊。

original: No... no, no... I'm not leaving this spot. Why dirty my hands when the Sierra Madre can kill you for me?
translation: 不，不不……我才不会离开这里。何苦脏了自己的手呢？马德雷山脉赌场会替我干掉你的。

original: {Smug, a little eager}Time for a little show - I'll just grab a seat and watch how this plays out from backstage. Security can handle it from here.
translation: {Smug, a little eager}演出要开始了，我会去后台找个地方，坐着静静欣赏的。接下来就交给保安们了。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}Don't act stupid. Let's get out of here.
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}别干傻事，我们一起离开这儿。

original: {Slightly defensive, angry, echoing player's "stupid" accusation}Stupid? No, playing it smart. {Emph}You're the dumb one, waltzing in here without realizing who the headliner is.
translation: {Slightly defensive, angry, echoing player's "stupid" accusation}傻事？不，我可聪明了。傻的是你，稀里糊涂地闯进来，却不知道谁才是这里的腕儿。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}So, stabbing me in the back for the Sierra Madre?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}所以呢，你就为了马德雷山脉不惜对我痛下杀手？

original: {Incredulous}You think {emph}I'm the bad guy here? I'm not the one slapping bomb collars on innocent folks and flicking the switch.
translation: {Incredulous}你觉得我卑鄙？难道给无辜的人套上炸弹项圈，还在背后偷偷拨弄开关的人是我吗？

original: {Sing-song, then disdainful in second half}And I'm not stabbing you in the back. I was facing you all the time. This heist? I planned it lifetimes ago. You and that old man? Tourists.
translation: {Sing-song, then disdainful in second half}我才没有背叛你，我自始至终都和你坦诚相见。这场抢劫我已经策划了几辈子。而你和那个老头子，不过是两个过客。

original: Hurry, would you? Get me out of this mess. {Beat}Got to sue my agent for this.
translation: 快点，行么？ 等你救我出去，我非要把我的经纪人告上法庭不可。

original: Get me out of here, they've got me trapped!
translation: 救我出去，我被它们堵在里面了！

original: {To himself}Hold it together, Dean, you've been in worse jams. Like Madrid. {Reflecting}Christ - Madrid.
translation: {To himself}坚持住，迪安，大风大浪都过来了，还记得马德里那场演出吗？天啊，马德里那次真是。

original: {Taunt}How long you think you can keep dancing around out there? Song's going to end soon, you along with it.
translation: {Taunt}你觉得你还可以跳多久？歌曲快放完了，你也快完了。

original: {Taunt}You won't get out of here alive. Even if you reach me, you don't have the guts to fight.
translation: {Taunt}你别想活着出去，就算你找到我，你也不敢和我打。

original: I'm calling the tune here - this is my theater, my show, I've waited my life to get back here. You? Not even worth the time it'd take to kill you.
translation: 我才是这里的主角，这是我的剧院，我的演出，为了回来，我已经等了大半辈子。而你，甚至不值得我浪费时间动手。

original: I'm listening.
translation: 我听着呢。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你这是什么意思？

original: And if she is alive?
translation: 那么如果她还活着呢？

original: Then she can make some beautiful music. I'm not banking on it.
translation: 那她就能派上大用场，虽然我并不太抱希望。

original: So you're going to prove it now? How?
translation: 你现在要证明？怎么证明？

original: I didn't know at first. Then the old man showed up. You showed up. Then... that woman showed up, covered in scars.
translation: 一开始我也不明白。直到后来那个老头出现，你也出现，接着…那个浑身伤痕累累的女人也出现了。

original: The one who makes all the hand signs, a little tight around the corners of her mouth.
translation: 就是那个老爱打手语，嘴角有些紧绷的姑娘。

original: I put her in the Clinic, tuned her like an instrument. If she heals up, it's not going to be her voice speaking any more.
translation: 我把她扔进了诊所，然后像给乐器调弦一样，对她的声道做了手术。将来如果她伤口痊愈，她的声音也会彻底变成另一个人。

original: That is, if the Sierra Madre didn't get her. If it did... well, there's enough of Vera around for me to spend a few years piecing a book together.
translation: 当然前提她得活着。但……即便她死了，这附近有关薇拉的信息也够多了，大不了我再花个几年时间，也能拼凑出一段语音。

original: Forget Sinclair. If Vera was the key, she's dead.
translation: 忘了辛克莱吧。如果薇拉是钥匙的话，她已经死了。

original: {Mocking, he's echoing one of his songs}I only saw her yesterday. Well, a few yesterdays.
translation: {Mocking, he's echoing one of his songs}我昨天还看到她呢。好吧，几天前。

original: But what did he do to you?
translation: 可他究竟对你做了什么？

original: Do to me? {Frowns}What, weren't you listening? He thought he was {emph}better than me. Don't believe me? Look around.
translation: 对我做了什么？ {Frowns}你没在听我说话吗？他自认为比我优秀。不相信么？看看这周遭的一切吧。

original: This big casino, this big colossal monument - think it was for some woman? No, all ego, all self-righteous-in-lights, fit him perfect.
translation: 这座巨大的赌场，这座雄伟的纪念碑，你以为他是为了某个女人而建的？不，这是他得意忘形、不可一世的产物，和他简直是绝配。

original: Had to take him down a few pegs, bring him down to my level. "Begin again?" Some things you don't get up from... I was going to prove it.
translation: 我必须煞煞他的锐气，让他也体会一下我的处境。“从头再来“？有些事是无法从头来过的…我要证明给他看。

original: What was your problem with Sinclair?
translation: 你和辛克莱有什么瓜葛？

original: {Slight surprise, hasn't given a lot of thought to this in a long time}Problem? All high-and-mighty. Lording it over everyone. Acting so self-righteous, like nothing could touch him. He was the one with the problem.
translation: {Slight surprise, hasn't given a lot of thought to this in a long time}瓜葛？他整天摆着个破架子，在人前威风凛凛的。那副自以为是的模样，好像凡事在他眼中都不值一提。他这个人本身就有问题。

original: {Colder, losing himself}Never got mad at anything. Nothing seemed to shake him. Even after... his life kept getting dragged through the dirt.
translation: {Colder, losing himself}他从来不生气，仿佛任何事情都无法撼动他。即便…他的人生一次次地遭遇挫折和变故。

original: {Cold, staring into the distance}Always kept looking for the bright, shining future in everything. So... I decided to take everything from him.
translation: {Cold, staring into the distance}他永远是那么乐观，老把事情往好的方面想。所以…我才决定要夺走他的一切。

original: So what happened?
translation: 结果呢？

original: {Quiet, reflective}The Bomb. Vera got sealed in here. {Throwaway}A few hundred years go by, give-or-take. {Emph}Almost the end of the story - then you came along.
translation: {Quiet, reflective}核战爆发，薇拉被困在了里面，然后就这么过了大概几百年。{Emph}本以为故事要到此结束的时候，你出现了。

original: {Rallying}Now we finish the job. Rob the Sierra Madre, rip out its heart. Last chapter of Frederick Sinclair, close the book.
translation: {Rallying}现在是该给这事画上句号了。抢劫马德雷山脉，挖出它的心脏，这是弗雷德里克·辛克莱传奇的最后一章，让我们替他写下结局吧。

original: Go on.
translation: 继续说。

original: All she had to do was get inside the Sierra Madre for the Gala, then use her voice to open the door. {Smiles}After that... smooth sailing.
translation: 本来她只需要进入马德雷山脉赌场参加开业大秀，再用自己的声音打开避难所大门。在那之后…一切就能水到渠成。

original: {Gleeful, slight malicious}Would have been the biggest heist in history. Sinclair left holding the bag. Ruined.
translation: {Gleeful, slight malicious}这原本将是有史以来规模最大的抢劫案。留给辛克莱将是一个巨大的烂摊子。

original: Forget the history lesson, get to the point.
translation: 别上历史课了，说重点。

original: How so?
translation: 怎么做到的？

original: Sinclair was already puppy-eyed, so all I had to do was the introductions. {Disgusted}She smiled, fluttered her eyes, showed a little leg...
translation: 辛克莱早就对她一见倾心了，我只不过是充当了牵线人。仅仅凭借她的一丝微笑，一次眨眼，再加一点春光乍泄…

original: {A little colder, disgust chilling}...and he built this whole place for her. Made {emph}her the key to his vault, like a joke, cause of her name. {Draw this out}Her fake Hollywood name.
translation: {A little colder, disgust chilling}…他居然就不惜代价为她修建了这整个地方。甚至还将她的声音设置成了打开避难所的钥匙，简直和玩儿似的，就因为她的名字，那个用来混迹好莱坞的假名。

original: {Malicious, implying "been" = sex}Except Sinclair didn't know I'd been there first. I could twist her whatever direction I wanted.
translation: {Malicious, implying "been" = sex}只可惜辛克莱不知道我早已捷足先登，把她捏在掌心了。

original: {Likes PC}All right, I'll head out and see what I can do on my end.
translation: {Likes PC}好吧，我这头也努力想想办法，我先出去了。

original: Go knock yourself out. I'm just going to catch my breath a bit. That performance... well, more pressure than I was expecting.
translation: 你去吧。让我先喘口气。刚才的表演…呃，压力实在有点大。

original: So you don't know the phrase?
translation: 所以你不知道那句短语是什么？

original: {Thinking}No, that I still had to figure out - still do. Sinclair wrote stuff down, was obsessive about it. Just got to find where.
translation: {Thinking}不知道，也猜不出来。辛克莱把它记下来了，而且看得很紧。得找找它究竟藏在哪里。

original: Voice?
translation: 嗓音？

original: Yeah, the woman, the Starlet, Vera - her voice. {Grumbles to himself}Didn't realize there was so many holotapes of her still around, otherwise... eh, never mind.
translation: 对，那个女星，薇拉，用她的声音。{Grumbles to himself}我没想到这里居然有这么多她的全息磁带，否则…哎，算了。

original: Tell me. The short version.
translation: 给我讲讲吧。简短一些就好。

original: Elevator's up in the Executive Suites. Voice-activated. Speak the right phrase, in the right tone of voice, and it's open sesame.
translation: 行政套房的电梯是声控的。只要用正确的语气说出指定的短语，它的大门就会打开。

original: I was able to snag the voice, {beat downnote}or thought I had. {Normal tone}The right tone and phrasing... well, that may take some time.
translation: 嗓音这块，我很早就搞定了，就是出了些差池。{Normal tone}至于正确的语气和短语... 好吧，可能需要一点时间。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你说的什么意思？

original: {Confiding, superior}There's a private elevator, Sinclair's elevator. It's up in the Executive Suites, in Vera's room. {Beat, emph}Not a coincidence.
translation: {Confiding, superior}辛克莱有一台私人电梯。就装在行政套房，薇拉的房间里。{Beat, emph}这绝不是巧合。

original: Vera. {Reluctant, quiet}She was... my other partner, before the Bomb. {Quieter}Took some legwork. Some convincing, made it happen.
translation: 薇拉。{Reluctant, quiet}她是我……在核大战前的一位朋友。{Quieter}我打通了不少关节，费了许多口舌，才让辛克莱对她百依百顺。

original: [Christine stares at the headless corpses for a second. Then she makes a slow, angry scowl.]
translation: [克莉丝汀盯着无头尸体看了一会。然后她缓慢的、愤怒的皱起了眉头。]

original: {Pretending to find the scene distasteful}There's a picture, a bunch of headless saps all waiting for the pearly gates. Whoever did this... messed up.
translation: {Pretending to find the scene distasteful}我记得曾经有幅画，上面是一帮没脑袋的人正排着队等着进天堂。干这事的人……做得可真糙。

original: {Frustrated}First time on stage in a hundred years, and it has to be this?
translation: {Frustrated}这可是我时隔百年后首次登台亮相，结果就这样？

original: {Looking around}Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
translation: {Looking around}嗯。这个剧院几乎和以前一模一样。

original: Where the hell did everyone else go?
translation: 其他人去哪儿了？

original: Need some help here... and that audience is {emph}not looking friendly.
translation: 我需要帮助…那位观众不是很友善。

original: Hope my partner fared better than I did... better not have left me high and dry, get-even's not going to be pretty.
translation: 希望我的搭档处境比我好…最好别丢下我一个人跑了，不然我做鬼都不会放过这家伙。

original: {Looking around}Hnh. Theater's almost the same as it was.
translation: {Looking around}唔。这个剧院和过去相比几乎没什么变化。

original: {Looking around}This place... hasn't changed at all.
translation: {Looking around}这个地方……根本就没变嘛。

original: Wonder what happened to the suckers. {Frowns}Might have gotten taken away, like I did?
translation: 不知道那几个傻瓜怎么样了。说不定也和我一样，被抓走了。

original: That audience... better lay low, get a feel for the crowd.
translation: 那位观众…最好低调一点，考虑一下周围人的感受。

original: Good thing, someone walks in here, they're toast.
translation: 棒极了，有人进来了，他死定了。

original: I am out of here... well, not to the Villa, just out of the damn theater first chance I get.
translation: 我要离开这里…不是去别墅区，反正只要离开这个剧院就行。

original: Got to say this for Sinclair, he sure knew how to keep things locked down, the tight-assed prick.
translation: 不得不说，辛克莱这小子在看管宝贝方面真的很在行，不愧是个一毛不拔的铁公鸡。

original: {Under his breath, after battle in the theater}Not going to be performing here again, that's for sure.
translation: {Under his breath, after battle in the theater}我以后不会在这里表演了。

original: Why don't you come with me, whatever else you're here for, not my concern.
translation: 你为什么不和我一起走呢？不管你有什么问题，我都不关心。

original: You're looking for something else. Fine, I can help.
translation: 你在找别的东西。好吧，我可以帮忙。

original: [She studies you again, then her expression softens slightly. She shakes her head slowly, and gives a silent sigh.]
translation: [她又一次打量着你，表情似乎缓和了一些。她慢慢摇摇头，发出了无声的叹息。]

original: [She nods at you, then raises an eyebrow and nods at the door.]
translation: [她向你点点头，然后竖起眉毛，示意走出大门。]

original: What exactly is wrong? Don't you want out of here?
translation: 什么情况？你不想离开这里么？

original: Look, I'm not trying to order you. But your life is tied to mine.
translation: 听着，我不想命令你。可毕竟我们现在是一条绳子上的蚂蚱。

original: [She frowns, glances at the collar, looks back at you. She makes a circle with her hands, puts her hand over her eyes and squints.]
translation: [她皱了皱眉，看了一眼项圈，又转过头来看着你。她用双手画了一个圈，然后把手放在眼睛上面眯着眼看。]

original: [She nods at you, then lowers her hand from her eyes, shakes her head. She draws a slow line between you.]
translation: [她向你点点头，然后把手从眼睛上放下，摇了摇头。她缓慢地在你俩之间画了一条线。]

original: Get going. I'll meet you at the Fountain in the center of the Villa.
translation: 出发吧。我会在别墅区中心的喷泉那里等你。

original: {Christine goes to the fountain.}[Christine gives a brief nod, then turns and begins to walk.]
translation: {Christine goes to the fountain.}[克莉丝汀微点一下头，然后转身走开了。]

original: Fine. Would hate to have carved you up anymore than you are.
translation: 好吧。毕竟你都这么惨了，我也不忍心再给你多割几刀。

original: [Christine's defeated expression vanishes into a stone-faced glare.]
translation: [克莉丝汀受挫的表情消失了，变成了冰冷的怒视。]

original: Glad we understand each other. Let's go.
translation: 理解万岁。咱们走吧。

original: {Player has no companion. Christine comes along.}[Christine narrows her eyes slightly. She slowly nods, then steps slightly behind you.]
translation: {Player has no companion. Christine comes along.}[克莉丝汀微微眯起眼睛。她缓缓点头，小步在后面跟着你。]

original: {Player has a companion. Christine goes to the fountain for now.}[Christine glances at your follower, shakes her head, then points at you, her, and nods in the direction of the fountain.]
translation: {Player has a companion. Christine goes to the fountain for now.}[克莉丝汀瞥了一眼你的随从，摇了摇头，然后指着你和她自己，并向喷泉的方向点了点头。]

original: I let you out of the Auto-Doc. I can put you back in there just as fast.
translation: 是我把你从自动医生里解救出来的，我可以一样轻松的把你送回去。

original: [Her eyes widen, and her eyes gauge yours. She then touches her wounds, and her expression crumbles into anger, as if defeated. She slowly nods.]
translation: [她睁大双眼，死死盯着你的眼睛。接着她把手放在伤口上，表情变得十分愤怒，仿佛饱受挫折。她缓缓点头。]

original: ... a monument to wealth.
translation: …一座为财富而造的丰碑。

original: It was built before the War, a tower of gold and lights, where fortunes could be gained and lost...
translation: 它是战前建造的，闪耀着黄金与光芒的高塔，金钱在此犹如过眼云烟……

original: {beat}A bright, shining monument luring treasure hunters to their doom.
translation: {beat}一尊光彩夺目的石碑，引诱着寻宝者们走上绝路。

original: {Sneer continues}Foolishness about it lying in the middle of the City of the Dead, buried beneath a blood-red cloud.
translation: {Sneer continues}有些荒诞不经的故事，说它坐落在死亡之城的中心，笼罩在血红色的毒雾之下。

original: {Slight sneer, hates these rumor stories, when he knows the truth}We all have, the legend, the curses.
translation: {Slight sneer, hates these rumor stories, when he knows the truth}我们都听说过，无论它的传奇，抑或它的诅咒。

original: {Terminal blows up}What the blazes... piece of junk! {Beat, cold, gets it}You rigged that terminal, didn't you. Didn't want security showing you out, eh? We'll see.
translation: {Terminal blows up}什么…没用的垃圾！{Beat, cold, gets it}你对那台机器做了手脚！既然不肯让保安请你出去，那咱们走着瞧吧！

original: {Working on a computer, trying to shut it down}Hnh. Maybe I can shut down these ghosts using the Stage Manager's old termin... {blows up}dammit! {Beat, frowns}Well, so much for that idea.
translation: {Working on a computer, trying to shut it down}嗯。也许我可以用舞台经理的终端把这些鬼影关掉...{blows up}该死！ {Beat, frowns}好吧，这个想法只能作罢了。

original: {Relieved to see a familiar face}You... partner, are you a sight for sore eyes. Unfriendly crowd tonight, in a lethal way - if you could calm the house down, I'd be grateful.
translation: {Relieved to see a familiar face}是你啊…搭档，你来得真是时候。今晚来的观众都不怎么面善，甚至会要人命。如果你能让大家安静下来，我可就千恩万谢了。

original: {Gloating a bit}Hey... guess who finally showed. {Malicious}You weren't on the guest list. Guess I'll need to call security, have them show you the door.
translation: {Gloating a bit}嘿…瞧瞧是谁来的。我可没请你啊，看来我得让保安请你出去了。

original: {Slow, then challenging, bravado}So... you think you have what it takes to beat {emph}me, on {emph}my stage, in {emph}my town? Come on down, we'll see.
translation: {Slow, then challenging, bravado}难道……你真以为自己有本事打败我吗？在我的舞台上，我的小镇里？那就来走着瞧吧！

original: {Slightly unnerved, player's about to break his last line of defense}Don't do it. Leave that projector alone - I'm warning you.
translation: {Slightly unnerved, player's about to break his last line of defense}别那么做，别碰投影仪，我警告你！

original: {Cold}So... can't leave well enough alone, have to enter Vera's room. Some things are better left in the past, "partner."
translation: {Cold}你啊……就是不懂得少管闲事，非要进薇拉的房间。过去的事，有些还是忘掉的好，“搭档”。

original: {Slightly irritated, still superior}Now, now... that's {emph}my room. You want your own dressing room, you have to work for it.
translation: {Slightly irritated, still superior}给我站住…这可是我的房间。你想要个化妆间，你自己去想办法。

original: Oh, man... nice job. Good thing {emph}I was distracting them while you flicked them off. {Puffing up}We're a good team - I run the show while you run the box office.
translation: 哦…干得漂亮。调虎离山果然是个好方法。我们配合得不错，我上台演出，你负责看后场。

original: {Urgent}All right, now calm the audience down and let's go home. {Beat, under his breath}And when my part plays, no cracking jokes - that was the hairstyle back then, all right?
translation: {Urgent}好吧，让观众安静下来，然后我们回家。{Beat, under his breath}如果到时候我的影像出现在台上，你可别笑哦，我当年的发型就是那样的，好吗？

original: {Encouraged}Hey, you're making real progress, good. {Realizes the player's close to uncovering dirty laundry, so masks it behind "show some respect"}Uh, look that's... Vera's room, so careful what you touch in there, be respectful.
translation: {Encouraged}嘿，你获得了实质性的进展，很好。{Realizes the player's close to uncovering dirty laundry, so masks it behind "show some respect"}呃，这…这是薇拉的房间，别乱碰里面的东西，要保持尊重。

original: {Happy, excusing, then defensive}Hey, you found my old room. I mean, it's a little small... and hey, watch the hands in there, I remember where I left {emph}everything, got it?
translation: {Happy, excusing, then defensive}嘿，你找到了我以前的化妆间。你不觉得，这里有点小吗……嘿，别乱碰，我可不想这里的摆设被人动到，明白吗？

original: Fine. Meet at the Fountain?
translation: 很好。那在喷泉见咯？

original: I'm in. If that's all, let's head out.
translation: 我同意。这就是事情的原委了？那我们上路吧。

original: {Surprised}Hnh. The human pulled it off.
translation: {Surprised}嗯。那个人类成功了。

original: Just like last time. Come on, Dog, you know the drill.
translation: 和上次一样。来吧，狗，你知道该怎么做。

original: Gate won't be open for long.
translation: 大门不会开太久。

original: Need to stay out of sight... can't afford to be distracted now.
translation: 不能引起注意……这个时候分心后果是会很严重的。

original: What the Old World saw in these light shows is beyond me.
translation: 旧世界的人们为啥要举办这种灯光秀？我实在无法理解。

original: {Impressed}The human did it. {Evil}Good.
translation: {Impressed}那个人类做到了。{Evil}很好。

original: Not going down like last time - Dog, you're staying in the cage.
translation: 这次绝不能再像上次那样倒下了，狗，这次你必须待在笼子里。

original: Time to get to the gate, "friends" or no friends.
translation: 不管是敌是友，都该到大门那儿去了。

original: {To himself}Fires and speakers are going to bring the Ghost People out in full.
translation: {To himself}焰火和广播会把外边的鬼人全部引到这里的。

original: {Eager}Coming for you, human... you just wait.
translation: {Eager}我来找你了，人类……等着瞧吧。

original: Madre's mine.
translation: 马德雷是我的。

original: {To himself}When this festival fires, I'm the first one in the door.
translation: {To himself}等到焰火点燃时，我要第一个跑向大门。

original: Last time I ever deal with human trash...
translation: 这是我最后一次和垃圾人类打交道了……

original: After the Bomb, still slaves to technology, events, Pip-Boys, collars... hnnnr.
translation: 核爆以后，我们依旧被科技、娱乐、哔哔小子和项圈奴役着…哼。

original: I'll whip you for this, Dog. I'll crush your cage with you inside it for making me go through this.
translation: 狗，我要惩罚你。你让我受了这份罪，我要把你连同笼子一起碾碎。

original: All this - if I get inside the Sierra Madre, it's all worth it. All of it.
translation: 我受了这么多苦，只要能进入马德雷山脉赌场，那它们就是值得的。

original: As soon as those collars go off... we'll settle things, yes.
translation: 一旦那些项圈爆炸…事情就解决了，对。

original: {Urgent}Hurry, we're targets out here.
translation: {Urgent}快一点，我们要变成活靶子了。

original: Almost inside. Finally. {Beat, himself}Then I can get rid of the baggage.
translation: 终于能进去了。接下来，我就可以抛掉这份累赘了。

original: {To himself}Quiet, Dog, stay in the cage.
translation: {To himself}安静，狗，在笼子里待好。

original: {Disgust}Sick of these Old World deathtraps.
translation: {Disgust}受够了旧世界的这些陷阱。

original: {Low, eager}The Sierra Madre's almost mine.
translation: {Low, eager}马德雷山脉赌场眼看就是我的了。

original: {Snarling}They better not try and leave me here...
translation: {Snarling}他们最好不要把我丢在这里……

original: {Snff}No toxins in the air in here.
translation: {Snff}这里的空气没有毒。

original: Well, {emph}this place has seen better days.
translation: 好吧，{emph}这个地方确实有点残破。

original: If we need to fight, you should call Dog out... as much as I hate to admit it.
translation: 尽管我有些不乐意…但如果我们需要战斗的话，你最好还是把狗叫出来。

original: {Thinking}Might be able to use the gas valves around here to set traps of our own.
translation: {Thinking}也许可以利用这里的气阀来设计陷阱。

original: We'll need to move faster than this if we're going to outwit the Old Man.
translation: 如果我们想胜过那个老头，那我们的动作得再快一点。

original: {Smirks}Happy you followed the Sierra Madre broadcast? Curiosity and greed, same thing.
translation: {Smirks}跟着赌场的广播来这儿，你觉得开心吗？好奇心和贪念，你们都是一样的。

original: It's your own fault you're here. Couldn't leave well enough alone.
translation: 你落到这步田地，都是你自己一手造成的。你就是不懂得适可而止。

original: That Pip-Boy... maybe I'll tear it off your arm, wear it on my neck.
translation: 那个哔哔小子……可能我会把它从你的胳膊上扯下来，戴到我的脖子上。

original: Air tastes like copper. {Beat, smiles}Or Old World gold.
translation: 空气中有一股铜臭味。也许是旧世界的黄金。

original: Almost got away... then the idiot's hunger screws it up.
translation: 眼看就要逃走了…那个白痴却因为饥饿掉链子了。

original: Why do you keep looking at your Pip-Boy? It won't help. {Snorts}Didn't help the Old Man.
translation: 为什么你一直在看哔哔小子？ 那玩意没用。{Snorts}那个老头已经受过教训了。

original: Can't believe the idiot swallowed his collar.
translation: 真不敢相信这个白痴把项圈吞了下去。

original: Can't believe the idiot swallowed his collar.
translation: 真不敢相信这个白痴把项圈吞了下去。

original: What's taking that human so long.
translation: 那个人类到底去哪儿了。

original: {To himself}If that human wasn't wearing a collar...
translation: {To himself}如果那个人类没有带项圈...

original: Wonder what that human's insides would look like laid out over the fountain.
translation: 不知道喷泉上面那个人类的内部构造是什么样的。

original: {To himself}Might be able to rip the Pip-Boy off his arm without killing him. Hmm.
translation: {To himself}可以在不杀他的情况下把哔哔小子从他的胳膊上扯下来。唔。

original: Nooooooooooo!
translation: 不！

original: :: Howling, frightened. ::
translation: :: 嚎叫，害怕。 ::

original: Let me out, let me out!
translation: 放我出去，放我出去！

original: Noise hurts, noise {emph}hurts!
translation: 声音好吵，声音 {emph}好吵！

original: Streets are hurting my ears!
translation: 街上的声音吵得我耳朵疼！

original: Too bright, too bright.
translation: 太亮啦，太亮啦。

original: {Hypnotized by light show in sky}Lights and fire.
translation: {Hypnotized by light show in sky}灯火通明。

original: {Quiet}Pretty.
translation: {Quiet}太美了。

original: {Frowns}Lots of noise.
translation: {Frowns}太吵了。

original: {Curious}Where is Master? Did Master make fires in the sky?
translation: {Curious}主人在哪里？天上的烟花是主人放的么？

original: {At festival}:: Delighted clapping ::
translation: {At festival}:: 高兴地拍手 ::

original: :: Weeping. ::
:: Whimpering ::
:: Howling in frustration ::
translation: :: 沮丧地嚎叫 ::

original: Please let me out.
translation: 请放我出去。

original: Dog is sorry, sorry, sorry.
translation: 狗知道错了，对不起，对不起。

original: What did I do?
translation: 我做了什么？

original: Where are lights. Dog want to see the lights.
translation: 灯光在哪里？狗想看见灯光。

original: Can't wait to see the lights.
translation: 好想马上见到灯光。

original: :: Impatient Growl ::
translation: :: 不耐烦的嚎叫 ::

original: {Scared}Hurry up, Dog doesn't like being here.
translation: {Scared}快一点，狗不喜欢待在这里。

original: {Crude rhyme}Got to go... Casin-oooo.
translation: {Crude rhyme}应该去...赌场。

original: Didn't... we do this before? Can't remember.
translation: 我们以前……是不是这么干过？记不得了。

original: Want show and lights and yelling to start.
translation: 想看灯光表演，想对着它们大叫。

original: {1st Time, Switching Station, Slight concern}Really dark down here. {Beat}Smell like oil and 'tronics.
translation: {1st Time, Switching Station, Slight concern}这里真的很黑，{Beat}闻起来一股石油和电线的味道。

original: {1st Time, Clinic}Dog not like this place. Air smells like burnt sparks and blood.
translation: {1st Time, Clinic}狗不喜欢这个地方。闻起来有一股燃烧的火苗和血液的味道。

original: {1st Time, Cafe}{In cafe, stumbling over pronunciation}Cafe. Food place. Maybe something in kitchen?
translation: {1st Time, Cafe}{In cafe, stumbling over pronunciation}咖啡馆。吃饭的地方。厨房里可能会有东西？

original: {Cafe}Like it here.
translation: {Cafe}喜欢这里。

original: {Salida/Puesta Only}When Dog catch a Ghost in plastic, Dog tear him apart so they don't get back up.
translation: {Salida/Puesta Only}狗一抓住穿防护服的鬼， 就会把它们撕碎，让它们再也起不来。

original: {Salida/Puesta only, Snffs}Smells like... flesh in plastic... lots of food around here. We should catch some.
translation: {Salida/Puesta only, Snffs}闻起来像…防护服里的肉…这里有许多食物。我们应该带一些走。

original: {Salida/Puesta only}{Worried}Lots of marks on walls from other dead people. They not get far.
translation: {Salida/Puesta only}{Worried}墙上有许多其它死掉的人留下的标记。他们没能走多远。

original: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}Hope the voice doesn't come back. Mean. Bad.
translation: {Hushed, whispering, looks around}希望那声音不要再回来了。太凶了，太糟了。

original: {Rocks on legs}Where is Master? Did he go away? {Apologetic}Dog will be good this time.
translation: {Rocks on legs}主人去哪里了？他走了么？狗下次一定会听话的。

original: {Slight disgust}Swallowed something bad. Taste like burnt wires.
translation: {Slight disgust}吞了不好的东西。味道像烧坏的电线。

original: {Himself, sad}Always yell at Dog. Yell at Dog because gets hungry, can't stop it... always need more.
translation: {Himself, sad}总是骂狗。因为狗总是饿，控制不住…吃得太多。

original: {Himself, a little scared}Insides growling.
translation: {Himself, a little scared}肚子叫了。

original: {Himself}So hungry.
translation: {Himself}好饿啊。

original: Don't like this place. Want to go back, back to the Base. {Beat, quiet}Or the Church, miss the Church.
translation: 不喜欢这个地方。我想回去，回基地。 {Beat, quiet}或者教堂，我想念教堂。

original: {Relaxing}Air in here not burn chest.
translation: {Relaxing}这里的空气没有那么热了。

original: :: Mournful whining to self ::
translation: :: 暗自悲泣 ::

original: :: Stomach rumbling.::
translation: :: 肠胃翻滚。::

original: Holy Mary, Mother, and Joe - now {emph}there's a show.
translation: 我的老天爷啊，多么壮观的表演。

original: {himself}Not much time to get to the gates before they shut the door and turn folks away.
translation: {himself}大门不会开启太长时间的，他们会很快就会关门送客了。

original: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}All right, now - I'm out of here.
translation: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}好吧，我得撤了。

original: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}If the Ghost People didn't know we were here before, they know now.
translation: {Urgent, worried he's going to get attacked by zombies}这下鬼人可就都知道我们的位置了。

original: Someone struck up the band. {To himself, grumbling}A band of tortured cats.
translation: 演出开始了。 {To himself, grumbling}简直就像是虐猫演出。

original: What kind of casino has two Grand Openings?
translation: 什么样的赌场会举办两次开业庆典？

original: {Cold, to himself}This is your last hurrah, Sinclair, I promise you.
translation: {Cold, to himself}这是你最后一次出风头了，辛克莱，我向你保证。

original: Just my luck.
translation: 我可真走运。

original: Luck's finally shining down on me.
translation: 幸运最终降临到了我的头上。

original: You wait, beautiful. Keep that gate open for me, Dean'll be there soon.
translation: 等着，美人儿。替我留门，迪安马上就来。

original: Sierra Madre, sweetheart, Dean's coming home.
translation: 马德雷宝贝儿，我回家了。

original: Sinclair, you better appreciate all I do to screw you over.
translation: 辛克莱，你真该感谢我为了扳倒你所做的一切。

original: That tourist is better than most. Eh... probably won't matter.
translation: 那个游客比大多数人都强，也可能也没啥大不了的。

original: The linked collars is a new trick. Can't say I like it much.
translation: 把项圈连在一起倒是个新花样。但我不喜欢。

original: Waiting for the fireworks. {Beat}Just like last time.
translation: 等着看烟花吧，{Beat}就像上次一样。

original: Can't wait to see their faces when they find out what the lock is. Just gotta wait 'em out.
translation: 等他们发现门锁的情况时，不知道会是什么表情。等着看好了。

original: Place is going to be swarming with the masks when the sky lights up.
translation: 等到天亮的时候，这里的鬼人就会满大街都是了。

original: {Angry}We'll see who's holding the cards in the end...
translation: {Angry}看看究竟是谁能笑到最后吧……

original: {Mutters}Didn't come all this way to get conned by some tourist.
translation: {Mutters}好不容易走到这一步，绝不能栽在区区一个游客手里。

original: The joke's on you, "partners." You aren't getting to the prize without me.
translation: 你们这是自作聪明，"伙计们"。没有我，你们拿不到大奖的。

original: {Sighs}This is a fine how do you do.
translation: {Sighs}这可真是教人心寒哪。

original: {Grumbles}Should have blown up that seat cushion right when they sat down, would've been a better end than this.
translation: {Grumbles}真该在那家伙刚坐下的时候就引爆座垫，也就不会落到这步田地了。

original: {To himself}Just finish the last job, Dean. It's all you've wanted, just hang in there.
translation: {To himself}把活干完，迪安。你想要的就在眼前，再坚持一会儿。

original: {Himself}Keep your head down, Dean, don't let the locals see you.
translation: {Himself}保持低调，迪安，不要让当地人看到你。

original: {Mutters}Town's going to be filled with Ghosts when the sky lights up.
translation: {Mutters}等到天亮的时候，整个镇子都会布满鬼人。

original: This thing on my neck isn't for show. That bomb goes off, so do I - and you, too.
translation: 我脖子上的东西可不是拿来好看的。如果我的炸弹爆炸了，你的也会炸。

original: Leaving me in that goddamn elevator in the dark? You'll beg me to do the same to you while the Holograms are tracing lasers across your face.
translation: 你居然把我丢在黑漆漆的电梯里？等那些全息影像发出的激光照到你的脸上，你想求我把你塞进电梯里都来不及了。

original: So come on and get me, jackass. I'll have this floor's security dissect you like an Auto-Doc.
translation: 来杀我啊，笨蛋。我要让这层的安全系统像自动医生一样把你大卸八块。

original: So come on and get me, bitch. I'll have this floor's security dissect you like an Auto-Doc.
translation: 来杀我啊，婊子。我要让这层的安全系统像自动医生一样把你大卸八块。

original: {Thinking, determined}Should be able to rewire them, failing that, shoot them, {beat, backpedals, slight frustration}although that'll alert the others, they're on a linked patrol pattern.
translation: {Thinking, determined}应该可以篡改它们的程序，如果不行，用枪也可以，{beat, backpedals, slight frustration}不过这可能会惊动其它影像，因为它们的巡逻路线是互联的。

original: {More military professional}All doors are locked down, security's activated - and emitter signals are lighting up all over this floor. {Beat, comes to a decision}I'll do what I can from here.
translation: {More military professional}所有的门都锁上了，安全系统已经启动，这一层所有的投影仪都被打开了。我会尽量想想办法。

original: {Confused}Why pipe not break. {Puts back into}Pipe. Break. {Frowns, relaxes}Hnh. Leave it, not important.
translation: {Confused}为什么管子没有裂。{Puts back into}管子，裂啊。{Frowns, relaxes}唔，算了，也没那么重要。

original: {Not really happy to hear this, it's like someone left his door unlocked in a dangerous neighborhood}Oh, looks like you already forced the gate. {Beat, under his breath}Now, everybody and their mother can walk right in, thanks.
translation: {Not really happy to hear this, it's like someone left his door unlocked in a dangerous neighborhood}哦，看来你已经把门撬开了啊。 {Beat, under his breath}多亏了你，现在任何阿猫阿狗都可以闯进来了。

original: Don't have to take the long way back - there's a shortcut across the way, you see.
translation: 不用走那么大老远的路回去，其实有一条捷径的。

original: It's through the Cloud - but if I'm with you, I can help you through it. {To himself, the player better not have}If you didn't already force the lock to the gate, that is.
translation: 虽然需要穿过毒云，但只要有我在，我可以帮你过去。{To himself, the player better not have}不过前提是，你没有把大门的锁撬开。

original: <Lie> Dean, I wouldn't leave you here, I swear.
translation: <撒谎> 迪安，我不会把你丢在这里，我发誓。

original: {Disdainful}Sure, nice words, nice promises... not worth a dime out here in the shadow of the Sierra Madre.
translation: {Disdainful}是啊，各种花言巧语…在马德雷山脉赌场面前一毛钱都不值。

original: You say you wouldn't leave me here, I know better. {Low threat}And you leave me here, this Gala Event isn't going to happen, I can feel it.
translation: 你说不会把我丢在这里，但我心里可门清着呢。{Low threat}你要是不把我丢在这里，这盛世庆典就无法举行。

original: I'm not going to let any harm come to you, all right?
translation: 我不会让你受伤的，好么？

original: {Reluctant}No... you're not the type, but accidents happen, good intentions or no.
translation: {Reluctant}是...你确实不会，可就算你是真心的，谁知道会不会出意外呢？

original: Really? That wasn't the "we're both bomb-married" talk you gave me when we first met.
translation: 真的吗？咱们刚见面时，你还说咱俩是“一条绳上的蚂蚱”呢，这会儿就变口风了？

original: Look, you could offer me a steel clad contract for a world tour of all major cities with Imperial Records, I still wouldn't stay here.
translation: 听着，就算你有本事拉来帝王唱片公司给我一份天价合同，让我到全世界各大城市巡演，我也坚决不留在这里。

original: Less painful would be me throwing you off the roof. Understand?
translation: 你要痛快点，最简单就是我把你从房顶扔下去。明白么？

original: {Slightly insistent.}Pipe {emph}stay broken.
translation: {Slightly insistent.}管子。{emph}继续裂啊。

original: {Slightly angry}Pipe needs to behave, or Dog will hurt pipe.
translation: {Slightly angry}管子要乖乖听话，不然狗就教训管子。

original: {Like patting a small child}All better. {Slightly lower}Pipe be good now, keep hissing.
translation: {Like patting a small child}好啦。{Slightly lower}管子乖，嘶嘶响就对了。

original: You sound like the woman in the Sierra Madre broadcast.
translation: 你的声音听起来很像马德雷广播站里的那个女的。

original: {Confused}Do I? {Shakes head}It sounds off to my ears... hard to tell. Not to mention it... hurts like hell to swallow.
translation: {Confused}是么? {Shakes head}可我倒是听着有点怪…不过也分辨不出来。更别说我的喉咙……疼得厉害。

original: Might be why I got moved off to this suite... it's hers. {Quiet}That's her over there, got trapped by security like I did. Just took a different way out.
translation: 也许这就是我会被抬到这个套房里来的原因…这是她本来的住所。她人还在那里，也和我一样，被安保系统困住，但最后她选择了自我了断。

original: I wasn't the one hiding all this time.
translation: 老躲着的人又不是我。

original: You sure needed it to escape.
translation: 原来你要靠它才能逃出生天啊。

original: Proud that you have one? {Beat}I can hear the superiority.
translation: 所以你很得意自己手里有一台吗？我都能听出你话里的优越感了。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你什么意思？

original: That thing on your wrist - it's a convenience. It tells you where to go, what to do, dulls your brain.
translation: 你手上戴的那东西，实在是过于方便了。它告诉你该去哪里，该干什么，你的大脑因此而变得迟钝。

original: It may have helped you find the Sierra Madre broadcast, but it's just as much a crutch today as it was in the Old World.
translation: 虽然它帮你接收到了马德雷山脉赌场发出的信号，但这东西现在的作用和它在旧世界时差不多，只是一种工具。

original: How did you access my Pip-Boy?
translation: 你怎么连上我的哔哔小子的？

original: {Snorts, contemptuous}You speak as if your fingers have never touched the keys of a RobCo terminal. No machine is foolproof, they are designed to obey us.
translation: {Snorts, contemptuous}别跟我说你从来没有碰过罗科公司生产的终端。只要是机器，就能被破解，因为它们被制造出来的目的就是为我们服务。

original: {Superior, lording it over the player}The Pip-Boy's operating system has vulnerabilities... {emph}advantages to those who've studied its construction, even superficially.
translation: {Superior, lording it over the player}哔哔小子的操作系统存在许多漏洞……{emph}凡是研究过其架构的人，哪怕只是略知皮毛，都可以利用这些漏洞。

original: {Contempt}It's just a machine, though. Its real vulnerability is who wears it. And that's how {emph}you were caught.
translation: {Contempt}不过，机器到头来只是机器罢了。真正的漏洞其实是它的主人。这就是你被抓到这儿来的原因。

original: Still hiding behind images and screens, I see.
translation: 怎么你还躲在这张大脸盘子后边呢。

original: {Short, brutal}Hiding? Hardly. Trapped.
translation: {Short, brutal}躲？不。确切说是被困住了。

original: {Superior, dismissive}You think you were the first one to unlock the casino door? No, I did it... with other hands, other bodies. {To himself}After that, the casino wouldn't let go.
translation: {Superior, dismissive}难道你以为你是第一个打开赌场大门的人吗？不，是我……还有其他人。{To himself}然而赌场却不肯放我们走。

original: {Thinking, a little haunted}Once I was locked in, no way out... {smiles at his own cleverness}until your Pip-Boy signal came to life in the Villa. Then... then, uh, things changed. And here you are.
translation: {Thinking, a little haunted}我被锁在里面，没法出去……{smiles at his own cleverness}直到你的哔哔小子发出的信号传到了别墅区。然后…然后，呃，事情才有了转机。所以你才会出现在这里。

original: You've got a lot to answer for.
translation: 这里的很多事情都是你造成的。

original: {Scoffs}Do I? For what? {emph}Your greed? Curiosity? {Snorts}You came here on your own, no one held a gun to your head.
translation: {Scoffs}是么？我造成了什么？{emph}你的贪婪？你的好奇心？{Snorts}是你自己要来这儿的，可没人用枪逼着你来。

original: {Sneering}I've seen your Pip-Boy archives, your map markers and notes - you picked up the Sierra Madre signal just as I did, you couldn't resist.
translation: {Sneering}我已经看过了你哔哔小子里的记录，还有你在地图上做的标记，和所有的笔记。你和我一样，收到了马德雷山脉的信号，就无法抗拒诱惑。

original: {Vicious, judgmental}So if you feel {emph}I have a lot to answer for... no, the blame isn't on {emph}my shoulders. {To himself}Might as well have put the collar on yourself.
translation: {Vicious, judgmental}所以如果你把我当成罪魁祸首……不，责任不在 {emph}我。{To himself}倒不如说是你自己把项圈套在脖子上的。

original: There's a chance he'll see reason.
translation: 也许可以和他讲讲道理。

original: {Disgusted}Try and reason with him, see what happens. He's so lost in his technology, I don't think he even understands why anymore.
translation: {Disgusted}那你就去和他聊大道理呗，看他会有什么反应。他过度沉迷于各种科技，我甚至怀疑他自己都搞不清楚为什么。

original: Sympathized? Why?
translation: 同情你？为啥？

original: He said he understood what it meant to track someone who had such a... impact on his past life.
translation: 他说他能理解我，追杀一个对自己的人生有着如此巨大……影响的人，会是怎样一种感受。

original: He said people were like couriers, sometimes never understanding the messages they brought. {Frowns}That's who he was hunting for... some courier.
translation: 他说其实人人都像邮差，有时自己身上带着某种信息，却对此一无所知。 {Frowns}而他也在追踪…一个邮差。

original: He knew Elijah? How?
translation: 他怎么会认识以利亚？

original: No idea. A courier. Wore an Old World flag on his back. He was the one who pulled me out there, told me where Elijah had gone.
translation: 不清楚。那人是个邮差。背上贴着旧世界的旗帜。就是他把我从大空山里救出来的，他还告诉了我以利亚的下落。

original: {Reflective}Helped me heal up, listened to my story. He... sympathized.
translation: {Reflective}他甚至帮我疗伤，听我说了自己的身世。他是个非常有同情心的人。

original: He said he knew you.
translation: 他说他认识你。

original: He saw me, before the scars, at a place far from here. It's where he found some of the technology he uses now.
translation: 他确实见到过我，那时我还不是这副伤痕累累的模样。他现在使用的一些科技正是从那里找来的。

original: {Remembering a bad experience, somber}It's a place called the Big Empty. The name's deceptive - if you know where to look.
translation: {Remembering a bad experience, somber}那地方叫大空山。对于不了解其缘由的人来说，这个名字颇有迷惑性。

original: {Still reflecting}Almost got trapped there. There was someone else, though, who came along. Knew about Elijah.
translation: {Still reflecting}我差点被困在那儿。不过后来又出现了另外一个人，他也认识以利亚。

original: "Settle it?" You're here to kill him.
translation: "干掉？"你是来杀他的？

original: {Cold}Those are my orders. I've seen what he's done, and I believe in those orders.
translation: {Cold}我接到的命令就是这个。我见识过他的所作所为，我相信这道命令是对的。

original: Sounds personal.
translation: 听起来你和他有个人恩怨。

original: He... cut me off from someone I cared about a long time ago. He used his status to break us apart. So I had to find a new purpose, same banner.
translation: 他…很久以前，让我和心上人强行断绝了关系。甚至不惜动用权势来逼我们分手。所以我只能申请调去了兄弟会的其他部门。

original: Then he became unstable, left a trail of crimes across the wasteland. Once word reached us, I was ordered to kill him.
translation: 后来他的神智越来越不稳定，在废土上犯下了一连串的罪行。我们得知这些情况后，上级就命令我杀了他。

original: How long have you been hunting him?
translation: 你追捕他多久了？

original: Too long. Thought I might have had a chance to settle it before this event happened, but then the chance slipped away again.
translation: 很久了。我本来想在这件事发生前就将他干掉，可后来我又一次错失了良机。

original: The elevator to the vault is here, too.
translation: 通往避难所的电梯也在这里。

original: {Recognition, matter-of-fact}The elevator to the casino vault is here. In the starlet's room? That seems intimate.
translation: {Recognition, matter-of-fact}通往赌场避难所的电梯就在这里？在这女明星的房间里？他们的关系还真是紧密啊。

original: Now that your voice is back, what did you want to say?
translation: 既然你把声音找回来了，你现在想说什么？

original: Your voice... is that the Starlet's voice?
translation: 你的声音…是那个女明星的声音么？

original: {Cold}Guess the Sierra Madre healed me. {Dismissive}It doesn't matter, and to be honest, I miss {emph}my voice.
translation: {Cold}可能是马德雷山脉赌场治愈了我。无所谓，说实话，我很想念自己的声音。

original: I've had enough of you and Elijah running the show. {Beat}Now it's my turn.
translation: 我已经受够了被你和以利亚来回使唤。现在该我教训你们了。

original: {Confused}People missing heads... make mistake coming here. {slightly eager}Make Dog hungry.
translation: {Confused}好多没有头的人…他们不该来这里的。{slightly eager}狗觉得饿了。

original: {Curious, malicious}It looks like someone was experimenting... {more interested}although they were doing so {emph}after the collars went off.
translation: {Curious, malicious}似乎有人曾经在这个地方做实验……{more interested}是为了测试项圈爆炸后的情况。

original: {Little nervous}We're not heading to the police station, are we? Ghost People hunt there.
translation: 我们不是要去警察局吧？那儿有不少鬼人啊。

original: {A little quiet, dismissive}Hnnh. City smells bad in some places, so bad it makes people fall down.
translation: 嗯。这城里有些地方味道不太好闻，会把人熏倒。

original: {Warning}Careful, the Villa's filled with pockets from the Cloud. Lethal.
translation: 小心，别墅区里到处是聚集的毒雾，会致命的。

original: [Christine sniffs the air, then touches her neck and frowns. She gestures at the air and taps her wrist.]
translation: [克莉丝汀嗅了嗅，然后摸了一下自己的脖子，皱起眉头。她指着空气，敲了敲自己的手腕。]

original: [Christine's eyes narrow. She raises an index finger, as if listening, then points ahead grimly and pulls back an imaginary trigger.]
translation: [克莉丝汀眯起眼睛。她竖起食指，好像在聆听。之后，她冷冰冰指着前面，做出了扣扳机的动作。]

original: [Christine looks at the machine and frowns. She points at the narrow slot on the side and raises an eyebrow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看着这个机器，皱起了眉头。她指着那个狭小的插槽，扬起了眉毛。]

original: [Christine studies the area, then the Police Station. She pretends to unload a weapon and holds up the imaginary cartridge, waving it.]
translation: [克莉丝汀仔细打量着这个区域，又看了看警察局。她假装卸下一支武器的弹药，又举起弹夹挥舞着。]

original: {Looking around}Sinclair's little surgery carts. {To himself}Kept them around for his lady friend.
translation: 辛克莱的专用手术台，他还为他的小女朋友也特意订购了一台。

original: {A little quiet}The police station... Ghost People love this place, no idea why. Might be the Holograms nearby.
translation: 警察局…鬼人很喜欢这儿，不知道为什么。可能因为附近有全息影像吧。

original: {Nods}Those machines... Sinclair's little gifts, {to himself}lasted longer than he did. {Normal tone}If you need food, stims... {slightly condescending}put in a chip, hold out your hand.
translation: 那些机器...是辛克莱的小礼物，倒是比他活得久。如果你需要食物，治疗针…只要塞几个筹码进去，然后伸手就行了。

original: {Blinks at a vending machine}Pretty circle on machine, {emph}all glowing.
translation: 这个机器上的圈圈好漂亮，都在发光。

original: {Dismissive, grumbling}Those machines feed on Sierra Madre Chips. {Beat, quieter, throw line away}There's codes that unlock other things, too.
translation: 这些机器会吃马德雷山脉赌场的筹码，如果有代码，还可以解锁其他东西。

original: {Hesitates, big moment}"Begin again - {slightly quieter}but know when to let go."
translation: "从头再来，但明白什么时候该放手。"

original: I dealt with the other two in our team, now I need you to open something.
translation: 我已经把队里的另外两个人干掉了，现在我需要你来打开某样东西。

original: What? {Frowns}Open something... {beat}my voice. That's why it's hers... someone wanted to use me as a key.
translation: 什么？ {Frowns}打开东西... {beat}我的声音。所以我才会有她的声音…有人想利用我来当钥匙。

original: All right, I can do that... hope you're ready.
translation: 好吧，我可以帮你…希望你准备好了。

original: What would you use them for?
translation: 你要用它们来干什么？

original: I can't argue that.
translation: 这倒是没错。

original: Sources of food, supplies... medical assistance, ammo... make more collars, even print currency. {To himself}Make a nation.
translation: 稳定的食物来源，生活用品…医疗救助，武器弹药……项圈，甚至还可以印发货币。{To himself}足以建设一个国家了。

original: The Cloud allows me to wipe the slate clean. Collars ensure cooperation. Holograms - defense. The Vending Machines provide... everything else.
translation: 毒云可以让我轻松扫平一整片地区。项圈用于巩固权威，全息影像作为防卫部队，而售货机则提供……其它一切物资。

original: The Sierra Madre can kill nations and build them, using its technology with the right applications.
translation: 只要正确地运用马德雷山脉赌场的技术，任何国家都可以轻易地被摧毁和重建。

original: If you secure that, that's all you want?
translation: 你得到它以后呢？就满足了吗？

original: No, there is one last thing I want from the Sierra Madre. Its bounty. The machines that fill its streets, its corridors.
translation: 不，马德雷山脉赌场还有一样东西我也想得到——它的物产。那些遍布大街小巷的售货机。

original: They provide, provide almost anything. Perhaps in the Pre-War era, they were commonplace, things to dismiss.
translation: 它们几乎能提供一切物资。或许在战前的年代，它们平平无奇，已经面临淘汰 。

original: Now, they are far more valuable. You know it. {Derisive}They helped keep you alive.
translation: 但如今，它们却拥有巨大的价值。你也看到了。它们可以为我们的生活提供保障。

original: Working as murderous deathtraps, sure.
translation: 确实，作为杀人陷阱确实很管用。

original: Properly? Are you kidding me?
translation: 正常？你开什么玩笑？

original: The Holograms here kill trespassers. That's what I want. Dump one of those emitters in the middle of {emph}any battle, there's no defense.
translation: 全息影像可以杀死入侵者，这就是我想要的。将来无论遇到怎样的战争，只要丢下一台全息影像发生器，再强大的防御手段都将失去作用。

original: {Starts rambling a bit, to himself}It's like holding light in your hands. Can't fight it... only watch it burn. {Frowns}Just one is a portable army. Arm it - anyone stands against you, dies.
translation: {Starts rambling a bit, to himself}这就仿佛你将一束火光握在手心。敌人将对此束手无策…只能眼睁睁地看着它燃烧。{Frowns}仅仅一台机器就抵得上一支军队，有了它，任何人都无法再反抗你的意志。

original: I don't understand how an Old World casino helps you do any of that.
translation: 我还是不明白，一座旧世界的赌场怎么能帮你办到这些呢？

original: The Cloud is unique in my travels. Its proximity to the Sierra Madre isn't a coincidence.
translation: 我从未见识过毒云这样独特的物质。它之所以会萦绕在赌场上空，绝不是巧合。

original: Right now it protects this casino, preserves it. {Beat}It can be used to preserve other Old World relics - and cleanse them, at the same time.
translation: 它保护了赌场，使它能够维持本来的样貌。所以{Beat}，它也可以用来保存其他旧世界的遗产——同时净化附着在它们身上的污秽。

original: And as much as I've researched hologram technology, the Big Empty facility was clear - only the Sierra Madre got Holograms working... properly.
translation: 虽然我花了很多精力研究全息技术，但大空山的设施里却没有类似的东西——只有马德雷山脉赌场的全息影像…还在正常运作。

original: What do you want from the Sierra Madre?
translation: 你到底想从马德雷山脉赌场这里得到什么？

original: {Cold, echoing the player}What do I want. Weapons. Security. A citadel of my own.
translation: {Cold, echoing the player}我想得到什么？武器，安全。一座属于我自己的堡垒。

original: The Madre's {emph}all these things. It's a fortress and a weapon. {Derisive}A chance... to... "begin again."
translation: 马德雷{emph}拥有以上这一切。它既是一座要塞，也是一件武器。{Derisive}它给了我一个机会…一个… "从头再来"的机会。

original: Once I unlock its archives, I can carve the Mojave into any shape I choose.
translation: 一旦我揭开了它的秘密，我就可以随心所欲地改造莫哈维了。

original: I've never heard of the place you're talking about.
translation: 你说的那个地方，我从来没听说过。

original: {Frowns, still thinking about an unpleasant memory}Big Empty's a treasure box, a scientific graveyard of Old World misery. Like the Sierra Madre... there's treasures there, sleeping. {Under his breath, slightly fearful}Some, awake.
translation: {Frowns, still thinking about an unpleasant memory}大空山是个宝库，埋藏了许多给旧世界带来苦难的科技。和马德雷山脉赌场一样，无数宝物长眠于此…不过其中有些依然醒着。

original: The Holorifle, the Saturnite alloy... the hologram technology, hibernation chambers, Securitrons, the collars...
translation: 全息步枪，土星矿石合金……全息影像技术，冬眠舱，电子保安，项圈……

original: ...even the suits attached to those things stalking the Villa... that's only the surface of what's there. {Beat, re-focuses}Right now, the Sierra Madre is what I want.
translation: ……甚至包括别墅区里游荡的鬼人身上的防护服……这些都还是冰山一角。{Beat, re-focuses}但现在，我唯一想得到的只有这座马德雷山脉赌场。

original: If they're Pre-War tech, where did you get them?
translation: 如果是战前的技术，那你又是从哪儿得到的？

original: {Thinking back}A place far from here, called the Big Empty. {Beat, to himself}Almost didn't make it out.
translation: {Thinking back}从离这儿很远的一个地方，叫大空山。{Beat, to himself}我差点儿死在里面。

original: Were two others there... a woman. And a man, a courier. {Frowns}The woman was familiar... the other... I don't know what happened to him.
translation: 当时那里还有另外两个人…一男一女，男的是个邮差{Frowns}，女的我很熟悉…而那个男的…我不知道他到底经历了什么。

original: Where did you get the collars?
translation: 你是从哪儿得到这些项圈的？

original: The collars. {Frowns, snorts, sarcasm in middle}They're Pre-War tech, I suspect this great land had... compliance issues before the war.
translation: 项圈吗？{Frowns, snorts, sarcasm in middle}它们是战前的科技产物，我怀疑这个地方在战前曾经出现过一些……管理方面的问题。

original: {Frowns, more matter-of-fact}It's one of a series of models. The one on your neck? Special, easier to make adjustments. {gets disgusted}Unreliable in other ways, notably radio interference.
translation: {Frowns, more matter-of-fact}它有很多种型号，你脖子上的那个是特制的，便于调整。{gets disgusted}但相应的，它的质量并不好，尤其容易受到无线电的干扰。

original: This is the past you're walking through. Few have ever seen it. No one else ever will.
translation: 你目之所及的都是这里的历史。能亲眼目睹它的人屈指可数，今后也不会再有这种机会了。

original: {Under his breath}I worked hard to get here, it'll give me what I need before I leave. And it'll always welcome me back.
translation: {Under his breath}我费劲千辛万苦才来到这里，在离开前，我要从它那里得到我想要的一切，我也要让它今后永远欢迎我的归来。

original: {Slow, angry}Now... look for a way to wake this ghost up, remind it it's got guests.
translation: {Slow, angry}现在…该去唤醒这个沉睡的幽灵了，告诉它，有贵客登门了。

original: {Imperious, slight urgency, then pleased.}You inside. Can you hear me? {As if studying monitors}Power's fluctuating... emergency power. {Confirmed}Oh! You {emph}are in.
translation: {Imperious, slight urgency, then pleased.}你进来了。能听到我说话吗？{As if studying monitors}电力不太稳定……现在用的是应急电源。{Confirmed}哦！收到你的信号了。

original: {Slight contempt, dismissive}Good... thought that might be the end of you. {Beat}Unfortunately, your... "friends" also found their way here. Knocked unconscious... just like you.
translation: {Slight contempt, dismissive}很好……我还以为你完蛋了。{Beat}可惜，你的那些…"朋友"们也进来了，不过他们和你一样…都被打晕了。

original: {Slight contempt, dismissive}Wondering what happened? You were hit by casino security. Detects anything foreign - radioactive, it subdues the "visitor," moves them if needed.
translation: {Slight contempt, dismissive}想知道发生了什么吗？你被赌场的安保设施袭击了。一旦它在"访客"身上探测到外来的放射性物质，就会将其制服，甚至直接拖走。

original: {Trying to figure out echoes on the line}Hnh... getting interference from old recordings... the guests who were trapped here... eh, shut that noise off...
translation: {Trying to figure out echoes on the line}嗯…这些过往的录音正在扰乱通讯…都是被困在这儿的客人们留下的…呃，得把这噪音关掉……

original: {Slight contempt, dismissive}Looks like the casino moved your "friends" around once inside... might be useful. Or not. {Beat}Wonder if they came to help or kill you. Still...
translation: {Slight contempt, dismissive}看来赌场已经把你的"朋友们"扛到了别的地方……也不知是好是坏。{Beat}我倒是很想知道，他们究竟是真心帮你，还是想害你呢……

original: My signal should work through the speakers, now that you're inside. {smiling, a little eager}Heh, heh! Welcome to the Sierra Madre, in all its glory.
translation: 不过既然你已经进来了，我的信号就可以通过扩音喇叭传到你那里了，{smiling, a little eager}呵呵！欢迎来到马德雷赌场，感受它昔日的荣光吧。

original: {Sneering, emph}This is what the Old World stood for, even with bombs about to rain down on them. Now look at it.
translation: {Sneering, emph}这里是旧世界的象征，即便核弹的阴云曾经笼罩着它。看哪。

original: Beautiful... now its guests are all dead. {A little quieter}Better this way. Quiet. {Under his breath}How the Mojave should be.
translation: 多么美妙的地方……所有的宾客，都化为了白骨。{A little quieter}这样更好。更安静。{Under his breath}这才是莫哈维该有的样子。

original: {Going into instruction mode}Now - with the casino sleeping, it's got places closed off - won't let you go yet. We'll get there, trust me, just need to wake it up.
translation: {Going into instruction mode}好了——赌场仍然在沉睡，许多地方依然封闭着，你没办法进去。不过这阻止不了我们，相信我，我们只需要将它唤醒就好。

original: {Going into instruction mode}Casino's woken up, paying attention to us. Good.
translation: {Going into instruction mode}赌场终于从睡梦中苏醒了，也注意到了我们的存在。很好。

original: {Delivered as a question, slight taunt}Wondering what happened to your team...? Looks like they got moved to other floors. {Beat, to himself}Interesting, maybe that's why... hmmm, yes... yes.
translation: {Delivered as a question, slight taunt}你肯定好奇，你的队友们都去哪儿了…？看来他们都分散到别的楼层去了。 {Beat, to himself}有趣，原来是这样啊……嗯，没错，没错。

original: Perhaps the casino recognized specific guests... or guests with a voice or look close enough for them to be... assigned to that floor. We'll see.
translation: 这座赌场能自动识别来宾的特征……或者将有着相似嗓音和外貌的客人分配到同一楼层。这点还有待验证。

original: {Slight frustration}Had hoped with the power restored, the systems would fully awaken... {more frustration, this needs to be clear}especially the sound archives.
translation: {Slight frustration}我原以为电力接通后，所有系统都能恢复运作……{more frustration, this needs to be clear}尤其是音频资料库。

original: {Frustration}But no... your teammates' collars on each floor are interfering with the systems.
translation: {Frustration}但事实却没有……你们每个人的项圈对整个系统都造成了干扰。

original: It's the white noise filters embedded in their construction... they're blocking the casino speakers, the music.
translation: 这是由于项圈内置了白噪过滤器……它们屏蔽了赌场的广播，致使音乐无法播放。

original: You'll need to recalibrate... or destroy... each collar. To do that, you need to get close, re-set the signal - or blow their heads off.
translation: 所以你要么重新校准每个项圈…要么就干脆将它们毁掉。如果是前者，你就必须靠近项圈，重设信号，当然你也可以直接送他们上西天。

original: I'll leave the choice up to you - my preference? End them now. {Cold, throw away line}They're of no use.
translation: 选择权就交给你了，我个人的意见嘛，最好现在就将他们除掉。 {Cold, throw away line}反正他们已经没什么用处了。

original: {Throws line away}After all, it's safe to kill them now, provided you make it quick.
translation: {Throws line away}并且，只要你动作够快，现在杀死他们也很安全。

original: {Pissed at building's architecture and how it's hindering him}You see, the collars don't work inside the Sierra Madre... well, between floors. Else, I'd set off the collars, be done with it.
translation: {Pissed at building's architecture and how it's hindering him}你看，项圈在马德雷赌场内部是不起作用的……至少对身处不同楼层的人来说，项圈只是个摆设。否则我早就引爆项圈，一了百了了。

original: So find them, deal with them, as long as you're fast and can get off the floor after killing them.
translation: 所以你要找到他们，想办法解决他们。只要你干净利落，杀掉他们之后迅速逃离当前楼层就行。

original: The floors... whatever they lined this place with, interferes with the collar frequency... so if you kill them, you should have {emph}some time to run.
translation: 这些楼板……我不知道他们在里面埋设了什么东西，它会干扰项圈的频率…所以即便你干掉他们，应该也会有{emph}足够的时间脱身。

original: {To himself}Uh... just not sure how long, may not be consistent. More... less... whatever, it doesn't matter.
translation: {To himself}呃…就是不知道这个时间的长短，也许各不相同，或长…或短…随便吧，无所谓了。

original: {Firm}What we need is in the basement, we need to go to the top first and ride our fortunes down. {Cold, emph}After we deal with your team on the other floors.
translation: {Firm}我们要找的东西就藏在地下。为此我们要先上到顶楼，再从那里深入宝库。 {Cold, emph}在此之前，我们得先解决掉你散布在各楼层的队友。

original: {Pleased, checking readouts}You woke it up... good. Emitter frequencies... lighting up everywhere...
translation: {Pleased, checking readouts}你唤醒了这里…很好。全息发射器的频率…让四周变得敞亮了……

original: {Under his breath, commenting on old recordings that came to life, interfering with signal}Damn recordings... dead echoes in the frequencies...
translation: {Under his breath, commenting on old recordings that came to life, interfering with signal}该死的录音…这些频段里传来的都是死者的回声……

original: Casino's security is shutting down... opening up its vendor and gambling programs in the back casino... {rueful}Heh! Still might be something for sale.
translation: 赌场的安保措施正在解除…后方的售货机和赌桌程序也启动了…呵！说不定还有东西出售呢。

original: {Slightly curious, want to encourage exploration of back}Maybe something can help you now - security's shut down. After you're done looking around, head to the lobby, and we'll deal with your... friends.
translation: {Slightly curious, want to encourage exploration of back}给你说个好消息吧——安保措施关闭了。等你逛够了，就到大厅来，我们再想办法对付……你的那些朋友。

original: [Christine looks around, then nods toward a terminal on the far side of the room.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看了看四周，然后向屋子远侧的终端机点点头。]

original: {Coughs}See? That... {coughs again}wasn't so bad, was it?
translation: 咳咳…你瞧…咳咳，也没那么可怕嘛，对吧？

original: [Christine points to an electrical box on the wall, and twists her hand.]
translation: [克莉丝汀指了指墙上的电力箱，握紧了双手。]

original: {To himself, broken catwalk ahead}Guess we're going the long way around.
translation: 看来我们得绕远路了。

original: [Christine nods at the toxic cloud below, then makes a walking motion with her fingers and slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀向下面的毒云点点头，然后用手指做了一个走路的动作，缓缓摇着头。]

original: {Commenting about the toxic Cloud}Looks like we'll have to go through this pea soup. I can get you across.
translation: 看来我们得穿过这团飘在半空的浆糊了。我带你过去。

original: I found the phrase for elevator's audio lock.
translation: 我找到解开电梯声控锁的短语了。

original: {Curious}You did? {Impressed}Looks like even the Old World can't keep you out when you've got a mind to get in.
translation: 找到了？看来只要有心，连旧世界也阻止不了你啊。

original: You'll have to wait just a little longer.
translation: 你可能得再等一会儿。

original: {Slight irritation}Fine. {Warning player}I hear my collar beeping though, I've got the route to the exit all mapped out.
translation: 好。不过，我已经听见项圈在响了，我已经在地图上标出了通向出口的所有路线。

original: [Christine shakes her head as you approach the edge of the catwalk. She turns away from the catwalk and begins looking around.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看到你走向小道的边缘，摇了摇头。她转身离开小道，开始四处查看。]

original: {Weaker}When you die, I'll be waiting...
translation: {Weaker}我会耐心等下去，直到你死的那一天……

original: {Slow chuckle on the radio, uneasy undercurrent}Heh... now, come on, you open up. {Colder, angrier}Open up, damn you.
translation: {Slow chuckle on the radio, uneasy undercurrent}呵……快点，开门。 {Colder, angrier}开门啊，该死的。

original: Open the vault... {trying to make a deal}I can make it worth your while, {now angry}think about what you're throwing away. {Trying to bait player, make a deal}I have other weapons, other technology I can share with you.
translation: 打开避难所吧…… {trying to make a deal}我不会让你空手而归的，{now angry}想想看你错过了什么。{Trying to bait player, make a deal}我还有别的武器，别的科技可以和你分享。

original: {Low, trying to greed player with lure of other treasures}And the Big Empty... I know the way there. I know some of its secrets... if...
translation: {Low, trying to greed player with lure of other treasures}而且大空山…我知道去那儿的路，我还知道它的很多秘密……只要……

original: {Backpedals}The collars... the collars were a mistake, I see that now. Why would I kill you? After {emph}all you've done... after all {emph}we've done together.
translation: {Backpedals}项圈……项圈就是个错误，我现在明白了……为什么我要杀你？你做了{emph}这么多……{emph}我们一起实现了这么多……

original: {Challenging, hates being ignored}Are you listening to me?!
translation: {Challenging, hates being ignored}你有在听我说话吗？！
