original: {Looking around, reverent, quiet}Everything down here... I swear... so much you could use, you could rule the wastes with what's down here...
translation: {Looking around, reverent, quiet}我发誓，这里的一切……你都可以派上用场，你甚至可以用它们来统治废土……

original: ...make your own army, re-shape the world, and if others disagree... put {emph}collars on them, I can show you how.
translation: ……建立自己的军队，改造整个世界，如果有人不同意……就给他们{emph}戴上项圈，我可以教你方法。

original: {Anger/fear}Don't you leave me here. You can't do this to me. {Coughs, wheezing}
translation: {Anger/fear}你不能就这么把我丢在这里，你不能这么对我。 {Coughs, wheezing}

original: Eh? Getting dark in here. Machine... machine's losing power, no. I still have Pip-Boy light... maybe... maybe... no, no, that doesn't work.
translation: 呃？这儿变黑了。机器……机器没有能源了。不，我还有哔哔小子的灯……或许……或许……不不不，没用，这没用。

original: {Scratching on metal, clawing for door, quiet, to himself}Where... where is the door. Can't find the door.
translation: {Scratching on metal, clawing for door, quiet, to himself}门，门在哪里。我找不到门了。

original: {Rasping breath, to himself}Calm, been in worse situations... find a way out... {vicious, last part is threat}somehow, then find that Courier...
translation: {Rasping breath, to himself}冷静，冷静……更糟的情况我都遇到过……我一定能找到出去的路…… {vicious, last part is threat}找到那个邮差。

original: {Running through options, to himself}Maybe Veronica... no... no, she thinks I'm dead.
translation: {Running through options, to himself}或许维罗尼卡可以……不……不……她以为我早就死了。

original: {Himself}Must be someone... maybe that {emph}other courier, one with the flag on his back... maybe... no... no, said he'd never come to the Sierra Madre...
translation: {Himself}一定还有别人…或许我可以去找{emph}另一个邮差, 背上贴旗子的那个……或许我可以…不……不可能，他说过，他再也不会来马德雷山脉了……

original: No way out. {Beat, frustration}Can't... can't end like this.
translation: 出不去了。{Beat, frustration}不，不能就这么结束。

original: {Cold, firm, addressed to the player as his final words}You. I know you can hear me. When you die, Courier... I'll be waiting. Your grave's going look just like this vault.
translation: {Cold, firm, addressed to the player as his final words}你，我知道你能听到我说话。我会等下去，等到你死的那一天……你的坟墓会和这座避难所一样。

original: {Cold, quiet, hissing whisper}When you die... I'll be waiting here... at the Sierra Madre. {Faint, quiet, as if dying}Waiting.
translation: {Cold, quiet, hissing whisper}我会在马德雷赌场里等着……等到你死的那天。{Faint, quiet, as if dying}一直等下去。

original: What, you need surgery done? Let's get out of here... those speakers on the wall are making my nerves do a dance.
translation: 怎么，你是想在这儿做手术吗？我们还是走吧……这墙上的喇叭搞得我神经紧张。

original: Watch for Hologram security, not as nice as the lady at the fountain, trust me.
translation: 小心全息守卫，相信我，他们可没有喷泉上那位小姐这般好相处。

original: {Confused}What are we doing here? {Sarcastic}We're not going to find a doctor on call at this hour, trust me.
translation: 我们跑这儿来干嘛？现在可不是来看值班大夫的时候。

original: {Uneasy, not because of ghosts, but finding his victim, Christine}Place is haunted, got ghosts walking in it.
translation: 这地方闹鬼，到处是鬼人。

original: I don't believe you.
translation: 我不信。

original: You think I wanted to send you here without weapons, healing? No, the Sierra Madre lays you bare, strips and stores all your worldly possessions...
translation: 难道你以为我是故意让你手无寸铁、缺医少药地来到这种穷山恶水之地吗？不，是马德雷赌场把你剥得精光，没收了你身上所有的财物…

original: ...it's automated to move things as the builder saw fit, Sinclair - even the guests. It's what divided your team, me, assigned us to "our floors."
translation: …它会自动按照其建造者辛克莱的要求，对这里的每样事物进行分类——其中也包括宾客。是它把我和你的队伍分开的，把我们分配到了"各自的楼层。"

original: No contraband, nothing foreign in his paradise - even common Pre-War vending machines were banned from the Villa.
translation: 在他的这座伊甸园里，不能携带违禁品，更不允许外来物品入内—就连战前通用的售货机都不能在别墅区里出现。

original: So the casino stripped me of my gear?
translation: 所以这赌场扒光了我的装备？

original: The Villa did, as an extension of the casino, yes - and then sent it back to the owner's residence. Here, "begin again" is more than a slogan.
translation: 严格来说，这里是别墅区，不过作为赌场的附属区域，它的规定是一样的，所有东西都会被寄回原址。在这里，"从头再来"可不仅仅是一句口号。

original: Do you know how to get out of here?
translation: 你知道离开这儿的方法吗？

original: Of course. I walked all this way. {Lies}If you're worried... I'll give you a map back - or show you the way out when this is all over.
translation: 当然。来这里的路我亲自走过。{Lies}如果你不放心，等事情结束后，我可以给你一张回去的地图，或者直接告诉你该怎么走。

original: What happened to my gear?
translation: 我的装备在哪儿？

original: It lies in the bunker - or whatever mantrap caught you. It's the Sierra Madre, its security systems strip guests to their garments.
translation: 应该还在地堡里……或者留在捕获你的陷阱里。这可都要归功于马德雷山脉赌场的安保系统，它会将来这儿的每个游客都剥得只剩一件单衣。

original: It has... prejudices against outside material, "contraband." Almost anything with a radiation signature.
translation: 它…为了杜绝"违禁品"，对外来物品的检查异常严苛，哪怕有一丁点放射性痕迹，都过不了关。

original: The New Vegas casinos do the same thing, manually. {Raises an eyebrow}Although preventing bloodshed, not radiation poisoning, is their main concern.
translation: 新维加斯赌场也有同样的安保措施，不过是人工的。{Raises an eyebrow}而且他们那么做的主要目的是预防暴力事件，而非隔绝辐射伤害。

original: If Dog put a collar on me, why didn't he say so?
translation: 如果是狗给我戴上了项圈，为什么他不是这么说的呢？

original: "Dog?" Hnh. Appropriate. It's what I called him. {Beat}You've met him. You know why he forgot - his brain was ruined by FEV, his memory, wreckage.
translation: "狗？"呵，没错，我是这么叫他的。 {Beat}看来你已经和他见过面了，那你应该更清楚原因才对——他的大脑被FEV病毒破坏了，记忆残缺不全。

original: He may know the way back, somewhere, deep down. I doubt it. He tracks by smell and instinct. Still, he could be trained.
translation: 也许在他的脑海深处，他记得回来的路。但我对此表示怀疑，他主要依靠气味和直觉行动，不过，还是可以对他进行驯化的。

original: So someone else with a collar placed one on me? Who?
translation: 所以是另一个同样遭遇的人给我戴上了项圈？是谁？

original: The mutant. Heh! He swallowed one of the collars... after that, he was mine. The collar wasn't even necessary.
translation: 是那个变种人。呵！他吞下了一个项圈……之后就成了我的奴隶，有没有项圈都无关紧要。

original: All his kind, they exist to be given orders. They're soldiers - simple, stupid. I ask him to fetch, he did... even without the threat of death.
translation: 他们这个种族，从诞生之初就只懂得服从。他们是士兵——头脑简单，四肢发达。我要他去找人，他就照办了…无论那是否会威胁到自己的生命。

original: Even when I stopped speaking to him, he continued to leave the Villa, gather victims from the mantraps, out of habit.
translation: 哪怕我已经不再和他说话了，他也还是会主动离开别墅区，去各处的陷阱里搜寻猎物，这已经变成了他的习惯。

original: He must have found you in one of them. If so, he's probably forgotten - he only remembers my voice.
translation: 他应该就是这样发现你的。如果是的话，那他很可能已经忘了你…因为他只记得住我的声音。

original: He put the collar on you, dragged you here, because he doesn't know any better. It's in his nature, greedy and child-like.
translation: 是他给你戴上了项圈，把你拖到了这里。毕竟除此之外，他什么都不懂。这是他的天性，贪婪而幼稚。

original: How did you get me here?
translation: 你怎么把我弄到这里来的？

original: Everyone asks that. {Emph}Should be asking how they plan on leaving.
translation: 每个人都会问这个问题。{Emph}你不妨问问他们是怎么想方设法离开的。

original: It only takes putting a collar on one to begin the chain. One with a collar may chain another. And that one, another. Had traps all over the wastes.
translation: 我只是把项圈套在了一个人的脖子上，就引发了连锁反应。戴项圈的人会给其他人也套上项圈，如此周而复始，循环往复。我在废土各处都布下了陷阱。

original: The chain ends with the super mutant. Although with him... the collar wasn't even necessary. He only needed... guidance.
translation: 而这个反应在那个超级变种人那里结束。不过对他来说……项圈是可有可无的。他会听从一切……指示。

original: Now that I'm here, are you coming down?
translation: 既然我已经进来了，你要下来吗？

original: I'm sick of talking to some image on a screen. If you're going to come down, do it.
translation: 我不想再对着屏幕上的人头讲话了，你要下来的话，就动作快点吧。

original: {Slight reluctance}No. I am not going to take the chance while I'm so close... not this close, no. Not again... I can wait... afford to be careful.
translation: {Slight reluctance}不，已经离成功这么近了，我不会冒险的…不…不能再犯同样的错误。我可以等……这代价我承受得起。

original: You... you're locked down there. This is the only entrance, and I have free rein of the Sierra Madre. I have time... more than you.
translation: 你…你现在被关在里面。这是唯一的入口，而我已经可以自由出入马德雷山脉赌场，所以我的时间……比你多。

original: {Cold}Besides, there might be more traps. I'll send more scouts in... yes, others. {Suspicious, ends on downnote}You're... resourceful, don't want to leave anything more to chance.
translation: {Cold}再说了，也许还会有别的陷阱。我打算再派出几个探子……没错，再派几个人来。 {Suspicious, ends on downnote}你很……聪明，我绝不能在最后关头前功尽弃。

original: What happened?
translation: 发生了什么？

original: So you answered madness with madness?
translation: 所以你就用疯狂来对付疯狂？

original: When your life is tied to another's, sacrifice and cooperation - they can be conditioned, learned, and you can focus on the matter at hand.
translation: 只有当你与他人的生命紧密维系在一起时，你才能逐渐理解、逐渐学会奉献与合作，才能更加专注于手头的事务。

original: Greed can be beaten. Contained. Controlled. {Beat}You know it better than anyone... or I hope you do. It doesn't matter.
translation: 贪念可以被克服，可以被压抑，被控制。{Beat}你比任何人都清楚这一点…也可能你并不理解。无所谓了。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你到底是在说什么？

original: {Disgusted}Every time, even with collars clutched at their necks... they would betray each other, kill each other, to get inside the Sierra Madre.
translation: {Disgusted}即便项圈已经牢牢卡在了人们的脖子上……为了进入马德雷山脉赌场，他们也还是会反目成仇，自相残杀。

original: It... it was insanity. {Gets progressively madder here, frustrated}They could've had it all, it was so close. And... and they kept turning on each other, again and again.
translation: 那…那才叫疯狂。{Gets progressively madder here, frustrated}明明胜利已经唾手可得，明明成功近在咫尺了……可是，他们却总是要一而再再而三地相互背叛。

original: Cracking the Sierra Madre was difficult... but cracking greed, that was more difficult. So the dead man's switches went in.
translation: 赌场的机关已经教人疲于招架……可没想到人性的贪婪却更加难以应付。所以我才不得不设置一个让人同归于尽的机关。

original: You're nothing more than a killer that aspires to mass murder.
translation: 你不过是一个嗜血成性的刽子手。

original: {Frowns}You think I'm a murderer. If I was, I'd have set off your collar long ago... {getting on the teacher pedestal here}the collar ensures compliance, encourages... cooperation.
translation: {Frowns}你说我是刽子手，如果我是的话，你们脖子上的项圈早就爆炸了…… {getting on the teacher pedestal here}项圈可以使人服从，让人们……学会合作。

original: Think about it. Would you truly have gotten into the casino without those collars? No, human nature is against us, always.
translation: 想想吧，要是没有这些项圈，你们进得了赌场的大门吗？不，人性永远会与我们作对。

original: {Scoffs, actually cuts the superior act for a bit, he wants to share this}Did you know... did you know that I had to keep adjusting the collars, keep changing the rules to make this moment possible?
translation: {Scoffs, actually cuts the superior act for a bit, he wants to share this}你知道吗……你知道吗？我不停地调整项圈，不停地修改规则，就为了能让这一刻成为现实！

original: How did you find out about the Sierra Madre?
translation: 你是怎么发现马德雷山脉赌场的？

original: {Uneasy, reluctant, remembering his failure on the field of battle}It started with... a setback. Fires, blood, beneath the sun... a sun so close you could touch it.
translation: {Uneasy, reluctant, remembering his failure on the field of battle}一切都始于……一场败仗。火焰，鲜血，全都在阳光下化为乌有……有那么一刻，太阳近得触手可及。

original: {Beat}Moments like that, however, failures... can provide the brightest clarity.
translation: {Beat}虽然我遭受了这样的耻辱，但失败……却令我对未来豁然开朗。

original: Then we better get to killing them.
translation: 那我们不如立刻着手行动吧。

original: Hnh. Perhaps... perhaps I was too quick to put a collar on a potential ally.
translation: 哼。看来…看来我太着急了给人套上项圈了，险些失去了一个潜在的盟友。

original: Very well. I'll come down... and show you what the Sierra Madre has in store.
translation: 很好，我这就下来…我来给你展示一下马德雷山脉赌场到底都藏了什么秘密。

original: I don't care about the Republic, they're yours to kill.
translation: 我才不关心共和国的死活，想干掉他们随你便。

original: {Snaps at player}I know that. Their days were numbered since they occupied Hoover Dam.
translation: {Snaps at player}我知道。自从占据了胡佛大坝，他们就是一副日薄西山的景象。

original: [NCR] If you want to kill NCR, that's fine with me.
translation: [NCR] 如果你想干掉NCR，那我没什么意见。

original: {Frowns}I've read your Pip-Boy. Seen what you've done...
translation: {Frowns}我看过你哔哔小子里的记录，我知道你都做过什么……

original: If you wish to end them... I could use someone like you. Resourceful. Uncompromising. NCR has many soldiers... many citizens.
translation: 如果你也想消灭他们…那我或许用得上你，你天资聪颖，意志坚定。NCR不但有士兵…还有大量平民……

original: You want to attack NCR? All of NCR?
translation: 你想对NCR发动进攻？整个NCR？

original: Attack? No, not attack them. {Cold, deadpan, quiet}Wipe the slate clean. Make the Mojave like it was meant to be... undisturbed by man.
translation: 进攻？不，不，我可不是要进攻他们，而是要把他们彻底消灭，让莫哈维恢复往日的安宁……不再会有人类滋扰。

original: I'll send the Cloud, the Holograms. Bring ruin in my hands until only I stand atop the HELIOS One tower again.
translation: 我将用毒云和全息影像为我开道，我所到之处，一切都将化为废墟，直到我再次站上太阳神一号的顶端。

original: I'll scour Hoover Dam with the Cloud, rain its walls with spears from the sun... with an army of Old World ghosts behind me, Holograms all.
translation: 我要把胡佛大坝浸没在毒云中，用阳光之矛洗净它的全身……而这一切都将由我所率领的全息影像来实现，那将是一支来自旧世界的幽灵大军。

original: I'll kill them until it's only me, me alone... in a quiet world. {To himself}In a world that's nothing like what happened at HELIOS One.
translation: 我要把他们杀得片甲不留，直到剩我一人…让世界再次恢复安宁。在那个世界里，再也没有人可以夺走太阳神一号。

original: You're Veronica's mentor. The Elder who lost HELIOS One.
translation: 你就是维罗尼卡的导师，那个丢掉了太阳神一号的长老。

original: {Remembering, didn't think this was a possibility}Veronica... she... survived HELIOS. {Nods}She would. Resourceful.
translation: {Remembering, didn't think this was a possibility}维罗尼卡…她…居然没有死在太阳神一号。{Nods}这也不奇怪，她一向很有本事。

original: As for "losing" HELIOS One... that was the only outcome, aside from retreat. {Thinking back, sneering, frustrated}NCR, swarming like ants over Old World relics... Hoover Dam... HELIOS...
translation: 至于你说"丢掉"……除了撤退外，似乎也就只剩这么一种结局了。{Thinking back, sneering, frustrated}NCR早已像行军蚁一样爬遍了旧世遗迹的每一个角落…胡佛大坝…太阳神……

original: {Spits this out}I won't let those... children seize anything else. Hardin... McNamara... can't stop them... won't. {Slow, evil}So {emph}I will, with the Old World as my weapons.
translation: {Spits this out}我绝不会让那些…无知的孩童再夺走任何东西。哈丁…麦克纳马拉…根本阻止不了他们…也没这个胆识。{Slow, evil}所以，{emph}这件事只能交给我，而我已经将旧世界的利刃握在手中了。

original: What the hell are you motioning about?
translation: 你的手势到底是什么意思？

original: I have no idea what your problem is.
translation: 我不明白，你到底有什么可怕的？

original: [Her face becomes angry. She points at the elevator, points downward, then wraps her arms around her and shakes her head.]
translation: [她露出了愤怒的表情。她指着电梯，又向下指了指，然后抱着双手，摇了摇头。]

original: [Perception] It reminds you of being trapped in the Auto-Doc.
translation: [感知] 你想起了被自动医生抓住时的感觉。

original: [She turns to you, relieved, and nods... then she turns away, and her face crumbles. She makes motions with her fingers, then clenches her fists.]
translation: [她看向你，松了口气，点了点头... 随后她转向一边，脸耷拉了下来。她用手指做了个手势，然后握紧了拳头。]

original: What's wrong?
translation: 怎么了？

original: [Christine studies the elevator frame, raises her hands... then sets them down... then raises them up again.]
translation: [克莉丝汀研究着电梯的门，抬起手... 又放下... 接着又抬起来。]

original: [She gives a silent sigh of exasperation, and frowns at the elevator, and her hand brushes the side of her face, tracing the scar.]
translation: [她恼怒地轻叹一声，朝电梯皱了皱眉，手顺着疤痕在脸上拂过。]

original: {Terrifying Presence}Get in that elevator or I'll make those scars on your face a pleasant memory.
translation: {Terrifying Presence}进电梯去，否则我会让你脸上那些伤疤变成你一辈子都无法磨灭的记忆。

original: [Christine takes a step back from your gaze... her eyes widen in alarm, she takes one step, then two toward the elevator.]
translation: [克莉丝汀在你的怒视之下向后退了一步... 她警惕地睁大双眼，慢慢地一步步向电梯走去。]

original: I mean it. Stay alive until I get back.
translation: 我说真的。好好活着，我会回来的。

original: I'll be back for you, okay?
translation: 我会回来找你的，好吗？

original: [Christine tilts her head slightly, glances at your collar, then your Pip-Boy. She opens her mouth, frowns, then closes it.]
translation: [克莉丝汀轻轻歪着脑袋，眼睛瞥到你的项圈和哔哔小子。她似乎想说点什么，但皱了皱眉头，嘴又合上了。]

original: [Her face looks sad, and she taps her chest once, slowly. She nods at you, then the exit.]
translation: [她似乎有些伤心，接着，她慢慢敲了一下自己的胸口，示意你离开。

original: Yeah, "thumbs up" - you better appreciate it.
translation: 是啊，“竖起大拇哥”，你确实得感谢我。

original: We'll get through this.
translation: 我们能做到的。

original: All right, be ready.
translation: 很好，做好准备。

original: [She narrows her eyes, determined, and gives a last nod.]
translation: [她坚定地眯起眼，点点头。]

original: Not in a hand-holding mood right now.
translation: 我现在可没心情牵手。

original: [She frowns, then waves you away and focuses on the terminal.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，摆手叫你离开，眼神又回到了终端上。]

original: <Take her hand.>
translation: <牵住她的手。>

original: [She holds it, meeting your eyes intently for a few moments. She gives your hand a gentle squeeze, then releases it and smiles slightly.]
translation: [她握住了你的手，热切地直视了你的双眼一小会儿。接着轻轻捏了一下你的手，然后微笑着松开了]

original: Are you going to be okay here?
translation: 你自己在这儿能行吗？

original: [She nods... then gestures at your hand, offers hers.]
translation: [她点点头... 然后向你伸出了手。]

original: I'm not one for church, but there's a bell tower to the north that has a nice view of the Sierra Madre. {To himself, remembering the Cloud}Well, did, anyway.
translation: 我虽然不信教，但我知道北方有座钟塔，站在那上边，整座马德雷山脉赌场都可以一览无余。 {To himself, remembering the Cloud}好吧，至少曾经是这样。

original: {Whistles softly, appreciating}Now, {emph}there's a view. {To casino}Hello, beautiful.
translation: {Whistles softly, appreciating}看吧，{emph}多壮观啊。{To casino}你好啊，美人儿。

original: {Slight complaint}Bones. Dog not like bones, don't taste good... {thinking to himself}unless meat on them.
translation: {Slight complaint}骨头，狗不喜欢骨头，味道不好…… {thinking to himself}除非上面有肉。

original: Cage over there with things to pull, hard to pull, Dog can do it. {Beat, confused}Done it before? Not remember.
translation: 那边有个笼子，里面有几个可以拉的开关，但很重，狗可以去拉。{Beat, confused}也许之前拉过？狗不记得了。

original: Surprised these homes weren't robbed blind, folks leaving the key out like that. {Beat, grumbles}If only the Sierra Madre'd done the same.
translation: 令人惊讶，钥匙四处乱丢，这些房子居然都没被洗劫一空。 {Beat, grumbles}真希望马德雷山脉赌场也能这么大方。

original: [Christine taps her collar, makes a sweeping gesture at the area, then begins to pulse her fingers outward, faster and faster.]
translation: [克莉丝汀拍了拍她的项圈，对着前方的区域挥了挥手，然后开始用手指有规律地打起了节拍，速度越来越快。]

original: {Sniffing air}You smell gas? I smell gas. {Beat}Might be a valve nearby, we can use it to torch any locals that come near us.
translation: {Sniffing air}你闻到瓦斯气的味道了吗？我闻到了。{Beat}附近可能有个阀门，我们可以用它把胆敢靠近的鬼人烧成灰烬。

original: Place with hard to pull things is over there... {looks at player's compass}"W" on your wrist thing? {Remembers how to say "west"}Weh-st. West.
translation: 有开关的地方就在那边……{looks at player's compass}就是你手腕上那东西指着的"西"，西——边。 西边。

original: For now, just say the words, and let's settle this so we can go home.
translation: 你只要说出密语，把这件事解决，我们就能回家了。

original: Don't tell me where you're going - I'll find you after this.
translation: 不用告诉我你的去向，之后我再来找你。

original: {Nods, sighs}I... {takes a breath}never mind. Let me get the vault open... {To herself, slowly, quiet as if memorizing it}"Begin again... but know when to let go." {Slight rueful laugh, to player}Sounds like you.
translation: 我…算了。我去把避难所打开… "从头再来，但明白什么时候该放手。"感觉这话像你说的。

original: Fine. If you can't let him go, you don't leave me much choice.
translation: 好吧。如果你不放他过去，那我就别无选择了。

original: He won't escape, I swear.
translation: 他跑不掉的，我发誓。

original: Christine, please, let go of this. Let me deal with him.
translation: 克莉丝汀，拜托，放手吧。让我来解决他。

original: {Hopeful, slight}All right. All right, I'll... {frowns}but I'll need to leave this floor. He'll pick up my collar, and...
translation: 好吧。好吧，我会的… 但我必须离开这层楼。他会检测到我项圈的信号，然后……

original: Then I need to keep you from doing it.
translation: 那我只能先阻止你了。

original: I... I didn't want this to happen. {Sighs}Ending him is more important than saving you. For what it's worth... I'm sorry.
translation: 我…我不想变成这样做的。杀死他比救你更重要。无论如何…我只能说声抱歉了。

original: If you try and kill him, I can't let you do it. If you die, you'll kill us both.
translation: 我不能让你杀他。要是你死了，我们两个都会完蛋。

original: {Quiet}I can't. It's my mission, has been. {Beat}This has to be done.
translation: 不行。这是我的任务，一直都是。我一定要完成它。

original: Let him come through the suites, follow me. If he escapes, you'll still be here, waiting.
translation: 听我的，放他过去。如果他逃走了，你依然可以截住他。

original: {Quiet}You have to promise me. Promise me you'll deal with him... if I see him, I...
translation: 你要向我保证。保证你一定能干掉他…如果让我看见他，我…

original: If he kills you, I won't be able to get out.
translation: 如果他杀了你，我也不可能逃出去。

original: I know. And he {pause}will kill me, I can't get the collar off. Even if I could, I need to be sure - see his eyes, his face, when he dies.
translation: 我知道。他一定会杀了我，因为我取不下这项圈。就算取下来了，我也要亲自确认他的死，我要看到他的眼睛，他的脸。

original: Do you trust me? If you do, let go of this.
translation: 你相信我吗？如果相信我，就放下心吧。

original: I can't let go. Every time I've thought about it...
translation: 我放不下。每当我想起这件事…

original: {Quiet}I've lost him so many times. He needs to die... what happened here, with us? {Doesn't want to think about it}He's... he's done so much worse.
translation: 我刺杀了他很多次，都失败了。他必须去死…你觉得我们遭受的痛苦已经很可怕了吗？他…他以前干过的事比这还要残忍。

original: {Know about mission}Are... are you all right? Something seems off.
translation: 你……还好吗？你好像有些不对劲。

original: [SUCCEEDED] I...
That's why you're waiting. You're going to kill him.
translation: 你等这么久就是为了这个。你要杀他。

original: [FAILED] No... no, you have it wrong. Look, it's now or never, all right? Let me open the elevator.
translation: [失败] 没… 没有，你听错了。听着，机不可失，知道吗？我这就去打开电梯。

original: {Know about mission}He'll come here, to the Suites - when he does, let him go through.
translation: 他一定会经过行政套房。你看到他的时候，记得放他过去。

original: I... can't let him leave here. Look, you've done so much, and he's not going to show himself until you go down there.
translation: 我…不能让他离开这里。听着，你已经做了这么多事，除非你亲自下去，否则他不会现身的。

original: That's what I'm counting on.
translation: 这就是我指望的。

original: {To herself}"Begin again, but know when to let go." {Shakes head, skeptical}Let's see what happens.
translation: "从头再来，但明白什么时候该放手。"接下来就等着吧。

original: We'll see. I'll take care of him.
translation: 等着瞧吧。我会收拾他的。

original: You ready? The sequence is: "Begin." "Again." "Let." "Go."
translation: 你准备好了吗？短语的顺序是："从头""再来""放""手"。

original: The target's the vault, not the casino, right?
translation: 目标是避难所，不是赌场，对吧？

original: Guess it's the object of someone's obsession - or affection.
translation: 大概是出于某种执着，或者热爱吧。

original: I believe he loved her, wanted to protect her. Too much.
translation: 我估计啊，他很爱这个女人，十分想要保护她。

original: {To herself}Love makes people do strange things. {Beat, quiet}Won't argue that. It can drive you crazy sometimes if you can't... connect.
translation: {To herself}爱情会让人冲昏头脑，我承认。如果你…一根筋的话，很容易就会被它逼疯。

original: {Reluctant, something's wrong}If they loved each other, and they were together... I suppose that's all that mattered.
translation: {Reluctant, something's wrong}问题是如果他们真心相爱，死也死在一起…那我无话可说。

original: But she's in that side room, dead, because the casino wouldn't let her leave. {Beat}And who knows where he is.
translation: 可她最后却被关在赌场里头，活活困死在卧室里。而他呢，连个影子都见不到。

original: If we stay here, the Cloud and the Holograms will answer that.
translation: 如果我们留在这里，毒云和全息影像就会做出反应。

original: What does that mean?
translation: 什么意思？

original: I've got you to come down after me, it'll respond to your voice.
translation: 你可以在我之后下来，你的声音可以启动电梯。

original: {Evasive}I... just wanted to make sure you're ready. When you go down there, that may be it for us... we won't be needed anymore.
translation: {Evasive}我…只是想确认你做好了准备。因为你一旦下去，可能我们俩就…毕竟我们已经失去了利用价值。

original: The one who made these collars, he'll follow you down there. And he won't let you leave. He's not one for sharing, never was.
translation: 制造项圈的那个人，他一定会跟你下去的，而且他绝不会放你离开。他这人向来只喜欢吃独食。

original: I have no idea, let's unlock it. The phrase is contained in the lyrics to a song.
translation: 我不知道，先把锁打开吧。开门的密语包含在一首歌的歌词中。

original: {Nods}All right. {Cold, she knows she may be trapping the player down here}If you go down there, are you prepared... what if you don't come back?
translation: {Nods}好吧。{Cold, she knows she may be trapping the player down here}如果你要下去，希望你已经做好了准备…万一你回不来怎么办？

original: Maybe it was a trust issue? He built this place for her, it feels like.
translation: 也许是出于信任？感觉这地方就是为她而建的。

original: {Skeptical}It's possible. This place is immense... and it still has power, food dispensers, security... was it all for Pre-War guests? {Beat}Or for her?
translation: {Skeptical}很有可能。这地方那么大…有电力，食品贩卖机，还有安保系统…这一切究竟是为了方便旅客，还是为了保护她？

original: This place... I'm not sure, it doesn't feel like a casino. Not entirely.
translation: 这个地方…我也不知道，我感觉它就不像一个赌场。完全不像。

original: I know. The sealed doors, the security... it's almost a fortress. Think that's why we're being ordered to come here and crack it open?
translation: 我知道。紧闭的门窗，安保系统…简直就是一座要塞。所以那个人才会让我们来破解这里的奥妙？

original: I need you here, so sit tight.
translation: 我需要你留在这里，乖乖坐好。

original: I dealt with the others, and I've got the key phrase.
translation: 我已经解决了其他人，而且知道了开锁的密语。

original: {Slight surprise}Surprised that Super Mutant didn't eat you... {under her breath}and don't get me started on Dean.
translation: {Slight surprise}那个超级变种人居然没有吃掉你... {under her breath}至于迪安，我就不问了。

original: {Takes a breath, rests tone, beat}So... I just rasp out some words, and the vault opens? {Beat, to herself}That woman, the starlet... she didn't build this place, why would the builder do that?
translation: {Takes a breath, rests tone, beat}所以…我只要对着电梯说话，门就会打开？ {Beat, to herself}那个女明星…这地方又不是她盖的，为什么这里的建造者要设置这种密码？

original: [Christine stops, glances at the speaker, then glances at your collar, frowning.]
translation: [克莉丝汀停了下来，瞧了一眼喇叭，又瞧了一眼你的项圈，皱起了眉头。]

original: Great. How romantic.
translation: 太好了。多浪漫啊。

original: [She looks puzzled for a second, then glares at you and motions you to move on.]
translation: [她显得有些困惑，随后盯着你，示意你继续前进。]

original: Yeah, speaker static makes our heads blow off, right.
translation: 是啊，这些喇叭的静电声搞的我脑袋都要炸了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
translation: [成功][她正要点头——却停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]

original: You can interfere with the detonation signal from the speakers?
translation: 你能干扰喇叭里发出的频率？

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她皱皱眉，摇了摇头。]

original: ...but only between us.
translation: …这事千万保密。

original: It's just your frequency.
translation: 这只是你自己项圈的频率。

original: [She nods, once, then again, points at the two of you, then the Pip-Boy.]
translation: [她点点头，又指了指你们两人和哔哔小子。]

original: Got it, let's move on.
translation: 明白了，我们继续前进吧。

original: [She nods, and motions for you to go ahead.]
translation: [她点点头，做了个向前的手势。]

original: Does that work with any other collar?
translation: 对其他项圈有效吗？

original: [She frowns, slowly shakes her head - she opens her mouth, then makes the motion of tuning a dial, then points at herself.]
translation: [她皱起眉毛，慢慢摇了摇头——她张开嘴，做了个调旋钮的手势，又指了指自己。]

original: You... uh...speakers make a tempo... or...?
translation: 你…呃…是说喇叭会打节奏吗，还是……？

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
translation: [成功][她正要点头，旋即停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]

original: You can interfere with the Speaker's detonation frequency somehow?
translation: 你能干扰喇叭发出的频率？

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她皱皱眉，摇了摇头。]

original: What? You can make the speakers stop or something?
translation: 什么？你能让这些喇叭停下？

original: [She is about to nod - then stops, points at herself, and shakes head.]
translation: [她正要点头——却停下来，指指自己，摇了摇头。]

original: You can dampen the signal somehow?
translation: 你能抑制信号?

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她皱了皱眉，摇了摇头。]

original: I don't understand.
translation: 我不明白。

original: [She tries to open her mouth and nothing comes out. Her eyes narrow and her hands ball into fists.]
translation: [她试图张嘴，却一丝声音都发布出来。她眯起双眼，手攥成了拳头。]

original: [She touches her collar, then shakes her head in frustration and nods at you to go ahead.]
translation: [她摸了摸项圈，然后失望地摇了摇头，示意你继续前进。]

original: Come on, we need to keep moving.
translation: 来吧，我们得继续前进。

original: What? What now?
translation: 又怎么了？

original: It's a decayed speaker. If we stay too long near one, it'll go off.
translation: 那个喇叭已经锈蚀了，如果我们在它附近待得太久，它会爆炸的。

original: [She taps the collar and then opens and closes her hand really fast.]
translation: [她敲了敲项圈，双手快速地开合。]

original: [She taps her collar, then opens and closes her hand really fast.]
translation: [她敲了敲项圈，双手快速地开合。]

original: [She points at your Pip-Boy, her collar, and then your collar. After a second, then she opens and closes her hand slower.]
translation: [她指着你的哔哔小子，又分别指了指你们俩脖子上的项圈。过了一会儿，她开始缓慢开合自己的双手。]

original: [She points at your collar, then hers, then nods at your Pip-Boy. She makes a triangle motion, then the same slow pulse as before with her fingers.]
translation: [她分别指了指你们俩脖子上的项圈，然后向你的哔哔小子点点头，做了一个三角形的手势，用手指像刚才一样缓慢地]

original: There's something else I wanted to know.
translation: 我还想问些别的问题。

original: What happened next?
translation: 接下来呢？

original: After that... I wandered, alone. Saw the storms of the Divide, walked among the Ciphers of the West. {Beat}Traveled to the Big Empty.
translation: 之后……我孤身一人，四处游荡。我见识过大裂谷的风暴，也曾与西部风语者同行，{Beat}还进入过大空山。

original: {Eyes stare off in the distance, remembering a powerful moment}I heard the signal. The woman's voice, the Sierra Madre, promising a chance to begin again, reverse my fortunes. {Tries to blow off the slogan, fails because he believes}All... nonsense.
translation: {Eyes stare off in the distance, remembering a powerful moment}我听见了那条广播。一个女子的声音，马德雷山脉，她承诺我可以在这里从头再来、改变命运，{Tries to blow off the slogan, fails because he believes}完全是……一派胡言。

original: {Quiet, since the fact he followed it means he didn't believe it was nonsense at all}I tracked the signal. Came here, scouted the city... using other hands. Kept dying on me, killing each other. You - you got the farthest of all.
translation: {Quiet, since the fact he followed it means he didn't believe it was nonsense at all}我追踪信号的源头来到这里，借他人之手…探遍了城镇的每个角落。不少人死于我手，也有不少人自相残杀，而你——你是目前为止走得最远的一个。

original: Before this goes any farther, I had questions.
translation: 在深入探讨这个事情之前，我还有些问题想问。

original: If you want me to wait, I'll cooperate. The Sierra Madre doesn't matter to me.
translation: 既然你让我等你，那我就配合你吧。反正马德雷赌场对我来说也毫无意义。

original: {Hears the surrender in the player's voice}Hmm... compliance. Good. The others... fought, argued. If they had only obeyed...
translation: {Hears the surrender in the player's voice}嗯……服从。很好。其他人…他们只会打斗、争吵，如果当初他们也肯乖乖听话……

original: {Calmer, proud}I see the collar has done its work, I can hear it in your voice. {Cold, should imply that he's going to murder the player}Stand and wait outside the Vault, where I can see you from the elevator.
translation: {Calmer, proud}看来项圈终于起作用了，我能从你的声音里听出来。{Cold, should imply that he's going to murder the player}到避难所外好好候着，我要一下电梯就看到你。

original: Foresight, whatever it is, won't help you spot me.
translation: 不管你有怎样的先见之明，你都没办法找到我。

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] {Snarling}I've had enough... enough of others {emph}stealing from me.
translation: [成功] {Snarling}我已经受够了……受够了别人窃取我的东西。

original: I've gotten past everything the Sierra Madre's thrown at me. You're no different.
translation: 我会克服马德雷山脉赌场留给我的一切难题，连你也无法阻止我。

original: {DUPE}[FAILED] As long as you're wearing that collar, you're not far from me. A press of a button, and I'll find you - I'll just listen for the explosion.
translation: [失败] 只要你还戴着项圈，你就没办法逃出我的手掌心。我只要轻轻按下按钮，就能立刻知道你在哪里——听爆炸声就行了。

original: Yeah... well... I'll pick this lock, no matter how tough.
translation: 嗯…这个嘛…我会撬开那把锁的，不管有多困难。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Snarling}I've had enough... enough of others {emph}stealing from me.
translation: [成功] {Snarling}我已经受够了……受够了别人窃取我的东西。

original: You know the Sierra Madre's a huge combination lock. Me? I've almost cracked it.
translation: 你应该很清楚，马德雷山脉赌场本身就是一把巨大的组合密码锁。而我，已经快要把它撬开了。

original: {DUPE}[FAILED] Take all the time you need. {Disgust}I suspect the Sierra Madre is more than proof against bobby pins and crowbars.
translation: {DUPE}[失败] 尽管试吧。{Disgust}单凭发卡和撬棍可是没办法打开马德雷山脉赌场的。

original: So there is a lock? Good. Wasn't sure until you said so.
translation: 所以这里头确实有个锁咯？很好，你不说我还不知道呢。

original: Find a way inside - you can try. The Sierra Madre is a patient thing, and it has outlasted many who've come to its doors.
translation: 你随便试吧，看你能不能撬开它。马德雷山脉最不缺的就是耐心，有无数人来到它的大门前，最终都败给了时间。

original: The punishment often equals the reward for those without the foresight to see what's in store. I'll let you test the security, see how you stand up.
translation: 对那些目光短浅的人来说，风险与回报往往是相抵的。你想测试这里的安保措施有多牢靠，我不会阻止你的，我倒想看看你能坚持多久。

original: The size of the lock doesn't matter, only the contents.
translation: 锁的大小不是问题，内容才是。

original: Fine, stay up there and wait. I'll keep busy down here.
translation: 好吧，那就在上边等着吧，我还有很多事要做呢。

original: As long as you can find me, you mean.
translation: 前提是你得先找到我。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}Hiding in the Sierra Madre... an interesting thought. {Under his breath}I'd come to see it more as a prison.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}把马德雷山脉当作藏身之所……有趣的想法。{Under his breath}但我觉得它可能更像一座监狱。

original: Hide, flee... it doesn't matter. The Sierra Madre is patient. I can be as well. You won't get any farther inside, and you won't escape my sight.
translation: 想玩捉迷藏……随你便。既然马德雷山脉赌场有耐心等待数百年，那我也可以。反正你现在哪儿都去不了，也逃不出我的视线。

original: You'd have to find me first. The Sierra Madre basement's bigger than you'd expect.
translation: 你得先找到我。马德雷山脉赌场的地下设施可比你想得要庞大得多。

original: [FAILED] As long as you're wearing that collar, you're not far from me. A press of a button, and I'll find you - I'll just listen for the explosion.
translation: [失败] 只要你还戴着项圈，你就没办法逃出我的手掌心。我只要轻轻按下按钮，就能立刻知道你在哪里——听爆炸声就行了。

original: If it has a lock... and it should... I can pick it. Somehow.
translation: 只要它有锁…反正我觉得它有…我就可以找到办法撬开它。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Snarling}This casino isn't some caravan safe. And the lock that secures the Sierra Madre vault doesn't hold all its secrets.
translation: [成功] {Snarling}这是赌场，不是外面某个商队的保险箱。况且赌场避难所的门锁内隐藏的也并不是它全部的秘密。

original: I already managed to unlock the elevator and get down here before you. Better hurry.
translation: 我已经成功解开了电梯的锁，先你一步来到地下了。你再不来也许就没机会了。

original: [FAILED] Take all the time you need. {Disgust}I suspect the Sierra Madre is more than proof against bobby pins and crowbars.
translation: [失败] 随便你吧。{Disgust}马德雷山脉赌场可不是单凭发卡和撬棍就能轻易打开的。

original: Time is a commodity you don't have.
translation: 你拥有的时间可不像你想象的那么宽裕。

original: But all of that - all of that wasn't an obstacle, it drove you here.
translation: 可这一切——这一切都不能算是障碍，是它驱使你来到这里的。

original: You're right, you have everything - except the vault.
translation: 你说的没错，你可以拥有一切——除了避难所。

original: If you seek to goad me... impatience and greed led {emph}you here, not me, it doesn't control me as it does you.
translation: 你不是在对我用激将法吧…被贪婪驱使，火急火燎来到这里的人是你，不是我。我才不会像你这样沉不住气。

original: I won't fall prey to another trap - either the Sierra Madre, or yours. There is no trust between us, and there will be no trades, either.
translation: 我绝不会再落入圈套了，无论是马德雷山脉还是你，都别想再蒙骗我。你我之间没有信任可言，我也不会和你谈什么条件。

original: No traps, just a trade, you and the vault, me and the exit.
translation: 哪有什么圈套，只是和你谈条件罢了。你得到避难所，而我全身而退。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant, tempted, to himself}I... I {emph}have earned it, fought for it. {Beat}Paid for it in blood, mine, others - countless times.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant, tempted, to himself}我…这是我历尽艰辛得到的，我为此奋斗了那么久。无数人，包括我在内，都付出了血的代价。

original: Greed implies you want more than you deserve. You've earned this.
translation: 人的贪欲会怂恿你去追求自己不配拥有的东西。你走到今天这步就是咎由自取。

original: [FAILED] {Snorts}Let you go? To crawl back to whatever caravan whore spawned you? No, she was perhaps more talented in {emph}deals than you.
translation: [失败] {Snorts}放你走？让你爬回去找那个在大篷车里生下你的野娘们哭诉吗？不，我看她的交涉水平可能都比你强。

original: But... look, I want to cooperate, all right? Come down.
translation: 但是…听着，我愿意合作，好吗？下来吧。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}Hnh. The collars... yes. Technology solves so many ills.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}嗯。那些项圈…没错。技术可以克服不少顽疾。

original: The collar's done its work, or we wouldn't be at this point.
translation: 项圈完美发挥了它的作用，不然我们也没办法走到这一步。

original: [FAILED] Enough talking, save your energy. You'll be down there for a while.
translation: [失败] 别再废话了，省点力气吧。你还要在下边待上好长一段时间呢。

original: I've cooperated so far. You've made sure of that.
translation: 我不是一直都很配合你吗？你大可以放心。

original: Both of us working together has allowed us to get this far.
translation: 正是我们携手合作，才能有现在的成果。

original: You're right, it will be different - has been different.
translation: 你说的不错，确实不一样，你没有重蹈覆辙。

original: {Reluctant}True... the collars... have worked better than I'd hoped. With adjustments.
translation: {Reluctant}是的…项圈…经过调整之后，居然比我想象得要有用得多。

original: Still... I'm not eager to leap into another trap - the Sierra Madre's or yours. This experience has taught me human nature is... unreliable.
translation: 但是…我可不想再落入圈套了，无论是马德雷山脉还是你，都别想再欺骗我。过往的经验教会了我，人性…是不可靠的。

original: You say your freedom is important to you - so did the others that fill the Villa, before they turned on each other.
translation: 你口口声声说自由对你多么重要，可别墅区里躺着的那些人，在他们开始自相残杀前也是这么说的。

original: Look, let me out, you get in the vault, we're both happy.
translation: 听着，放我出去，你就能进入避难所，咱们皆大欢喜。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}That signal... that siren's call... lured me in, yes. And being trapped in the Sierra Madre, perhaps forever...
translation: [成功] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}那条广播…如同海妖的呼唤…将我蛊惑到了这里。我被困在马德雷山脉赌场，险些再也无法离开……

original: That has made me more - cautious. I have my freedom, access to the bottom of the casino, and you, under my control. {dismissive}Heh... I can wait.
translation: 这也让我更加小心谨慎。既然我现在已经可以随心所欲地进入赌场的地下，而你也被我捏在手掌心，{dismissive}呵……我完全可以静观其变。

original: You followed the signal, too. You want what's down here, I want out. Let's deal.
translation: 你不是也跟着那条广播到了这里吗？你想得到这里的宝藏，而我只想回家，咱俩不妨做笔交易吧。

original: [FAILED] If you want to appease me, then do so in silence. I'll come for you, in time. Irritate me, and I'll silence you forever.
translation: [失败] 如果你想讨好我，那你最好保持沉默。等到时间合适，我自然会下去救你，但你要是敢继续挑衅我，那就永远沉默下去吧。

original: What can I say to convince you I just want to go?
translation: 我只想离开这里，怎样才能让你相信呢？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}I've lost much in the past by... falling to my instincts. This time... {rallies}this time will be different.
translation: [成功] {Hesitant, but tempted, to himself}我曾经因为过分相信自己的直觉…蒙受了巨大的损失。{rallies}这次我绝不会重蹈覆辙。

original: You've already waited too long for this moment, there's no need to wait any longer.
translation: 为了这一刻，你已经等了那么久，没必要再多等下去。

original: [FAILED] Silence and patience will convince me. I'll come for you, in time. Irritate me, and I'll silence you forever.
translation: [失败] 你可以用沉默和耐心来打动我。等到时间合适，我自然会下去救你，但你要是敢继续挑衅我，那就永远沉默下去吧。

original: Having you wait up there forever with no way down sounds more appealing all the time.
translation: 看你这副在上面急得直跺脚的样子，我可开心了。

original: Throwing a wrench into the works is what I do best.
translation: 我最喜欢到处搞破坏了。

original: If that's what it takes to fix this, that's fine with me.
translation: 只要能让一切回到正轨，什么代价我都无所谓。

original: Even... even if you damaged the mechanism... there's a chance of repairing it. {Chewing it over, slowly}It might take years... but it's possible.
translation: 就算…就算你能破坏这里的设施…我依然有机会修复它。 {Chewing it over, slowly}这可能要花上很多年……但并非不可能。

original: Well... then you'd need some way of transmitting that, right?
translation: 呃…那你也需要能传递信号的方法，是不是？

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] Huh... {Beat, realizing he's been outfoxed}clever.
translation: {DUPE}[成功] 哈…{Beat, realizing he's been outfoxed}聪明。

original: I'll clip the wires to this intercom, then the Pip-Boy.
translation: 我会切断这个对讲机的电路，再断开哔哔小子。

original: [FAILED] {Sarcasm}Indeed... and how {emph}would I reach you, let alone {emph}speak to you. {Shakes head}Perhaps you're not as resourceful as I suspected.
translation: [失败] {Sarcasm}当然了…不然我怎么能 {emph}找到你，更别提 {emph}和你对话了。{Shakes head}看样子你也没有我想象得那么机灵嘛。

original: Um... are you sure of the frequency?
translation: 嗯…你的频率能传过来？

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] Huh... {Beat, realizing he's been outfoxed}clever.
translation: {DUPE}[成功] 哈…{Beat, realizing he's been outfoxed}聪明。

original: There's noticeable lag of several seconds for the collar to go off - and a warning.
translation: 项圈引爆之前会有几秒的延迟，还伴随着警报声。

original: [FAILED] Quite certain. How you managed to come all this way amazes me - {to himself}perhaps it was luck.
translation: [失败] 当然可以。真想不通你是怎么走了这么远的，可能全凭运气吧。

original: Safeguards? If you're a gambling man now, stay up in the casino.
translation: 保险？既然你这么喜欢赌，那就好端端待在赌场里呗。

original: Destroying even a single fragment of data is more than you could stand.
translation: 哪怕只毁坏一丁点数据，那代价也是你承受不起的。

original: Maybe too many safeguards, as you've discovered already.
translation: 我看恰恰就是保险设置得太多了，难道你看不出来吗？

original: {Snorts}But, you recognize the value of what's down there. You would no sooner destroy what's inside the Sierra Madre than destroy yourself.
translation: {Snorts}可是，你应该也意识到了这里的东西蕴含的价值。如果你执意要毁掉马德雷山脉赌场的秘密，那你自己也将灰飞烟灭。

original: {Snarling}Persist in threatening me... or the Sierra Madre's secrets, you're of no use to me, I'll set off your collar now.
translation: {Snarling}你一直在威胁我…还想摧毁马德雷山脉赌场的秘密，你对我一文不值了，我现在就引爆你的项圈。

original: Wait until I get my hands on the computers, we'll see.
translation: 那就等着我在电脑上大闹一通吧。

original: {Success Result}[SUCCEEDED] You might destroy access to the data... not the data itself. Besides, there would be safeguards in place.
translation: {Success Result}[成功] 就算你可以破坏数据的访问渠道…你也没办法破坏数据本身。而且，数据库肯定会设置保险的。

original: All it takes is destroying a single terminal or holotape.
translation: 我只要毁掉一台终端或者全息磁带就够了。

original: [FAILED] There's nothing you can do that I cannot undo... or recover. {Coldly smug}And I have the time now, thanks to you.
translation: [失败] 无论你做什么，我都可以还原…或者修复。{Coldly smug}而且多亏了你，我现在的时间很充裕。

original: I'll trash the electronics, the vault wiring, maybe.
translation: 我可以劈坏电子设备，比如避难所的电路。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Frowns}The elevator. {Testing the player}Then you'd be trapped for certain, no probability of escape.
translation: [成功] {Frowns}电梯。{Testing the player}那你会被完全困住，没有任何逃生的可能。

original: Forget the Vault. The elevator's only a single control box.
translation: 别再惦记避难所了，到这儿的电梯是单控的。

original: [FAILED] {Sarcasm}The vault would be as shielded against vandalism just as the casino itself was. No... any damage you could cause would be minimal.
translation: [失败] {Sarcasm}避难所和赌场一样都配备了防暴措施。所以…你能造成的损伤是微不足道的。

original: You... you don't have any way to transmit down here.
translation: 你……你没办法往避难所里发送引爆信号。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Huh... {Beat, realizing he's been outfoxed}clever.
translation: {DUPE}[成功] 哈…{Beat, realizing he's been outfoxed}聪明。

original: Between floors? I don't think so.
translation: 隔着楼层吗？我觉得没可能。

original: [FAILED] {Contempt}Really? No, I don't think so. I can afford to wait, and your threats... meaningless.
translation: [失败] {Contempt}真的吗？我可不这么认为。我有大把的时间可以等，至于你的威胁…毫无意义。

original: Oh, so you're willing to risk it?
translation: 哦，所以你居然愿意冒这个险咯？

original: Denying you the Sierra Madre vault would be worth it.
translation: 只要能让你无法进入赌场避难所，我做的一切就值得。

original: Sounds like I'm dead anyway, the way you're talking.
translation: 听你说话的口气，不管怎样我都难逃一死了。

original: {Imperious, as if thinking it over}Kill yourself, and you decide this now. I can shut down your signal, prevent the collar from going off.
translation: {Imperious, as if thinking it over}那就自杀吧，你自己决定。我可以切断你的信号，让项圈不会爆炸。

original: I... I'm pretty sure I can do some damage down here. Somehow.
translation: 我…我肯定能在这儿搞点破坏。反正我可以。

original: [SUCCEEDED] The collar? Even if you could trigger it... {scoffs}no, you'd die.
translation: [成功]项圈吗？就算你能触发它…… {scoffs}不，你会死的。

original: We'll see how "protected" the Vault is when I detonate this collar.
translation: 等我引爆项圈，我们就会知道避难所的"保护机制"到底有多完善了。

original: {Failure Result}[FAILED] {Contempt}Really? No, I don't think so. I can afford to wait, and your threats... meaningless.
translation: {Failure Result}[失败] {Contempt}真的吗？我可不这么认为。我有大把的时间可以等，至于你的威胁…毫无意义。

original: Then I'll find a way to unlock the secrets of this vault, take them for myself.
translation: 那我就去找办法解开避难所的秘密，把里面的一切都据为己有。

original: {Slow}You've gotten far. Any farther, try to breach the vault, you'll become a corpse.
translation: {Slow}你已经走得够远了。如果你敢再往前迈一步，试图闯入避难所的话，那等待你的只有死路一条。

original: {Snarling}What's inside is mine. Anyone else touches it... tries to take it from me... they'll answer for it.
translation: {Snarling}里面的一切都是我的，其他人休想染指…敢夺走我的东西…那就等着瞧吧。

original: I'm not interested in the vault, I only want to leave.
translation: 我对避难所没有兴趣，我只想离开这里。

original: {Slow}Then all you need to do is wait, be patient. {sneering}Hnh... you may be down there for a while. {To himself}Just as I was, trapped inside the casino.
translation: {Slow}那你就只能等了，耐心地等吧。{sneering}呵…不过你可能要等上好长一段时间咯。{To himself}就像我之前一样，被困在这座赌场里。

original: {Snaps}Consider this punishment for following the Sierra Madre signal in the first place. {Condescending}So eager to rush ahead... now, enjoy your reward.
translation: {Snaps}权当是上天对你当初听从了马德雷山脉赌场召唤的惩罚吧。{Condescending}这么急不可耐…那就好好享受你的奖赏吧。

original: Unless you come down here, I'll destroy the vault, everything in it.
translation: 如果你不下来，我就毁掉整座避难所，连同其中的一切。

original: {Slow}No... I don't think so. It'd most likely trigger other security measures... if you hurt the Vault at all.
translation: {Slow}不…我觉得你做不到。如果你真的试图破坏避难所…估计只会触发其它的安保措施……

original: The builder of the casino built it to last - the Sierra Madre withstood the {emph}war. I'm sure the Vault is protected as well.
translation: 这座赌场的创始人当初建造这里时就希望它能屹立不倒，马德雷赌场历经{emph}战争依旧保存完好，我敢说避难所内一定也有类似的保护机制。

original: Besides, you wouldn't have followed the signal if you didn't want this place's secrets for your own. You're curious... past the threats.
translation: 而且，如果你不是真的想要独占这个地方的秘密，当初你也不会跟着广播过来了。你的好奇心…远胜过你的愤怒。

original: [Christine nods at the Vending Machine, then makes a sweeping gesture with both arms and draws them to her chest.]
translation: [克莉丝汀对着售货机点了点头，然后张开双臂，做了个将手臂收回到胸前的动作。]

original: [Christine's eyes dart around at the walls and the ceiling. She glances at the exit, then takes a slow breath. Sweat appears on her brow.]
translation: [克莉丝汀环顾着墙壁和天花板，又瞥了一眼出口，然后慢慢深吸了一口气。她的眉间开始冒出冷汗。]

original: {Quiet}I am all about keeping low in this section of town... so let's see about creeping by the locals, all right?
translation: {Quiet}在这地方我只想保持低调……所以我们就从那些当地人身边悄悄溜过去，好吗？

original: {Grumbling}Tired of being inside. Want outside, get food inside Dog.
translation: {Grumbling}我不想再呆在里面了。狗想出去，要吃的填饱肚子。

original: {Walked into a nice patio, appreciative}Nice spot for sunning. {Beat, to himself}Well, if the sun ever touched here.
translation: {Walked into a nice patio, appreciative}真是个晒日光浴的好地方，当然，前提是得晒得到。

original: If your marker's right, think the roost we're looking for is to the southeast.
translation: 如果你的定位没错的话，那我们要去的地方应该就在东南方向。

original: [Christine frowns, looks upward, then back at you. She nods her head upwards, then makes the motion of holding a gun at the ready.]
translation: [克莉丝汀皱起眉头向上看去，接着又看向你。她仰起头向上示意，然后做出了一个举枪防范的手势。]

original: {Curious}Why leave a bear trap here, so high up. {Beat, to himself}Someone's arm must have lost it.
translation: {Curious}为什么要把捕熊夹放在这么高的地方。{Beat, to himself}也许是从谁的手臂上掉下来的。

original: {To himself, sarcastic}Ah, aren't the trees lovely this time of year, all blooming and green...
translation: {To himself, sarcastic}啊，这个季节的花草树木真是美极了，郁郁葱葱，枝繁叶茂……

original: [Christine flicks her finger back and forth quickly like a switch, then nods to the north.]
translation: [克莉丝汀快速来回拨动着自己的手指，然后向北方点了点头。]

original: This is the place you need to go when everyone is in place. {Quiet}Until then... nothing more than a diseased view of the Sierra Madre.
translation: 等到所有人都就位之后，你就到这里去。 {Quiet}在那之前……我们也只能继续盯着这恼人的赌场发呆。

original: Can you hear me...? Damn transceivers... {To himself}let me link the collars to the speaker in the tower... then... there.
translation: 能听清我说话吗…？该死的收发器……{To himself}我得把项圈和塔上的扩音器连起来…好了…行了。

original: [You hear banging from the speaker, as if someone is hammering on a wall with their fists.]
translation: [你听到扩音器里传来阵阵巨响，好像有人正在疯狂用拳头捶墙。]

original: [You hear a tapping from the speaker... a series of sharp taps, then a slow, two taps.]
translation: [你听到扩音器里传来敲击声…先是一连串尖利的敲击，然后是缓慢的两声敲击。]

original: {Eager}I'll pull the switches. {Beat, snarling}And when I find you, I'll pull your head from your body.
translation: {Eager}我可以拉动开关。{Beat, snarling}但之后我会找到你，我要让你身首异处。

original: {Eager, evil}Ready. {Chuckling}The both of us. I'll keep Dog locked in his cage... you just open the Sierra Madre.
translation: {Eager, evil}准备好了。{Chuckling}我们都准备好了。我已经把狗锁进笼子里了……你只要打开马德雷赌场就好了。

original: {Frightened, make player squirm}Dog is scared... wants out of cage. Cage you put me in. {Beat, pleading}Will pull levers, be good, just let Dog {emph}out.
translation: {Frightened, make player squirm}狗很害怕……狗想从笼子里出来。别再把我关进笼子。 {Beat, pleading}狗会好好表现，会去拉开关，只要你把狗放出来{emph}。

original: {Eager}Dog is ready to be good, pull switches, see the {emph}lights.
translation: {Eager}狗已经准备好好表现了，拉下开关，打开灯光。{emph}

original: {Not happy, but sees an opportunity}What are you waiting for? Rubbing it in? {Slight disgust/eager}Strike up the band already.
translation: {Not happy, but sees an opportunity}你还在等什么？戳我的旧伤吗？{Slight disgust/eager}开始演出吧。

original: {Warning}Careful when you do... you think the Villa's bad now, you haven't seen anything yet.
translation: {Warning}小心点……你以为别墅区很可怕？真正厉害的你还没见识过呢。

original: {Sees an opportunity, quiet, whispering}Come on, partner. So close now, stage is set, strike up the band.
translation: {Sees an opportunity, quiet, whispering}快点啊，伙计。我们马上就要成功了，舞台已经准备完毕，开始演出吧。

original: {Slightly worried}Just get ready to run when you do... I sure will. {To himself}Think the Villa's bad now... you haven't seen half the hell this town can raise.
translation: {Slightly worried}准备好冲刺吧…我肯定会第一时间进去的。{To himself}别以为别墅区很可怕……这才一半儿都不到呢。

original: There's no need for any of that, let's get out of here.
translation: 没必要这样做，我们出去吧。

original: If you try to burn the voice out of you, this casino will be destroyed, and us along with it.
translation: 如果你真的把那个声音赶走，这个赌场就会毁灭，我们都会一起死。

original: Dog is tired of voice inside, tired of being in another cage, again. Try to...
translation: 狗厌倦了体内的声音了，厌倦了呆在另一个笼子里。尝试...

original: ...kill this human, Dog. Kill them. If this casino is destroyed, good, it'll kill the Old Man, too, the one who...
translation: ...杀了这个人类吧，狗。杀了他们。如果赌场被毁了，那也好，至少那个老头也死定了，那个人……

original: {Sad}...shouts at Dog, the voice shouts, and to stop the voice, Dog needs to burn it out.
translation: …在朝狗大吼，那声音又在大吼大叫，要他闭嘴，狗就要用火把它熏出来。

original: Dog, if you do this, you'll kill yourself.
translation: 狗，如果你这样做，你会害死自己的。

original: {Amused}...do this? Yes, he can. You caused this - coddled him, protected him, now I'm going to have to take control from...
translation: …这么做？是的，他可以。都是你造成的——你纵容他，维护他，现在，我必须要从你这儿取回控制权…

original: ...you, you need to go, run. {Whispering, as if confiding in player}Dog is going to burn voice... burn voice out, burn it away.
translation: ...你走吧，快逃吧。狗要烧掉那声音…用火把它熏出来，赶走。

original: {God's voice, quiet, echoing}...and Dog looks just like me. {Beat, to Dog}You've hurt yourself. Inside. {Slightly tender}Do you see now, see...
translation: ...狗和我很像。你一直在自我伤害。你看见了吗，看吧……

original: {Dog finally gets it}...in the water. {Slow realization, quiet, to himself}Dog understands now. Dog knows what happened.
translation: …水中的倒影。狗现在明白了。狗明白怎么回事了。

original: {God, quiet, serious}He's right. If you merge us, then... I... we... or whatever we become... we can't help you when you reach whatever's at the Sierra Madre's end.
translation: 他说得对。如果你让我们两个融合，那...我...我们…也许会变成另一个人…等你抵达了马德雷山脉的终点，我们那时也无法帮你了。

original: {Dog, crumbling, sad}And Dog... Dog doesn't want to unremember you, may {emph}forget you.
translation: 而且狗...狗不想忘记你，狗也许会忘了你。

original: {God, correcting Dog's "Dog may forget you."}We {emph}will forget almost all that has happened here. You'll be alone - at the Old Man's mercy. Like Dog. Like me.
translation: 我们会忘了这里发生的几乎所有事情。你将独自面对那个老头，任由他摆布，如同狗和我一样。

original: {Snarl, slightly indignant}...to stop you. You think your pull is stronger than mine? No... no, I've minded Dog, protected him far longer than you ever have. He won't...
translation: ...阻止你。你觉得你的能力比我大？不...不，是我一直在照顾狗，保护狗，比你要久得多。他不会……

original: ...listen to you. If Master sent you, Dog is listening.
translation: ...听你的。如果是主人派你来的，狗就听你的。

original: {Exhausted}...him, just as I do. {Beat}Do you understand now? Do you understand why I have to take control? He...
translation: ...他，就像我一样。你懂了吗？你明白我为什么要取得控制权吗？他...

original: {Despairing}...why keep hurting self, voice keeps... telling Dog to do things. Dog just wants voice to go away... away.
translation: ...为什么老是伤害自己，那声音老是…指挥狗。狗只想让它走开。

original: {Takes a breath, sounds weak}...too late. Too late for us... too late for you to do anything but...
translation: ...太晚了。对我们来说...你什么都做不了，但是…

original: ...listen to you. Your voice... Dog will listen to you.
translation: ...听你的。你的声音...狗会听你的。

original: Take that chain around your neck, grab the ends, and pull slow and hard until you hear a crack.
translation: 抓住你脖子上的锁链末端，慢慢拉紧，直到听见断裂的声音为止。

original: {Nods, about to kill himself}Yes, Dog can do that. {Quiet}Dog hopes to see you soon.
translation: 是，狗这就照办。后会有期。

original: The other voice? See it in your head - not as a voice, but as a ball, the size of your hand.
translation: 另一个声音？你要想象他不是个声音，而是个球，和你手掌差不多大小。

original: {Dog, Confused, curious, as if holding a ball in his hand}Dog... Dog never thought of the voice as... small. As something he could hold...
translation: 狗...从没想过那声音会如此…弱小。仿佛他可以...

original: {God, slow suspicious}...on for much longer. What are you doing? What...
translation: …捏在手心。你在做什么？你...

original: {Dog, confused}...do you want Dog to do? {Frown}Voice is small now, Dog... {building, getting slightly evil}Dog could... Dog choke the voice, crush it into red mash.
translation: …希望狗做什么？那声音已经十分微弱了，狗可以把它吞掉，嚼烂。

original: Dog, listen to the other voice inside now. Go to sleep, let him come out.
translation: 狗，你必须听体内那个声音的话。快睡吧，让他出来。

original: {Frightened}If... if other voice comes out... Dog... Dog won't wake up. Dog doesn't want to sleep, please don't make him...
translation: 如果...如果那个声音出来了...狗...狗就再也醒不过来了。狗不想睡，求你不要让他…

original: {God, Relieved}...go to sleep. Good. Yes... make him sleep. Please...
translation: …睡着 。很好。让他睡吧。

original: {Dog, a little sad}...don't make me go to sleep. I... {frowns, slowing speech}Dog is tired. Dog is tired, can't... keep eyes open. Sleep... Dog needs to sleep.
translation: ...不要让我睡。我...狗累了。睁不开眼。睡觉...狗要睡觉。

original: No, look, I wasn't the one who caged you here, all right?
translation: 不，听着，不是我把你关在这儿的，好吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Confused}Master? {Beat, quiet, reverent}Master... Dog... Dog is listening.
translation: [成功] 主人？主人...狗...狗在听。

original: Dog, the Master sent me. He commands you to listen to my voice now.
translation: 狗，主人让我来的。他命令你听我的话。

original: [FAILED] {Getting more and more angry}No... no, you put Dog here, you keep him here! Like other cages you put Dog in!
translation: [失败] 不...不，你把狗关在这儿的！你还把狗关在了其他笼子里！

original: Dog... stay back, listen to me.
translation: 狗…住手，听我说。

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED]{Stops in mid-attack}Hnnh? Master? {Beat}Don't want Master to be mad... what does Master want Dog to...
translation: [成功] 哈？主人？不想惹主人生气...主人想要狗做什么...

original: Dog! Stop! Or Master will be mad!
translation: 狗！停下！不然主人会生气的！

original: [FAILED] {Getting more and more angry}No... Dog no listen to you, no listen to your voice anymore - will tear you apart, feed on you.
translation: [失败] 不...狗不听你的，不想再听你的话了——要把你撕碎，吃了你。

original: Ready for more? Come on, let's finish this.
translation: 还想再来吗？来吧，一决胜负。

original: {Snarling, then roars as he launches himself at player}Nrrrrrrh... rhhhhharrhhh!
translation: 咕咕咕……啊啊啊嗷嗷！

original: Forget this. Come on, let's fight, you big reject.
translation: 算了。来吧，动手吧，你这个怪胎。

original: I can't do it - fighting's more merciful than this.
translation: 我做不到——还不如战斗呢。

original: Master needs you to pull on the chain on your neck as hard as you can.
translation: 主人让你用力勒紧脖子上的锁链。

original: {Nods, about to kill himself}Yes, Master. {Quiet}Dog hopes to see you soon.
translation: 是，主人。后会有期。

original: Dog... listen to me... don't do this.
translation: 狗...听我说...别这样。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Stops in mid-attack}Hnnh? Master? {Beat}Don't want Master to be mad... what does Master want Dog to...
translation: [成功] 嗯？主人？不想惹主人生气...主人想要狗做什么？

original: Dog! Stay! If you don't, Master will be mad!
translation: 狗！停下！不然主人会生气的！

original: [FAILED] {Malicious}Dog tired of listening to you - put {emph}you in cage, piece by piece.
translation: [失败] 狗不想听你的话了，狗要把你扔进笼子，撕成碎片。

original: I don't plan on running, it's time to kill you both.
translation: 我没有想跑，我要杀了你们两个。

original: Come on, then. I won't make it easy on you.
translation: 那来吧。我不会对你手软的。

original: {Snarling, evil, malicious}Dog will crush you, snap your bones, make red everywhere.
translation: 狗会打烂你，打断你的骨头，让你的血洒得到处都是。

original: {Elijah - DUPE: Narration, echoes the beginning, but it's somber, not as bitter}You've heard of the Sierra Madre Casino.
translation: {Elijah - DUPE: Narration, echoes the beginning, but it's somber, not as bitter}你一定听说过马德雷山脉赌场。

original: {Christine - Narration, somber}We all have, the legend, the curses.
translation: {Christine - Narration, somber}我们都听说过。无论它的传奇，抑或它的诅咒。

original: {Dean - Narration, somber}Some foolishness about it lying in the middle of a City of Dead.
translation: {Dean - Narration, somber}有些荒诞不经的故事，说它坐落在亡者之城的中心。

original: {Dog - Narration}A city of ghosts.
translation: {Dog - Narration}一座幽影幢幢的鬼城……

original: {God - Narration}Beneath a blood-red cloud...
translation: {God - Narration}笼罩在血红色的毒雾之下……

original: {Dean - Narration}...a bright, shining monument, reaching out, luring treasure hunters to their doom. An illusion.
translation: {Dean - Narration}…一尊光彩夺目的石碑，引诱着寻宝者们走上绝路。一场幻梦。

original: {Christine - Narration}A promise that you can change your fortunes. Begin again.
translation: {Christine - Narration}一张空头支票。仿佛在那里你可以改写命运，重获新生。

original: {Elijah - DUPE: Narration, slow, defeated, reflecting}Finding it, though, that's not the hard part.
translation: {Elijah - DUPE: Narration, slow, defeated, reflecting}然而，找到它并非难事。

original: {Elijah - DUPE: Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}It's letting go.
translation: {Elijah - DUPE: Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}真正难的是放手。

original: {Dean - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}It's letting go.
translation: {Dean - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}真正难的是放手。

original: {Christine - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}It's letting go.
translation: {Christine - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}真正难的是放手。

original: {Dog - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}It's letting go.
translation: {Dog - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}真正难的是放手。

original: {God - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}It's letting go.
translation: {God - Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}真正难的是放手。

original: {Narration, echoes the beginning, but it's somber, not as bitter}You've heard of the Sierra Madre Casino.
translation: {Narration, echoes the beginning, but it's somber, not as bitter}你一定听说过马德雷山脉赌场。

original: {Narration, somber}We all have, the legend, the curses. {Somber}Some foolishness about it lying in the middle of a City of Dead.
translation: {Narration, somber}我们都听说过，无论它的传奇，抑或它的诅咒。{Somber}有些荒诞不经的故事，说它坐落在亡者之城的中心。

original: {Narration}A city of ghosts. Buried beneath a blood-red cloud... a bright, shining monument luring treasure hunters to their doom.
translation: {Narration}一座幽影幢幢的鬼城，笼罩在血红色的毒雾之下……一尊光彩夺目的石碑，引诱着寻宝者们走上绝路。

original: {Narration, a little quieter in this line}An illusion that you can begin again, change your fortunes.
translation: {Narration, a little quieter in this line}一场幻梦，仿佛在那里你可以改写命运，重获新生。

original: {Narration, slow, defeated, reflecting}Finding it, though, that's not the hard part.
translation: {Narration, slow, defeated, reflecting}然而，找到它并非难事。

original: {Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}It's letting go.
translation: {Narration, the grand finale, downnote - this is the last sentence of the story}真正难的是放手。

original: {Narration}The survivors of the Sierra Madre thought about gathering at the Fountain and waiting for the Courier.
translation: {Narration}从马德雷山脉赌场中逃出的幸存者们本想聚集在喷泉处等待邮差归来。

original: {Narration}In the end, the collars' silence made them uneasy, and the fear of turning on each other made them hesitate, and leave the goodbyes - {beat}unspoken.
translation: {Narration}然而，项圈的沉默让他们深觉不安，彼此之间的不信任又让他们倍感踌躇。最终，他们只能将道别默默埋在心中，没能说出口。

original: {Narration}The radio message at the fountain was enough for them, and there was no need to add another farewell on top of all they had suffered.
translation: {Narration}喷泉的电台里传出的信息对于他们来说已经足够。在共同经历过这一切之后，一句珍重都显得如此多余。

original: {Narration}You've heard stories of the Sierra Madre Casino. {Beat}We all have.
translation: {Narration}你一定听过关于马德雷赌场的传说。{Beat}我们都曾听过。

original: {Narration}This story's different than the others. It's all in promise of beginnings. {Beat}And the ending.
translation: {Narration}然而这个故事却有所不同。它开始于一个美好的承诺，{Beat}而结局……

original: {DUPE: Narration}In the years that followed, the legend of the Sierra Madre faded, and there were no... {emph}new visitors to the city.
translation: {DUPE: Narration}之后的几年里，马德雷山脉赌场的传说逐渐被人遗忘，再也没有人…{emph}进入过这座城市。

original: {DUPE: Narration}Years later, when a mysterious blood red cloud began to roll across the Mojave, then West toward the Republic, no one knew where it had come from.
translation: {DUPE: Narration}又过了几年，一团神秘的红雾开始飘入莫哈维，并继续向着西面共和国的方向前进。没有人知道它从何而来。

original: {DUPE: Narration}Only that it brought death in its wake. Attempts to find the source of the toxic cloud failed.
translation: {DUPE: Narration}直到有人命丧红雾之下，人们才有所警觉。但毒雾的源头始终未能查清。

original: {Narration}The Mojave was cut off. Through the Cloud, lights were seen from HELIOS One.
translation: {Narration}莫哈维就这样与世隔绝了。透过红雾，只有太阳神一号发出的光仍旧依稀可见。

original: {Narration}There were stories of ghosts immune to gunfire, who struck down anyone they saw with rays of light.
translation: {Narration}后来传说出现了一群刀枪不入的幽灵，凡是遇到它们的人，都会被它们发出的光束击倒。

original: {Narration}The last chapter of the Mojave came when a modified REPCONN rocket struck Hoover Dam, releasing a blood-red cloud, killing all stationed there.
translation: {Narration}最终，胡佛大坝被一枚改装过的瑞普康火箭击中，血红色的浓雾从中喷涌而出，驻扎在此处的士兵无一幸存。莫哈维就此走向终结。

original: {Narration}All attempts to penetrate the Cloud and re-take the Dam failed, and both the NCR and Legion finally turned away from it, citing the place as cursed.
translation: {Narration}人们数次试图冲破红雾，收复大坝，但均以失败告终。NCR和军团不得不宣告放弃，将这里视为诅咒之地。

original: {Narration}In the years that followed, communities across the West began to die as traces of the Cloud began to drift over lands held by the NCR.
translation: {Narration}之后的岁月里，红雾继续向西扩散，NCR领地内的定居点开始逐一走向消亡。

original: {Narration}Only two remained alive in the depths of the Cloud, at the Sierra Madre, waiting for their new world to begin again.
translation: {Narration}只剩下浓雾深处马德雷山脉赌场里的两个人，依然在静静等待着一个重获新生的世界来临。

original: {Narration}The Courier, lured by the promise of the Sierra Madre, could not escape. Once inside the vault, the casino did not let go.
translation: {Narration}邮差被马德雷山脉赌场的宝藏所蛊惑，最终没能逃脱。凡是进入避难所的人，赌场都不会再放手。

original: {Narration}When the Courier finally passed away, the casino created a new Hologram to walk with the other ghosts that filled its casino.
translation: {Narration}邮差去世之后，赌场里出现了一个新的全息影像，与其它游荡在其中的幽灵们成为了同伴。

original: {Narration}It was a pre-programmed homage intended for another. It assumed a new meaning in the likeness of the Courier.
translation: {Narration}它原本是为纪念另一个人而准备的复制品。如今它却拥有了邮差的外貌，这也仿佛赋予了它一层新的含义。

original: {Narration}A means of allowing even the dead to begin again.
translation: {Narration}即便已经死去，也可以用某种方式重获新生。

original: {Growling, just fed, slightly full}Hnnhhhh... {bestial}Dog getting full.
translation: 呃...狗快吃饱了。

original: OM NOM NOM
translation: 嚼嚼。

original: Rhrrrrrr...
translation: 唔唔嗯…

original: RhhhhaaarrrRRRRRRRR!
translation: 呜啊啊啊啊啊啊嗷嗷！

original: Show's about to begin. People, take your places.
translation: 好戏要开场了，大伙儿，各自就位。

original: I'm ready. Everyone - trigger the event.
translation: 各位，我准备好了——动手吧。

original: {Slight expectation}Finally. {Beat, slightly expectant}Now, the gates will open. And so will the skies.
translation: {Slight expectation}终于。{Beat, slightly expectant}大门终于要打开了，天空也要打开了。

original: Let's do this. On the count of three... two... one.
translation: 我们动手吧，三，二，一……

original: <Give two taps back.>
translation: <回敬两下敲击。>

original: Only a little longer, and we'll open the casino.
translation: 再过一会儿，我们就可以开启赌场了。

original: Christine? We're almost ready here.
translation: 克莉丝汀？我们马上就好了。

original: [A single tap comes from the speaker, then silence.]
translation: [扩音器里传来一声敲击，然后便安静了。]

original: Must be you, Christine. Sit tight, not like you have a choice.
translation: 只能是你，克莉丝汀。好好呆着吧，反正你也没有别的选择。

original: Save your energy, we still have to pull this off.
translation: 省点力气吧，我们还有事要做呢。

original: Now, now... I'll let you out when the event's over. Maybe.
translation: 很好，好……等到一切结束之后，我或许会考虑放你出来的。

original: [The hammering stops for a second... and there's one final bang from the speaker, as if someone is smashing their fist into a wall.]
translation: [捶打的声音停了下来，紧接着扩音机那头传来最后一声巨响，仿佛是有人用拳头砸墙的声音。]

original: Fine, don't take too long, or it'll be a short recovery, trust me.
translation: 好的，别花太久，相信我，否则你会来不及恢复的。

original: If you get the strength to leave, do so - quickly.
translation: 等你有力气离开的时候，就尽快启程吧。

original: Go on and rest. I have to take care of something.
translation: 休息吧。我还有别的事要做。

original: {God Calm, trying to make sense of this, takes a breath, recovering}Thank you... for whatever you have done. I will remain here, need to get my strength back.
translation: 谢谢你…虽然我不知道你究竟做了什么。我会留在这儿，恢复体力。

original: We're trapped inside a casino in a poisonous city.
translation: 这里是座死城，我们被困在了一家赌场里。

original: A cage... but at least you're not in two of them now.
translation: 这里是一间牢笼……不过好在你刚刚摆脱了另外两间牢笼。

original: {God Calm, slightly curious}That... that was not the answer I was expecting.
translation: 这...这不是我期待的答案。

original: It'd take too long to explain.
translation: 这事解释起来可能比较麻烦。

original: {God Calm, getting his bearings, takes a breath}I feel as if I've woken up.
translation: 我感觉自己仿佛刚刚苏醒。

original: {God Calm, trying to make sense of this}I don't know you, yet I feel like I do, and a feeling of... gratitude. I... {beat, slowly realizes he's in pain}forgive me, I... I'm wounded. This chain... this bear trap on my arm...
translation: 我不认识你，但我仿好像以前在哪儿见过你，我的心里…充满了感激。我...抱歉，我受伤了。这锁链...我手臂上的这个捕兽夹...

original: {God Calm, trying to make sense of this}...how did I even get this far with these wounds? The pain is excruciating, I... I need to rest for a moment.
translation: 我是怎么带着这些伤走这么远的？伤口很疼，我...我要休息一会儿。

original: Your voice... it's different.
translation: 你的声音...变了。

original: Are you all right?
translation: 你还好吧？

original: Dog?
translation: 狗？

original: {God Calm, different voice, calm, but disoriented}Who... who are you? What is this place?
translation: 你...你是谁？这是什么地方？

original: Just go before I change my mind.
translation: 来吧，趁我还没改变主意。

original: I promise I'll try not to get killed.
translation: 我保证我会努力活下去的。

original: We came this far, I'll manage. Go on, let go.
translation: 我们都走到这一步了，剩下的交给我就好。放心地去吧。

original: {Dog, Quiet}You were there all the time...
translation: 你一直都在...

original: {God}...all the time, you were there, and so close...
translation: …一直以来，你都与我如今接近...

original: {God Calm, realization, voice changes as if seeing something}...together.
translation: …与我同在。

original: Then I don't want you to merge, I need you here... Dog, listen to my voice. Dog?
translation: 那我不再坚持让你们融合了，我需要你……狗，听到了吗，狗？

original: {Dog, slightly regretful}Dog understands. Need help, need Dog in case.
translation: 狗明白。让狗帮忙，以防万一。

original: {God, snarling, slightly judging}Of course. You... we might not get through this, otherwise. Need to survive, no matter what the cost. Now... now...
translation: 当然，否则的话，你…我们也许熬不过这一关。无论如何，都要想办法活下去。现在…现在…

original: I don't want you to be under anyone's control, even mine.
translation: 我不想让你被任何人控制，哪怕那个人是我也不行。

original: Not having your help doesn't matter if this heals you.
translation: 没有你们的帮忙也没关系，别太放在心上。

original: {Dog, slightly sad}Dog understands... Dog has done... bad things, knows why voice was...
translation: 狗明白...狗做过不少坏事…也知道那声音为什么...

original: {God, respectful}...furious with him. Tired of the anger. {Beat}Thank you... Courier. Even if it's only for minutes before the Sierra Madre kills us all, then...
translation: …会发火。不想生气了。谢谢你...邮差。哪怕我们也许不久之后都要葬身于这马德雷山脉中，我……

original: {Dog, quiet sad}...Dog hopes you find a way to save self, like you help Dog, and...
translation: ...狗也希望你能找到解救自己的办法，就像你解救了狗一样...

original: {God, saying goodbye}...when you meet him, find a way to save yourself, as you tried to save us. {One last weak joke}Otherwise, I'll be upset with you.
translation: ...你见到他的时候，一定要保护好自己，就像你曾经对我们一样。不然，我可是会感到失望的。

original: Now that you see, I want you to step back, listen to the voice again.
translation: 既然你看见了，我想让你退回来。再听听那个声音。

original: Do you know what happens if you go into the water, Dog?
translation: 你知道你走进水里会发生什么吗？

original: Then... step into the water, step into yourself.
translation: 接下来...走进水里，和你自己融为一体吧。

original: If Dog... if Dog goes into the water... Dog can't help if Master gets mad. {Beat, sad}You were nice to Dog, Dog {emph}wants to help.
translation: 如果狗走进了水里...那主人发狂的时候，狗就帮不上忙了。你对狗很好。狗想帮你。

original: Try to picture the voice, inside, and, uh, turn in and look at it.
translation: 试着把那个声音想成一个实体，然后，呃，再想象你看着他。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Dog can {emph}see the voice. {Frowns, studying his reflection}Looks just like Dog...
translation: [成功] 狗能看见那声音的样子了。似乎和狗长得差不多...

original: Imagine the voice, not as a voice... but as water. Look at the voice now, what do you see?
translation: 把那个声音想成...水面。看着它，你看见了什么？

original: [FAILED] {Confused}Dog... Dog does not understand. Voice? The other voice? {Beat, slight frustration}What do you want Dog to do.
translation: [失败] 狗...狗不明白。声音？另一个声音？你要狗怎么做。

original: As long as you're not planning to blow up the casino now, great.
translation: 只要你不打算炸掉赌场就行。

original: Now, if you've got him on a leash, I need to finish things here.
translation: 既然你已经搞定他了，我还有很多事情要做呢。

original: Are you going to be all right?
translation: 你没事吧？

original: {Firm, eager}Things here... are... under control. {Beat, anger}Find the one that dragged us here, end him.
translation: 目前...还能控制。找到那个把我们绑到这儿来的人，杀了他。

original: That's it, sleep, reject. Sleep like the dead.
translation: 这就对了，睡吧。像个死人一样沉睡吧。

original: Goodnight, Dog. You won't wake up, ever again.
translation: 晚安，狗。你再也不会醒来了。

original: Close your eyes, and only open them if the voice tells you.
translation: 闭上眼睛。除非那个声音叫你打开，你再打开。

original: You did it. You... I don't feel him struggling anymore... I'm in pain, and... I hate to say it, I'm starving, but... I'm not fighting him.
translation: 你做到了。你…我再也感觉不到他的挣扎了…我很痛苦，而且…虽然羞于承认，但我确实很饿，不过…我并不是要击溃他。

original: {A little vulnerable here}All I wanted was him to listen to me, take {emph}care of him, keep him from hurting himself...
translation: 我只是想让他听话而已，照顾他，让他别受伤害……

original: {Quiet, resolved}Now I can. One day, when he's ready, I'll let him out. When we... understand each other.
translation: 现在我终于可以放心了。有朝一日，等时机成熟，当我们可以理解彼此的时候…我会再放他出来。

original: Good... well done, Dog. I'm pleased. Now stay.
translation: 好...做得好，狗。我很满意。在这儿呆着吧。

original: I have some unfinished business. Are you going to be all right?
translation: 我还有些没完成的工作，你没事吧？

original: Yes, well, it had to be done. Now, I need you to remain here.
translation: 好吧，行了，这都是必须的。现在我要你留在这里。

original: {Frowns, building determination, getting empowered}Now {emph}Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid. {Beat}And... {frowns}hungry. {Emph}More hungry.
translation: 狗有话要说。狗不怕了。而且……很饿。更饿了。

original: {Dog, Slightly malicious}Dog will obey. Dog will stay here... for now.
translation: 狗会听话的。狗会暂时……待在这儿。

original: {Slightly unsettling here}After... after that, Dog find food... tear apart food, eat. Chase it down, can't run, feed. Finally, until Dog is full.
translation: 然后……狗会去找吃的，把它扯烂，吞下去。追到它跑不动为止，再吃掉它。直到狗的肚子填饱为止。

original: Aren't you hungry? Go on - feed, piece by piece.
translation: 你不是饿了吗？来，吃吧，慢点嚼。

original: No, hold it tightly by the neck - now sink your teeth into it, tear it apart.
translation: 不，你要牢牢掐住他的脖子，再用力咬下去，撕碎他的喉咙。

original: {God's voice, quiet, horrified}No. No, Dog, no...
translation: 不，不，狗，不...

original: {Dog, eager, slightly amazed}...knows now. Voice was always small... {stronger}Dog could have torn it apart, eaten it all this time, tear it...
translation: …狗明白了。那声音其实很弱小...狗可以把它撕碎，把它生吞活剥...

original: {God}...apart, Dog... we cannot be apart, you need if... hnnnh... hrrhhaharrrrr... {Screams of being torn apart}
translation: …不，狗...我们不能分开，你需要...啊...啊啊啊啊啊...

original: {Dog, Breathing heavy}...Dog... Dog is... empty. The voice... {Beat, slightly evil}Dog is hungrier than ever...
translation: ...狗...狗觉得心里空落落的。那声音...狗感觉比以前更饿了...

original: {1G}I... {chuckles, not unkindly, more relieved}he's asleep. Finally. {To himself}Shhhhhh.
translation: {1G}我... {chuckles, not unkindly, more relieved}他睡着了。终于。{To himself}嘘。

original: {2G - Tired, serious, no malice}Dog... all I wanted was for you to listen to me, let me care for you. Keep you from hurting yourself...
translation: {2G - Tired, serious, no malice}狗…我只想让你听我的话，让我来照顾你吧。我不想让你伤害自己…

original: {3G - Stronger, to himself}Now I can. And one day, when you're ready, I'll let you out. When you're calm, and we... understand each other.
translation: {3G - Stronger, to himself}现在我有能力了。将来有一天，等到时机成熟，当你能冷静下来，我们…能够相互理解时，我会再把你放出来。

original: {4G}And we're at peace, you and I, mind and instinct. Then the world will be ready for us.
translation: {4G}只有这样，我和你，理智和本能，才能彻底达成和解。那时，我们才能共同面对这个世界。

original: {1D}Hello? Voice? You there? {Waits, deliver this as a snarl}It's Dog...{confused}...Dog can hear himself. Voice is... is in cage? Locked.
translation: {1D}嗨？声音？你在么？ {Waits, deliver this as a snarl}剩下狗了...{confused}…狗只能听到自己的声音。声音…关进笼子了？被锁起来了。

original: {2D - Frowns, building determination}Now Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid. {Beat}And... {frowns}hungry. {Emph}More hungry.
translation: {2D - Frowns, building determination}现在狗能说话了。狗不再害怕了。 {Beat}狗...{frowns}很饿。比以前更饿了。

original: {3D - Slightly unsettling here}Dog find food... tear apart food, eat. Chase it down, can't run, feed. Finally, until Dog is full.
translation: {3D - Slightly unsettling here}狗要去找吃的…把食物嚼碎，吞掉。狗要追赶猎物，到它跑不动为止，再吃掉它。狗要吃到肚子饱了为止。

original: {1B}What is this place?
translation: {1B}这里是什么地方？

original: {2B}Feel strange, like... sleeping. On my neck, is this... a chain? I... {recognition, looks down and sees the name carved there}what's carved on my chest?
translation: {2B}好奇怪，感觉就像…做梦一样。我脖子上的是…链条么？我... {recognition, looks down and sees the name carved there}我胸口刻了什么？

original: {3B}"God." No... not God. Something in reverse... hnh. Was that one of them...?
translation: {3B}"神" 。不…不是神。要倒过来看…唔。哪个才是正确的呢……？

original: {4B}Should rest, get my strength back... then explore this place, see what it holds.
translation: {4B}我想先休息一下，恢复体力…再四处看看，搞清楚这个地方。

original: Maybe you just... uh... need to hear another voice, like mine.
translation: 可能你需要…呃…听听别人的话，比如我的。

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED] {Surprised}Master? {Grateful}Master, Dog hoped you come, voice... voice is going...
translation: [成功] 主人？主人，狗一直在等你来，那声音...

original: Dog, Master is here now, Master wants you to stop this.
translation: 狗，主人来了，主人让你停手。

original: [FAILED] {Snarls, draws a ragged breath as he starts fight again}No... Dog is my creature, and he's more than enough to end you here and now.
translation: [失败] 不...狗只听命于我，他现在就可以轻松地把你解决掉。

original: Look, listen to my voice, maybe... maybe I can help.
translation: 听着，听我说，也许…也许我可以帮你。

original: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED]{Nods, slowly}You... were kind to Dog. Dog will listen... Dog is glad you came...
translation: [成功] 你对狗很好。狗会听你的话...你能来，狗很高兴。

original: Dog, I stopped because I don't want to hurt you - now listen. I want to help.
translation: 狗，我停手是因为我不想伤害你——你仔细听着，我想帮你。

original: I don't mean you any harm... you just need to calm down, focus.
translation: 我不想伤害你…你得冷静下来，集中精力。

original: Dog tried. Just hard... hard to hear over voice sometimes... so loud... pain... pain...
translation: 狗试过了。只是有时候很难……很难忽略那个声音...太大声了...痛…好痛...

original: {Snarls, but in pain, weakening}...won't shut me out, Dog. It won't silence me. This human... both of them, they mean to...
translation: …你抑制不了我的，狗。疼痛也无法让我消失。这个人类...他们两个，他们都想...

original: {Whispering}...help Dog, please. Please.
translation: ...帮帮狗，求你了。求你了。

original: Forget it. I'm sick of dragging you around anyway.
translation: 算了。我也不想再带着你这个拖油瓶了。

original: Dog knows... please... help Dog end the voice, Dog just wants it to go away. Dog...
translation: 狗知道...请你...帮狗解决掉那个声音吧，狗只想让它消失。狗...

original: {Amused, gets second wind}...and I have more in common than we know. Soon, you'll be inside Dog, just as I am.
translation: …与我有着许多共同点，甚至远超出我的想象。很快，你就会和我一样，变成狗肚子里的蛔虫。

original: Bite down on it, chew until it's silent, then swallow it.
translation: 咬住它，让它安静下来，然后吞掉。

original: Dog... don't do this, listen to me, my voice.
translation: 狗...别这样做，听我说，听我的声音。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Surprised}Master? {Grateful}Master, Dog hoped you would come, voice... voice is going...
translation: [成功] 主人？主人，狗一直在等你来，那声音…那声音要…

original: Dog, Master is here now, Master wants you to stop this.
translation: 狗，主人来了，主人要你住手。

original: [FAILED] {Pleading}Dog... Dog wants to, Dog does, but...
translation: [失败] 狗…狗要听，狗听了，但是...

original: Dog, that voice doesn't control you, all right?
translation: 狗，那个声音没有控制你，知道吗？

original: {Sad}Dog tried to shut it out, tried to hurt self enough to make it...
translation: 狗试过让他闭嘴，还试过用自残的方式来让它…

original: {Evil}...quiet. Shhhhh, Dog. Let me handle this. {Malicious}I'll let you feed on this human when we're done.
translation: ...安静。嘘，狗，交给我吧。等一切都结束，我就拿这个人类给你打牙祭。

original: Fine, reject. You want to die? I'll accomodate you.
translation: 好啊，你这个废物。想找死吗？我可以满足你的愿望。

original: {Sad, despairing}Dog doesn't want to die. But the voice keeps shouting, and...
translation: 狗不想死。但那声音还在嘶吼，还...

original: You're not leaving me any choice, I have to stop you.
translation: 你让我别无选择，我必须阻止你。

original: {Sad}Dog is sorry, so sorry, didn't want to, but...
translation: 狗很抱歉，非常抱歉，不想这样，但是...

original: {Cold, malicious}...it's time for you to realize who's in control here. First, we tear you apart - then this casino, and the Old Man with it.
translation: …该让你知道谁才是这里的老大了。首先，我们会把你撕成碎片，然后砸烂整个赌场，让那个老不死的一同陪葬。

original: What are you, exactly? You're acting different than before.
translation: 你到底是谁？你和之前表现得不太一样。

original: Dog and I take turns in the cage... one steps out, the other goes back in. Now - what do you want?
translation: 我和狗轮流待在笼子里... 一个出来，另一个就进去。所以，你有何贵干？

original: {DUPE: Low, cold, hates Dog's self-mutilation}Do you see these wounds of his, covering his skin...the bear trap on his arm? He placed his own hand in it.
translation: {Low, cold, hates Dog's self-mutilation}你看到他浑身上下遍布的伤口…还有他胳膊上的捕熊夹了吗？是他自己把手伸进去的。

original: The name he carved in his chest? To remind him of who he is, he inflicts pain on himself to silence me, when all I try to do... Hrr!
translation: 他还在胸口刻上了自己的名字，好时刻提醒自己是谁。为了不让我出声，他不断地摧残自己的肉体。而我只是想……唔！

original: {Quiet, more to himself}...he cuts, hurts, and tries to murder me out of him. He won't succeed. Just makes me angrier.
