translation: {Quiet, more to himself}…他故意弄伤自己，就为了将我从他的体内赶走。他不会成功的，这只会让我更加愤怒。

original: Dog is the beast, we simply change cages. {Glances around}Like the ones here.
translation: 狗是一头野兽，我们只是换了个笼子。{Glances around}就像眼前这间笼子一样。

original: Dog and I take turns in the cage... one steps out, the other goes back in.
translation: 我和狗轮流待在笼子里... 一个出来，另一个就进去。

original: I heard electricity and radios can cause, uh, voices in people's heads.
translation: 我听说长期接触电流和无线电信号会让人，呃，出现幻听。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Snarls}That's the easy explanation, the one {emph}humans use. Pre-War technology, as if it's the cause of all ills, mind and body.
translation: [成功] 这是个万金油一般的解释，人类编造的借口罢了。仿佛一切生理或心理上的疾病都是战前科技造成的。

original: I {emph}needed to come out of the cage to protect Dog. {Disdain}From clever humans... like you.
translation: 我只是想走出笼子，保护狗。让他不会被你这样……聪明的人类利用。

original: In Super Mutants, brain damage is usually the result of prolonged Stealth Boy usage.
translation: 对于超级变种人来说。脑损伤通常是长期过量使用隐形小子造成的。

original: [FAILED] {Taunting, playing games}Perhaps. Or maybe I was here all the time, watching. Waiting for you.
translation: [失败] 可能吧。也可能因为我一直都待在这里，等着你现身。

original: Did you hit your head or something? You're acting odd.
translation: 你是撞到头了还是怎么的？你表现得很古怪。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Slightly wary, player's onto something}Trauma... yes, in a manner of speaking.
translation: [成功] 创伤...没错，可以这样说。

original: You have multiple personality disorder. Some trauma caused this?
translation: 你有多重人格失调症。是创伤导致的？

original: [FAILED] {Taunting, playing games}No... sometimes it simply wakes voices up.
translation: [失败] 不...有时候我脑子里就是会突然响起某种声音。

original: {1 - Sad, sing song}...going to make casino burn, no more being...
translation: {1 - Sad, sing song}…我要烧掉赌场，不必再……

original: {2 - "No more being..."}...back in the cage. Stop what you're doing, we can...
translation: {2 - "No more being..."}…回到笼子里了。快住手，我们可以……

original: {3 - "we"}...can hear you now. {Beat, cold}Not much longer, not...
translation: {3 - "we"}…可以听见你了。{Beat, cold}不必了，不必了……

original: {4 - snarling, "you're not..."}...listening to me. {Frustrated, furious, emph}Tired of being your minder, tired...
translation: {4 - snarling, "you're not..."}…听我说。 {Frustrated, furious, emph}我不想再照顾你了，不想再…

original: {5 - "tired"}...of putting Dog to sleep, he wakes up in cage, hungry, Dog wants...
translation: {5 - "tired"}…让狗沉睡了，他每次都饿着肚子从笼子里醒来，狗想要…

original: {6 - "wants"}...to protect you, always wanted to protect you, the reason I have to take control is...
translation: {6 - "wants"}…保护你，我一直想保护你，我之所以想控制这具躯体，是因为…

original: {7 - "The reason I have to take control is..."}...Master. Master set me free, Dog needs to...
translation: {7 - "The reason I have to take control is..."}…主人，主人把我放了出来，狗必须…

original: {8 - "You need to"}...listen to me. {Sudden moment of weakness, slight plea}If you do this, we {emph}both...
translation: {8 - "You need to"}…听我说。 {Sudden moment of weakness, slight plea}如果你这么做的话，我们 {emph}都会…

original: {9 - "We both"}...die. Dog wants to die. Don't care anymore, tired of you, tired of place. Master will...
translation: {9 - "We both"}…死。狗想要去死。狗一点也不在乎，受够了你，受够了这个地方。主人会…

original: {10 - "Master will"}...help us. Please let me help us. If you don't, then you're...
translation: {10 - "Master will"}…救我们的。我可以帮助我们两个。如果你不肯，那你就会…

original: [The Hologram nods.]
translation: [全息影像点了点头。]

original: Do you have anything I can buy?
translation: 我能从你这儿买点东西吗？

original: [The Hologram flickers in acknowledgement.]
translation: [全息影像闪了闪，以示告别。]

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: [Christine's eyes dart in the direction of the screeching sound. She looks frightened and trembles slightly, as if fighting an urge to run.]
translation: [克莉丝汀朝着惨叫传来的方向望去。她看起来十分恐惧，身体微微颤抖着，似乎挣扎着想要逃跑。]

original: Reach around to the chain on your neck, see if you can find a key.
translation: 在你脖子上的锁链附近摸摸，有没有一把钥匙？

original: Go to the Fountain and wait for me there.
translation: 去喷泉那儿等我。

original: {Eager, a little quiet}Master, Dog waited a long time... brought you many people. If Dog finds more, will bring them to the Fountain, Dog promises.
translation: 是，主人。狗等了这么久...给你带了很多人来。狗保证会再抓一些人，把他们带到喷泉那里去。

original: Fine. Let's go, follow me.
translation: 好，走吧，跟上。

original: Yes, Master. Dog waited a long time... brought you many people. Dog will follow.
translation: 是，主人。狗等了这么久...给你带了很多人来。狗这就跟上。

original: Already have a Dog with you... Dog will meet you at the Fountain. {Slightly too eager}Maybe find food on the way.
translation: 你已经有只狗跟着了...狗会在喷泉那里和你会合。路上可能会找些吃的。

original: Shut up, reject, and give me the key. Now.
translation: 闭嘴，废物，马上把钥匙给我。

original: {Bad Node: Cringing}Yes, Master. Here, Dog sorry, Dog... just... {Beat}just let Dog out of the cage. Don't want to be here any longer.
translation: 是，主人。给你，狗很抱歉，狗…只要你肯放狗出来就行。狗不想再待在笼子里了。

original: Just give me the key - you want out of the cage, don't you?
translation: 把钥匙给我就行了——你也想逃出笼子，不是吗？

original: {Good Node, slightly confused}Yes, Master... Master sounds different, quieter. Master... {Beat}Dog doesn't want to be in the cage any more. Dog will be good this time, Dog promises.
translation: 是的，主人...主人声音不一样了，更温和了。主人...狗不想再进笼子了。狗保证这次一定会乖乖的。

original: Now that you are awake, Master wants you to listen, Dog.
translation: 既然你醒了，主人现在要你听从命令。

original: {Nods, quiet}Master, Dog is here. What does Master want?
translation: 主人，狗就在这儿。主人想要什么？

original: I need your obedience. First, I'm going to show you a trick.
translation: 我需要你服从。不过首先，我给你表演个魔术吧。

original: Does Master want Dog to fetch someone? {Beat, quiet}Dog will hunt down whoever you want, bring them here.
translation: 主人想要狗捉什么人吗？只要你想捉的，狗都可以照办，把他们捉来。

original: Dog, hidden on you is the key. Find it, and toss it to me.
translation: 狗，钥匙就藏在你身上，把它扔给我。

original: Dog... Dog doesn't have a... hnh. Here it is. {Frowns}Dog... Dog didn't know it was there. {Frowns, suspicious}How did it get there?
translation: 狗...狗身上没有...啊。找到了。狗不知道身上有钥匙。它是怎么跑到身上的？

original: Surprised they could hear you over the alarm bell outside.
translation: 外面警报声那么大，能听见才奇怪呢。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Very good. Yes... it's another layer of white noise to ensure privacy. Unfortunately, it's also acted as a dinner bell for the residents.
translation: [成功] 是的...这确实是一层可以保护隐私的白噪音。但坏消息是，对于这里的居民而言，这也约等于是开饭铃。

original: As long as the holographic greeter outside is active, however, I can get by them... the Holograms fascinate them. Ghost-worship, perhaps.
translation: 不过，只要外面的全息迎宾员还在运作，我就能从它们身边偷偷溜过去…它们对全息影像特别着迷，可能崇拜幽灵吧。

original: ...and the alarm sound outside helps as well. Your doing?
translation: …外面的警报声也屏蔽了窃听。你干的？

original: [FAILED] Yes... interesting that. {To himself, irritated by Ghost People outside}More like a dinner bell to some.
translation: [失败] 没错...挺有趣的。不过对某些东西来说，那警报声更像是开饭铃。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 什么意思？

original: The... inhabitants of the Villa. They are difficult to kill. {Pause}They need to be chopped apart, hacked on the ground... disintegrated, if you can.
translation: 别墅区里的…居民，它们很难被杀死。得把它们剁成肉块，或者趁倒地的时候劈烂它们……最好能把它们熔化分解掉。

original: They are difficult to kill... but not to devour. {Beat}And Dog is always hungry.
translation: 虽然它们很难被杀死…但吞下去倒是不难。而且狗一直都很饿。

original: If he is with you, when they fall, he will fall on them, end them. If I am with you... fighting will be far more difficult.
translation: 如果让他来帮你，在它们倒下的时候，狗就会扑上去，给它们致命一击。如果我和你一起的话...战斗就会变得更加艰难。

original: In that case, I will bring him along, I don't need you.
translation: 既然这样，我就叫他出来吧，用不着你了。

original: {Laughs}And so... greed, practical or otherwise, has its day.
translation: 看来…在贪婪面前，务实并不重要。

original: Even if Dog is more helpful, we can manage.
translation: 就算狗的用处更大，我也更相信我们俩的能力。

original: {Chuckles, amused}I am not sure you belong here. No, you don't belong here.
translation: 看来你的性格和这地方不太搭啊。对，你确实和这里不搭。

original: Yet... {appraising player}you came this far. And I'm not interested in remaining here any longer. I'll unlock the cage.
translation: 可…你居然还能走这么远。算了，我也没兴趣在这儿耗着了。我这就打开笼子。

original: I can't convince you I'm not here for the Sierra Madre or the Old Man, so I'll prove it.
translation: 我不是为了马德雷山脉，也不是为了那个糟老头而来的，既然说服不了你，我就证明给你看。

original: {Frowns}Prove it... how? Words are worthless.
translation: 证明...怎么证明？说什么都是没有意义的。

original: I have the power to let Dog out of his cage. I'm going to prove it by not doing it.
translation: 我随时都能把狗放出笼子，但为了证明我的诚意，我不想这么做。

original: {Studying the player}Hnh. No... no, you're not. {Confused here, slow, since flies in the face of reason}Even though Dog's more docile... easier to control.
translation: 唔。确实…你不会的。尽管狗更加温顺，更容易控制。

original: {Questioning}You may regret this. This place... this place is where creatures like Dog can survive. The people that fill its streets...
translation: 不过你可能会后悔。这个地方…这个地方只有像狗那样的生物才能够生存。街道上横行的那些东西……

original: He is as vicious, more vicious than them. His hunger can help you more than I can. When I am in control... this shell is difficult to... fight in.
translation: 他比它们要凶残，凶残得多。也许和我比起来，他的饥饿对你而言更有用，在我控制这副躯体的时候，我是很难用它来……战斗的。

original: Calm down. Follow me, willingly, I won't do it.
translation: 别激动。只要你自己肯出来，我就不播录音。

original: {Echoing the player}No, you wouldn't. If you did, you won't escape this place alive. I'd shatter every one of your limbs to splinters and leave you here.
translation: 你当然不敢。否则你就别想活着走出这个地方。我会扯断你的四肢，把你扔在这里等死。

original: You think I'm afraid of your collar exploding, killing us? No, I'll leave you breathing, then keep walking until {emph}my collar goes cold.
translation: 你以为我会顾忌项圈爆炸，不敢对你动手吗？不，我会留你一口气，然后我就远走高飞，一直走到我的项圈冷却下来为止。

original: I'll prop your broken body in view of the Sierra Madre so you can see what you came to steal... forever out of reach as you die.
translation: 我会把你苟延残喘的躯体挂在刚好能远眺到马德雷山脉赌场的地方，让你望眼欲穿地看着自己求而不得的东西…慢慢死去。

original: Goodbye, whoever you are... I'm going to let Dog out of his cage.
translation: 再见，不管你是谁……我要把狗放出来了。

original: No! No, no, don't! I'll make you suffer for this, I promise you.
translation: 不！不，不，不要！我一定会让你生不如死，我发誓。

original: {End Bad Node}Although it may not matter... I suspect the Sierra Madre will be reward enough for ones like you.
translation: 算了，无关紧要了……对你这种人，也许马德雷山脉赌场就是最好的奖赏。

original: What if we go after the Old Man together?
translation: 要是我们一起去找那个糟老头算账呢？

original: No... I don't trust you. Even if you're not working with him, you'll fall into the same trap he did.
translation: 不...我不相信你。就算你和他不是一伙儿的，你也会和他一样掉进利欲熏心的深渊中。

original: {Slow taunting}You may think you can take your revenge... that'll change. You'll start thinking there's a way to have it all.
translation: 也许你现在满脑子只想着复仇…但人心是会生变的。很快，你就会想要独吞这里的一切。

original: I want my freedom, too. You think I like having this collar on me?
translation: 我也想要自由。你以为我愿意戴着项圈？

original: {Low, quiet}They all wanted their freedom at first. Then... they realized they could get inside the Sierra Madre.
translation: 他们一开始都想要自由。可后来…他们发现自己还可以进入马德雷山脉赌场。

original: After that, their freedom wasn't important any more. They couldn't let go, just like the Old Man. So you say you want your freedom...
translation: 于是自由也就变得不再重要了。他们不懂得放手，和那个老头一样。所以，你说你想要自由...

original: No... even if you feel that way, it won't last. You'll forget, get greed-blind, and you'll turn.
translation: 不…即便你现在这么想，将来呢？你会忘记的，会被贪婪蒙蔽双眼，然后你就会变成另一个人。

original: The Old Man's voice is on my Pip-Boy, just like yours.
translation: 那个糟老头的声音就在我的哔哔小子里，还有你的录音。

original: I can play his voice, yes. I have an audio log from him on my Pip-Boy.
translation: 我可以播放他的声音。是的，我的哔哔小子里有他的录音。

original: {Pauses}You... {snarling}don't play it. {Snarls}If you do, I'll find a way to get out of the cage, end you. I'll murder you, crush your arms and legs until...
translation: 你…别播。如果你播了，我会立刻冲出笼子杀了你。我会把你打得面目全非，扯断你的两条腿和胳膊，直到...

original: If he hears the Old Man's voice, he'll do what the Old Man says.
translation: 如果他听见那糟老头的声音，那他肯定会服从的。

original: {Suspicious}Dog... obeys. Yes. {Wary, this was unexpected}Why... do you have some means of contacting the Old Man?
translation: 狗…是的，他会服从的。怎么…你有办法联系上那糟老头吗？

original: Do you want to die? Cooperate, or you're both dead.
translation: 你想死吗？合作点，不然你们俩都会死。

original: I could just tell Dog he has the key.
translation: 我可以直接告诉狗，钥匙就在他身上。

original: {Frowns, slightly hesitant}Yes... you could. {Recovers}And once he was out, all starving and hungry... what do you think he would do then?
translation: 没错...你可以。但他如此饥肠辘辘，你把他放出来的话...你觉得会发生什么呢？

original: {Warning}Be careful what cage you open, because he won't go back in it without a fight. He'll tear you apart, he won't care if it kills you both.
translation: 打开笼子前，你可要想清楚，毕竟再想把他关进去可就没那么容易了。他会把你大卸八块的，他也不在乎是否会和你同归于尽。

original: The key's in there with you - and Dog.
translation: 钥匙就在你——和狗身上。

original: {Cruel, laughing}Yes, but Dog doesn't know that. We don't share everything. Sometimes it's a blessing... sometimes... it causes difficulties.
translation: 没错，但狗不知道。我们的记忆不共享。有时这是好事…有时…也会造成一些困扰。

original: Now I think it's a blessing, it keeps you on that side of the cage. Now... you go fetch. Find your master, bring him here so we can talk.
translation: 就目前来说，这显然是件好事，因为这样一来，你就打不开笼子了…你走吧。去把你的主子带来，否则免谈。

original: I could order Dog to come with me. I bet he'd obey.
translation: 我可以命令狗和我一起走，他会服从的。

original: {Laughs}Dog? You're not talking to him now, are you? No, even if you could drag Dog out of his cage, you still couldn't get him out of {emph}this cage.
translation: 哈，狗？但现在和你说话的并不是他吧？不，就算你能把狗从笼子里拽出来，你也没办法让他离开眼前这个笼子。

original: {Smug}I put him here for a reason... if he could have escaped, he would have. So here he stays.
translation: 我把他关在这儿是有原因的...要是他跑得掉，他早跑了。所以他哪儿也去不了。

original: If you don't come with me, he'll set off our collars - yours and mine.
translation: 如果你不跟我走，他就会引爆我们两个人的项圈。

original: Then I still win. I'd rather die in this cell than have Dog follow him any longer, follow his orders, his commands, desperate for recognition.
translation: 那我也赢了，我宁可死在这牢房里，也不要让狗再对他俯首帖耳，唯命是从，任由他摆布，渴望得到他的赏识。

original: The Old Man... he has the need to hold on, to the past, to the Madre... I'd rather be free, let go of this shell, than have it cage me any longer.
translation: 那个糟老头…对自己的过去，对马德雷山脉，都有很深的执念…而我只想要自由，我想从这个躯壳中解脱，不再受它束缚。

original: Why did you surround yourself with all these radios?
translation: 为什么你让这些收音机围绕着你？

original: [SUCCEEDED] They were here when I arrived... so I made use of them, in a manner of speaking. More their... voices, really.
translation: [成功] 我来的时候，它们就在这里了…所以某种意义上说，我确实利用了它们。我想多制造一些…杂音。

original: These collars... they don't just track us. You can eavesdrop on them as well. Tune to a frequency, and you can hear everything someone is saying.
translation: 这些项圈…不仅能追踪我们的方位，还可以用来窃听。只要调到一个固定频率，就能听到他人说的每一句话。

original: {Slightly amused}So perhaps it's a good thing that Dog swallowed his collar. Anyone listening would find it difficult to hear past the... digestion.
translation: 所以狗把项圈吞进肚子里，未尝不是一件好事。毕竟要透过消化系统来偷听……恐怕还是挺困难的。

original: These radios, were you using them for signal interference?
translation: 这些收音机，你是在利用它们干扰信号吗？

original: [FAILED] I was afraid Dog would get lonely. The voices, as static and whispering as they are... are still company.
translation: [失败] 我害怕狗会寂寞，这些声音就算只是微弱的白噪，对他而言也是一种陪伴。

original: So... you're locked in there? Where's the key?
translation: 所以...你被关在里面了？钥匙呢？

original: [SUCCEEDED] The key? Why it's the Old Man, the one who brought us here.
translation: [成功] 钥匙？钥匙就是那个老头，把我们绑架到这里来的人。

original: I hid the key on me so Dog wouldn't know... I just need the Old Man to show up, so he and I can talk.
translation: 我把钥匙藏在身上了，免得狗找到...我要那个老头亲自过来和我面谈。

original: If Dog was in control when the Old Man appeared... well, he would just do whatever he commanded, as always. And I can't have that.
translation: 如果那个老头出现时，狗还在控制这具躯体...那他就会和以前一样，对那个老头言听计从。我不能允许这种事情发生。

original: You wouldn't have locked yourself in there without some sort of key to let you out.
translation: 如果你没有钥匙之类的东西，你是不可能把自己关在里面的。

original: [FAILED] It's close, safe, as you know.
translation: [失败] 就在附近，很安全。

original: [FAILED] It's close, safe. I did lock myself in, after all.
translation: [失败] 就在附近，很安全。毕竟，是我自己把自己关起来的。

original: Wait. So you... or Dog... doesn't know the key is on him?
translation: 等等。所以你…我是说狗…不知道钥匙其实就藏在自己身上？

original: {Sarcastic}Dog and I don't share... everything. What {emph}I know, {emph}he doesn't.
translation: 狗和我的记忆…并不相通。我知道的事情，他不知道。

original: What he knows... what little he knows... I don't. For example, your arrival is a surprise. I wished {emph}that I could have remembered, I'm sure Dog knew.
translation: 而他知道的事情…哪怕只有一丁点…我也一概不知。比如，你的到来对我而言就是个意外。我也希望自己能想起来，我敢说狗肯定知道。

original: {To himself, angry}And when he's feeding, well... I sometimes have to find out about it later. Now all there is to do is wait for my intended guest.
translation: 至于他吃进嘴里的东西…这么说吧，有一些我得过了很久才能搞明白。至于现在，我只想待在这儿，等着我期望的那个人出现。

original: If you locked him... you... in, what if you couldn't get out?
translation: 既然是你把他...和你自己……锁住的，万一你出不来怎么办？

original: {Malicious, slightly smug}Oh, I have the key, always did. {Disgusted}Hid it on the chain behind my neck before Dog came bursting out, eating everything he could.
translation: 哦，我当然有钥匙。在狗冲出笼子，将一切吃干抹净之前，我已经把它藏在了我脖子后面的锁链上。

original: Wanted to make sure whoever came to fetch Dog spoke to {emph}me first, got within reach. Instead... I get you.
translation: 本想着无论谁来找他，都得先过我这一关。没想到……等到的人是你。

original: So why did you bring me here?
translation: 所以你为什么抓我到这儿？

original: What is he doing here?
translation: 他来这儿干嘛？

original: {Taunting}Heard the call of the Sierra Madre, just like you did... {emph}exactly the same way.
translation: 他听到了马德雷山脉赌场的呼唤，和你……一模一样。

original: {Slow, reflective here}Finds out it's more than a story, {sarcasm bleeds in}comes to this shining poisonous grail, this jewel of the desert.
translation: 他发现这里不仅仅是个传说，于是不远万里寻找这座光辉璀璨却又充满剧毒的圣杯，这颗沙漠中的明珠。

original: {Anger comes back}Dog knows him more than I do. Dog's always nodding, always obeying him, because he's weak and hungry and greedy for master's affection.
translation: 狗比我更了解他。狗总是对他点头哈腰，言听计从，因为他太过弱小，太过饥饿，渴望得到主人的宠爱。

original: Scorched by the sun?
translation: 在烈日下化为焦土？

original: {More reflective than normal, not malicious}The Old Man... this "Elijah," tried to hold the sun in his hands, arrogance, was cast down for it. Icarus' crime was to fly too high, Elijah...
translation: 那个老头..."以利亚"，他想把太阳握在手心，结果因为傲慢自大，受到了惩罚。伊卡洛斯的罪过就是因为飞得太高，而以利亚……

original: {Anger comes back}Elijah wanted to bring the sun down to {emph}him. Hnh! {Snorts}Arrogance.
translation: 以利亚竟然想让太阳从天而降，落到他身边。哼！真是自不量力。

original: No idea, I was unconscious the whole time.
translation: 不知道，我完全没有意识。

original: I don't remember, only woke up when my Pip-Boy went active.
translation: 我不记得，只记得我的哔哔小子启动，我就醒了。

original: {Thinking}Must have already been in the cage... already had the collar in me. You're lucky Dog didn't devour you... otherwise, we'd be closer than we are now.
translation: 看来那时候我已经关在笼子里了…项圈也在我肚子里了。你很走运，狗没有吃掉你。否则咱俩现在的关系可就要近多了。

original: Why do you say that?
translation: 你为什么这么说？

original: I don't remember you... that isn't surprising. What is... is that it was when Dog was out of his cage... free, hungry.
translation: 我不记得你…这件事并不令我惊讶。真正令我吃惊的是，在我刚把狗从笼子里放出来时……他是饿着肚子的。

original: He knows not to eat anything he catches in the traps... after that, however... so he dragged you here, you got spared.
translation: 他知道不可以吃陷阱里的东西…但在那之后…他把你大老远拖到这儿来，你却毫发无伤。

original: {Thinking}Dog must have fed {emph}after you arrived... once he was fed, that allowed me out of the cage, and put him inside. {Beat, curious}Do you remember how long you were out?
translation: 所以在你抵达这里之后的时间里，狗一定吃过东西…正因为他吃饱了，我才有办法出来，把他关回笼子。你记得自己昏过去多长时间吗？

original: So you know the way back?
translation: 那你知道回去的路吗?

original: The way back doesn't matter... try to leave, try to disobey, and your collar ends the journey faster than you can say, "begin again."
translation: 回去的路并不重要…只要你试图离开，或是违抗他的命令，那在你还没来得及说出"从头再来"之前，你的项圈就会送你上路。

original: You're clever, you'd be able to find a way back if you left the Villa. Dog can... I can find the way back, if "back" is where I even wanted to go.
translation: 你很聪明，如果离开别墅区，你肯定能自己找到回去的路。狗...我也可以找到回去的路，但前提是我有地方去 。

original: Until the Old Man lets you go, you're going nowhere. This beautiful paradise, with all its toxins and death... it's home.
translation: 除非那糟老头放你走，否则你哪儿也去不了。这个美丽的天堂，这个充满毒气与死亡的地方……就是你的家。

original: You brought me here to the Villa.
translation: 所以是你把我抓到这个别墅区来的。

original: Me? You think I want to haul bodies around the wastes like a Brahmin at the whip? {Snarling, spitting}No, Dog does it, when the Old Man says fetch, Dog fetches.
translation: 我？难道你认为我愿意像一只带轭的双头牛似的，在废土上拖着几个大活人四处晃荡？不，抓你来的是狗。那个糟老头命令他做什么，他就做什么。

original: You were in a man-trap, and Dog made his rounds, and dragged you here. When, I don't know. But... it must have been... recent. Before the cage.
translation: 你踩中了陷阱，狗查看陷阱的时候发现了你，就把你拖到这儿来了。至于这是什么时候发生的事，我不知道，但…肯定是……不久以前。在我进这个笼子之前。

original: This Old Man, what do you know about him?
translation: 关于那个糟老头，你知道些什么？

original: Elijah. Human, weak like all of you are. Feeling age circling him like starved dogs, howling for blood.
translation: 他叫以利亚。人类，和你们一样弱小。衰老仿佛一群咆哮的饿犬围着他，随时都会将他吞噬。

original: To me, he reeks of age and failure. And madness. {Beat}To me, he is simply the "Old Man." To Dog, he is "Master." His name, meaningless.
translation: 对我来说，他散发着一股老而无成却又偏执疯狂的臭气。在我眼里，他就是"糟老头"而已。但对狗来说，他却是"主人"。至于他的名字，没有意义。

original: Running out of years, hopes and dreams running through his withered hands like sand from the Big Empty... and scorched by the sun.
translation: 他时日无多了，希望和梦想仿佛大空山里的沙子，正从他那双干枯的手中滑落…在烈日下化为焦土。

original: Why do you say I'm the same as the Old Man?
translation: 为什么你说我和那个糟老头一样？

original: {Disgust, player doesn't get it}You're not him anymore than I'm Dog. But that collar around your neck...
translation: 你和他的关系，如同我和狗。但你脖子上的那个项圈…

original: ...you're an extension of the Old Man's grasp, clumsy, perhaps, but a tool, yes. And once you get acclimated to the Sierra Madre...
translation: …你就是个工具，替那个糟老头发号施令，虽然不太灵光，但懂得听使唤。等你适应了马德雷山脉赌场的环境…

original: ...then you'll feel the same overpowering hunger the Old Man does. And then you'll {emph}be him, not just his hand.
translation: ...你就会变得和那糟老头一样贪得无厌。到时候你就会想取代他的位置，不再只甘作他的爪牙。

original: Do you know how I got here?
translation: 你知道我是怎么到这儿来的吗？

original: {Amused}Of course I know. {Snarling}Even if I don't see it happen - down in the cage, I hear echoes of the footfalls, the click of the collars.
translation: 当然知道。就算我关在笼子里，没有亲眼看见，我也听到了脚步的回声和项圈的响动。

original: {Furious}Every time I see one of you, I know exactly how you got here - you couldn't help yourselves, anymore than Dog can help himself.
translation: 你们这种人，我不用猜都知道你们是怎么到这儿来的——因为你们无法压抑自己的欲望，就像狗一样。

original: {Accusing}You heard the voice, the promise, and then you walked right into one of the Old Man's traps. Then... then Dog comes for you, drags you here.
translation: 你听到广播里的声音，以为有利可图，就迫不及待地一脚踏进了那个老头设下的陷阱里。接着……接着狗就把你扛到了这里。

original: Forget it. I had other questions.
translation: 算了。我还有别的问题。

original: Maybe you shouldn't go around shoving Old World tech in your stomach.
translation: 也许你不该不分青红皂白就把旧世界的科技产品往嘴里塞。

original: {Sneers}As if I had a choice. Sometimes instinct takes over, and that's when {emph}I go into the cage. {Beat, superior}It's like curiosity that way.
translation: 你以为我有办法控制吗？有时冲动是抑制不住的，而那种时候我通常都在笼子里关着呢。主要还是好奇心作祟。

original: {Taunting}After all, you wouldn't have put that collar on by choice... perhaps it was {emph}your curiosity that caused that hand to close on your neck.
translation: 何况，你的脖子上不也套了个项圈吗…也许你也一样是因为好奇心，才会不小心踩中别人的圈套吧？

original: How the hell did you... or whoever... eat one of these collars?
translation: 且不说你的情况…那个项圈…究竟是怎么到你肚子里的？

original: {Frowns}They... detach. When segmented, they look like nothing more than metallic Radscorpions... and if they're attached to neck flesh, warm, red...
translation: 它…松脱了。脱下来以后，它的样子就像是一只铁皮辐射蝎…如果把它贴在脖子上，就会发热，变红……

original: {Angry}Dog doesn't {emph}care what's on the body he's crushing in his hands, he'll mangle it, twist it, make it fit until he's full.
translation: 狗根本不在乎他手里抓着的是什么，他只会将那东西撕成稀巴烂，然后塞进嘴里，直到填饱自己的肚子为止。

original: {Quiet}Dog can't help himself... hungry... greedy. And now the collar's inside, alive again. And we're trapped here until it goes cold.
translation: 狗控制不了自己…他太饥饿…太贪心了。现在肚子里的项圈又启动了。除非它再次冷却，否则我们只能被困在这里。

original: If that collar inside you is active, I didn't switch it on.
translation: 如果你肚子里的项圈动了，那肯定不是我干的。

original: {Suspicious}Really. Yet it led you here, to me. And now you're here, and it's burning a hole in my guts. Maybe it's crying for its owner.
translation: 确实。然而是它指引你来找我的。你也确实找到了。现在我的内脏都快要被它烧穿了。可能它是在呼唤自己的主人吧。

original: If you weren't expecting me, who were you waiting for?
translation: 你不是在等我，那是在等谁？

original: Don't play stupid, I already have to mind {emph}one child. {Beat}You {emph}must have figured it out by now.
translation: 别装傻了，我可没兴致陪你过家家。你应该清楚我说的是谁。

original: {To himself}The Old Man obsessed with the Sierra Madre... riddled with greed. {Beat, predatory}Hoped you might be him when I woke up. All you are is his hand...
translation: 那个糟老头对马德雷山脉赌场十分痴迷…他的脸上写满了贪婪。我醒来的时候，还以为来找我的人是他，结果来的却是他的爪牙…

original: ...you're the same kind of greed. Followed the radio, the broadcast, and now you're here, all confused. Not for long. You'll figure it out.
translation: ...你也和他一样，贪得无厌。你跟着广播，稀里糊涂地到了这里。再过不久，你也会明白我说的话。

original: I need to get you out of there.
translation: 我要把你放出来。

original: No... no, I don't think so. Even in here, I have more control than you do.
translation: 不...不，我不同意。哪怕被关在笼子里，我现在也比你更占据主动权。

original: I'm not leaving until the one who controls the collars shows... not his voice, not his hand, not his lackey... him.
translation: 除非我见到控制项圈的那个人，否则我是不会离开这里的…我不想听他的声音，也不想见他的走狗…我要他本人亲自来。

original: And when he comes to see me, we'll settle things. So go on, go back to your master, tell him I'm waiting for him. Dog may follow him - I won't.
translation: 等他来了之后，我会和他做个了断。所以，你走吧，回去找你的主子吧，告诉他我在等他。也许狗会听他的话，但我不会。

original: Why did you lock yourself in the cage?
translation: 为什么你要把自己锁在笼子里？

original: No... why did {emph}I lock him in the cage. {Beat, malicious}I locked him in because I could feel him... getting hungry again. There wasn't much time.
translation: 不…是我把他锁在了笼子里。因为我感觉……他又饿了。我当时没有多少时间。

original: If Dog roams, he gets into trouble... eats things he shouldn't, listens to others he shouldn't... so he's safer in here. We're safer in here.
translation: 如果放任狗四处乱跑，他一定会惹上麻烦…吃不该吃的东西，听不该听的话...所以他在这儿更安全。*我们*在这儿更安全。

original: I hoped if I locked him in here... the one he obeys would come for him. {Disgust}Instead, I get you.
translation: 我原以为只要把他关在笼子里…操纵他的幕后主使就会现身。没想到，来的却是你。

original: I was looking for someone with a collar like mine. Where is your collar?
translation: 我在找和我一样戴着项圈的人。你的项圈呢？

original: {Angry}It's close. Closer than I'd like... {frustrated}Dog's been into things, needs to think before he eats, chew before he swallows. He's... eager that way.
translation: 它近在咫尺，比我想得还近……狗太着急了，他在吃东西前应该先想一想，在狼吞虎咽前应该先嚼一嚼。他在这方面……太过饥渴了。

original: Now the collar's a part of me. Inside. {Slow, feeling it in his gut}I can feel its electronic heartbeat, clicking and burning down below... {thinking}like before.
translation: 现在，项圈已经成为了我的一部分，留在了我的体内。我能感受到它电流的脉动，在我的胃里震颤、发热……就像以前一样。

original: {Suspicious}It was cold and heavy before going in the cage... {suspicious}now you're here, and it's pulling and kicking again, tugging like a leash. Interesting.
translation: 本来在进笼子之前，它又冰又沉…可自从你来之后，它又开始蠢蠢欲动，仿佛狗链似的拽着我。有趣。

original: I can't leave until we get through this.
translation: 你不跟我走的话，我也走不了。

original: Of course you can't. This cage is locked tight... from you and the Old Man.
translation: 你当然走不了。这个牢房的门锁可结实了…你和那个糟老头进不来的。

original: Sounds like Dog might be more willing to get out of the cage than you.
translation: 听起来狗比你更愿意从笼子里出来。

original: Something tells me I could walk Dog through unlocking a door.
translation: 我觉得我可以让狗走出这扇门。

original: So Dog could just open the door at any time?
translation: 所以狗随时可以打开门？

original: Wait, the casino already opened?
translation: 等等，赌场之前打开过？

original: So the Gala Event was triggered at least once?
translation: 所以盛世庆典以前至少启动过一次？

original: Uh-huh. Master ordered it. "Take places." Then... {frowns}Master went away. {Starts getting quieter}Left Dog... Dog in cage.
translation: 嗯哼，是主人命令的。"出事了"。然后...主人就不见了，把狗...狗扔在了笼子里。

original: Casino open long time ago, not sure when... voice keeps putting Dog in cage. Haven't seen Master since, only hear voice on your arm and from walls.
translation: 赌场很久以前打开过，不知什么时候…后来那声音就只准狗待在笼子里了。那之后也没见过主人，只从你的手上和墙上听到过他的声音。

original: Um... do you want to talk about it?
translation: 呃...你可以和我说一下吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Slightly wary, warming up}The lights were pretty. In the sky. Pointed at casino. {Beat, like wonder}And the casino opened up.
translation: [成功] 那些灯光很美，在天上，面对赌场的方向。然后赌场的门就打开了。

original: Dog, think back to the lights, the pretty ones.
translation: 狗。回想一下那些漂亮的灯光吧。

original: [FAILED] {Clams up}Uh-uh. Dog... Dog wants to stop talking now.
translation: [失败] 呃-呃。狗…狗不想说话了。

original: This is important - do you remember what happened exactly?
translation: 这很重要——你记得到底发生了什么吗？

original: {Clams up, quiet}Dog can't remember. {Beat, quiet}Don't want to go, can't make him stay there.
translation: 狗不记得了。不想去，狗不想待在那里。

original: Dog, do you know why you have to go to the position on this map?
translation: 狗，你知道你为什么要去地图上的这个地点吗？

original: We need to get you to the Gala Event. Get you to your place.
translation: 你得帮忙操控盛世庆典。到你的岗位上去。

original: Dog... Dog has heard that before. Was there pretty lights? {Frowns, gets a little more focused}There... were things to pull? Hard to pull, but Dog did. And... {quiet}a cage.
translation: 狗…狗以前听过这句话。好像有很多闪闪发光的小灯？还有个…玩意要拉下来？很难扳，但狗最后还是扳动了。还有…一间笼子。

original: ...and Dog was hungry there. Dog... {frowns}was someone else there, with Dog. Then... {pained, doesn't want to remember the girl's screams}then there was noise, then... lights... and streets... screamed.
translation: ...狗那时觉得很饿。狗...和另一个人在一起。然后…狗听到了噪音…光亮...街道…和惨叫。

original: ...Dog doesn't want to go to cage. It's inside Dog now, Dog can see the cage, hear the noises. {Beat}The way to casino... it'll hurt you. Inside.
translation: ...狗不想进笼子。它在狗体内，狗可以看见笼子，也可以听见噪音。一想到要进赌场…就让人心痛。

original: I guess... the alarm outside sure is a racket, though.
translation: 确实……外面的警报声挺吵的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE}Very good. Yes... it's another layer of white noise to ensure privacy. Unfortunately, it's also acted as a dinner bell for the residents.
translation: [成功] 是的...这确实是一层可以保护隐私的噪音。但坏消息是，对于这里的居民而言，这也约等于是开饭铃。

original: As long as the holographic greeter outside is active, however, I can get by them... the Holograms fascinate them. Ghost-worship, perhaps.
translation: 不过，只要外面的全息迎宾员还在运作，我就能从它们身边溜过去…它们对全息影像特别着迷，可能崇拜幽灵吧。

original: You're blocking the eavesdropping with the alarm outside, too. Nice.
translation: 你用警报声阻止了窃听。不错。

original: [FAILED] {DUPE}Yes... interesting that. {To himself, irritated by Ghost People outside}More like a dinner bell to some.
translation: [失败] 没错...挺有趣的。不过对某些东西来说，那警报声更像是开饭铃。

original: <Play Elijah Audio Tape.>
translation: <播放以利亚的录音>

original: If I can't prove it to you, then forget this, I'm bringing Dog out.
translation: 既然你怎样都不信，那就算了，我要放狗出来。

original: {Dog}That's enough for now.
translation: 先这样吧。

original: Hnnh-hnn.
translation: 嗯哼。

original: {Nods}Yes, Master.
translation: 好的，主人。

original: {Nods}Nnnh-Hnnn.
translation: 嗯哼。

original: I need you to stay here and trigger the switches.
translation: 我要你待在这儿，扳动开关。

original: {Complaining}Dog doesn't understand... {to himself}too hungry, hard to hear words... {slightly petulant and evil here}Master, when can Dog {emph}feed.
translation: 狗不明白...太饿了，听不见...主人，狗什么时候能吃东西啊。

original: {Quiet, this is a little creepy in its hopefulness}If Dog was fed like last time, Dog would listen. If the feeding was quiet.
translation: 要是狗能像上次一样吃饱，狗一定会听话的。这次的食物最好不要再乱动了。

original: {Slightly fearful}Maybe voice could make Dog stay, Dog not want to be in cage, Dog want to be free, find Master.
translation: 也许那个声音可以让狗待在这里，狗不想再关到笼子里了，狗想要自由，想去找主人。

original: {Snarling, clutching ears at start after unpleasant noise}Nnnh... getting tired of hearing your orders. {Slow, appraising his health}Dog's clawing at the cage, hungrier than usual.
translation: 嗯…我已经对你的命令感到厌烦了。狗在扒笼子，感觉比以往更饿了。

original: {Narrows eyes, suspicious}You must {emph}need something, I can see it in your eyes. {Glancing around}The Gala... of course. How could I forget?
translation: 你找我一定是有事吧，我可以从你的眼神里看出来。盛世庆典…是啊。我怎么把这条给忘了？

original: {Slow, taunting}If you want me to... heel... if you want Dog to obey, then he'll need to be fed, {beat, a little quieter, not happy about what happened}like last time.
translation: 如果你想要我...想要狗听你的话，那你得给他吃东西，就像上次一样。

original: Those scars on your body - where did you get them?
translation: 你身上的伤疤，哪儿来的？

original: {Shrugs, a little sad/sheepish}Hurt self. Hurt makes the voice go away... it doesn't like pain.
translation: 自己弄的。疼痛可以让那个声音消失…因为它怕疼。

original: {Pissed}Dog doesn't like pain, either, but keeps voice quiet, so Dog will hurt self until voice dies. Dog hurt self enough, voice go away, never come back.
translation: 狗也怕疼，但只要能让那声音安静下来，狗就算弄伤自己也没事。也许疼到一定程度，那声音就不会再出现了。

original: Can you tell me how you got to the Sierra Madre?
translation: 你能告诉我你是怎么来到马德雷山脉赌场的吗？

original: {Confused}Here? Followed voice in air, then here... here as long as can remember. {Hushes voice a bit}Don't like this place... hard to find things to eat sometimes.
translation: 这儿？狗只记得…跟着风中的声音，就到了这儿。不喜欢这里…很难找吃的。

original: {To himself}Better than the cage. {Frowns, petulant/angry}Dog doesn't {emph}like being locked up. Voice in air didn't say anything about a cage and nothing to eat.
translation: 比笼子里好。狗不喜欢被关起来。那阵风从来没说过这里会有笼子，也没说过这里没有吃的。

original: Do you know how to wake him up?
translation: 你知道怎么唤醒他吗？

original: Sometimes when Dog gets tired. Or eats too much, gets full. Sometimes... {frowns}when Dog goes to the cage... then voice wakes up.
translation: 等狗累的时候，或者吃太多、太饱的时候。又或者…狗钻进笼子的时候...那个声音就会醒来。

original: {Getting irritated, pissed}The voice locks Dog in when it comes up, always trying to keep Dog from food. Voice did it at the cage where you found me. {Happy, draw this out}Then Master came.
translation: 那个声音出来的时候，会把狗关起来，不让狗吃东西。你找到我的时候就是这种情况。然后主人来了。

original: What's the other voice?
translation: 另一个声音是什么？

original: {Hushed}Other voice... don't wake him up. When voice wakes up, Dog goes to sleep and voice climbs up in Dog's head.
translation: 另一个声音…狗不想叫醒他。只要那个声音醒来，狗就会睡着，然后那声音就会钻进狗的脑袋。

original: {To himself}The voice puts Dog in places... puts him in cages and locks him in.
translation: 那个声音会把狗赶走……赶进笼子里关起来。

original: Where's your collar?
translation: 你的项圈呢？

original: {Quiet, bad dog}Lost it. Got hungry. {Beat}Made the other voice mad, madder than it ever was, mad enough to lock Dog up.
translation: 丢了。饿了。结果那个声音就发怒了，比以往任何一次都要生气，气得把狗关了起来。

original: I want to hear more about the Master.
translation: 关于这个主人，你还有什么能告诉我的吗？

original: {Brightening up}He takes care of Dog. He tells Dog what to do. Told Dog to come here, put collars on people.
translation: 他照顾狗。他指挥狗做事。是他派狗到这儿来，给人戴上项圈的。

original: Sometimes people fight. Dog holds them until they go quiet, don't make any noise. {Beat}If collars don't fit or go too quiet... {shrugs}find others for Master.
translation: 如果有人反抗，狗就捏住他们，直到他们安静下来，不再发出任何声音为止。如果项圈不合适，又或者他们太安静了...主人就会让狗再找别的人来。

original: {Strangely intense}Master makes the other voice go away - the other voice hates Master, Dog can feel it. Master's voice is like pain, protects Dog.
translation: 主人的存在会让另一个声音消失——那个声音讨厌主人，狗感觉得到。主人的声音和就像疼痛一样，可以保护狗免受骚扰。

original: Sounds like good trade.
translation: 听起来还挺划算。

original: {Pleased, agreeing with player here}Master always feed Dog if not in cage. Master lets Dog do what Dog wants. {Grumbling}Not like other voice in cage. Always mad with Dog, shouting at him.
translation: 狗不在笼子里的时候，主人一直会喂狗。主人让狗想干啥就干啥，不像笼子里的另一个声音，总是生狗的气，朝狗大吼大叫。

original: Where does the voice come from?
translation: 那声音从哪儿来？

original: {Slight anger, frustration}Don't know where other voice come from. Wish would go away. Always trying to stop Dog, caging Dog.
translation: 不知道那个声音从哪儿来的。希望能消失吧。总是想阻止狗，把狗关进笼子。

original: {Thinking}Voice started talking not long ago, Dog think... was always there. Start talking when Master showed up? {Irritated}Making Dog sleep, go to cage.
translation: 那声音是从不久前出现的，狗觉得...它其实一直都在。是主人出现后，他才开始说话的。他会把狗赶到笼子里，让狗去睡觉。

original: Voice hates Master. It okay... {Curious}voice {emph}always hide when Master around, go quiet, watch Master as he does things. Voice scared of Master, Dog thinks.
translation: 那声音讨厌主人。还好...主人在附近的时候，那声音就会躲起来，闭上嘴，静静地观察主人。狗觉得，那声音害怕主人。

original: Sound nice. It still there?
translation: 听起来不错。那地方还在吗？

original: Where Church now?
translation: 大教堂在哪儿？

original: Maybe you go back someday.
translation: 也许某天你可以回去。

original: All gone. {Beat, a little sadder}All gone. {Beat, slightly stronger}It better now that found {emph}new Master.
translation: 都不在了。都不在了。现在有了新主人，比之前好多了。

original: {Slightly evil}New Master tells Dog what to do, rewards Dog, like old Master. Dog goes get people, drag them here... like vat. Dog knows how to do that.
translation: 新主人不仅指挥狗做事，还会奖励狗，和老主人一样。狗去四处抓人，把他们扛到这里来…就像扛玻璃缸一样，狗知道怎么扛。

original: {Deliver this gruesomely}If people fight, Dog hit them until they stop. And if more than one, Dog can eat them, so Dog hunts hard for as {emph}many as he can find.
translation: 如果有人反抗，狗就揍他们，揍到他们动不了为止。如果抓的人多了，主人就会把其中一些赏给狗当饭吃，所以狗一直在努力抓人。

original: Must been hard to see you.
translation: 那样你就隐身了。

original: Why you want to look like ground?
translation: 你干嘛要变得和地面一个颜色？

original: When put it on, hard to see. Hard to see... Dog was told not to be seen then. Same as now, except different.
translation: 戴上以后，别人就很难看到狗了...他们告诉狗，最好别被人看到。现在也一样，只不过下命令的人不同。

original: Dog and others... had to hide in Base. And Church. The Master was there. Master was... {frowns}spoke like many people. Smart. Like Lou-Lieutenant.
translation: 狗和其他人…都藏在基地里。还有大教堂。主教大人当时也在。主教大人好像会……模仿各种人说话，他和中…中尉一样聪明。

original: {Remembering back, slight tender}Dog misses the Church. {Beat}When got dark, no people, Dog could sit on floor and look up at ceiling. {Beat}Could... take off wrist-collar then.
translation: 狗想念大教堂。天黑的时候，人都走了，狗可以坐在地上，抬头看着天花板，手上的圈……也可以拿下来了。

original: Nuh-uh!
translation: 不会吧！

original: {Nods}Is true. Dog wore it right on his hand, where bear trap is now... he thinks.
translation: 真的。狗原来戴过那样的东西，就在现在捕熊夹的这个位置……

original: {God}I had other questions for you.
translation: 我还有其他问题想问。

original: {Irritated}More? Don't push your luck.
translation: 还有？别得寸进尺了。

original: {Malicious, taunting}You're a brave one. Sure you're ready for the answers?
translation: 你很勇敢嘛。你确定你想听我的回答？

original: What do you eat?
translation: 你吃什么？

original: {Eager}Dog eats whatever he can catch. Sometimes they run, but Dog is strong, moves fast.
translation: 只要是能抓得到的东西，狗都吃。有时那些东西会乱跑，但狗力气大，跑得也快。

original: {Sad}Sometimes... makes voice mad when I eat... {brightens up, "but..."}Master doesn't mind.
translation: 有时候……狗吃东西，会让那个声音特别生气……但主人不在乎。

original: Voice in the air?
translation: 风中的声音？

original: {Frowns, getting complicated}Dog hears many voices... one in air. {Scared, thinking about God}The... other one. {Brightens up a bit}And Master. Master is the nicest. {Frowns}Gets mean, mad sometimes. But lets Dog feed.
translation: 狗能听见很多声音…其中一个会在风中和狗说话。还有另一个。是主人。主人最好了。虽然他有时脾气不好，爱发火，但他会给狗吃的。

original: Master was quiet for a long time until Dog heard him on your arm... {frowns, confused}did you eat him? {Sympathizes with player for eating a human being}Dog gets hungry, too. {Quiet}Being hungry makes the voice... mad.
translation: 狗刚才从你的手臂上听到了他的声音，之前他突然沉默了很久…是你吃了他吗？狗也饿。饥饿会让那个声音…变得疯狂。

original: Don't like it here, either.
translation: 我也不喜欢这儿。

original: Me hear voice, too? Then got here, bad place.
translation: 我也听到某个声音，然后不知怎的就到了这里，破地方。

original: {Nods gravely}Dog trapped here, too. This place not like West. Air like copper wire. Gut heavy, hurts, beeps sometimes.
translation: 狗也被困在这儿了。这个地方不像西边。空气里有一股铜线的味道。肚子很沉，很痛，有时还叫。

original: Back West... in bone cities... {Beat, slight wonder}Dog wore a collar on wrist, turned him into color of ground, turned him into color of sky.
translation: 以前在西边…骨头城的时候...狗的手腕上有个圈，可以让狗的身体变得和地面天空一个颜色。

original: {Dog}I had other questions for you.
translation: 我还有其它问题。

original: Dog is getting tired, Master. {Grumbling, slight threat}When can Dog eat?
translation: 主人，狗累了。什么时候狗能吃东西？

original: Too much talking makes Dog's head hurt. {Beat}Getting hungry.
translation: 说太多了，狗觉得头疼。饿了。

original: Can you tell me about the voice?
translation: 你能和我说说那个声音吗？

original: Your name is carved on your chest. Is that part of it?
translation: 你的名字刻在胸口上。和这个有关系吗？

original: Yes... {frowns}no... don't know what the word means, everyone says the same, except the voice. {Hushed, frightened}The voice says it backward.
translation: 是的…不…狗不懂那个词的意思，大家都用同样的称呼叫我，除了那个声音。那个声音是倒过来念的。

original: Is that why you have a bear trap locked on your arm?
translation: 所以你手臂上才会有个捕熊夹？

original: Dog put his hand in it, hurts. Made the voice go away, now can't get it off. Don't want it off, hurt keeps voice sleeping... {angrier, yet pleased}bleeding.
translation: 狗自己把手放进去的，很疼。虽然赶走了那个声音，但现在也拿不下来了。不想拿下来，疼痛可以让那个声音沉睡…让它流血。

original: {Confiding in player}It also keeps {emph}others quiet, too. Dog hits them with metal bear teeth until their voices stop, makes Master's voice come back.
translation: 也能让其他人闭嘴。狗会用抓熊的夹子把它们打到不能说话为止，这样主人就会再次和我说话了。

original: <Lie> Just... stay here in the courtyard, I'll go get food.
translation: <撒谎> 你就…在院子里好好待着，我去找吃的。

original: {Suspicious}All right... for a moment there, I thought... hnh. I'll wait here then, come back when you've found a carcass. Or three.
translation: 好吧…只待一会儿的话，那我觉得…也行。我会在这儿等你的，你只要带一具尸骸回来就够了。最好是三具。

original: If I bring food, will that calm Dog down?
translation: 如果我带些吃的东西来，能让狗冷静下来吗？

original: It always does... makes him sleepier. Weaker. Easier to keep out of trouble. As for the type of food...
translation: 可以的…食物能让他变得困倦、虚弱、不容易惹麻烦。至于何种食物...

original: Make sure it isn't struggling, if you can. {To himself, rueful, irritated}It's hard enough to choke down half of what I suspect he eats. And make sure it's not a bomb collar.
translation: 只要不会乱动的东西都行。我估计他吃的东西里有一半都在他的嘴里挣扎过。还有，千万别再拿爆炸项圈来了。

original: Yeah, well, I'll make Dog help me. Can't be hard to figure all this wire stuff out.
translation: 好，我会让狗帮我。把这些线路弄清楚应该不难。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Getting really angry}You think you can figure out what to... {quieter, studying the player, slightly respectful}hnh. Of course you can.
translation: [成功] 你觉得你有这种本事吗……哼。你确实有。

original: {Resolved}I'll stand at my post. {Then threat comes out}Once you trigger the event... well, we'll see who makes it to the Sierra Madre.
translation: 我会守在这里的。一旦你启动了盛世庆典…呵，那就看谁能先抵达马德雷山脉赌场吧。

original: If that diagram over there holds the details, I can walk Dog through the instructions.
translation: 如果那边的示意图里已经包含了详细说明的话，我可以指挥狗来操作。

original: [FAILED] No... you can barely give me instructions, let alone order Dog. Bark your orders somewhere else.
translation: [失败] 不…你连我都指挥不了，更别说狗了。少在我面前指手画脚。

original: Have orders for you - for going, staying, all that.
translation: 我有命令要给你，比如让你走，让你坐下之类的。

original: {Nods}Dog is listening.
translation: 狗在听。

original: The Master sounds like he treats you well.
translation: 听起来主人对你很好。

original: Could I find my way back?
translation: 我能找到回去的路吗?

original: Maybe. Not sure you could find way back once leave. Dog has to smell and hunt for path back here sometimes... {frowns}Cloud keep moving.
translation: 也许可以。但如果你离开，想要再找路回来就很难了。有时狗得靠鼻子闻才能回到这里……毒云总是在移动。

original: It okay... no one {emph}ever leave except Dog... and Dog not want to leave. {Beat, drops this more like threat}You here until Master lets you go.
translation: 没事的…这里除了狗，没人离开过…但狗不想离开。除非主人放你走，否则你也休想离开。

original: Do you know the way back?
translation: 你知道回去的路吗？

original: Might find way back if Master lets you go. If he not want you to go, he makes head red spray. {Thinking, to himself}Then Dog has to find another one.
translation: 如果主人准你走，也许你能找到回去的路。如果他不让你走，你的脑袋就会开花。狗只好再抓一个人来。

original: {Confused, never thought about anyone leaving before}To leave...? Go through gate, walk. Hard to find way, Dog can do it, too hard for most to come here. {It's why...}Why so quiet in streets.
translation: 真要走的话…？穿过大门，往前走就是了。很难分清方向，狗可以，但来这儿的大多数人都不行。所以这里的街道才这么安静。

original: Did you bring me here?
translation: 是你把我绑到这儿来的？

original: {Affirmative}Dog fetches. Dragged you here... Dog thinks. You not struggle like others. Trap makes you sleep, make your voice go to cage.
translation: 狗会捡东西。应该就是狗……把你拖到这儿来的。你不像其他人一样挣扎。你中了陷阱，睡着了，你的声音好像也被关进了笼子。

original: Dog doing what he was told. Tried to catch as many as he can, can eat the others.
translation: 狗一直都很听话，努力多抓人，因为没用的人可以直接吃掉。

original: No eat you, though. Master talk through you, like voice inside Dog. {Beat}Dog missed hearing Master, not hear Master for long time.
translation: 但不能吃你。主人会通过你和我说话，就像狗体内的声音一样。狗想念主人的声音，很久没听到了。

original: Can you tell me about the other voice inside you?
translation: 你能说说你体内的另一个声音吗？

original: Can you tell me more about the Gala Event going off?
translation: 你能告诉我启动盛世庆典的事情吗？

original: Do you know how long ago?
translation: 你知道是多久之前吗？

original: If the casino already opened, what are we doing here?
translation: 如果那个赌场早就打开过，我们还在这儿干嘛？

original: {Shrugs}Don't know. {Beat}Dog keep bringing people here.
translation: 不知道。狗只知道抓人。

original: So Master vanished around that time.
translation: 所以那段时间主人消失了。

original: {Nods}Master went away until you show up with him on your arm.
translation: 主人不见了，但你来的时候，他又出现在了你的手上。

original: Dog, do you know why you have to go to the position on the map?
translation: 狗，你知道你为什么要去地图上的这个地点吗？

original: {Confused}Hard to pull things...? Dog has to pull very, very hard to... {beat, slow fear/curious}are we going there?
translation: 为了扳开关…？狗得花很大力气，才能扳得动...我们要去那里吗？

original: Dog not want to stay and pull things... hard to do... {quieter}and cage there.
translation: 狗不想去…那东西很难扳…还有笼子。

original: What does Dog know?
translation: 狗都知道什么？

original: {Snarl}Ask him. Or better, don't. It wouldn't be an interesting conversation, much like this one.
translation: 问他吧。或者，最好还是别问了。估计也和现在差不多，你们聊不到一块儿去的。

original: What's Elijah doing here?
translation: 以利亚来这儿做什么？

original: {Taunting}Heard the call of the Sierra Madre, just like you did... {emph}exactly the same way.
translation: 他听到了马德雷山脉赌场的呼唤，和你……一模一样。

original: {Slow, reflective here}Finds out it's more than a story, {sarcasm bleeds in}comes to this shining poisonous grail, this jewel of the desert.
translation: 他发现这里不仅仅是个传说，于是不远万里寻找这座光辉璀璨却又充满剧毒的圣杯，这颗沙漠中的明珠。

original: {Anger comes back}Dog knows him more than I do. Dog's always nodding, always obeying him, because he's weak and hungry and greedy for master's affection.
translation: 狗比我更了解他。狗总是对他点头哈腰，言听计从，因为他太过弱小，太过饥饿，渴望得到主人的宠爱。

original: I want to know more about the man who brought us here.
translation: 我想多了解一点那个把我们绑到这儿来的人。

original: {Global}Where is your collar?
translation: 你的项圈在哪儿?

original: {Global}Did getting hit in the head cause you to start acting this way?
translation: 你是之前撞到头了还是怎么的？你表现得很古怪。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE: Slightly wary, player's onto something}Trauma... yes, in a manner of speaking.
translation: [成功] 创伤...没错，可以这样说。

original: You have multiple personality disorder. Some trauma caused this?
translation: 你有多重人格失调症。是创伤导致的？

original: [FAILED] {DUPE: Taunting, playing games}No... sometimes it simply wakes voices up.
translation: [失败] 不...有时候我心里就是会突然响起某种声音。

original: Why can't you control him?
translation: 你为什么控制不了他？

original: The instinct is stronger than me. Dog is stronger than me. He's just a child... he knows when he does wrong, he just can't help himself.
translation: 我无法战胜那股冲动，狗比我强太多了。他就是个孩子...虽然他懂得认错，可他总是知错不改。

original: I don't know when I first spoke, or when I first started thinking for myself, it was so long ago. I... slept for a long time... before...
translation: 我已经记不得自己是何时开口说话，何时开始思考的了。我…似乎...沉睡了很久...

original: ...I want to believe I was the one in control. Once. I don't know anymore. Then Dog got a new Master. A new voice. And I woke up, to protect him.
translation: …我曾想让自己相信我才是这副身体的主宰。成功过一次吧，我记不清了。可那之后，狗又有了一个新主人，一个新声音。于是为了保护他，我就苏醒了。

original: You care about him.
translation: 你关心他。

original: He's my brother - kin. Without him, I wouldn't exist. Maybe I was nothing more than his conscience, trying to rein him in. Useless.
translation: 他是我的骨肉兄弟。没有了他，我也将不复存在。也许我只是他良知下的产物，想要控制他的行为。但没用。

original: I... I just need him to show restraint, let go of the needs, the hungers. Ease the burden... just once, so I can have my thoughts to myself.
translation: 我...我只希望他能稍稍克制一下，抑制自己的本能和饥饿。放下那副重担…哪怕一次也行，好让我有时间思考。

original: Does not being in control bother you so much?
translation: 你就这么想控制他？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Starts weakening here, tired}I've watched over Dog for so long. Tried to stop him from... hurting others, killing others, {frustrated anger}quiet that mindless howling instinct of his.
translation: [成功] 我照顾狗很久了。我也曾经数次阻止他…伤人，甚至杀人，想要安抚他那股无处发泄的冲动。

original: He doesn't understand, he has the brain of a child... he knows when he does wrong, he just can't help himself.
translation: 他不明白，他实在太孩子气了…虽然他懂得认错，可就是知错不改。

original: You're trying to protect Dog. Having Elijah control him, hurt him - you want to protect him.
translation: 你是在保护狗。以利亚控制他，伤害他，而你却想保护他。

original: [FAILED] No... because all I need to do is bide my time. I'll settle this... myself, as I always planned.
translation: [失败] 不...因为我想等一个机会。我想按自己的想法…将这件事彻底解决。

original: Can't you do anything?
translation: 你什么都做不了吗？

original: {Echoing, emph}Do anything? {Hurt and frustration coming through}Me... me, Dog puts in the cage, hurts himself to try and drown out my voice, when all I want to do...
translation: 能做什么？我...我，狗把我关在笼子里，为了屏蔽我的声音，他甚至不惜自残，而我只是想……

original: ...aah... hrrr, never mind, useless. Finally had to start fighting back, screaming on my own. Had to take matters into my own hands, lock Dog up.
translation: ...啊...呵，算了，反正也没用。为了出声，我只能反击。我只能自己动手，将狗锁了起来。

original: What does Elijah make Dog do that angers you so much?
translation: 以利亚对狗做了什么，让你这么生气？

original: Gather others, drag them here... fetch, like an animal... and hurt them if they resist.
translation: 为了把其他人聚到这里…他就像对待动物一样使唤狗…甚至命令狗对那些反抗的人痛下杀手。

original: Dog doesn't even blink, even hear their cries when he's twisted their arms full circle... fragile things, screaming on the ground...
translation: 听到他们的哭喊，狗甚至连眼睛都不眨一下，就这样生生将他们的胳膊折成圆形…那些脆弱的人类，在地上惨叫着...

original: To listen to him... commanding Dog... to hurt others... and Dog just nods, eager and willing to serve.
translation: 只要是他…命令狗做的…无论多么伤天害理的事…狗都照办，他的心里只有服从。

original: Sounds like it makes you mad.
translation: 听起来你要被逼疯了。

original: Mad? Mad doesn't even begin to describe... there's not a {emph}word for the hate I feel inside. It's consuming... twists every thought to red.
translation: 疯？那根本不足以描述…没有一个词能够形容我的仇恨。它蚕食着我...把我所有的意志扭曲成暴虐。

original: {Snarling}After all that's laid ruin to the world... again and again, I thought at last, we could be free... thought Dog could be free.
translation: 我们一次又一次…将身边的一切砸成废墟，本以为这样我们就能获得自由...狗就能获得自由。

original: No... no, the world's always got another cage, waiting, keeping everything you want... just out of reach.
translation: 可是…没有，这个世界永不缺牢笼，而你根本无法挣脱，只能望眼欲穿…却求而不得。

original: Well... true enough. Sure uses the word "Master" a lot.
translation: 嗯...没错。他确实经常说"主人"两个字。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Slow, thoughtful}The "Master" - Elijah... reminds Dog of someone from long ago. His leader, commander. Commanders.
translation: [成功] "主人"——以利亚...让狗想起了很久以前的另外一个人。他曾经的领袖、指挥官，也有多重人格。

original: The Master was a strong personality... personalities as well. Dog is slavish, was conditioned to serve the Master until death.
translation: 那个主人拥有强大的个人魅力…无论哪种人格。狗当惯了奴隶，他只懂得服侍主人，至死方休。

original: The Old Man... Elijah merely came along and opened that door in Dog's mind. Now Dog does whatever the Old Man wants.
translation: 而那个糟老头...以利亚的出现，只不过是重新打开了狗脑海中的那扇大门。现在狗已经唯他马首是瞻了。

original: Why did you put emphasis on the word "Master" before?
translation: 为什么你之前说"主人"这个词的时候要特意加重语气？

original: [FAILED] Habit. Conditioning. It doesn't matter.
translation: [失败] 习惯而已。没什么。

original: Why does that make him go away?
translation: 为什么这样他就会走开？

original: Dog is afraid of me as long as {emph}the Master isn't around.
translation: 只要主人不在，狗就很怕我。

original: {God}We need to discuss tactics - and positioning.
translation: 我们需要讨论战术和你的站位。

original: {Low, threatening}Orders - for me. This should be good.
translation: 想命令我吗？有点意思。

original: How do you switch back and forth between voices?
translation: 你是怎么做到在两个声音间来回切换的？

original: All it takes is the right... command. Whenever Dog hears the... {corrects self}his Master giving orders, I go back in the cage.
translation: 只要说出正确的…口令。无论何时，只要狗听到…他主人下的命令，我就会回到笼子里。

original: So that leash on your wrist... and the one on your neck. {Beat}I won't truly be free to... express myself until every trace of that voice is destroyed.
translation: 所以，你手腕上的那条束带...还有脖子上的项圈。除非将所有能传递他声音的渠道全部切断，否则我永远也无法…畅所欲言。

original: Still... if you ever want to speak to me, bark my audio log at him, the one in the police station. That'll call me out.
translation: 不过…如果你想找我的话，只需要把我留在警察局里的那段录音放给狗听，我就会出来。

original: He can't have possibly have set up a deadman's switch like that.
translation: 他不可能搞出这样一个损人不利己的招数吧。

original: Really. As much hatred as I hold for him, he is much, much smarter than many I've met... {sarcastic}no offense meant, of course.
translation: 真的。我虽然很恨他，但我必须承认，他比我见过的许多人都要聪明…哦，我无意冒犯。

original: He seems to not only understand the workings of Pre-War tech, he seems to breathe it. And... these collars, commandeering your Pip-Boy...
translation: 他不仅了解各种战前科技产品的工作原理，甚至已经到了痴狂的地步。而…这些项圈，还有操控你的哔哔小子...

original: Are the marks of someone who makes mistakes - but he's not leaving much to chance when it comes to ensuring our compliance.
translation: 都证明了人是很容易犯错的——可他为了确保我们的服从，容不下多这样的纰漏。

original: Then how are the collars active again?
translation: 那这些项圈怎么又重新启动的？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Interesting... so it seems you have another link we don't. And... you're to blame for this.
translation: [成功] 有意思…原来是你身上有着一样我们没有的东西。所以…这也算是你的错。

original: Yes... he wears a Pip-Boy on his wrist, just as you do. If he's feeding commands and signals, then I would be careful.
translation: 是的...他和你一样，手腕上也有一个哔哔小子。如果他真的在通过这东西发送指令和信号，那我可得小心了。

original: He's most likely installed a contingency switch in the Pip-Boy. If the signal gets cut off, or you try and remove it... well, then we'll all die.
translation: 他极有可能在哔哔小子里装了应急开关。一旦如果信号被切断，或者你尝试摘除它…那我们就死定了。

original: The Pip-Boy could boost the signal. If Elijah has a Pip-Boy, that would explain it.
translation: 哔哔小子能够增强信号。如果以利亚也有一个哔哔小子，那就说得通了。

original: [FAILED] That I don't know. The collars came back to life... I'm not sure how.
translation: [失败] 我不知道。项圈为何重新开始运作…我也不清楚。

original: {Snarling, low}I felt it when you woke me up... that kicking in my gut, the collar was coiled with a charge again, like a snake.
translation: 你叫醒我的时候，我就感觉到了它…在我的体内跳动，仿佛一条蛇，盘绕着一堆炸药。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你说的什么意思？

original: Ask Dog. It doesn't matter... it's in the past, as much as I try to forget it, it's always... with us.
translation: 问狗吧。不重要了…过去的事情，就算我再怎么想忘掉，它也会一直…萦绕在心头。

original: So what happened then?
translation: 所以后来又发生了什么？

original: Dog happened. When the collars came off... he got... hungry. And all my work, all my effort... wasted because of his hunger, his greed.
translation: 狗又出现了。项圈掉下来的时候...他突然…就饿了。我的全部心血，全部努力…就因为他的饥饿，他的贪婪，毁于一旦。

original: Does the casino block the signal?
translation: 是赌场屏蔽了信号吗？

original: It {emph}should have... the casino's construction is unusual. Signals in there get... scrambled, some alloy in the architecture... I don't know.
translation: 应该是…这赌场的构造不太寻常。信号在这里…会被阻断，可能是建筑内部采用了某种合金...我不知道。

original: I wasn't sure until the collars de-activated that I had won. Trapped him in his cage. Dog... {corrects self}I... could be free.
translation: 直到项圈关闭，我才意识到自己成功了，我把他关进了笼子里。狗…我…终于自由了。

original: Couldn't he have commanded you to rescue him?
translation: 他不能命令你去救他吗？

original: No... I saw to that...
translation: 不可能...我早有准备...

original: If he got trapped, why didn't he set off the collars?
translation: 如果他被困在里面了，为什么他没引爆项圈？

original: {Smiles}Because he couldn't. As soon as he made his way into the casino, it sealed up...
translation: 因为他做不到啊。他一进入赌场，门就封上了。

original: ...and the casino's construction allowed me an opportunity to escape. The collars... unhooked. I... was free.
translation: ...赌场的建筑结构给了我逃走的机会。项圈...断开了。我...自由了。

original: If the casino opened up, then why are we here?
translation: 如果赌场打开过，那我们还在这儿干嘛？

original: Because something got left inside. The Old Man... Elijah.
translation: 因为有人被落在里面了。那个糟老头...以利亚。

original: He's trapped in there. As I hoped he would be.
translation: 他被困在里面了。我求之不得呢。

original: He said the casino opened up.
translation: 他说赌场打开过。

original: {Impressed}Very good. As for the casino... yes, it did.
translation: 很好。赌场...没错，它打开过。

original: Something about lights and colors, not much else.
translation: 就说了一些灯光啊烟花啊，没别的了。

original: {Sneers}There was more. Only he truly recalls, though... and should. I won't spoil it for you, especially when we have more... pressing matters.
translation: 其实还有别的。不过得等他自己想起来才行…他不该忘掉的。但这事我就不透露给你了，尤其咱们眼下还有…更要紧的事。

original: Dog said he triggered the Gala Event once already.
translation: 狗说他曾经启动过盛世庆典。

original: {Amused}He did, yes. A team did, with collars linked just like yours. Did he tell you everything, or just about the pretty lights?
translation: 确实。他和另外一支小队，戴着和你一样的项圈。他都告诉你了吗，还是只说了灯光好看之类的？

original: Do you know anything else?
translation: 你还知道别的事情吗？

original: Dog might know more, you should ask him. Beware the answer, because I think Dog got hungry, he couldn't help himself.
translation: 狗可能知道得更多，你应该去问他。不过要小心他的回答，我觉得狗一旦饿了，就会控制不住自己。

original: {Frustrated he couldn't keep his little brother out of trouble}I tried, I always try, and he... he keeps giving in.
translation: {Frustrated he couldn't keep his little brother out of trouble}我试过了，试过很多次…可他就是不听。

original: What do you know about the Gala Event?
translation: 关于盛世庆典，你都知道些什么？

original: {Snarls}The Gala Event is the way to bring the Old Man out. {Suspicious}He won't show himself until the casino doors are open.
translation: 只有盛世庆典才能让那个糟老头现身。赌场大门不开，他是不会出来的。

original: So triggering the Event is key... and the key. The question becomes... can we trust each other to do this? We'll see.
translation: 所以启动盛世庆典，既是打开赌场的钥匙...也是关键所在。那么问题来了…我们可以互相信任吗？恐怕还得看情况吧。

original: If we go there, you'll have to give {emph}me control. If you bring Dog out, then... I'll make sure you pay in blood.
translation: 如果我们要一起进去，那你必须保证我能控制这副躯体。要是你让狗出来…到时候我一定你会付出惨重的代价。

original: {Global}I heard electricity and radios can cause, uh, voices in people's heads.
translation: 我听说长期接触电流和无线电信号会让人，呃，出现幻听。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE: Snarls}Hmm... Hrrr... That's the easy explanation, the one {emph}humans use. Pre-War technology, as if it's the cause of all ills, mind and body.
translation: [成功] 这是个万金油一般的解释，人类编造的借口罢了。仿佛一切生理或心理上的疾病都是战前科技造成的。

original: I {emph}needed to come out of the cage to protect Dog. {Disdain}From clever humans... like you.
translation: 我只是想走出笼子，保护狗。让他不会被你这样……聪明的人类利用。

original: In Super Mutants, brain damage is usually the result of prolonged Stealth Boy usage.
translation: 对于超级变种人来说。脑损伤通常是长期使用隐形小子造成的。

original: [FAILED] {DUPE: Taunting, playing games}Perhaps. Or maybe I was here all the time, watching. Waiting for you.
translation: [失败] 可能吧。也可能因为我一直都待在这里，等着你现身。

original: Any reason why you're assigned to this point on the map?
translation: 你知道为什么你会被指派到这里来吗？

original: {Taunting}Maybe it's familiar, comfortable. Practice makes perfect.
translation: 可能因为我熟悉，顺手吧。毕竟熟能生巧嘛。

original: And as much as it bruises my ego, some things require... brute strength. {Beat}In the right combination.
translation: 虽然这话让我挺没面子的，但有些事情确实需要…蛮力，加正确的步骤。

original: {Grumbling, to himself}Besides, none of your assembled band of thieves look able to rip a 200 year rusted power switch down like a machete to fire up an entire town.
translation: 再说了，你们这个临时搭起来的盗窃团伙，恐怕也没人有力气能扳得动一个锈了200多年的电闸开关，来为这个镇子提供电力吧。

original: I don't know what you're talking about.
translation: 我不知道你在说什么。

original: [She sighs silently, then shakes her head and motions to the West.]
translation: [她轻轻叹了口气，摇了摇头指向西方。]

original: I... can only type with two fingers?
translation: 你是说…只能用两根手指打字？

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She slowly nods, looks impressed.]
translation: [成功] [她缓缓点头，看起来很欣慰。]

original: Neither Dean or Dog have the technical aptitude to man the Switching Station?
translation: 你是说迪安和狗都没有足够的知识来操纵开闭所吗？

original: [FAILED] [She sighs silently, then shakes her head and motions to the West.]
translation: [失败] [她轻轻叹了口气，摇了摇头指向西方。]

original: Why do you think he wants you to go the Puesta del Sol Switching Station?
translation: 你为什么认为他想让你去日落镇的开闭所？

original: [She frowns, then makes a motion as if typing at keys... then she points at you, raises her left wrist and pantomimes talking into it.]
translation: [她皱了皱眉，做了一个像是敲键盘的手势…然后指了你一下，又举起左手腕，假装在对它说话。]

original: [She points at you, then her, looks right and left, raises two fingers, tries to type, pauses, and slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [她指着你又指了指自己，接着左顾右盼，竖起两根手指，假装在打字，停下，然后慢慢地摇了摇头。]

original: You sure seem eager to go.
translation: 你确实看起来急着要走。

original: [She points at the Fountain, then at your Pip-Boy... pauses, then points at her collar, then yours.]
translation: [她指指喷泉和哔哔小子，停顿片刻，又指了指你们来的项圈。]

original: [She encircles her throat with her hand, then slowly releases it. Then she motions again to the West.]
translation: [她用手握住喉咙，然后慢慢松开。接着她再次指向西方。]

original: <Wait.>
translation: <等着。>

original: No worries, I'll just stand here like a piece of furniture until you're done.
translation: 不用担心，在你完事之前，我会像个家具一样杵在这儿的。

original: Careful, that's my arm, all right?
translation: 小心点行吗？这是我的手。

original: [Her finger stabs through the red buttons, narrowing in on the local map. She scrolls to the Sierra Madre's main gate, frowns, backs out.]
translation: [她戳了几下红色按钮，打开了本地地图。她把地图滚动到马德雷山脉赌场的大门，皱皱眉，又退了回来。]

original: [She calls up the local map of the Puesta del Sol Switching Station, zooms in. Her intent expression loses some of its edge as she notes the marker.]
translation: [她打开日落镇开闭所的地图，然后放大。她注意到了地图上的标记，专注的表情瞬间变得有些失落。]

original: [She looks up at you, points at marker on your Pip-Boy, points West and tilts her head.]
translation: [她抬头，指着你哔哔小子上的标记，又指向西方，歪着脑袋看着你。]

original: I had to get shot in the face for this. Get your own!
translation: 想要啊？我为了它可是差点被人爆头呢。想要就自己去搞！

original: I don't want you messing with this.
translation: 我不喜欢你这样鼓捣它。

original: [Christine snarls, makes a dismissive wave, and goes back to studying the Fountain intently - then looks at the casino, then the Fountain again.]
translation: [克莉丝汀从喉咙里发出一声低吼，手轻蔑地一扬，又故意回过头去研究喷泉。她望向赌场，又再次看着喷泉。]

original: What? What do you want?
translation: 啥？你想干嘛？

original: [She frowns, and snaps her fingers at your Pip-Boy.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，用手弹了一下你的哔哔小子。]

original: No fucking way am I giving this to you.
translation: 要我送你？门儿都没有。

original: <Show her the Pip-Boy.>
translation: <给她看哔哔小子。>

original: [Christine studies the Pip-Boy intently, turning your arm around as if your wrist's a sensor module she just found.]
translation: [克莉丝汀专心致志地研究着哔哔小子，抓着你的手腕转来转去，仿佛在端详一个新发现的传感器模组。]

original: [She doesn't seem interested in the screen - she studies the exterior, then the casing. She seems to be making sure it's intact.]
translation: [她似乎并不关心屏幕里的内容，却对外观和材质颇有兴趣，似乎是想确认它是否有破损。]

original: He leaves audio logs, too.
translation: 他也留下了音频日志。

original: [Christine holds out her hand, and motions at your Pip-Boy.]
translation: [克莉丝汀伸出手，指了指你的哔哔小子。]

original: We need to trigger the event like he says.
translation: 我们必须按他说的启动这个庆典。

original: That's the hologram projector in the Fountain. What of it?
translation: 你指的是喷泉里的投影仪吗？怎么了？

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, and raises her hands, palms facing each other, then rotates in a 180 degree arc and back again.]
translation: [成功] [她点点头，举起双手，掌心相对，转了180度角然，又转了回来。]

original: You think he's using the Pip-Boy? To establish the projector connection?
translation: 你觉得他在使用哔哔小子连接投影仪？

original: [FAILED] [She rolls her eyes, opens her mouth to speak, then stops, her face tensing up in frustration.]
translation: [失败] [她翻了个白眼，张开嘴想要说话却又停住了，脸耷拉了下来。]

original: What? What is it?
translation: 什么？什么意思？

original: That's our captor. He likes giving orders.
translation: 这就是绑架我们的人，他喜欢发号施令。

original: [She circles her finger around the Fountain and moves her fingers and thumb together rapidly, as if talking.]
translation: [她把手沿着喷泉比了一圈，快速地晃着大拇指和手指，好像在说话。]

original: [She frowns, stops moving her hand, then points at the Pip-Boy at your wrist.]
translation: [她皱起眉头，停下手中的动作，又指了指你手腕上的哔哔小子。]

original: You make a pretty lousy transmitter, you know.
translation: 你传递信息的方式怎么啰里啰嗦的。

original: [She glares at you. After a second, she pauses, and smiles slightly, shaking her head. She then makes a circle of the skyline with her finger.]
translation: [她瞪了你一眼。过了一会儿，她微笑着摇了摇头，用手在半空中画了一个圈。]

original: He'd have to be broadcasting from somewhere nearby.
translation: 他一定是从附近的地方进行广播的。

original: Think he might be close, then. Any idea where?
translation: 我感觉他可能就在附近。知道他在哪儿吗？

original: [She surveys the area, focusing upwards. She glances at the casino, frowns. She then looks West, then East.]
translation: [她仔细检查着这片区域，目光朝上。她瞥了一眼赌场，皱起了眉头。接着她又看向西方和东方。]

original: She's been broadcasting all this time?
translation: 她直到现在还广播？

original: The bombs fell, and the emergency signal went out.
translation: 核弹落下来后，应急信号就发送了出去。

original: So... it's not an invitation, it's a call for help.
translation: 所以...那其实不是邀请，而是求救信号。

original: Yeah. The Sierra Madre's last song, one only a few people are ever going to hear. A little sad, but what can you do?
translation: 没错，马德雷山脉赌场最后的挽歌，却被一些人听到了。虽然有些感伤，但又能怎么办呢？

original: What do you mean about the Sierra Madre broadcast?
translation: 你说马德雷山脉的广播是什么意思？

original: Well, Vera's beautiful voice doesn't run on casino power, exactly. Her broadcast is tied into the emergency broadcast signal for the Sierra Madre.
translation: 这个嘛，薇拉那优美的嗓音能传遍废土，靠的并不是赌场的电力系统，而是占用了马德雷山脉赌场的应急频段。

original: You know, in case of attack? Well, guess what - the night of the Gala Event, the emergency signal went out all right.
translation: 你懂的，就是遭受攻击时会使用的那种频道。结果呢？盛世庆典当晚，这个应急频道启动了。

original: But because the broadcast had been hooked up to the Gala Event, instead of an emergency signal, you get Vera's voice on the radio. Great, huh?
translation: 但因为广播系统本身就是和盛世庆典串联在一起的，所以就导致你最终在收音机上听到的是薇拉的声音，而不是紧急广播。是不是很妙啊？

original: Why would security shut down for the Gala?
translation: 为什么庆典开始时安保系统会关闭？

original: How is the Gala tied to the casino? That makes no sense.
translation: 庆典怎么会连接着赌场呢？没道理啊。

original: The Gala Event's tied into the casino's generators?
translation: 盛世庆典连接着赌场的发电机？

original: {Frowns, remembers player doesn't know this}Right, look - so, not everything about the Villa was the pinnacle of bright ideas.
translation: {Frowns, remembers player doesn't know this}对，听着，别墅区有些东西可算不上智慧结晶，倒更像是随便拍脑门的产物。

original: In order to pull off the Gala, old Sinclair had to get creative... the Sierra Madre announcement, for example. Not just for the casino, not at all.
translation: 为了盛世庆典能够一炮打响，老辛克莱不得不另辟蹊径…比如马德雷山脉的开业广播，他打广告可不光是为了给赌场揽客。

original: The Gala's tied to the casino, draws on its power. Might cause it to reset itself, open the doors for a bit like it was supposed to.
translation: 盛世庆典与赌场是联系在一起的，需要它的电力才能启动。如果庆典开始，赌场的电力系统也许会重启，大门就有可能按原计划打开。

original: Any advice to getting through this?
translation: 你觉得应该怎样才能在这儿活下来？

original: Well... considering my life's on the line, too, yeah, a few things.
translation: 嗯...考虑到咱俩现在是一条绳上的蚂蚱，我还真有几条建议。

original: First off, keep everyone together. Keep checking behind you, make sure your partners are following... {emph}don't let them wander.
translation: 首先，确保不要有人掉队。一定要注意身后的同伴是否跟上...别让他们四处乱跑。

original: Also, don't go running crazy everywhere. Almost every inch of this town is lethal. So if you're not sure, take it real slow.
translation: 其次，自己也不要乱跑。这里几乎每一寸土地都潜藏着致命的危险。如果没有十足的把握，就放慢脚步。

original: And speaking of slow, don't go shouting, or attracting attention. Go quiet. The Ghost People find you, it's over.
translation: 说到慢，千万别大吼大叫，免得引起注意。关键是保持低调。要是让鬼人发现你，你就完了。

original: What happened to the people who came to the Villa?
translation: 那些到别墅区来的人最后都怎样了？

original: Dead. Either got killed by one of the Villa's attractions, locals, or the beautiful weather.
translation: 死了。要么死于别墅区的各种机关，要么死于本地人之手，要么就死于这怡人的空气。

original: Can tell you right now - they didn't stick close to each other, and when they did, they let down their guard at the wrong moment.
translation: 实不相瞒，他们的问题就是太不团结了。即便其中有几个懂得团队精神的重要性，也会在错误的时刻放松警惕。

original: Some left signposts to others, trying to help them out - just led to them getting killed by someone a little more greedy than they were.
translation: 有些人特意留了标记，好心提供帮助，到头来却被更加贪得无厌的人所杀。

original: So the visitors all killed each other?
translation: 所以来这儿的人全是自相残杀而死的？

original: Sure. First, they figure they can get out, escape. {Beat, slow, emph}Then they start thinking it over, start thinking about how they can have it all.
translation: 当然了。刚开始他们都想逃出去，之后就打起了各自的小九九，想方设法地独吞这里的宝藏。

original: They start weighing the odds, taking risks... and then taking each other out. Bomb collars or not.
translation: 他们开始权衡利弊，铤而走险…不久就发展成拔刀相向，利用爆炸项圈或者别的方法互相残杀。

original: Although... it's odd, the bomb collars weren't linked before like they are now. Guess someone learned what the problem was.
translation: 不过...说来奇怪，以前的炸弹项圈可不像现在这样是彼此绑定的。估计终于有人发现了问题的核心吧。

original: I found some medical records in the Villa Clinic. You brought her in for treatment, right?
translation: 我在别墅区的诊所里找到了几份接诊记录。是你带她来治病的，对吧？

original: {Slight surprise}The Clinic? {Beat, a little wary}Yeah, I did bring her in. Before the Gala... well, before the first Gala Event. A few lifetimes ago.
translation: 诊所？对，是我带她来的。那是在庆典前…呃，我说的是几百年前原定要举行的那场盛世庆典。

original: She was a stress case, throat was shot, all nerves. When she wasn't doped up on Med-X or Superstimming her pain away...
translation: 当时她压力很大，嗓子打不开，精神也很不稳定。如果她没有使用吗啡针或者超级治疗针来止痛的话……

original: ...look, never mind. I don't want to speak bad about her. She was a classy woman, good singer, and if she couldn't act her way out of a box...
translation: ...算了，不说了。我不想说她的坏话。她是个美人，歌唱得也好，虽然她的演技实在让人无法恭维…

original: ...she was Sinclair's world, and that's all that mattered. He didn't need to know any of that, any of her history.
translation: …但只要辛克莱看重她，这就够了。他不需要了解她的健康状况，也不需要知道她的过去。

original: So you met her before she met Sinclair?
translation: 所以你在他俩交往之前，就已经认识薇拉了？

original: Introductions? You knew her before?
translation: 介绍人？你认识她?

original: Of course. What, some kind of surprise to you that I knew people once? Used to have my name in lights, all right?
translation: 当然了。怎么，当年我人脉很广的，这很奇怪吗？那时侯我大小也算是个名人好吧？

original: Knew a dozen Veras, or whatever her name was. Uh... "Vera Keyes." Figured I could pay Sinclair back, introduce the two...
translation: 像薇拉这样的女人，我认识可多了，我甚至都记不清她的全名。呃…她全名叫"薇拉·凯丝"。我是为了报答辛克莱的恩情，才替他们俩牵的线...

original: {To himself}...guy was a slouch in the dame department, had to pick up the slack somehow.
translation: ...辛克莱在女人这方面实在太嫩了，我就想拉他一把。

original: Can you tell me about her?
translation: 你能和我说说她的故事吗？

original: Vera was a big star, back before the Bomb. Not the best actress, but... well, she had other talents. Nice voice, nice legs.
translation: 薇拉是核弹落下前那个年代的大明星，虽然她演技不算出众，但...她有些别的天赋。比如嗓音美，腿美。

original: For some reason, Sinclair... he built this place... she caught his eye. {Shrugs}Once he was hooked, that was it, had to have her.
translation: 出于某些原因，辛克莱…就是这地方的建造者…对她一见倾心。他上钩之后——没错就是上钩——便彻底爱上了她。

original: So made the introductions, and guess what? He builds this place for her, like some kind of Cleopatra obsession. {Beat, looks around}Wasn't always a deathtrap.
translation: 于是我充当了他们俩的介绍人，结果你猜怎么着？他居然为薇拉修了这座赌场，简直就和某些人对埃及艳后的痴迷一般。以前这地方还没有那么危险。

original: Before, you mentioned the Hologram at the Fountain - Vera? Do you know her?
translation: 先前你提到了喷泉上的全息影像？是叫……薇拉？你认识她么？

original: What happens during the Gala Event?
translation: 盛世庆典上会有什么节目？

original: Oh, it'll light up the casino, light up the sky... set the speakers in the Villa to play beautiful, soothing music.
translation: 哦，整个赌场都会被点亮，亮如白昼.…别墅区的所有喇叭都会播放美妙舒缓的音乐。

original: ...and when I say soothing music, I mean with the speakers being the state they are, things'll be screaming, all right. Think air raid sirens.
translation: ...我说舒缓，前提是那些喇叭都还没坏，现在这些玩意只会发出刺耳的尖叫，那声音简直比得上空袭警报。

original: That means it'll wake up everything in town like a hornet's nest. Not sure what a hornet is? Forget it - basically, trouble.
translation: 要是它们响了，那城里的所有牛鬼蛇神都会醒过来，不亚于捅了马蜂窝。你不知道马蜂是啥？算了——简单来说，情况会变得相当棘手。

original: Interesting? Interesting how?
translation: 有趣？怎么个有趣法？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Yeah... maybe the drain in power, that'll cause the security systems to shut down enough to let us in. But... getting back out?
translation: [成功] 是啊…一旦电力供应不上，安保系统就有可能断电，到时候咱们就有机会溜进去了。不过…想要再出来的话…

original: No, the place'll close up tighter than an opening at the Fronds. {To himself}Or Danny Parker's sphincter when he has to tip a doorman.
translation: 难了，恐怕这大门会关得比开业庆典时的碎叶赌场还要紧，甚至紧过丹尼·帕克给门童付小费时的菊花哟。

original: Why... it sure is interesting. Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
translation: 对呀…确实很有趣。看来咱俩的想法一致？

original: [FAILED] Interesting... in the sense that having some light show open the Sierra Madre? Interesting to me, who would have thought?
translation: [失败] 有趣…我是说在马德雷山脉赌场开幕的时候举办灯光秀。对我来说可真是太有趣了，谁能料到这种场面呢？

original: And the woman? The Auto-Doc victim - what about her?
translation: 那个女人呢？躺在自动医生上的那个，她怎么样？

original: Little Miss Silence...? Maybe she needs to be in some place where she can be seen, but being heard isn't important?
translation: 那位沉默的小妞吗…？可能更适合去一个能够当花瓶，却用不着出声的地方吧。

original: What about Christine?
translation: 克莉丝汀怎么样？

original: Christine, that her name? Nice name. I mean, you can't see it on posters, but... never mind.
translation: 她叫克莉丝汀？好名字。招贴画上可找不到这样的名字，但...算了，不说了。

original: I don't know. She might need to hold some place where speaking isn't important. Like stage tech? Lighting? Got me.
translation: 我不知道。我觉得她更适合去做那些不太需要说话的工作。比如舞台设备？灯光？搞不懂。

original: And me? I've had prime billing in Europe, New York... and this gig doesn't feel like that.
translation: 至于我？我在欧洲、在纽约可都举办过大型专场……这种级别的场子根本入不了我的眼。

original: Don't get me wrong, I can hold an audience, conduct a score from the rooftops, but I'm guessing I'm the odd man out in this whole heist.
translation: 别误会啊，我知道如何调动观众，我也懂得怎么站在屋顶上指挥乐队，但在我看来，我绝对是咱们这个抢劫团伙里的异类。

original: Any idea why he wants you there?
translation: 你知道他为什么要派你来这儿吗？

original: Partner, I'm not sure this guy's operating with a full deck. My bet? Process of elimination, lowest common denominator.
translation: 我的好搭档哟，我也不清楚这老家伙的脑子是否正常。但要我猜的话，他应该用了排除法，寻找最大公约数吧。

original: He figures the "Strong Man"'s needed somewhere, {to himself}even if it sounds like the Strong Man's {emph}two minds about it.
translation: 他估计是对那个"大块头"另有安排，虽然听得出来，那大块头的脑子里似乎有两个人在打架。

original: Plus, I'm guessing wherever ol' Doggy Boy's needed doesn't need smarts. {Beat, to himself}I hope not, or we're royally jones'd.
translation: 另外啊，我猜咱们这位狗兄要去的地方应该是用不着多少聪明才智的。希望我猜得对吧，否则咱们可就凶多吉少咯。

original: According to the marker, you're slated for a spot in Puesta del Sol.
translation: 根据哔哔小子上的地标，你要去的是日落镇的一个地方。

original: No... looks like a {emph}rooftop in Puesta del Sol. In better days, nice view. Now? It's the last place anyone wants to stand when this event goes off.
translation: 不…更具体说，应该是{emph}日落镇的一处天台。那地方以前风景不错。现在呢？恐怕是欣赏开业大秀最糟糕的位置了。

original: That place during Spring, Summer, and Fall, a little bit in Winter, is a prime resort spot for Ghost People. Not the best of neighborhoods.
translation: 那里一年四季，除了冬天的大部分时间以外，都是鬼人最喜欢光顾的地方。可不是什么邻里和睦的好去处啊。

original: If we're going there, I'm not going alone. And if you have any bright ideas about telling me to stroll over there - or leave me there? No thanks.
translation: 如果我们真要去那儿的话，我拒绝单独行动。甭管你有什么理由，想让我就这样进去，或是要我留在那里，门儿都没有。

original: "Vera" Hologram? You know the holographic woman?
translation: "薇拉"，那个全息影像？你认识那个全息女人？

original: Yeah - don't you? Or... {Frowns}guess Vera Keyes got lost along with the rest of the holo-archives when the bomb hit, huh?
translation: 对啊，你不认识？…看来核弹落下后，薇拉·凯丝的事迹也和其他全息档案一道，消失在了历史的长河里啊。

original: {Little wistful}Ghost in name and image. Still a looker, though. {Quiet}Got to hand it to Sinclair, sure can pick 'em. Well, or get picked. Whichever.
translation: 只剩下一个名字和外貌。不过，她确实是个美人。必须夸一下辛克莱，挺会挑人的，或者也可以说，是被她盯上了吧。

original: Know anything about this Gala Event we're supposed to trigger?
translation: 关于我们要启动的这个所谓盛世庆典，你有多少了解？

original: {Chewing it over}Supposed to be the Grand Opening of the Sierra Madre. Lot of lights, music, the works.
translation: {Chewing it over}原本要作为马德雷山脉赌场的开业大秀，搞了许多节目，张灯结彩、欢天喜地的。

original: {Slowly}And he's going to use the Gala Event... to open the casino? But... {Thinking}that's... interesting.
translation: {Slowly}那家伙居然想借着盛世庆典来…打开赌场的大门？…这还真是…挺有趣的。

original: {Warning}Can't take any chances, though... you may be some victim who simply stumbled down here. If so, can't let you let Dog out... no, not yet.
translation: {Warning}不过容我先确认一下…也许你只是个误打误撞闯进来的倒霉蛋，那样的话，我就不能让你把狗放出来…不，现在不行。

original: {Imperious}If you're who I think you are, you came to fetch Dog, use him to drag others here. {Beat, cruel}Now I'll use {emph}you - {emph}and that Pip-Boy you're wearing.
translation: {Imperious}如果我没猜错的话，你应该是要来带走狗的，你想利用他来绑架其他人。{Beat, cruel}而现在我要利用你，和你手上的哔哔小子。

original: {Taunting}You're smart. Clever. The key to Dog's cage is simple. Take my voice to the cage above. {Beat}Let me speak to the beast inside.
translation: {Taunting}你很聪明。非常聪明。打开笼子的方法非常简单。把这盘磁带拿到上面的笼子旁边，播放它。{Beat}让我和笼子里那个怪物说话。

original: Then you and I... {emph}we can talk.
translation: 然后我和你…{emph}我们就能交谈了。

original: {Smug, player walked into a trap}That's it... signal frequency's hot, let's see how you deal with this.
translation: 行了，信号频率已经调试好了，看你还有什么花招。

original: {Anger, player's rushing at her for melee combat}Switching frequency, asshole.
translation: 切换频率给你看看，混蛋。

original: {Anger, player's rushing at her for melee combat}Switching frequency, bitch.
translation: 切换频率给你看看，婊子。

original: {First bark}Need to reset this damn thing... switching the frequencies... come on, come on...
translation: 得赶紧重启这该死的东西…转换频率… 快点，快点…

original: {Under her breath, slight frustration}Resetting signal... resetting signal.
translation: 重设信号… 重设信号…

original: {Under her breath, pissed}Think you can run? The longer you try and keep your distance, this scanning frequency will flush you out.
translation: {Under her breath, pissed}你以为你能逃得掉吗？就算你一直躲着我，这个扫描频率最终也会让你暴露的。

original: {Breaks into player's frequency while he's being blasted with turrets, urgency}Seeing what I can do to shut those turrets down from up here... come on... come on...
translation: 我想想办法，看能不能关掉这些炮塔…快啊…快啊…

original: ...got it, two of 'em down... can't shut down the others - he's cut off access. {frustrated}Dammit! {Beat, cold}Put him down, bury him - whatever it takes!
translation: ...成了，关掉两个...其他的没办法了，他切断了连接。该死！干掉他！无论用什么手段！

original: {Uncertain of controls}Is... is this thing on? You hear me down there? {Beat, studying dials}Trying to help you out here... disable the speakers, play a little music...
translation: 这...这东西开了吗？你在下面能听到我说话吗？我在想办法帮你…关掉喇叭，来放点音乐吧……

original: {snaps fingers as music kicks in, ohhh yeah}...and that's more like it, got a beat you can swing to. {Beat}And they won't set off your collar any more - {lower, tougher}just hit that guy where it hurts.
translation: …这才像话嘛，这节奏怎样？够你跳舞的了。它们不会再引爆你的项圈了，好好给那家伙一点颜色看吧。

original: {Rage}You think you've escaped?! You can't outrun me, you were always under my control! Do you hear me?! {Beat, takes it up a notch}Do you hear me?!
translation: {Rage}你以为你安全了吗？你休想摆脱我，你的生死由我掌控！你听到了吗？！{Beat, takes it up a notch}听到了吗？！
