original: {Snarling, player's making good time}You won't get out. {Beat, ominous}I'll bring the whole Sierra Madre down on you, bury you here with {emph}all the others.
translation: {Snarling, player's making good time}你出不去的。{Beat, ominous}我会将整个马德雷山脉赌场掀翻，让你和其他人{emph}全部葬身于此。

original: {Cold, steady, menacing}Think you can escape? No, that hand on your throat is mine, always was.
translation: {Cold, steady, menacing}你以为你逃得掉？不，我的双手早已扼住了你的咽喉，一直如此。

original: {First Time}Hey, those are my emergency supplies! {Beat, backpedaling, knows how it sounds}Uh... I-I mean... I know we're in a bad spot here... just, uh, leave me something, all right?
translation: 嘿，那些都是我留着救急用的！呃…算了…我知道咱们现在处境也不好……就，呃，拜托你，给我剩点行吗？

original: {Grumbles, slight frustration}Yeah, go on... help yourself. Why not?
translation: {Grumbles, slight frustration}对，拿吧…随便拿。干嘛不拿呢？

original: Leave me {emph}something, will you?
translation: 给我留点，行吗？

original: {Grumbles}Never should have left those stupid handprints. Dead giveaway.
translation: 早知道就不留这些蠢手印了。此地无银三百两。

original: Gala
translation: 盛会

original: END MUSIC {plays when player triggers Vera Hologram in lobby or unlocks vault access}
translation: 结束音乐 {plays when player triggers Vera Hologram in lobby or unlocks vault access}

original: I'm not following you.
translation: 我没听明白。

original: Odd Man out... dead weight. Someone you need holding the toolbox, the nurse passing the scalpel, the chauffer driving you to the concert.
translation: 异类…就是可有可无。比如替你拿工具箱的人，给你递手术刀的护士，送你去音乐会的司机。

original: Any guy with {emph}hands is who he needs up on that rooftop. Guess he thinks I don't rate, looking like I do. {Beat}Poor him.
translation: 反正他只需要一个双手健全的人站上屋顶就行了。也许他瞧我这副模样，就觉得我无关紧要吧。可惜他想错了。

original: Is there one console that runs them or several?
translation: 究竟是有一台主机，还是有几台主机在控制它们？

original: Keep going. What else?
translation: 继续走。不然呢？

original: That's the radios and speakers - what about a central sound system?
translation: 你说的是收音机和喇叭——那中控音响呢？

original: The speakers are all controlled by a central console. {Thinking}It's the farthest from the only door out of here...
translation: 所有喇叭都由一台中央主机控制的。从我说的那扇门进去，它在最里面那个房间……

original: ...so you'd need to do a full circuit of the corridor to get to it. Once there, you'll need to shut it down, and I don't have the code.
translation: …想要过去，你得沿着走廊走一圈。到那儿之后，你得自己想办法关掉它，我不知道密码。

original: If you have the code, you can turn off {emph}all the speakers, make them settle down. Getting backstage should buy us time, just take it slow.
translation: 如果你有密码，就可以关闭所有喇叭，让它们安静下来。躲进后台可以为我们争取一些时间，但你一定要小心。

original: Good thing you mentioned that before I ran back there, "partner."
translation: 多谢你及时提醒，我都要准备出发了呢，"好搭档。"

original: Look, I'm in danger here, all right, not exactly thinking with a level head, so cut me some slack. {Beat}Please.
translation: 听着，情况危急，我脑子可能不太好使，您大人有大量，就别和我计较了，行吗？

original: One problem at a time. Take a breath, try and remember.
translation: 咱们一件件来。你先喘口气，好好想想。

original: Calm down, think. Do you know specifically where?
translation: 冷静点，想一想。你知道那些喇叭具体的位置吗？

original: Uh... let's see. Um, once you break right, watch each turn in the corridor, one'll be on your right past my dressing room - and up.
translation: 呃...我想想。呃，你进去后，注意观察走廊内的每个转角，有一台就在我更衣室门口的右上方。

original: Oh, my dressing room - may have left the radio on, right by the table... uh, if you could just shut it off instead of blowing it u... uh, never mind.
translation: 哦，更衣室里的收音机可能还开着，就放在桌上...呃，如果你能关掉它的话，最好是别对它动粗…呃，算了。

original: {Remembering}And there was a speaker in the prop room, too - on the wall between the entrances. And... well, walk slow - there's bound to be more.
translation: 还有一台在道具间，位于入口处的墙上。至于其他的…你还是小心点吧，肯定还有别的喇叭。

original: What about the speakers in here?
translation: 那里面的喇叭呢？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Slight frustration - what's the player getting at?}Yeah... yeah, so what? We got bigger problems with the Holograms... no, no, wait, you're right.
translation: [成功] 对...对。怎么了？咱们现在的重点是全息影像...不，不，等等，你说得对。

original: {Frustrated}The Theater piped music and sound backstage, which means those little squealers are in the corridors back there, too.
translation: 剧场里的音乐和声音都可以传到后台。也就是说，后台的走廊里肯定也装了不少该死的小喇叭。

original: Dean, the theater speakers are wired to a central sound system, right?
translation: 迪安，剧院里的所有喇叭都连着中控音响，对吧？

original: [FAILED] {Urgent}What about them? The speakers won't kill you if you leave them alone, don't worry about them, just get backstage.
translation: [失败] 喇叭？你不去碰它们，它们又不会杀了你，别管喇叭了，到后台去就是了。

original: This casino's security system is pissing me off.
translation: 这赌场的保安真是太让我恶心了。

original: {Slight nervous}You are preaching to the choir. Sinclair and his security... don't even get me started. Those Holograms...
translation: 谁说不是呢。辛克莱和他的保安团队…我真的不愿意提起他们。那些全息影像...

original: Uh... anything else you can tell me that'd help? Anything?
translation: 呃...还有什么可以告诉我的吗？什么都行。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Uh... right. Uh... let's see... when you get the door open, there'll be an exit door dead ahead. {Emph}Don't take it.
translation: [成功] 呃...对。呃...我想想…进门之后，你会在前方尽头处看到一扇标着出口的门。千万别开。

original: It's most likely filled with toxins from the vents. So hug the wall, make as much space between you and the door... or it's Cloud Nine in a casket.
translation: 里面可能充满了通风口排出来的毒气。所以你要靠墙走，尽量离门远点...不然你可就要交待在那儿了。

original: Past that... {thinking}is my dressing room. Under the table there's a footlocker. It's tucked back a bit, so you might miss it. Inside, a gun, some ammo.
translation: 越过那扇门…就是我的更衣间，桌子下面有个手提柜，藏得比较深，你多找找。柜子里面有一把枪和几发子弹。

original: Not much help against the ghosts, still, if you're about to give up, call it quits? {Beat, punchline}Throw it to {emph}me so I can eat a bullet first.
translation: 拿来对付全息影像恐怕不行，但如果你撑下不去，想自行了断的话，麻烦你先把它扔给我，我第一个来。

original: I need a little more than that to go on if we're going to break out of here.
translation: 如果你这么想让我逃出去的话，那你得多给我一点建议。

original: [FAILED] Anything else? I've told you all I can think of! Now, come on, get going.
translation: [失败] 还想听？我已经把一切都告诉你了！赶紧，出发吧！

original: All right, I'll head for the door on the left.
translation: 好吧，我会往左边的门跑。

original: {DUPE}Good, go, and don't get yourself killed - do that, and we're both done.
translation: 好的，去吧，千万别作死，否则咱俩都完蛋。

original: All right, I'll break to my right, head for the locked door.
translation: 好吧，我会向右跑，去找那扇锁住的门。

original: Good, go, and don't get yourself killed - do that, and we're both done.
translation: 好的，去吧，千万别作死，否则咱俩都完蛋。

original: {Nervous}Look... just get rid of them, all right? Tried to slip off stage, then they all started changing color and raising their hands... {emph}not a good sign.
translation: 听着…一定要甩掉它们，知道吗？我试过从舞台附近溜走，谁知它们的颜色立马就变了，还举起双手……看着相当不妙。

original: So how do I get you out of there?
translation: 那我该怎么把你弄出去？

original: Trust me - as soon as you can, run to the door to the {emph}left - use the key you got out of the music rag there, and camp out.
translation: 相信我，你要用最快的速度跑向左边的门，然后用你从乐谱里找到的钥匙打开门，进去里面躲着。

original: As bad as things are, it's going to get a lot worse if either of us pops - so get backstage... {under his breath}until we get a better plan.
translation: 虽然这不是个好办法，但万一咱俩有一个嗝屁了，那情况只会更糟。所以先到后台去吧…等我们想出了更好的方法再说。

original: I didn't see any security coming in - only the speakers.
translation: 我没看到有保安进来，只看到了喇叭。

original: Wait, what Holograms? What are you talking about?
translation: 等等，什么全息影像？你在说什么？

original: {Uneasy}Look... those ghosts are going to come out of the wings behind you in a second, the security types, {emph}not the "friendly" bald types.
translation: 听着…那些幽灵很快就会从你身后的舞台边上现身，它们穿着保安的制服，和你之前遇到的那些“友好”的秃头可不一样。

original: And if you got in here, the door's probably locked tight behind you - so {emph}don't back up or run for the exit, you're not going to make it.
translation: 而且既然你进来了，那你身后的门很有可能已经锁上了。所以也别想着从剧院的出口出去了，没用的。

original: All right, makes sense. Where's the music?
translation: 好吧，有道理。音乐磁带在哪儿？

original: The Holotape should be where I left it... no, wait. It's... it's in Vera's dressing room, probably. May... may be a key to her room on my desk.
translation: 全息磁带应该还在原地……不，等等。也可能是在...在薇拉的更衣间里，搞不好…搞不好她房间的钥匙还放在我的桌子上。

original: Anyway... snag the key out of my room, and look around Vera's room, the Holotape has to be there. As for getting it to the projection booth...
translation: 总之…先去我房间里拿钥匙，再去薇拉的房间里看看，全息磁带一定在那儿。至于放映室嘛…

original: Well... sometimes Vera used to watch from the projection booth, so she must have had a master key... look around her room, might be there.
translation: ...薇拉有时候会在放映室观看录像，所以她一定有万能钥匙...在她房里找找，应该有的。

original: Yeah, but if I run, what about the Security Holograms?
translation: 好，要是我跑了，那些全息保安怎么办？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Thinking}Yeah... yeah, right. So... let's see... security's here because the show hasn't started. Guests aren't allowed in, so...
translation: [成功] 对...对，没错。我想想…之所以场内有保安，是因为演出还没开始，观众不允许入场，所以…

original: ...guess we need to start the show. Okay... so when they were setting this place up... we had rehearsals...
translation: …我们可以假装让演出开始。好吧…当初他们建这个地方的时候...我们彩排过几次…

original: {relaxes a bit}...and heh... Sinclair even set up hologram recordings of the shows so we could watch and critique our performances before a fake audience. {Beat, slight anger}Whatever.
translation: …呵...辛克莱甚至用全息录像把彩排过程都录下来了，以便我们之后可以对着一群虚假的观众来检验自己的演出效果。真是够了。

original: Thing is, when the recording queued up, a nice, calm, appreciative audience appeared in the Theater - no security with their head-blasting zap rays.
translation: 关键在于，录像播放的时候，剧场内只会出现一群彬彬有礼又颇有教养的假观众，那帮头顶放光的保安此时就会消失。

original: So, find the music, get it to the projector room upstairs, then play it...? Might reset security, worth a shot.
translation: 所以，你如果能找到录像带，拿到楼上的放映室里播放…兴许安保系统就会重启，值得试一下。

original: Getting backstage is a temporary measure if I can't find the security terminal.
translation: 躲进后台只是权宜之计，关键还是得找到安保控制终端。

original: [FAILED] One thing at a time - and buying time is what we need, all right? Think in the now, it'll sort itself out. {Beat}I hope.
translation: [失败] 饭要一口口吃，现在重要的是争取时间，好吗？船到桥头自然直，会有办法的。也许吧。

original: So I go to the locked door, right?
translation: 所以，我要跑进那个上锁的门，对吧？

original: [SUCCEEDED] What? Oh, my left - your right. So, yeah, run to the door on your right. {Beat}Heh, almost got you killed there. {To himself}Us killed there.
translation: [成功] 什么？哦，我的左边就是你的右边。对，应该去你右手边的那扇门。嗨，瞧我差点害死了咱俩。

original: Wait - I need to head to the door to your left or my left?
translation: 等等——我要去的是你左边的门还是我左边的门？

original: [FAILED] Right, the locked door to the left. Watch out, the guards are going to materialize in any second, crouch and take it slow.
translation: [失败] 对，左边上锁的门。小心，守卫随时会出现，你最好蹲下来，慢点前进。

original: That's all I wanted to know. I'll head out, see what I can do on my end.
translation: 我先了解这么多吧，我会去想想办法的。

original: What were you blackmailing her with?
translation: 你用什么来要挟她？

original: What {emph}wasn't I blackmailing her with. {Flippant}Chem use, indiscretions, more chem use... the usual Hollywood tune.
translation: 还能有啥呢？滥用药物，品行不端，以及——滥用药物…反正就是好莱坞常见的那些套路。

original: Like Sinclair, people are the architects of their own misfortunes. Leave themselves wide open for someone to waltz right in and take what they want.
translation: 像辛克莱这种人，命中犯太岁纯粹就是咎由自取。要不是他自己门户大开，又怎么会有人趁虚而入呢。

original: As long as they take a single step into the trap. Get a few pictures, get a little dirt, and that person's your piano.
translation: 一旦他们入局，只需要几张照片，再加一点黑料，就能将他们玩弄于鼓掌之间。

original: Vera? Med-X was her thing, even Superstimmed herself for the after-rush. Sick.
translation: 至于薇拉？她喜欢吗啡，甚至为了过瘾，不惜注射超级治疗针。简直病态。

original: What did you want her to do?
translation: 你想让她做什么？

original: Sinclair built this whole town to accommodate her. Same with the casino's voice lock. He wanted to make sure she had access to everything.
translation: 辛克莱为了讨她欢心，不惜斥巨资修建了这个度假村，还将赌场的声控锁也设成了她的声音，他想把这里的一切都交给薇拉。

original: And since I already had access to Vera... well, that meant I had access to the vault, too.
translation: 而我只要将薇拉捏在手心…呵，那就等于将避难所的钥匙也捏在了手心。

original: Were you blackmailing Vera Keyes to break into the Sierra Madre?
translation: 你为了进入马德雷山脉赌场，曾经要挟过薇拉·凯丝？

original: "Blackmail" is such a strong word. I asked her, she said yes, then... she started to get cold feet.
translation: 说"要挟"有些过了，我只是求她帮个忙而已，本来她都答应了，谁知后来…却心软了。

original: I blame Sinclair... he was such a victim, that maybe she felt it would be too easy... it doesn't matter.
translation: 都是辛克莱的错...他太老实了，搞得薇拉可能于心不忍…不过无所谓了。

original: I found this Holotape in your safe.
translation: 我在你的保险箱里找到了这盘全息磁带。

original: Yeah? Little bit of two-reel memories... we're here to steal from the Sierra Madre, not from each other.
translation: 是吗？小小一卷磁带，包含多少回忆呀…不过我们的目标是马德雷山脉赌场，可不是各自的私人珍藏。

original: Sinclair?! Sinclair, I'm trapped. Please, oh god, the security systems won't let me out, they're keeping me here.
translation: 辛克莱？！辛克莱，我被困住了。天啊，安保系统不允许我出去，我被关在里面了。

original: Sinclair! Sinclair!
translation: 辛克莱！辛克莱！

original: {Quiet}We all pay for what we've done. I'm so sorry, Sinclair. Sorry, I... I should have trusted you.
translation: {Quiet}这一切都是自食其果。我真的很抱歉，辛克莱，我……我本该相信你的。

original: I'm going to die here, amongst the ghosts. I... I'm still being recorded by the holographic system.
translation: 我要死在这儿了，死在这些幽灵身边……那些全息设备还在录着我的一举一动……

original: The doors, they... they sealed. I... I can hear the other guests, screaming to be let out, to let go.
translation: 门……门被锁住了。我……我能听到其他客人的惨叫，哀求着让他们出去，放他们走。

original: Let go? Let go of what?
translation: 放手？对什么放手？

original: I came so far to be here... now, now I just want to leave. Please... let me leave.
translation: 我花了那么多心思……可现在，现在我只想离开。求求你，让我走吧。

original: Sinclair? Sinclair, where did you go? Why did you leave me here? Why...
translation: 辛克莱？辛克莱，你到底去哪儿了？为什么把我丢在这里？为什么…

original: Sinclair, is that you?
translation: 辛克莱，是你吗？

original: ...would you stop? {Laughs}Such a kidder.
translation: …别这样行吗？ {Laughs}真会开玩笑。

original: {Getting serious}This is Vera Keyes, auditioning for Love Sets Sail... {frowns}god, this script. Don't get me wrong, I'm happy to have the w...{"work"}
translation: {Getting serious}我是薇拉·凯丝，正在试镜《爱已起航》…{frowns}天哪，这破剧本……哦，别误会，我很高兴能得到这份……{"工作。"}

original: ...is that a plane over head? Those bombers are nothing but big hornets buzzing around the sky these days...
translation: ……我们头顶是刚过去一架飞机吗？那些轰炸机像蜜蜂似的，成天飞来飞去。

original: ...is it gone. All right. This is Vera Keyes, auditioning for "Love Sets Sail."
translation: ……它走了，很好。我是薇拉·凯丝，正在试镜《爱已起航》…

original: "Malcolm... ever since our freighter went down, I feel like my heart's fallen to the bottom of the ocean along with my... ugh"{Laughing}
translation: "马尔科姆…自从我们的货船沉没之后，我感觉我的心也一起沉到了海底…连同我的……呃"{Laughing}

original: ...along with my career. God... heh... all right, all right...
translation: …连同我的事业…上帝啊…呵，好吧，好吧…

original: {Dean walking in on Vera as she's getting ready}Pretty as a picture.
translation: {Dean walking in on Vera as she's getting ready}真是美若天仙啊。

original: {Surprise, uncomfortable at the sudden arrival}Uh... Dean, I... didn't hear you come in.
translation: 啊...迪安，我...没听见你进来。

original: I'm not wearing my dancing shoes, so I walk a little softly now. {Mock menacing}What, you think I was a Chinaman, come to cut your American throat?
translation: 我没穿舞鞋，所以脚步很轻。怎么，难不成你把我当成了中国佬，要来暗杀你这美国人了？

original: Dean, really.
translation: 迪安，别这样。

original: {Slightly predatory}What... no hug? Come here.
translation: 怎么了…来抱一个吗？来吧。

original: Dean, I'm getting ready.
translation: 迪安，我要上台了。

original: You sing like a bird, pop the safe, and we're as through as through can be.
translation: 你好好唱歌吧。等金库的事情办妥了，我就不再为难你。

original: {Wants to back out}Dean... I just... about tonight, I... I don't know.
translation: 迪安…可我...今晚，我...不知道。

original: {Vera's starting to get cold feet, Dean doesn't like this}You don't know? I ask one simple favor of you, and you tell me "no?"
translation: 你不知道？我只是请你帮个小忙，连这你都不答应？

original: I didn't say no. I just said that... I don't think...
translation: 没有不答应。我只是...觉得这样不行...

original: You're right, you don't think.
translation: 没错，你不行。

original: I don't need you - I'll send you back to the farm, worse off than you were, because you'll have seen the Sierra Madre, and had to let it {emph}all go.
translation: 我不需要你了——我可以把你送回农场，你会过得比以前还糟，因为你已经见识过马德雷山脉赌场的奢华，舍不得放手这样的生活。

original: I could have gotten any leggy dame out of Hollywood to get out here and play Sinclair's heart strings.
translation: 早知道就随便找个好莱坞的长腿美女来勾引辛克莱了。

original: You just happened to be the one I caught, and it was really your own fault, a little too much into the chems and meds, and...
translation: 你不过是恰巧遇到我慧眼识人，可你却自甘堕落，沉迷于药物之中，而且……

original: {Placating, but still leaving the hooks in}Aw, shhh, don't cry. Look, I'm not trying to hurt {emph}you. Just one last little job, a little less dirty, a little less messy. He trusts you, Vera.
translation: 啊呀，哟哟，别哭啊。听着，我不是有意要为难你的。最后一点小忙，不必搞得这么难堪。他相信你，薇拉。

original: {Placating, but cold}And so do I. After this, I promise you, all those other Holotapes, they'll go away.
translation: 我也是。我保证，这事结束以后，所有这些全息磁带，它们全都会消失。

original: Of course, Dean.
translation: 当然，迪安。

original: Everyone's still alive on each floor - including you.
translation: 每层的人都还活着——包括你。

original: Still trying to find out. Not sure.
translation: 还在想办法，我也不知道。

original: All right... even if they all end up dead, though, you say there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives.
translation: 好吧...就算他们都死了，你说还可以通过马德雷山脉赌场的档案来复原这首歌。

original: Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal to tie it all together? Easy. Just a little legwork.
translation: 只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端将档案拼到一块就行了对吧？简直小菜一碟。

original: Christine is dead. Dog... well...
translation: 克莉丝汀死了。狗...他...

original: {Frustrated}Dead? For the love of... chopping up her voice box was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
translation: 死了？天哪…算了，反正改造她的声带本来就十分冒险。这样一来只能放弃备用计划了。

original: Still... there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives, right? Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal?
translation: 话虽如此...还是可以利用赌场的档案来修复这首歌的，对吧？只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端进行操作就行了。

original: Christine is alive. Dog... well...
translation: 克莉丝汀还活着。狗…他…

original: Forget that walking stomach, not interested in being his lunch... just glad the girl's all right. Where is she? Is she here?
translation: 忘了那个怪物吧，我也不想变成他的午餐…我只是很高兴那个姑娘还活着。她在哪儿？还在赌场里面吗？

original: Wait... no, if the Sierra Madre assigned people to floors, she's got to have been sent to Vera's room, right? That's irony for you.
translation: 等一下……如果马德雷山脉赌场会自动安排人们到各个楼层去，那她肯定已经被送到薇拉的房间了，对吧？老天爷可真会开玩笑。

original: Perfect, couldn't have worked out better. So - what, you're heading to the main terminal now that you've got this floor unlocked?
translation: 那可真是太棒了，简直万事俱备。既然这层的门锁都打开了，你现在是打算去操作主终端吗？

original: <Lie> If Christine's throat surgery was your plan, too late, she's dead.
translation: <撒谎> 如果克莉丝汀的声带手术也是你计划的一部分，那很可惜，她已经死了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Dead? After all I went through... after all that hauling her body through the streets?
translation: [成功] 死了？我费了那么大的劲儿…千辛万苦地背着她走街串巷…

original: [FAILED] Really... "partner." Now, now... you can't pull one over on Dean... but you tried, didn't you?
translation: [失败] 说真的啊..."搭档"。这种级别的谎话可骗不了迪安…虽然你的想法不错。

original: So you don't want to share... keep her from me, huh? All we have to do is make her sing, and it's all ours.
translation: 看这样子，你是想吃独食咯…不乐意我碰她吗？我们只要让她唱首歌，就能发大财了呀。

original: Although... why lie to me? I'm hurt. I mean, we don't even {emph}need her if you get the terminals live, and the music kicking.
translation: 既然这样…为何还要骗我呢？我真的很受伤。你看，如果你能启动终端，让音乐响起的话，我们甚至都用不着她呢。

original: If you were using Christine's voice box to smuggle Vera's voice in, she's dead.
translation: 如果你是想用克莉丝汀的声带来“重现”薇拉的声音，那我告诉你，她已经死了。

original: And here I thought I was being clever. {To himself}Teach me to hold my cards a little closer to the chest... whole heist was a gamble anyway.
translation: 看来是我自作聪明了。这件事教育我下次得把底牌藏得更深一点…不过随便了，这场抢劫本来就是一次豪赌。

original: Still... there's a way to recover the song from the Sierra Madre archives, right? Just set up links to each floor, then use the lobby terminal?
translation: 话虽如此…还是可以利用赌场的档案来修复这首歌的，对吧？只要设置好每层的连接，再用大厅中央的终端进行操作就行了。

original: Wait, you were trying to smuggle one inside? Where is it?
translation: 等等，你曾经夹带过一盘录音进来？它在哪儿？

original: It's safe. I hope. Right now, let's focus on getting everyone {emph}else to safety, all right? Everybody else all right?
translation: 它很安全。应该吧。我们还是先确保大家都平安无事吧，好吗？其他人情况怎样？

original: So - what, you're heading to the main terminal now that you've got this floor unlocked?
translation: 既然这层的门锁都打开了，你现在是打算去操作主机了吗？

original: {Frowns}Hnh. You got a point. {Frowns, warning}You better not let me down. Try and get into the Sierra Madre without me? You'll wish you hadn't.
translation: 哼，挺有道理的。最好别让我失望，你要是敢抛下我独自进入马德雷山脉赌场，我一定会让你后悔的。

original: {Slight hesitation}All right... look, if the Holograms are here to keep me company, then... I don't mind staying here for a while.
translation: 好吧...听着，如果那些全息投影会来和我作伴的话，那…我可以在这儿多待一会儿。

original: But listen... {Frowns, warning}when this thing goes off, try and get into the Sierra Madre without me? You'll wish you hadn't.
translation: 但你听好了……等这玩意启动后，你要是敢抛下我独自进入马德雷山脉赌场，我一定会让你后悔的。

original: The terminal can tie the fragments together, just need to wrap it up.
translation: 终端会把片段拼接起来，我只要最后点个确定就行。

original: Now that I've got the signal established to this floor, yes.
translation: 我已经设置好了这层的信号，所以是的。

original: All right - well, thanks for bailing me out.
translation: 好吧，谢谢你救我出来。

original: Yes, that's the next step. You going to be all right?
translation: 没错，这就是下一步。你会没事吧？

original: {Brushoff, needs player to leave}I'll be fine, don't worry about me. Go on ahead, I'm going to try and unwind.
translation: 没事的，不用担心我。去吧，我想在这儿吹吹风。

original: If it means I can get out of this alive, yes, that's why I'm here.
translation: 反正能活着出去就行，这就是我来这儿的理由。

original: At least you're honest, can't blame you. I'd have done the same if there was a trigger to my head... or a collar on my neck.
translation: 至少你很诚实，也怪不得你。如果有人用枪抵着我的脑袋...或者脖子上套个项圈的话，我也会做同样的事。

original: No - believe it or not, I wasn't going to leave you to die.
translation: 不，信不信由你，我不会丢下你不管的。

original: You know... people can still surprise me. All right, I believe you. You got spine. {Raises an eyebrow}Guess the bombs left a little human goodwill behind.
translation: 真应了那句老话…知人知面不知心。好吧，我相信你。你有骨气。看来核弹还没有带走人类所有的良知。

original: The one who put these collars on us wanted me to deal with everyone first.
translation: 在我们身上安项圈的那个家伙，想让我先对付你们所有人。

original: Figures... wish he'd show himself, although I'm betting he's not doing that until we've cracked the vault.
translation: 不出所料啊…要是他能亲自现身就好了，不过我估计得等到咱们打开了避难所，他才会出现吧。

original: {Thinking}That means we'll still need a copy of the song to get into the vault... and after all I went through to smuggle a copy inside.
translation: 所以想要进入避难所，我们还是需要一份录音…好在功夫不负有心人，我已经成功夹带了一份进来。

original: Wait... you said this guy wanted you to deal with all of us first? What, is everyone else here?
translation: 等一下...你说那老头要你先搞定我们所有人？那就是说其他人也都进来了？

original: If by "recording inside," you meant Christine, she's dead.
translation: 如果你所说的"夹带进来的录音"是指克莉丝汀，那她已经死了。

original: Figured that out, huh? Clever.
translation: 你居然猜到了？挺聪明的嘛。

original: <Lie> If by "recording inside" you meant Christine, she's dead.
translation: <撒谎> 如果你所说的"夹带进来的录音"是指克莉丝汀，那她已经死了。

original: {DUPE: Frustrated}Dead? For the love of... Chopping up her voice box was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
translation: 死了？天哪…算了，反正改造她的声带本来就十分冒险。这样一来只能放弃备用计划了。

original: Christine is dead. Dog... well...
translation: 克莉丝汀死了。狗...他...

original: {Frustrated}Dead? For the love of... this whole heist was a gamble anyway. So much for back-up plans.
translation: 死了？天哪……算了，反正这次的抢劫本来就是一次豪赌。看来只能放弃备用计划了。

original: Christine is alive. Dog... well...
translation: 克莉丝汀还活着。狗...他...

original: Forget that walking stomach, not interested in being his lunch... just glad the girl's all right. Where is she? Is she here?
translation: 忘了那个怪物吧，我也不想变成他的午餐…我只是很高兴那个姑娘还活着。她在哪儿？还在赌场里面吗？

original: Wait... no, if the Sierra Madre assigned people to floors, she's got to have been sent to Vera's room, right? That's irony for you.
translation: 等一下……如果马德雷山脉赌场会自动安排人们到各个楼层去，那她肯定已经被送去薇拉的房间了，对吧？老天爷可真会开玩笑。

original: Perfect, couldn't have worked out better.
translation: 那就太棒了，可以说万事俱备。

original: Wait - you said you have one inside? Where's the song recording you have?
translation: 等等——你说里面也有一盘录音？那盘录音在哪儿？

original: It's safe. I hope. Right now, let's focus on getting everyone {emph}else to safety, all right? Everybody else all right?
translation: 它很安全。应该吧。我们还是先确保大家都平安无事吧，好吗？其他人情况怎样？

original: The one who put these collars on us wanted me to deal with everyone first.
translation: 在我们身上安项圈的那个家伙，想让我先对付你们所有人。

original: Figures... wish he'd show himself, although I'm betting he's not doing that until we've cracked the vault.
translation: 不出所料啊…要是他能亲自现身就好了，但我估计，得等到咱们打开了避难所，他才会出现吧。

original: {Thinking}That means we'll still need a copy of the song to get into the vault... and after all I went through to smuggle a copy inside.
translation: 所以想要进入避难所，我们还是需要一份录音…好在功夫不负有心人，我已经成功夹带了一份进来。

original: Wait... you said this guy wanted you to deal with all of us first? What, is everyone else here?
translation: 等一下...你说那老头要你先搞定我们所有人？那就是说其他人也都进来了？

original: <Lie> I'm not sure how to do it yet. You said you had a recording outside?
translation: <撒谎> 我还不太清楚该怎么做。你说过你在外面有盘录音带？

original: Well, yeah in the Villa. {More to himself}But I have one inside, too.
translation: 嗯，对，在别墅区里。但里面也有一盘。

original: We can talk about that later, though, it's not important right now... you came for me, any sign of the others?
translation: 待会再说吧，现在这件事不重要...你都能找到我了，那其他人呢？

original: The song still exists in fragments in the Sierra Madre archives on each floor.
translation: 这首歌分成了好几个片段，就藏在赌场各层的档案室中。

original: Guess Vera echoes down through the ages, then. Sierra Madre hasn't completely forgotten her.
translation: 看来薇拉的声音回荡了数百年，马德雷山脉赌场还没完全忘了她。

original: {Frowns}So that's why you showed... you wanted what was in the music archives on this floor, hook up the signal. Nice.
translation: 所以你才来这里…你想找到这一层保存的音乐档案，然后再把几个片段拼接到一起，聪明。

original: As long as I re-establish a frequency to each floor, I can rebuild the song.
translation: 只要我重新设定每一层的频率，我就可以修复这首歌。

original: The key is a song by Vera Keyes.
translation: 钥匙是薇拉·凯丝唱的一首歌。

original: What? Are you sure? {Beat, realizes}That song... that stupid song of hers... no, that makes perfect sense.
translation: 什么？你确定？那首歌.…那首破歌…啊，原来如此。

original: And it was always playing here in the casino... dammit, if I'd only brought a recording inside... so, what, you're trying to recover it?
translation: 难怪赌场当时老在循环播放那首歌…见鬼，要是我能带盘录音带进来就好了...怎么，你要尝试复原它？

original: What are you doing with a key to her room?
translation: 你为什么会有她房间的钥匙？

original: Do I have to spell it out? Come on. Time's wasting, and those Holograms are going to be on us any second.
translation: 连这种事我都需要向你解释？拜托，时间不多啦。那些全息影像随时都会启动。

original: ...got it, two of 'em down... can't shut down the others - he's cut off access. {frustrated}Dammit! {Beat, cold}Put him down, bury him - whatever it takes!
translation: ...成了，关掉两个...其他的没办法了，他切断了连接。该死！干掉他！无论用什么手段！

original: {snaps fingers as music kicks in, ohhh yeah}...and that's more like it, got a beat you can swing to. {Beat}And they won't set off your collar any more - {lower, tougher}just hit that guy where it hurts.
translation: …这才像话嘛，这节奏怎样？够你跳舞的了。它们不会再引爆你的项圈了，给那家伙一点颜色看吧。

original: I can handle a 200 year old washed-out lounge singer, trust me.
translation: 一个过气了200年的酒吧歌手，我对付起来根本不在话下，相信我。

original: I guess I'll try the key and see.
translation: 先试试这把钥匙也无妨。

original: We'll talk about this more when we're face-to-face.
translation: 这条等咱们见面了再细聊吧。

original: Really? You're a terrible liar. See you soon, Dean.
translation: 真的？多谢你如此坦诚。待会儿见啦，迪安。

original: {Frustrated}Of all the... where the hell are those stupid Holograms already? {Beat}Even if you get back here, you won't live long, trust me.
translation: 该死的…那些该死的全息影像怎么还不出来？就算你能跑进后台，你也命不久矣，相信我。

original: ...that plan sounds pretty clear to me. Got it.
translation: …这计划听起来挺靠谱的，明白了。

original: So as long as I make sure I don't run for the exit...
translation: 所以我只要不往出口跑就行了……

original: {Uneasy}What... what now? Try and come back {emph}here?
translation: 什么...怎么？难不成你还要往后面跑？

original: {Uneasy}No, you belong out in the audience... I mean, not like... uh... you could get backstage. That key you snagged, it won't work.
translation: 不，你只能呆在观众席…你不能…呃…来后台。你拿到的那把钥匙，没用。

original: ...head backstage, destroy every speaker, grab every key, then shut down security...
translation: …所以我只要去后台，破坏所有喇叭，拿走每把钥匙，再关掉安保系统……

original: I'm that predictable, am I? You're probably right.
translation: 我的心思有那么容易预料吗？你可能说对了。

original: I guess I should have figured you'd have an escape plan. Clever.
translation: 早该猜到你已经想好了逃跑计划。真聪明。

original: {Smug}I'm not a betting man, I've come too far to leave it to chance.
translation: 我不喜欢赌博，我已经花了这么大心思，可不能再靠运气了。

original: Really? What makes you think you can slip out?
translation: 真的？你凭什么觉得自己可以溜出去？

original: {Smug, dismissive}Way I figure it, you'll try and run for the exit, and only I know where the key is - and where the safest place in the whole theater is: backstage.
translation: 依我看，你会往出口跑，但只有我才知道钥匙在哪里，而且我也知道，这座剧院最安全的地方，其实是后台。

original: You, you're trapped down there, and you couldn't shut off the speakers, unlock the doors, or cancel security if you tried.
translation: 而你，你在下面插翅难飞，既关不了喇叭，也打不开门，解除不了安保措施。

original: What about the collars, huh? Kill me, and...
translation: 那项圈怎么办？如果我死了，那...

original: [SUCCEEDED] No... no... the collars... I know what happened now. Sure, mine activated... but it feels different, the electronic tapdance inside.
translation: [成功] 不...不...项圈…我现在明白怎么回事了。没错，我的项圈是启动了…但振动的频率感觉和以前不一样了。

original: I can kill you and still make it out while security is busy frying you to a crisp. Hands are clean, then smooth sailing to the Sierra Madre.
translation: 就算我杀了你，也可以放心逃走，任由保安将你的尸体烤成焦炭。我也不必担心弄脏自己的手，还可以大摇大摆地开进马德雷赌场。

original: And the collars? You sound awfully eager to kill someone whose life is tied to yours.
translation: 那项圈怎么办？咱俩可是生死与共的伙伴啊，你就这么舍得对我动手？

original: [FAILED] No... I know how the collars behave now, in here anyway. At least the Sierra Madre gave me {emph}that.
translation: [失败] 不...我已经明白项圈在这里的运作机制了。是马德雷山脉赌场点醒了我。

original: I should be thankful, in a second, it'll give me another gift - with any luck, security'll leave enough of your ashes for an urn on my mantle.
translation: 我应该感恩，很快它就会再送我一件礼物——希望保安能留你几片骨头渣，毕竟我还想把它们装进骨灰盒，放到壁炉上供着呢。

original: Fine with me. Come on, let's settle this.
translation: 我没意见。来吧，咱们做个了断吧。

original: Oh, I'm not going to fight you - I'm going to let {emph}security show you out. Didn't see anyone come in? Well... they'll be here soon.
translation: 哦，我不想和你打，我会让保安们代劳的。怎么，你没看到他们？...他们马上就到。

original: Security? What security?
translation: 保安？什么保安？

original: Didn't see anyone come in? Well... they'll be here soon.
translation: 你没看到外面有人？嗯…他们应该很快就会来的。

original: And go on, run for the exit door, this'll be fun to watch.
translation: 你去吧，往出口跑吧，我会好好欣赏你的表演的。

original: Come on, Dean, turning me to ash? Hardly the way to end a beautiful partnership.
translation: 拜托，迪安。咱俩合作不是挺愉快的嘛，你居然就想这样把我轰成渣？也太绝情了吧。

original: It's a shame... I regret it. Still, you dames are all the same - things get a little hot, you get cold feet. That's why I'm still alive. You? Well...
translation: 说到合作…真是丢人，我早就后悔了。何况，你们这帮人都是一路货色，但凡碰到个硬茬，立马就两腿发软。所以我才能活到今天。而你？哼……

original: I'm not sure.
translation: 我不知道。

original: That's... hmm. Never mind, doesn't change anything. The Sierra Madre's still waiting for us to crack it open.
translation: 这……算了。没什么意义。马德雷山脉赌场还在等着我们破解呢。

original: Why did you need her?
translation: 你为什么需要她？

original: Because she could get closer to Sinclair than I ever could. He built this place for her... well, after the two "chanced" to meet.
translation: 因为她能比我更接近辛克莱。这地方可是他为了取悦她而建的……就在他俩"邂逅"之后不久。

original: I think she was sick, yes. Found a medical report in her Suite.
translation: 我觉得她病了。我在她的房间里找到了诊断报告。

original: {Frowns}What are you talking about? Medical report? Vera wasn't...
translation: 你说什么？诊断报告？薇拉没有...

original: {Thinking}...the Med-X and Superstims. And here I thought she was trying to numb herself to the lights.
translation: …吗啡和超级治疗针。我还以为她是怯场，所以想让自己不再畏惧灯光。

original: Sinclair must have known, though. He was dense, not in that way. But... that doesn't make any sense. If she was sick, dying...
translation: 辛克莱肯定知道。他虽然迟钝，但这方面还是很敏感的。可是...这说不通啊。如果她真的病了，快死了...

original: ...then why build this place? Why start a damn casino and have her be the lock?
translation: ...那为什么要盖这个地方？为什么要开这该死的赌场，还拿她当做这里的钥匙？

original: I'm positive you have it. Now, I'll just kill you and take it.
translation: 我确信你有。我打算直接杀了你，拿走钥匙。

original: {Flustered}What? Hey, hey... now... w-wait... I... {angered}ah, forget it. Time for the hard way.
translation: 什么？嘿…不对...等-等等...我...啊，算了。那就来吧。

original: Give me the key, Dean, and you walk.
translation: 给我钥匙，迪安，然后你就可以走了。

original: No, based on your response, I'm sure of it.
translation: 鉴于你的回答，我很确信。

original: All right, all right... look, I'll hand it over, I promise. No need to get all upset. We can both come out ahead in this.
translation: 好吧，好吧... 听着，我会把钥匙给你的。没必要搞得场面太难看嘛。咱们大可以一块出去，然后既往不咎。

original: I bet I can figure out how to unlock the exit without you.
translation: 就算没有你，我敢打赌，我一样可以打开出口的门。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Bluffing, slightly uneasy}Lucky guess... you sure about that? Because if you make a mistake... well, Sierra Madre's got us both.
translation: [成功] 猜得不错…你确定吗？要是你猜错的话…那咱俩可都要交待在这里了。

original: You're not a betting man, which means I'm betting you have the key to the exit on you.
translation: 你不是个赌徒，所以我猜测，你身上一定有钥匙。

original: [FAILED] Yeah, you're a gambler. Me, I don't take chances. Trust me, only {emph}one of us has a sure out.
translation: [失败] 是啊，你确实是个赌徒，可我不喜欢冒险。相信我，我们中只有一个人能逃得出去。

original: {Hates PC}That's all I wanted to know. Ready to die?
translation: 我就想知道这么多了，准备好受死了吗？

original: Always asking questions when you should be shooting. You're a piece of work, I'll give you that.
translation: 明明早该动手了，却还问这问那的。不得不说，你可真是朵奇葩。

original: I found this Holotape in your safe.
translation: 我在你的保险箱里找到这盘全息磁带。

original: {Disdainful}You don't just stop robbing casinos, do you? What's that tape... oh, the one with Sinclair's woman, Vera.
translation: 看来你抢劫起赌场还挺有心得的啊？这盘带子是...哦，是辛克莱的女人，薇拉的磁带。

original: {Disdainful}What about it? You want me to give you a standing ovation?
translation: 怎么？难道你想让我为你起立鼓掌吗？

original: Has the Cloud decayed your brain? Forget the Sierra Madre!
translation: 那些毒云把你的脑子了给毒傻了吗？别管马德雷山脉了！

original: I'm not interested in killing you.
translation: 我没兴趣杀你。

original: Are you really that stupid?
translation: 你真这么蠢？

original: I waited an entire lifetime! Sitting in that Villa, watching it all fall apart - Sinclair's Sierra Madre towering over everything? Untouched?!
translation: 我等了一辈子！就这样干坐在别墅区里，眼睁睁地看着这里日渐衰败。而辛克莱的马德雷山脉赌场，那座不可一世的城池，却仍然完好无损地立在那里！

original: Then you show up, thinking you can just take it all from me, you and the old man running the show? I {emph}planned all this, I {emph}made it all happen, not you!
translation: 然后你们一来，就想夺走我的一切，你和那个老头打算坐收渔翁之利。要知道这一切都是我策划的！是我的劳动成果！不是你们的！

original: Sure, yeah, I have the key on me. I made other keys, too, to unlock the casino and ruin Sinclair, finally. After all these years...
translation: 对，没错，我身上有钥匙。其他的钥匙我也有，我费了这么多功夫，就是为了打开赌场，亲手毁掉辛克莱的遗产。这么多年过去，这天终于来了……

original: No... now... now I think ruining you and all your plans would be enough for me. Kill me, I still win, you're never getting in the vault.
translation: 不...现在...现在只要能毁掉你和你的计划，对我来说就足够了。即便你杀了我，我一样赢，你们永远也别想进入避难所。

original: Forget it, I'll just kill you and take it.
translation: 算了，我还是直接杀了你，然后拿走钥匙吧。

original: Quit stalling, hand it over.
translation: 别磨磨蹭蹭的，交出来！

original: Are you going to give me the key or not?
translation: 你到底给不给我钥匙？

original: {Paranoia sets in}Look... I give you this key, and there's nothing to keep you from just killing me and running. And as I see it...
translation: 你看啊…如果我给了你钥匙，也就失去了利用价值，你大可以直接杀了我，然后跑路。依我看……

original: {Quiet resolution}...I just gave up my ace in the hole. So... the only chance I've got left is making sure you don't leave.
translation: …那等于是我主动放弃了最后的底牌。因此...我唯一的机会就是确保你走不了。

original: And there's no way in hell I'm letting you get to the Sierra Madre vault instead of me. Not after all this time.
translation: 而且，我好不容易才走到这一步，决不能放任你进入马德雷山脉赌场的避难所。

original: You must know me enough by now to know I'm not going to put you in danger.
translation: 咱俩认识的时间也不短了，你应该看得出来，我不会让你陷入危险的。

original: Oh, right, after all the "we'll both blow up if you don't do as I say" talk we first had. Not put me in danger? Right.
translation: 哦，好吧，刚见面时你怎么说的？"如果你不听我的，我们就同归于尽"。不会让我陷入危险？少来。

original: Yeah... yeah, you're right. You didn't have to switch on those Holograms, and you did.
translation: 没错...没错，你说得对。你完全可以不必打开那些全息影像的，但你还是打开了。

original: Even when you first showed up in the Villa, you didn't threaten me, were just willing to cooperate to get through this. Hnh.
translation: 你第一次出现在别墅区时，也没有恐吓我，而是表现得十分配合，愿意和我仔细商量。唔……

original: I think you can count on the Holograms, okay?
translation: 只要有那些全息影像就没问题的，好吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Reluctant, convincing}Well... yeah. You got a point.
translation: [成功] 嗯...没错。你说得有道理。

original: Vera's stayed powered up since the bombs fell... those Holograms will, too.
translation: 核弹落下那么久了，薇拉都还有能源...那些全息保安应该也没问题。

original: [FAILED] {Skeptical}Really? You're not the one standing up here waiting for the Ghost People to show, all right?
translation: [失败] 真的？得了吧，在这儿提心吊胆等着鬼人来索命的人又不是你，行吗？

original: Just trust me, all right?
translation: 相信我，好吗?

original: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE: Reluctant, convincing}Well... yeah. You got a point.
translation: [成功] 嗯...没错。你说得有道理。

original: Don't trust me? Then trust our collars. I die, you die. Got it?
translation: 不相信我？那相信项圈总可以吧。我死，你也死。明白吗？

original: [FAILED] Trust you? Right. You're not the one who has to sit up here and wait for the Ghost People to show.
translation: [失败] 相信你？得了吧，在这儿提心吊胆坐以待毙的人又不是你。

original: Look, what do you want to do this?
translation: 你要怎样才肯干？

original: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE: Reluctant, convincing}Well... yeah. You got a point.
translation: [成功] 嗯...没错。你说得有道理。

original: I'm not about to trade your life for mine, got it? Remember the collars.
translation: 我是不会为了自保而把你牺牲掉的，明白吗？你忘了项圈的事了？

original: [FAILED] What do I want? I want a little more insurance than some Old World Villa construction to guard me, all right?
translation: [失败] 怎样？我只希望能有一个比这老房子更坚固的东西来保护我，懂吗？

original: Dean... a man with cold feet isn't someone I'd share a bed with.
translation: 迪安…我是不会和临阵脱逃的人穿一条裤子的。

original: Wait, hold on. I didn't say I was scared. {Snorts}Heh, heh. Cold feet? Don't be ridiculous. I've played to worse crowds than this, I can hold the fort here.
translation: 等等，打住。我可没说我怕了。呵呵，临阵脱胎？别扯淡了。再糟糕的演出场面我都经历过，守住这里对我来说不是问题。

original: If you don't do this, I'll go shut off the Holograms now.
translation: 你要是不听我的，我现在就把全息影像关掉。

original: What? You wouldn't. I mean... no, wait, you would. You don't bluff, ever since you first showed up in the Villa and we chatted.
translation: 什么？你不敢...不，等等，你敢。你是个说一不二的人，你第一次出现在别墅区和我说话的时候，我就看出来了。

original: No... you wouldn't. You're not the type. Even when you first showed up in the Villa, you didn't threaten me.
translation: 不...你不会的。你不是这样的人。我们第一次见面的时候，你丝毫没有威胁我的意思。

original: You just let me talk, not even letting on that our collars were linked, when all you had to do was tell me that to get me to come along.
translation: 你一直顺着我说话，甚至连我们俩的项圈绑在一块儿这件事，你都没告诉我。其实如果你说出来的话，我肯定会乖乖跟你走。

original: So... no, I don't think you'll shut them off. You don't threaten people, not your way.
translation: 所以…我觉得你不会关掉全息影像。你不擅长恐吓别人，这不是你的风格。

original: Do what I say, or I'll break both your legs and leave you here.
translation: 照我说的做，不然我就打断你两条腿，把你扔在这儿自生自灭。

original: If I break your legs, you can't leave - only scream. Here, in the middle of town.
translation: 如果我打断你的腿，你就走不了了——只能在镇中心哀嚎。

original: No, it only means I wouldn't come back for you. Ever.
translation: 确实，但我也不用再来管你了。

original: You wouldn't... {frowns}no, yeah, you would. I would. If I thought you screaming wouldn't attract more of the locals.
translation: 你不敢这么做……不，是的，你干得出来这种事。换我也会这么想，只要尖叫声不会引来本地人就行。

original: All right, I'll stay here. For now. But you leave me high and dry, make a run for the Sierra Madre? You'll pay for it, I promise you.
translation: 好吧，我暂时留在这里。但你要是敢丢下我，独自进入马德雷山脉赌场，我一定要你好看，我保证。

original: All I need is your hands to hold the wires.
translation: 你只要抓着电线就够了。

original: I could break both your legs, leave you here on the roof.
translation: 我可以打断你的腿，把你丢在屋顶上。

original: {Wary}You wouldn't. You need me to strike up the sparking chords there. Breaking my legs isn't any way to get {emph}me to dance.
translation: 你不会的。你还需要我给你当电线桩呢。要是打断了我的腿，你也就没戏唱了。

original: Both of us dying wasn't my plan.
translation: 我可不想咱俩一起死。

original: I don't need to kill you, you know.
translation: 可我并不需要杀你。

original: {Slight surprise, confused}What? What are you talking about?
translation: 什么？你什么意思？

original: Okay, let me see if I can reactivate the Holograms.
translation: 好吧，让我看看能不能重启全息影像。

original: If I remember correctly, there should be two Holograms you can switch on in the area... just don't remember how.
translation: 如果我记得没错，这个区域应该有两个全息投影仪可以打开...只是我不记得怎么用。

original: Do that, and I'll consider waiting on the rooftop. Maybe.
translation: 如果你能启动它们，也许我会考虑待在屋顶上。

original: I switched on two Holograms to cover the courtyard, those should protect you.
translation: 我打开了两个全息影像，让它们把守庭院，应该能保护你了。

original: {Thinking}You powered the Holograms up? {Beat}Well... yeah, that's pretty good protection. {To himself}Sure worked at the fountain, Vera kept the Ghost People away.
translation: 你打开了全息影像？哦...行吧，倒是个不错的防护措施。比如喷泉那里，就是薇拉的影像让鬼人不敢靠近。

original: {Uneasy}But, uh... how do I know the power won't suddenly go out? And... I don't know, this still sounds risky to me. {Emph}For me.
translation: 但是，呃…万一它们的能源突然耗尽怎么办？而且...我总感觉，还是很冒险。对我来说。

original: I could just throw you off the roof. What about that?
translation: 我可以直接把你扔下房顶。怎么样？

original: You're full of it - you kill me, we both die. You wouldn't dare.
translation: 你尽扯谎——你要是杀了我，我们都会死。你不敢的。

original: So you leaving me here? No dice, not going to happen, and nothing you can say will change my mind.
translation: 所以你想把我留在这儿？门儿都没有。说什么我都不会改变主意的。

original: What if I can guarantee they won't come into the courtyard below?
translation: 如果我可以保证他们不会进入下面的院子呢？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Well... yeah. If the Hologram systems still work, that'd do the trick.
translation: [成功] 那…也行。如果全息影像系统还能工作的话，这法子倒是不错。

original: Okay... all right, you call up some of those Old World stiffs, that'd be an audience I wouldn't mind having below.
translation: 好吧……那行，你就去张罗几个旧世界的老古董到这儿来吧，我不介意让他们当我的观众。

original: The Villa has Holograms everywhere. If I switch on some to cover the area...
translation: 别墅区到处都有全息影像，只要我启动其中几个，让它们看守这片区域……

original: [FAILED] Yeah, and how can you guarantee that? I'm not waiting here alone, trust me.
translation: [失败] 行啊，但你要怎么保证？我可不想一个人在这儿干等，相信我。

original: I mean, if I had a few of those Holograms... or a few hundred... surrounding me, maybe. I'd settle for two, enough to cover a quick exit.
translation: 如果能给我张罗来几个全息护卫…当然几百个更好…只要能保护我就行。哪怕两个也行啊，足够掩护我开溜了。

original: All right. What's it going to take?
translation: 好吧，那你开个条件吧。

original: Take? It's not going to take anything because you couldn't {emph}offer me anything to stay here.
translation: 条件？没有条件。无论你给我什么好处，我都坚决不会待在这儿。

original: The Ghost People'll come out of the woodwork when the Gala Event starts blaring, and when they see me trapped up here? It's curtains for Dean.
translation: 一旦盛世庆典启动，那些鬼人就会纷纷从石头缝里钻出来。要是被它们发现我一个人待在楼顶上，那我的人生也就到此为止了。

original: If I clear out all the Ghost People in the area, will you change your mind?
translation: 如果我清理了这个区域所有的鬼人，你会改变主意吗？

original: No, you want to know why? Because there's more beneath the streets, in the buildings, and oh - everywhere else.
translation: 不会，你知道为什么吗？因为下面的每一寸街道、每一幢建筑——哦，以及其他所有地方，都有它们在活动。

original: They hear anything out of the ordinary, especially "music" screaming through the speakers when I close the connection? They'll be here, fast.
translation: 任何异常响动都会传到它们的耳朵里。尤其当我切断连接，喇叭里响起了雄壮的"音乐"的时候，它们不用多久就会找到这里。

original: Look, I need you to stay here and do it.
translation: 听着，我要你留在这儿启动庆典。

original: {Like told to wait in a DMZ}In the middle of town here? Alone? On a {emph}rooftop, with a big lightshow in the air?
translation: 你要我待在镇中心？一个人站在屋顶上，身后的夜空中还噼里啪啦地闪着烟花？

original: {Sarcastic}Tell you what - why don't you just give me one of those Space Age Cosmic Knives so I can slit my wrists, be less {emph}painful checking out that way.
translation: {Sarcastic}我看你啊，倒不如直接塞给我一把大宇宙菜刀，让我就地割腕得了，这样起码还能死得痛快一点。

original: If re-connecting the speakers is part of the Gala Event, yes.
translation: 如果为了启动盛世庆典就必须打开喇叭的话，那我也在所不惜。

original: Look... I strike up the speaker system, there's going to be ghosts all over this place. Any change in the sounds around here...
translation: 听着…一旦我打开扩音系统，鬼人很快就会占领这里。但凡这地方有一丝响动...

original: ...the Ghost People are not big on talking, they are big on listening. Hunting. Killing. More vicious than music critics, trust me.
translation: …虽然鬼人不会说话，但它们听力很好，杀人的手段也很犀利。比那些乐评家犀利多了，相信我。

original: I could just jab both wires into you, close the circuit that way.
translation: 我可以直接把电线戳在你身上，形成回路。

original: Really? You don't strike me as the type, especially after our little "how can I cooperate" chat at my home.
translation: 真的？我还真没想到你是这种性子，你在我家时的态度可是相当谦和呢。

original: Real funny. {Beat}Although you know, after your "collar talk" in the Residential area, I believe you.
translation: 有意思。不过回想起咱们在居住区里那段“亲切而友好”的交谈，我觉得这种事你是干得出来的。

original: That's the plan. Are you going to be able to do it safely?
translation: 计划就是这样。你在这里安全吗？

original: {Skeptical}Well... "safely?" Around here, that word doesn't come cheap.
translation: 嗯…"安全？"这种事可不敢轻易打包票啊。

original: Safely? What, after your sweet-and-ruthless talk when we first met, now you care about my safety? Right.
translation: 安全？怎么，刚见面时你还一副咄咄逼人的样子，现在倒关心起我的安全了？真行。

original: There's a Hologram guarding the courtyard below, you're covered.
translation: 下面已经有个全息影像在守卫院子了，你不会有事的。

original: Unless he's got a friend, no dice. Nobody relies on a single escape route unless they want to get caught.
translation: 你得给他找个伴儿，否则没用。没有人会只盯着一条逃跑路线，那不等于作茧自缚？

original: {DUPE}Unless he's got a friend, no dice. Nobody relies on a single escape route unless they want to get caught.
translation: {DUPE}你得给他找个伴儿，否则没用。没有人会只盯着一条逃跑路线，那不等于作茧自缚？

original: Let me hunt around, maybe there's something I can do to protect the area.
translation: 我四处看看，也许这附近还有什么东西可以用来保护这片区域。

original: {Frowns}You can look all you want... I still feel safer with a pair of Hologram escorts to make it through the area.
translation: 随便你找吧...我还是觉得有两个全息护卫更安全点。

original: How do you make it?
translation: 这东西你拿什么做的？

original: Scrape some Cloud Residue off the walls, mash it in a Tin Can with some Junk Food from the machines, then hold your nose and down it.
translation: 从墙上刮了点毒云残渣，和售货机里的那些垃圾食品一起捣进罐头里，然后捏着鼻子，一口闷下去就行了。

original: There's Electric Hot Plates around if you can't find a campfire to mix it at. Also, there's other recipes you can do with the Cloud Residue...
translation: 如果你想学着做，却找不到营火，附近也有不少电磁炉可以用。对了，毒云残渣还可以用来酿造别的东西……

original: ...although it might take a hardier survivalist than me to brew them. I stick to martinis.
translation: …但那些就留给命硬的人去试吧。我还是做些马提尼酒就好。

original: Scrounge supplies? Like what?
translation: 搜刮物资？都什么物资？

original: {Defensive}I still need to eat. At least I think I do. The Villa provides... even if it's not as glamorous as the Cantina Madrid.
translation: 我总得吃饭啊，反正我觉得自己该吃饭。这别墅区里倒是有不少食品供应…虽然不如马德里餐馆里那样美味。

original: Once I... well, realized what you could scrounge up around here, I had a lot of time to experiment. Not the best chef, but...
translation: 自从我……呃，发现这里蕴藏的各类宝藏之后，我就花了很多时间来钻研烹饪。虽然说不上厨艺精湛吧，但……

original: ...well, here's the mix, if you can stomach it. {Rueful}I call it a "Sierra Madre Martini."
translation: …喏，送你一杯，我自己调的，希望能入得了你的喉。我管它叫"马德雷山脉马提尼。"

original: I found one of your stashes. Why did you leave them around the Villa?
translation: 我找到了你的一个储物箱。你为什么要把它们丢在别墅区的各个地方？

original: Why? Survival. I still needed to leave the Residential Area to scrounge up supplies, and I don't like taking chances.
translation: 为什么？为了活命啊。我偶尔还是需要离开居民区去搜刮些物资的，而我这人不喜欢冒险。

original: The Villa's dangerous. So I left weapons and stims in case I got in a tight spot. {Grumbling}Then, of course, {emph}you show up, putting your mitts on everything.
translation: 别墅区非常危险。所以我四处留了一些武器和治疗针，以防遇到紧急情况。{Grumbling}谁曾想你来之后，就把这些东西全都笑纳了。

original: I suppose this qualifies as an emergency, so I'm not complaining. Much.
translation: 不过这也可以算是一种紧急情况吧，所以我也没什么可抱怨的……是吧。

original: You can use these somehow? To make... make Sierra Madre Chips?
translation: 你可以使用这些来制作… 马德雷山脉赌场的筹码？

original: Maybe if I find what you're talking about, you can let me know.
translation: 等我找到了你形容的东西，你再提醒我吧。

original: Can you teach me how to do it?
translation: 你能教我怎么做吗？

original: [She nods. She then makes a series of hand motions to represent weight and amounts - enough so you think you could do it on your own.]
translation: [她点点头，然后做了一系列用于表达重量和数量的手势，你觉得自己已经领悟了她的意思。]

original: You need a battery... a Fission Battery... and Scrap Metal? And you can counterfeit the chips?
translation: 你只要一块电池… 一个裂变电池…和废金属？就可以仿造这个筹码？

original: [She nods, impressed. Then she points at you, then her and makes a circle.]
translation: [她点点头。然后指着你，画了个圆圈。]

original: Maybe if I find whatever objects you're trying to describe, this might make more sense.
translation: 也许等我找到了你要形容的东西，我就能搞清楚你要说的意思了。

original: I have no idea what you're talking about.
translation: 我完全不懂你在说什么。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]
translation: [成功][她笑了，点点头。]

original: [She points at your Pip-Boy, makes a motion of opening it up and removing something from it.]
translation: [她指指你的哔哔小子，然后做了个打开的手势，仿佛从里面取出了什么东西。]

original: [She then raises her hand and makes the motion of smashing it and holding up the remains.]
translation: [接着她举起手，比了个砸烂的动作，又将砸过的东西捧在手心。]

original: You can make more of those at a Workbench. With the right materials.
translation: 只要有正确的材料，你就能在工作台上造出更多筹码。

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, then thinks for a moment. She then points at your pack, and taps the back of her wrist.]
translation: [失败][她皱皱眉，思考了一会儿。她指了指你的背包，又敲敲她的手腕。]

original: Yeah, there's more. All over.
translation: 没错，外面到处都是。

original: I don't understand.
translation: 我不明白。

original: [She frowns, looks frustrated for a moment, thinking.]
translation: [她皱了皱眉，看起来有些失望，努力思索着。]

original: [She stands still for a second, then stops, and slowly makes the motion of bending down and scooping something up.]
translation: [她笔直站了一会儿，然后慢慢弯下腰，好像是在捞起什么东西。]

original: [Then she holds the imaginary object in her hand, as if heavy, and puts it in front of her, as if on a table.]
translation: [她将这东西握在手心，感觉分量沉甸甸的。接着她把这东西摆在自己的面前，仿佛那里有一张桌子。]

original: [She then hefts what looks like a small box, and pours it on top of the object, looks at it, then reaches down and holds up a small "O."]
translation: [她举起一个形似小盒子的的玩意，将它倒在那东西上，又端详了一会儿，然后将手指围成了一个圈。]

original: [Christine points at your pack, then points at the Fission Battery and the Scrap Metal.]
translation: [克莉丝汀指了指你的背包，又指了指裂变电池和废金属。]

original: You... can make more?
translation: 你…可以制造这种筹码?

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]
translation: [成功][她笑了笑，点点头。]

original: You can... scrounge more somehow.
translation: 你可以…找到更多这种筹码。

original: [FAILED] [She frowns, looks frustrated for a moment, thinking.]
translation: [失败][她皱了皱眉，看起来有些失望，努力思索着。]

original: We really don't have time for magic tricks right now.
translation: 咱们真的没时间变魔术。

original: [She frowns, shakes her head.]
translation: [她微一皱眉，摇了摇头。]

original: You want... a small circle?
translation: 你想要个…小圆圈？

original: [She frowns, shakes her head.]
translation: [她微一皱眉，摇了摇头。]

original: Here's a Sierra Madre Chip. I'll need that back.
translation: 这就是马德雷山脉赌场的筹码。记得还我。

original: [She examines the chip for a second, raises it to her eye, then turns it to the side, gauging its diameter and width.]
translation: [她把筹码放在眼前翻来覆去研究了一会儿，似乎在测量它的直径和厚度。]

original: [She runs her finger over the surface slowly, checking the engraving. She then tosses the chip back to you.]
translation: [她慢慢用手指抚过筹码表面，仔细端详着上面的铭文。然后把筹码扔回给了你。]

original: [She then pretends to look around, sees something on the floor, then pretends to bend down and pick it up. She then looks at you and nods.]
translation: [接着她环顾四周，假装在地上发现了某样东西，俯身将“它”捡了起来。表演完后，她望着你，点了点头。]

original: I don't have any Sierra Madre Chips on me.
translation: 我身上没有马德雷山脉赌场的筹码。

original: [She nods, then waits.]
translation: [她点点头，继续等待。]

original: Do you know what those machines around the Villa are?
translation: 你知道那些别墅区里遍布的那些机器有什么用吗？

original: [Christine shakes her head, then pauses, and makes a small circle with her thumb and forefinger.]
translation: [克莉丝汀摇了摇头，然后停下来，用拇指和食指围成了一个小圆圈。]

original: [She points at you, and makes the motion of putting something in her palm.]
translation: [她指着你，做了一个把东西放在手掌上的动作。]

original: Can you show me where?
translation: 可以告诉我是哪儿吗？

original: Dog can... see where back of collar is? Follow down, to lower back - hit neck, middle back, right on spine, crack. Then they not get back up.
translation: 可以…知道项圈背面吗？从那儿一直到后腰，脖子，后背中间，还有脊椎，朝那儿用力，它们就起不来了。

original: Dog hits them, then Dog eats them... easier to make quiet twice that way.
translation: 狗打倒它们后，再把它们吃掉…这样它们就彻底消停了。

original: How do you do it?
translation: 你怎么做到的？

original: Dog knows where to hit them, make them stay down... base of neck, lower back, hit it hard enough, life snaps out of them.
translation: 狗知道它们的要害，可以让它们再也爬不起来…比如脖颈下部，后腰，只要用点力，就能杀死他们。

original: That all seems lethal. Sort of.
translation: 感觉这些方法都挺致命的啊。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Dism... disin... {gives up}chop legs off while stand up, eat when fall down. If not that, make them electric ash.
translation: [成功] 肢什么…熔什么…反正只要把它们的腿打断，或者趁它们倒下的时候将它们吃掉就行。如果都不行，就把它们烧成灰。

original: So... dismemberment and disintegrations take them down.
translation: 所以…用肢解或者熔解的方式就可以将它们彻底消灭。

original: [FAILED] All make them stay down. {Thinks to self}Most of time.
translation: [失败] 只要不让它们再站起来就行。大多时候都有效。

original: Do you need to eat them to make them stay down?
translation: 所以想不让它们活过来，你就必须吃掉它们？

original: {Slow}No... if you rip their arms off... or legs, mask people stay down. Easier to rip off legs and arms when they fall on ground, just keep hitting them.
translation: 不…只要把把它们的胳膊…或腿扯下来，这些面具人就再也爬不起来了。它们倒地的时候，扯断胳膊腿更容易些，用点力气就行。

original: If can't make them fall down and rip off legs, make them ash. Saw one caught in electric sparks so much, he turn into burnt pile. Not get back up.
translation: 如果来不及趁它们倒下的时候把腿扯断，那把它们烧成灰也行。狗见过其中一个家伙被电火花点燃，烧成了渣，它再也没有爬起来。

original: Why do you eat the Ghost People?
translation: 你为什么吃鬼人？

original: {Slight frustration, treating them like bees that get in the way of his honey}Dog doesn't like to eat them always, sometimes so many.
translation: 狗也不喜欢老吃它们，可它们有时数量太多了。

original: Doesn't that make the voice mad?
translation: 这样不会让那个声音生气吗？

original: {A little quieter}Voice doesn't get mad when Dog feeds on the people here. Voice not like Ghost People, worried there are too many to eat, too many knives.
translation: 狗吃这里的人的时候，那声音不会生气。那声音也不喜欢鬼人，他只是担心它们数量太多，吃不完，会被刀子砍伤。

original: {Slight frustration}Started eating them because wouldn't go quiet when Dog smashed them with bear jaw. Only want one.
translation: 狗只能吃了它们，因为就算拿熊夹子揍它们，它们也不肯消停。本来吃一只就够了。

original: {Frustrated}Got Dog angry, others kept cutting him and slicing him with knives when he tried to make one go quiet with teeth.
translation: 可是它们把狗惹毛了，狗咬住其中一个，想让它安静点，但其他鬼人老是拿刀子来砍狗。

original: So Dog started crushing them, then when they stop twitching, then eats them. Then they not get back up with hssss-chkk noise, Dog not like that.
translation: 所以狗把它们都打成了稀巴烂，等它们都不动了，狗就吃了它们。它们也不会再爬起来，发出嘶嘶的噪音了，狗不喜欢那种声音。

original: Dog can tell when they not yet dead... twitch a bit, make low noise, then noise when they get back up, listen.
translation: 狗能分辨它们死没死…先是微微抽搐，发出低沉的声音，接着仔细听，就能听到那种噪音，然后它们就会爬起来。

original: I watched you devour one of the Ghost People.
translation: 我看见你生吞了一个鬼人。

original: {Slight irritation, frustration}Dog doesn't like to eat them always, sometimes so many. Keep stabbing Dog, cutting him.
translation: 狗也不喜欢老吃它们，可它们有时数量太多了，还总爱用刀来刺狗。

original: Do you know how the Ghost People taste?
translation: 你知道鬼人是什么味道吗？

original: {Slightly sour-faced, shakes head}Taste like plastic and copper. Gas inside, in pockets, hssss when teeth sinks into them.
translation: 味道就像塑料和黄铜。袋子里一股臭气，咬下去的时候，嘶嘶地漏气。

original: <Lie> I'll go hunt for food, you just stay here, and wait.
translation: <撒谎> 我去搞些肉来，你在这儿等着。

original: {Suspicious}All right... for a moment there, I thought... hnh. I'll wait here then, come back when you've found meat from two of the bodies.
translation: 好吧…只待一会儿的话，那我觉得…嗯。我会在这儿等你的，你只要带两块肉回来就行。

original: You need to trust me if we're going to get through this.
translation: 如果我们要熬过这关，你就得相信我。

original: {Slow chuckle}No, you'll throw me in the cage when you need to, just like at the Police Station. Trust you? No... you've made trust... difficult.
translation: 不，你只会在必要的时候把我扔进笼子里，就像你在警察局时干的那样。相信你？不...你让我很难对你产生信任。

original: I'm not staying here and doing what you "order" me to do. Not again... and the sequence here? Just {emph}see if Dog can figure it out on his own.
translation: 我才不会待在这儿任由你"摆布"。绝不会再有第二次了…至于这些开关的顺序？那就看狗自己有没有本事领悟了。

original: What kind of food should I bring back?
translation: 我该带什么食物回来？

original: Dog has torn apart a number of the inhabitants of this town... while he doesn't prefer them to... other flesh... it'll do for the time being.
translation: 狗曾经杀死过这里的不少居民…虽然比起其他肉，他真的不喜欢这些家伙的味道…但拿来充饥还是可以的。

original: Find some of the inhabitants... it'll require some hunting on your part. Kill them, take some of the remains inside them, bring it back here.
translation: 你得想办法寻找这些居民…这就要考验你的捕猎本领了。杀了它们，割下它们的肉，带几块回来。

original: They're not easy to kill. {Cruel smile}But... I have faith in you, and the beast must be fed if you want him to stay in {emph}this cage.
translation: 虽然要杀死它们并不容易。但…我对你有信心，想要让野兽待在笼子里，就得先喂饱它。

original: I need you to trust me. I let you out of the cage in the Police Station.
translation: 你完全可以信任我。毕竟在警察局的时候我都把你从笼子里救出来了。

original: You're right... but trust? Trust is such a... harsh word. I prefer... mutual need. It's more honest.
translation: 没错…但你说信任？信任是个…很严肃的词。咱们现在这样顶多…坦白点说，只能叫各取所需。

original: No, I can help you. {Examining the wall}These wiring diagrams... I know how to operate the switches in sequence to make fire appear in the sky.
translation: 我可以帮你。有了这些示意图…我已经知道该怎样扳动开关才能让烟花启动。

original: I... we just need to make sure that Dog doesn't surface before that happens. To do that... he'll need to be fed. That makes him stay in the Cage.
translation: 但是我...我们必须确保在这过程中狗不会跳出来捣乱。所以…得先将他喂饱，把他关在笼子里。

original: Worried about being attacked if left here? The gate looks strong enough.
translation: 你担心待在这儿会被袭击？可这门看着挺坚固的啊。

original: This Villa was built to decay, but parts... parts were well-defended, indeed. There was a method in the layout, you can... see it.
translation: 这别墅区虽然是个豆腐渣工程，但里面的一部分设施…确实很牢靠。教你一种方法…通过外表布局就能识别出这种地方。

original: The terminal outside... one of those means this place was designed... properly. No, if locked, it could hold others out... and even Dog inside.
translation: 比如外面那台终端…只要出现这样的东西，就说明此地的设计…是合格的。所以，假如门关上的话，不仅外面的人进不来…狗也出不去了。

original: Do you know how to operate the switches?
translation: 你知道怎么操作这开关吗？

original: I do. And after you threw me in the cage at the Police Station, I have no intention of telling you.
translation: 我知道。可因为你把我扔在了警局的笼子里，我不想告诉你。

original: I do... the diagram there tells me what I need to know.
translation: 我知道...那边的示意图已经告诉我了。

original: If you won't do it, then Dog will, like he did at the police station.
translation: 如果你不做，那就让狗来，就像我在警察局时那样。

original: No... this time is different. The key is different.
translation: 不...这次不一样了。问题的关键变了。

original: I bet I can get Dog to stay here, if you won't.
translation: 如果你不肯的话，我可以唤狗出来。

original: Really... an amusing thought.
translation: 你这个……想法挺滑稽的。

original: If you needed his teeth to devour those metal switches, chew up the diagram, then let him out.
translation: 如果你希望他咬掉那个金属把手，吃掉整块电路板，那你大可以放他出来。

original: There's a sequence, precise and clear as a knife, that must be followed. And it requires more than instinct to operate.
translation: 这些开关的操作是讲顺序的，必须严格按步骤来，不能随意改变。要执行这样的操作，光凭直觉可不行。

original: {Slow, ending on sinister smug note}No, you need me, here - out of the cage.
translation: 所以，你需要我留在这里——而不是把我关进笼子。

original: I need you to stay and operate the switches for the Gala Event.
translation: 我需要你留在这儿操作庆典装置的控制杆。

original: {Chuckles}You can lead me to water... no, being trapped in this courtyard while lights are flashing and sirens are screaming...
translation: 这是强人所难...不行，一旦庆典开始，不仅漫天烟花，还会警报大作，而我到时候却独自留在这个院子里……

original: I can survive one or two of the inhabitants... more than that, even Dog would have to work to keep full without being carved to pieces.
translation: 如果只引来一两个鬼人倒还好…可要是再来多几只，恐怕就连狗也无法保证自己不会被撕成碎片，除非你能让他填饱肚子。

original: {Studying exterior of gate}And the gate here... if it somehow got locked, it'd be the holding cell at the Police Station again, except with no way out.
translation: 还有那扇大门，万一它意外锁住了，这里就会变成另外一间警局牢房，只是这次连逃走的办法都没有了。

original: He wasn't trying to torture you, he needed to alter your voice to use an audio-lock.
translation: 他不是想折磨你，他是想改造你的声带，从而解开一个声控锁。

original: An audio-lock to where? {Beat, recognizes what happened}To the Sierra Madre vault. It's voice-activated. And he wanted in.
translation: {DUPE}声控锁？开哪儿的？{Beat, recognizes what happened}马德雷山脉避难所的吗？原来它是声控的。他想进去。

original: That makes sense. {Thinking}So... those bodies in the Clinic... all right. Dean always felt like the odd one out, and he kept... studying me.
translation: {DUPE}这就说得通了。{Thinking}所以…诊所里的那些尸体... 好吧。难怪我总觉得迪安这人神神叨叨的，他好像一直在…打量我。

original: He was trying to figure out if I recognized him... and see if my throat healed. I'll deal with you first, then I'll deal with him.
translation: 原来他是害怕我认出他…还想搞清楚我的喉咙是否已经痊愈。好吧，我先对付你，再去找他算账。

original: I didn't put you in that Auto-Doc. Dean did.
translation: 把你放进自动医生的不是我，是迪安。

original: {Disbelieving}Dean? {Emph}He put me in there? No, I don't believe it. He didn't have any reason to torture me. You, on the other hand...
translation: 迪安？他把我放进去的？我不信。他没有理由折磨我。而你…

original: Even with the differences in the Villa, I don't want to fight.
translation: 虽然我们在别墅区时有些分歧，但我不想和你打。

original: [SUCCEEDED] No, I believe you. All along, you were watching out for yourself. I understand.
translation: [成功] 我相信你的话。一直以来，你考虑的只有你自己。我理解。

original: But I wonder what you would have done if there hadn't been these collars. Would you have gotten me out of the Clinic at all?
translation: 但我不禁想知道，如果没有这些项圈的话，你会怎么做？你还会不会把我救出诊所？

original: So as long as we're "in this together," and it's a choice between you and me? I know what you're going to choose.
translation: 纯粹因为咱俩曾是“一条绳上的蚂蚱”，如果换成你必须在咱俩之间做出选择时，我很清楚你会怎么选。

original: I'm not gonna wait for that to happen - again. I'm tired of being controlled.
translation: 我不想让这种事再次发生。我不想再受人摆布了。

original: We're inside the casino. We don't need to fight anymore, it's useless.
translation: 我们已经进入赌场了，没必要再自相残杀了，根本没有意义。

original: [FAILED] I believe you. And that's not the point. That collar... I believe you got caught by Elijah, too. I don't think it changes who you are.
translation: [失败] 我相信你。但这不是重点。那个项圈… 我相信你也是被以利亚绑架的。但我觉得这并没有改变你的为人。

original: How you behaved in the Villa... all that was you. And as bad as these collars are, maybe it kept you from being {emph}worse.
translation: 你在别墅区里的表现… 那才是你的本质。虽然项圈不是什么好东西，但也许戴上它的时候，你反而有所收敛。

original: And that's the worst part about all this. That it takes something like that to keep you from hurting someone else.
translation: 这才是最可怕的地方。为了不让你伤害别人，居然得用这样的东西来限制你的行为。

original: You know I didn't put you in the Auto-Doc, right?
translation: 你也知道，把你绑在自动医生手术台上的人并不是我。

original: You, Elijah... it doesn't matter. Both of you have run out of places to hide.
translation: 你，以利亚…都无所谓。反正你们已经无处可藏了。

original: There'll be a second or two of lag while you switch it. That's long enough for me to kill you.
translation: 你转换频率时会有一两秒的延迟，足够我杀你了。

original: {Slightly uneasy, player is right}We'll see. I don't think you're gonna have the time.
translation: 我们走着瞧。我觉得你来不及的。

original: Done talking? I want to put your little theory to the test.
translation: 说完了？那不妨把你的理论付诸实践吧。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你在说什么？

original: You'll find out.
translation: 你会知道的。

original: Try and run, it won't matter, the signal will find you. Get too close to me, then the signal'll lock on. You can't get away.
translation: 想跑也没关系，信号很快就能找到你。要是敢近我的身，信号也会锁定。你逃不掉了。

original: But... your collar's still on. So you're not free.
translation: 可…你也还带着项圈啊。你也不自由嘛。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Oh, it helps... as long as I need to control your movements.
translation: [成功] 呵，用处可大了…能把你牢牢控制在我手心。

original: You can modify the detonator signal. I don't see how that helps you.
translation: 你能修改引爆器的频率。我看不出来这有什么用处。

original: [FAILED] Free? I have more freedom of movement than you do, and that's all I need.
translation: [失败] 自由？至少我的行动比你自由，这对我已经足够了。

original: Is that like a science thing?
translation: 你说的是什么科学道理？

original: [SUCCEEDED] I did. And it means I can control your movements.
translation: [成功] 是的。所以你现在已经逃不出我的手掌心了。

original: You found a way to modify the collar's radio frequency.
translation: 你找到了修改项圈信号频率的方法。

original: [FAILED] {DUPE}You'll find out.
translation: [失败] 你会知道的。

original: If killing you will shut you up, let's do this.
translation: 如果杀了你就能让你彻底闭嘴，那我乐意至极。

original: You've had your voice back for only a little while, and I'm already sick of listening to you.
translation: 你的声带还没恢复多久，可我却已经听腻了你的废话。

original: {Cold, determined}Silence suits me fine. When your master shows, I'll deal with him, too.
translation: {Cold, determined}对我来说，沉默确实更合适。等你的主子现身时，我也一样会把他干掉。

original: What are you planning to do?
translation: 你打算怎么做？

original: When we first met, I thought I recognized the collar technology. Just needed some time to experiment with it.
translation: 我们刚见面的时候，我就认出了这种项圈技术，只不过我需要一些时间来做实验罢了。

original: I noticed the signal lag as soon as you arrived on the floor. Collar detonator signal's down to a dull thud, more like a heartbeat than a screech.
translation: 你刚进入这层楼，我就发现信号出现了延迟。项圈引爆器的信号频率越来越低，从原本尖锐的噪音变成了有规律的心跳。

original: You think you can kill me, then make a run for the exit before my dead man's signal catches you and blows that collar. {Beat, player walked into trap}Not gonna be that easy.
translation: 你以为杀了我之后，只要在我的信号引爆你的项圈之前逃出这层楼，就可以高枕无忧了？可惜没那么容易。

original: The Suites here gave me enough tools and enough time that our frequencies... I can push and pull that collar of yours however I want.
translation: 这间套房里有不少工具，而且我恰巧也有时间……现在，我已经可以随意地篡改你项圈的信号频率。

original: Thought you'd leave me in that elevator? {Slow anger, remembering how the player trapped her}I haven't forgotten what you did in the Switching Station, not for a second.
translation: 你居然把我丢在电梯里？我可没忘记你在开闭所时对我做过的事情，一点都没忘。

original: Trapped down in that room in the dark, listening to that {emph}sound, like saw blades. {Cold, anger}I could barely breathe... couldn't even scream!
translation: 我被困在伸手不见五指的房间里，听着那个声音，锯木头似的声音。我几乎不能呼吸… 甚至无法尖叫！

original: {Quiet, more to herself}Was like being operated on in that Auto-Doc in the Clinic... all over again.
translation: 简直和我之前在诊所里被绑在自动医生手术台上时的感觉……一模一样！

original: Come to throw me in the Auto-Doc? Toss me back in the Clinic where you found me?
translation: 你想把我扔给自动医生？想把我丢回之前那间诊所？

original: Did you know the Stimpak reservoirs ran out within an hour of being in there? I was in there for two weeks, and it kept... repeating the procedure.
translation: 你知道我躺在手术台上，光一个小时内就打完了所有治疗针吗？我在那儿躺了整整两个星期，而手术……从未间断。

original: {Disgust}No Med-X, no stims, just... that {emph}sound, feeling the scalpels... cut. {Cold}Now... we're going to see how you like it when someone else is in control.
translation: 没有吗啡，没有针剂，只有…那台机器的声音，和手术刀切开我身体时的痛苦。现在……我要让你也尝尝被别人捏在掌心的滋味！

original: I can switch the proximity of the detonation frequency. Try and run? I'll have the signal seek you out, blow up your collar from a distance.
translation: 我可以变换引爆器的频率范围。想逃？用信号就能把你揪出来，就算你跑得再远，我也可以炸掉你的项圈。

original: Come in close, maybe get the upper hand? I'll set off the proximity detonator, and your collar'll blow.
translation: 如果你企图靠近我，我也会在近距离启动引爆器，把你的项圈炸成碎片。

original: [She points at the casino, makes a movement with her hands as if talking, and then repeats the squinting gesture.]
translation: [她指着赌场，用手比划着，仿佛在说话，然后不停地挤眉弄眼。]

original: [Christine waits, studying you.]
translation: [克莉丝汀一边等待，一边打量着你。]

original: I just want to kill him anyway.
translation: 我就是想杀他。

original: Maybe you're right, killing him is the best option.
translation: 也许你是对的，杀了他是最好的选择。

original: He came this way for a reason, and I want to know why.
translation: 他变成这样是有原因的，我想知道为什么。

original: [She then slowly shakes her head and draws an "X" in the air.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，在空中划了个叉。]

original: I don't care. I'd rather reason with someone first than simply kill them.
translation: 我不在乎。我宁愿先和人讲道理，而不是直接动手。

original: [She then slowly shakes her head and draws an "X" in the air.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，在空中划了个叉。]

original: I'm not out to kill anyone, I just want to get out of here.
translation: 我不想杀死任何人，我只想离开这儿。

original: [Christine looks at you, then shakes her head, points at your collar, then the front gate and shakes her head.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看着你，摇了摇头，指着你的项圈，然后指着大门，又摇了摇头。]

original: I'd like to know why he did all this first and what's so important about the casino.
translation: 我想先搞清他为什么要干这种事，还有这赌场究竟为何如此重要？

original: [Christine's expression becomes furious, and she raises her hands, draws jagged lines in the air.]
translation: [克莉丝汀突然变得十分愤怒，她举起手在空中画了一条锯齿状的线。]

original: [She then points at you, then the direction of the casino, and makes the motion of two hands talking to each other.]
translation: [接着她指向你，又指向赌场，比出两只手仿佛在说话的动作。]

original: [As one hand continues to talk, she moves the other hand to the wrist, and constricts until the other hand slows, stops talking.]
translation: [其中一只手“说话”的时候，她用另一只手抓住了它的手腕，然后那只手慢慢蔫了下去。]

original: Could always slap a collar on him and let him run into a wall of speakers.
translation: 我们可以直接用项圈套住他，然后逼着他撞向满是喇叭的墙壁。

original: [Christine's expression relaxes slightly, and she nods.]
translation: [克莉丝汀的表情放松了一些，她点了点头。]

original: I'm fine with killing the son of a bitch. As long as we can torture him first.
translation: 我对干掉那王八蛋没什么意见，不过得先让他多吃点苦头。

original: [She nods grimly. She seems satisfied.]
translation: [她严肃地点点头，看起来很满意。]

original: You mean business.
translation: 看来你挺有决心。

original: He's responsible for the scars.
translation: 这些伤疤是他造成的。

original: You want to kill him.
translation: 你想杀了他。

original: [She gives a nod. Then another nod, even slower.]
translation: [她点点头，随后用更慢的速度点了一下头。]

original: Why are you looking for him?
translation: 你为什么找他？

original: [She wrinkles her face, frowns, and looks angry. She touches her throat, traces the scar with her finger, then points the finger at the casino.]
translation: [她的表情有些扭曲，眉头皱起，有点生气的样子。她摸了摸喉咙，手指抚过伤疤，然后指向赌场。]

original: [She then points at your collars, points at the casino. Then she matches your gaze with a dark expression, then draws a slow line across her throat.]
translation: [她指着你的项圈，又指向赌场。随后她盯着你，用一种阴沉的表情，慢慢地做了一个抹脖子的动作。]

original: Elijah? You need to see Elijah.
translation: 以利亚？你要见以利亚。

original: You're looking for the man inside the casino.
translation: 你要找的是赌场里的那个人。

original: [She nods.]
translation: [她点点头。]

original: You kind of... changed there for a second.
translation: 刚才你好像……突然变了个人似的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {DUPE}[She looks like she's about to shake her head, stops, and then puts her hand over her eyes and squints, as if staring in the distance.]
translation: [成功][她似乎想要摇头，却停下了，接着她把手举过眼睛上方，搭了个凉棚，似乎正望着远方。]

original: Don't ignore me - your whole body language changed there.
translation: 别不理我啊，刚才你的肢体语言整个都变了。

original: [FAILED] [She glares at you a moment, then slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她看了你一会儿，慢慢摇了摇头。]

original: Um, do you want to talk about it, or...?
translation: 呃，你想谈谈吗?

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks like she's about to shake her head, stops, and then puts her hand over her eyes and squints, as if staring in the distance.]
translation: [成功][她似乎想要摇头，却停下了，接着她把手举过眼睛上方，搭了个凉棚，似乎正望着远方。]

original: No, before we go any further, I need to know what the problem is.
translation: 不，在我们继续行动之前，我想知道问题所在。

original: [FAILED] [She glares at you a moment, then slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她看了你一会儿，慢慢摇了摇头。]

original: You really want to get to him, don't you.
translation: 你是真的想找到他，是吧。

original: [She ignores you for a second, still staring at the casino. Then she glances at you, and her face and stance relax slightly.]
translation: [她没理睬你，仍然盯着赌场。随后她看向你，表情和站姿都稍稍放松了点。]

original: [She points at her collar, then the casino with an irritated look. She then folds her arms and raises an eyebrow.]
translation: [她指着自己的项圈，朝赌场恼怒地看了一眼，然后抱着手，扬起了眉毛。]

original: He's broadcasting from the casino.
translation: 他是从赌场里进行广播的。

original: [Christine looks at you, frowns. Then glances at the casino, her eyes narrowed. She stops breathing for a second, as if holding it in.]
translation: [克莉丝汀看着你，皱起眉头，然后瞥向赌场，眼睛眯了起来。突然，她屏住了呼吸。]

original: You can still do numbers and calculations.
translation: 你还能数数。

original: [She nods.]
translation: [她点点头。]

original: You can still do math, that's good to hear.
translation: 你还懂得怎么算数，好事。

original: [She nods, smiles.]
translation: [她点点头，笑了。]

original: Why... would someone remove your ability to write, or...
translation: 为什么……有人要移除了你的书写能力？难道…

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She nods, slowly, and then makes the motion of typing and drawing X's and lines in the air, and then gives a thumbs up.]
translation: [成功][她慢慢点头，做了一个打字的手势，在空中画了一个叉，然后竖起了大拇指。]

original: That's a specific form of brain surgery using electrodes. Pre-War.
translation: 这是一种将电极插入人脑的特殊手术。战前科技。

original: [FAILED] [She looks distant... then slowly shakes her head.]
translation: [失败][她看向远方，摇了摇头。]

original: That's a rather specific form of operation.
translation: 这是一种特殊手术。

original: So... brain damage, or...?
translation: 你是说…脑损伤，还是…?

original: [She shakes her head... then stops, as if thinking.]
translation: [她摇了摇头…似乎在思索着什么。]

original: Something to do with the surgery.
translation: 和手术有关。

original: [She pauses, then draws a jagged symbol like electricity in the air, then puts on an odd, staring face.]
translation: [她停顿了一下，然后在半空画了一个代表电流的锯齿状符号，脸上浮现出一种古怪而专注的神情。]

original: [She keeps the blank face for a second, then slowly blinks, looks around. She looks at her hands, shakes them, then lets them go limp.]
translation: [这样空洞的表情维持了几秒，紧接着她缓慢眨了眨眼，看向自己的手，晃了晃，让它们毫无生气似地垂下。]

original: This nodding, frowning, pointing you do is wearing me out.
translation: 你这又是点头又是皱眉，又是指手画脚的，实在给我整糊涂了。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [Christine frowns, then pauses and traces one of the scars on her head with her finger.]
translation: [成功] [克莉丝汀皱起眉头，然后停了下来，用手指划过了她头上的一处疤痕。]

original: [She then makes a motion as if picking up a pencil, tries to write, then shakes her head.]
translation: [然后她做了一个像是拿起铅笔写字的动作，接着摇了摇头。]

original: Can't you communicate some other way? Can you write?
translation: 你就不能用其他方式交流么？你会写字么？

original: [FAILED] [Christine nods, frowns, then points at you, then points West. Then she glares at you.]
translation: [失败] [克莉丝汀点头，皱起眉头，指了指你，又指着西边。然后便盯着你。]

original: If you don't stay here, I'll bring Dog out and leave him here.
translation: 如果你不肯留着，我就叫狗出来，让他替你待在这儿。

original: And what would that gain you? Are you so eager to slice off your hand to spite your arm?
translation: 那对你有什么好处？你就这么喜欢干这种杀敌一千自损八百的事？

original: Sounds to me if I bring Ghost People here, you couldn't handle them.
translation: 感觉要是我把鬼人带过来，你也根本对付不了他们。

original: I can't trust Dog to do this properly. I can trust you.
translation: 我不相信狗能做好这件事。我相信你。

original: I need someone who can operate the switches - and stay in control.
translation: 我需要有人来操作这个开关——还要能压得住。

original: Because this requires intelligence, and I trust you to do this.
translation: 因为这需要智力，我相信你能做到。

original: I don't want Dog to have to deal with this, I prefer to deal with you.
translation: 我不想要狗来做这件事，我想要你来。

original: {Slight curious}Really. {Slow}And why is that? Dog is much more... docile. Obedient.
translation: 真的。为什么呢？狗更温顺，更服从。

original: Yeah, well, I'll make Dog help me. Can't be hard to figure all this wire stuff out.
translation: 呃，好吧，我让狗来帮我。弄明白这玩意儿应该不难。

original: [SUCCEEDED] {Getting really angry}You think you can figure out what to... {quieter, studying the player, slightly respectful}hnh. Of course you can.
translation: [成功] 你居然自以为看得懂这些……啊。你确实可以。

original: {Resolved}I'll stand at my post. {Then threat comes out}Once you trigger the event... well, we'll see who makes it to the Sierra Madre.
translation: 我会在这里坚守岗位的。等你开启了盛世庆典…呵，那就看谁能先抵达马德雷山脉赌场吧。

original: If that diagram over there holds the details, I can walk Dog through the instructions.
translation: 如果那个示意图里已经包含了各种细节的话，那我完全可以指挥狗来扳动开关。

original: [FAILED] No... you can barely give me instructions, let alone order Dog. Bark your orders somewhere else.
translation: [失败] 不…你都没法教我做事，更别说狗了。你还是到别处指手画脚去吧。

original: If you know how to operate the switches, I need you to trust me to get through this.
translation: 如果你知道怎么操作开关的话，那你必须得相信我。

original: I'm not about to fight any more Ghost People just to feed you... or Dog.
translation: 我才不会为了你…或者狗去招惹鬼人呢。

original: We don't really have time for this.
translation: 我们没时间争论这个了。

original: If you don't... then I can't guarantee I'll remain in control long enough to help you. It is... your choice.
translation: 如果你不干的话…那我可能坚持不了太久，也就没法帮你了。这…都取决于你。

original: So some of the "meat" inside them?
translation: 所以只要几块它们的"肉"就行？

original: All right, I'll go hunting, see what I can find.
translation: 好吧，那我就去打猎，搞点肉回来。

original: {Quieter, more complacent}Two chunks of meat from their bodies should be enough. Hunt... quietly, so as not to draw more here.
translation: 只要从它们的尸体上割两块肉下来就行了。动静别太大…免得引来其他人。

original: I expect you to do what you're told.
translation: 我希望你听我的命令。

original: If that's what it takes to make you listen, yes.
translation: 如果只有这样你才能听话，那好吧。

original: So you want me to listen. To obey. No... I can't. Because Dog wouldn't let me. I can already feel him clawing at me.
translation: 所以你的目的是想让我听话。不...不行。狗不会给我这个机会，我都能感觉他在我体内蠢蠢欲动了。

original: If you want me to remain, then I'll need to stay aware... enough to operate the switches properly.
translation: 如果你想让我留下来，那我就必须保持清醒……至少得有能力操作这些开关。

original: I... we just need to make sure that Dog doesn't surface before that happens. To do that... he'll need to be fed. That makes him stay in the Cage.
translation: 我...我们必须确保在这过程中狗不会跳出来捣乱。所以…得先将他喂饱，把他关在笼子里。

original: Aren't you upset?
translation: 你不难受吗？

original: {Grim, shakes head}I've... done worse. Much worse... and for more hopeless causes, and I will again.
translation: 更糟糕的事情…我都经历过。甚至比这次还绝望，但就算再有下次，我也义无反顾。

original: He wasn't trying to torture you, he needed to alter your voice to use an audio-lock.
translation: 他不是想要折磨你，他是想要改造你的声音，来解开一个声控锁。

original: To the vault... of course. {Nods}That makes sense.
translation: 打开避难所的门锁……是啊，这下就清楚了。

original: {DUPE}An audio-lock to where? {Beat, recognizes what happened}To the Sierra Madre vault. It's voice-activated. And he wanted in.
translation: {DUPE}声控锁？开哪儿的？{Beat, recognizes what happened}马德雷山脉避难所的吗？原来它是声控的。他想进去。

original: {DUPE}That makes sense. {Thinking}So... those bodies in the Clinic... all right. Dean always felt like the odd one out, and he kept... studying me.
translation: {DUPE}这就说得通了。{Thinking}所以…诊所里的那些尸体... 好吧。难怪我总觉得迪安这人神神叨叨的，他好像一直在…打量我。

original: Elijah didn't put you in the Auto-Doc... Dean did.
