translation: 把你放进自动医生不是以利亚…是迪安。

original: {Emph, incredulous}Dean? {Beat, echoing disbelief}Dean {Emph}Domino?
translation: {Emph, incredulous}迪安？{Beat, echoing disbelief}迪安 ·多米诺？

original: Why would he want to torture me? {More to herself}If he wanted to do that, he could keep his singing career going... or keep staring at me.
translation: 他为什么要这样折磨我？ {More to herself}他有这个兴趣，还不如继续他的歌唱事业…哪怕继续盯着我看也行啊。

original: You said you got off lucky?
translation: 你说你变成这样是万幸？

original: {Unpleasant memories, cont.}Yeah... I saw records of other "patients," and what had been done to them. Some couldn't hear anything but static. Others, just... gibbering wrecks.
translation: {Unpleasant memories, cont.}是的…我看过其他“患者”的记录，他们的下场更凄惨。有些人除了电流音，什么都听不见。另一些人…变成了精神失常的怪物。

original: Never going back... and Elijah was on his way here, so I couldn't stop to see if it was something I could fix...
translation: 我不会再回去了…可惜当时以利亚已经离开那里前往马德雷山脉了，所以我也来不及寻找治疗方法…

original: ...if you can even fix what happened to me when they jabbed the electrodes into my skull and turned my head into a flashlight.
translation: …但一想到它们把电极插进我的头骨，将我的脑袋改造成了一个手电筒，我估计也没谁能治得了我。

original: {Sighs}Then I got here, and my voice got severed... now I have a new one. {Grim}Another thing Elijah has to answer for.
translation: {Sighs}到了这里之后，我的声带又被切断了…好在现在我有了新的声音。这些事全都要算在以利亚头上。

original: Can the Auto-Doc heal your scars?
translation: 自动医生能治愈你的伤疤吗？

original: {Slight frustration}No... they run a lot deeper than that.
translation: {Slight frustration}不…这些伤疤没这么简单。

original: {Quiet, unpleasant memory}While I was hunting Elijah in the Big Empty, he trapped me in one of those medical research centers buried there.
translation: {Quiet, unpleasant memory}我在大空山里追杀以利亚时，他把我关在了其中一间地下研究中心里。

original: {Uncomfortable}It... did something to my head... and I got off lucky. It's difficult enough to read now, and somehow the leap between what's in my head and words...
translation: {Uncomfortable}在那里…我的大脑被做了手脚…我变成现在这样已经是万幸了。我现在有严重的阅读障碍，感觉大脑和文字之间的联系已经被切断了…

original: ...it just ends up being a mish-mash of symbols, not letters. Can still do math, formulas, equations... {rueful}writing poetry's out.
translation: …所有文字在我眼里只是一团乱麻。尽管我依旧可以做算术题，解方程式、等式……但写诗肯定是没戏了。

original: {Act 3}I had some questions I wanted to ask you.
translation: {Act 3}我有一些问题要问你。

original: {Nods}All right. {Beat}Just glad I can {emph}answer you now.
translation: {Nods}好的。现在我终于能直接回答你了。

original: Anything you can download off of it?
translation: 你能从上面下载到什么有用的数据吗？

original: {Slightly impressed}Looks like you got almost everything, not much more {emph}I can extract... {slight smile}"doctor."
translation: {Slightly impressed}感觉你都下载完了，我也提取不出什么有用信息了……“大夫”。

original: {Operating a terminal, hunting through folders}I can see... check the root, recent diagnostics...
translation: {Operating a terminal, hunting through folders}我试试... 查看根目录，近期的诊断记录...

original: Lot of Med-X was dispensed for... Vera Keyes. {To herself,}Guess that's her corpse there for certain... and why all those meds are scattered around in here.
translation: 开了大量吗啡针给…薇拉·凯丝。所以坐着的那位肯定就是她了…也解释了为何地上散落着这么多吗啡针头。

original: ...here's the medical report. {Scanning, somber}Looks like she had some sort of terminal condition... diagnosis isn't conclusive, {to herself}must have been painful.
translation: …这是体检报告。 {Scanning, somber}看起来她患了某种绝症…诊断结果并不明确。{to herself}她一定非常痛苦。

original: I'm not even sure she knew, if these medical reports are enough. She must have been numb most of the time.
translation: 从这几份报告来看，我怀疑她甚至对此毫不知情。她的感官应该大部分时间都是麻木的。

original: Does that Auto-Doc there work?
translation: 那个自动医生还能用么？

original: {Glances at medical computer}Yeah, still functional. Lot of garbage data on it, its basic procedures should still work fine.
translation: {Glances at medical computer}是的，依然能用。虽然里面有许多垃圾数据，但基础程序运转依然良好。

original: Whatever, love is transitory - or ended in gunfire.
translation: 无论如何，爱情是短暂的，只会在争吵中结束。

original: I understand how important a loved one can be.
translation: 我明白爱人有多重要。

original: [She nods slowly, studying you. She seems to be gauging you again.]
translation: [她缓缓点头，打量着你，像是在重新审视你。]

original: [She makes a slow circle motion after a moment, taps her wrist.]
translation: [接着她慢慢做了个画圈的手势，又碰了一下自己的手腕。]

original: Give me a little credit.
translation: 对我有点信心呗。

original: What, you think I don't understand love?
translation: 怎么，你觉得我不懂爱？

original: [She raises an eyebrow, looks at you.]
translation: [她扬起眉毛，看着你。]

original: Unrequited? Or...
translation: 单相思？还是...

original: [She shakes her head, draws the two fingers together, then shakes her head more emphatically.]
translation: [她摇摇头，把两根手指并在一起，头摇得更厉害了。]

original: You were more than girlfriends - lovers.
translation: 你们不仅是闺蜜——更是恋人。

original: [She nods, and looks at you a little surprised.]
translation: [她点点头，有些惊讶地看着你。]

original: Oh- girlfriend.
translation: 哦——闺蜜。

original: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]
translation: [她犹豫了一下，摆了摆手。]

original: Oh - girlfriend.
translation: 哦——闺蜜。

original: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]
translation: [她犹豫了一下，摆了摆手。]

original: What, your wife?
translation: 要不是你妻子？

original: [She shakes her head, but rolls it side to side.]
translation: [她用力地摇了摇头。]

original: Uh... boyfriend?
translation: 呃… 男朋友？

original: [She shakes her head.]
translation: [她摇了摇头。]

original: Oh - girlfriend.
translation: 哦——闺蜜。

original: [She hesitates, then waves her hand.]
translation: [她犹豫了一下，摆了摆手。]

original: Family? Husband?
translation: 是你的家人？丈夫？

original: [She frowns, shakes her head, and even more so at husband.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，摇了摇头，尤其听到“丈夫”这个词时，摇得更厉害了。]

original: He cut you off from someone.
translation: 他拆散了你和另一个人。

original: [She nods.]
translation: [她点点头。]

original: I don't understand.
translation: 我不明白。

original: [She repeats the chopping motion, slower, then draws the two fingers apart. She looks sadly at one of the fingers.]
translation: [她放慢了速度，重复了一遍劈砍的动作，然后把两根手指分开，伤心地看着其中一根手指。]

original: So why would you waste time looking for him?
translation: 你干嘛要费这么大功夫找他？

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She frowns, raises two fingers, and has them walk together. Then she looks down on the two fingers, and her face becomes angry.]
translation: [成功] [她皱着眉头，伸出两根手指，比出走路的动作。然后她看着这两根手指，神情突然变得愤怒。]

original: [Then she chops her hand down, and draws the two fingers apart. One of the finger she points at herself.]
translation: [她的另一只手猛劈下来，把两个手指分开，用其中一个指着自己。]

original: Sounds like it's pretty important to you to find this person.
translation: 看来找到他对你来说很重要。

original: [FAILED] [She pauses, looks at you for a second, then shrugs and shakes her head.]
translation: [失败] [她停下来，看了你一眼，然后耸耸肩，摇了摇头。]

original: ...and nuts.
translation: ...还有点疯。

original: [She nods, frowns.]
translation: [她皱着眉，点点头。]

original: Someone smart.
translation: 那人很聪明。

original: [She nods, then circles her ear.]
translation: [她点点头，在耳旁画了个圈。]

original: The man on the Pip-Boy holotape, Elijah.
translation: 你说的是我哔哔小子录音里的那个人，以利亚。

original: You were looking for a Vault Boy?
translation: 你在找一个避难所小子?

original: [She shakes her head, points at your Pip-Boy again and makes a talking motion with her hand.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，又指了指你的哔哔小子，做了个代表说话的手势。]

original: You were looking for a man in a Vault.
translation: 你在找一个避难所里的人。

original: [She shakes her head, points at your Pip-Boy again.]
translation: [她又摇了摇头，指了指你的哔哔小子。]

original: An... angry, bearded... man.
translation: 一个…愤怒的，大胡子…男人。

original: {SCRIPT: Knows that Elijah is in Pip-Boy}[She points at your Pip-Boy.]
translation: [她指了指你的哔哔小子。]

original: [She nods, looks concerned, taps the side of her head, and expands her hands.]
translation: [她点点头，表情有些焦虑，她敲这侧边头，接着摊开双手。]

original: All right, someone alive.
translation: 好吧，一个活人。

original: Or a woman?
translation: 是个女人？

original: [She shakes her head... then stops mid-way, frowns... then tilts her head, as if thinking. She seems lost in thought for a moment.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，又突然停下，皱起眉头，似乎想到了什么，就这样沉浸在了自己的思绪中。]

original: [She glances at you, as if caught, then she smiles slightly, but there's an edge to it. Then she shakes her head, slowly, once.]
translation: [她瞥了你一眼，仿佛刚注意到你似的。随后她淡淡一笑，眼神中带着些许轻蔑。她慢慢地摇了摇头。]

original: Man?
translation: 男人？

original: [She nods. She makes a motion with her hands around her chin, drawing it down, and then she raises her hands and clenches them at the sky.]
translation: [她点点头，用双手捧着脸颊，又顺着脸颊向下伸展。随后她举起双手，握紧拳头，伸向天空。]

original: A robot?
translation: 机器人?

original: [She shakes her head and pumps her fist near her chest.]
translation: [她摇摇头，用拳头撞了一下胸口。]

original: This charades shit is driving me crazy.
translation: 我不想再玩这种你比划我来猜的游戏了。

original: [She frowns and raises her middle finger.]
translation: [她皱起眉头，甩了个中指。]

original: Wherever you were, it was hot out.
translation: 无论你在哪儿，感觉周围都热烘烘的。

original: [She shakes her head and rolls her eyes.]
translation: [她摇摇头，翻了个白眼。]

original: You were looking for someone?
translation: 你在找什么人吗？

original: [She nods and raises a finger.]
translation: [她点点头伸出一根手指。]

original: You were... looking for something?
translation: 你是在……找什么东西？

original: [Shakes her head and makes a motion of two fingers walking.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，用两根手指做了个走路的手势。]

original: You were over the moon?
translation: 你高兴得上天了？

original: [She shakes her head and rolls her eyes.]
translation: [她摇了摇头，翻了个白眼。]

original: Look... we'll find a way to heal you, all right?
translation: 听着…我一定会想办法治好你的，好吗？

original: [She doesn't look at you, continues to stare darkly in front of her.]
translation: [她没有理睬你，仍然阴郁地盯着前方。]

original: [After a moment, she glances at you, then taps the back of her wrist. She nods in front of her.]
translation: [过了一会儿，她又瞥向你，敲了敲手背，示意继续前进。]

original: You really need to relax. This entire place is a Pre-War paradise, you know.
translation: 别搞得那么紧张嘛，放松点，毕竟这地方在战前可是旅游胜地啊。

original: [She looks at you, surprised. Then she opens her mouth as if to laugh... silently.]
translation: [她有些惊讶地看着你，然后她张开嘴，无声地大笑着。]

original: [Almost as soon as she utters her silent laugh, she stops, looks pained, and her expression becomes dark.]
translation: [突然她停了下来，露出了痛苦的面容，表情也逐渐黯淡下去。]

original: A smile... now that's more like it.
translation: 你终于笑了…这还差不多。

original: [Still smiling, she rolls her eyes, and then slowly taps the back of her wrist.]
translation: [她翻了个白眼，仍然保持着微笑，然后她慢慢敲打手背。]

original: What are you shaking and nodding for?
translation: 你一会儿摇头一会儿点头的是什么意思？

original: [SUCCEEDED] [Her face wrinkles more, and then she gives a reluctant smile.]
translation: [成功][她的脸扭曲地更厉害了，不情愿地笑了笑。]

original: Okay, okay, I get it. <Nod slowly.> Better than finger snaps.
translation: 好吧。好吧，我懂了。<慢慢点头>总比打响指好。

original: [FAILED] [She looks frustrated, then makes a dismissive wave.]
translation: [失败][她看起来有些失望，挥了挥手，似乎在赶你走。]

original: Things would be a lot easier if you did one snap for yes, two snaps for no.
translation: 如果你敲一下代表同意，敲两下代表不同意，咱俩的交流会轻松很多。

original: [She smiles humorlessly. She then nods once slowly. Then she shakes her head slowly.]
translation: [她露出了一本正经的笑容。然后缓慢地点了一下头，又慢慢地摇了摇头]

original: [She then looks at you, her face wrinkled in a humorless smile.]
translation: [然后她看着你，那副冷峻的微笑让她的脸上现出了皱纹。]

original: Fine, be a bitch, then.
translation: 好吧，随你的便吧。

original: I'm not the one trying to communicate with hand motions.
translation: 要用手语交流的人又不是我。

original: [She gives you a snarl, glances at your collar, makes a dismissive wave.]
translation: [她朝你怒吼一声，看了一眼你的项圈，挥了挥手，似乎在赶你走。]

original: You can't protect the world from the world... it's useless.
translation: 世界要毁灭，你也毫无办法啊……没用的。

original: [She points at your collar, then hers, and shakes her head slowly... then cuts the air with her hand and her face becomes blank.]
translation: [她指指你和她的项圈，摇了摇头，手掌一挥，脸上没了表情。]

original: You're worried someone's going to find this place? Use it to hurt people.
translation: 你担心有人会发现这里？然后利用这里去伤害别人？

original: [She nods slowly, hands still locked on her throat. She looks pained for a moment, and she breaks from your gaze.]
translation: [她缓缓点头，手依然抓着脖子。她看起来有些痛苦，眼神逃离了你的视线。]

original: [Her fingers flutter, almost frantically, for a second, and she runs her hands along her scalp, then her throat - then the collar.]
translation: [突然间，她的手指开始狂乱地跳动着，拂过了头皮、喉咙，最后停在了项圈上。]

original: [She points at your Pip-Boy, almost with frustration... then gestures all around her, and her shoulders seem to sag.]
translation: [她沮丧地指着你的哔哔小子，胡乱做着手势，最后肩膀似乎也耷拉了下来。]

original: [After a moment, she glances back at you, glances around her, then shakes her head slowly.]
translation: [过了一会儿，她看了你一眼，看了看周围，慢慢摇了摇头。]

original: Why do you want to do that?
translation: 为什么这么做?

original: [She looks at you, as if surprised. Then glances at your collar, wrinkles her face, and points at it.]
translation: [她看着你，表情显得有些惊讶。她瞥了一眼你的项圈，指了指它。]

original: [She makes a wide sweeping circle of the area, looking around... then brings both hands back to her, then to her neck, and holds it.]
translation: [她用手画了一个大大的圈，接着环顾四周……然后把手收回来，抓住了自己的脖子。]

original: [Her hands still on her neck, she looks at you gravely, then shakes her head.]
translation: [她一边牢牢地抓着脖子，一边用严肃的眼神看着你，摇了摇头。]

original: You want to... hunt here?
translation: 你想在这儿……打猎？

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She looks impressed, nods.]
translation: [成功] [她看起来很欣慰，点点头。]

original: You want to kill something here, then protect this place.
translation: 你来这儿是为了杀掉某个人，同时保护这里。

original: [FAILED] [She looks frustrated, then makes a dismissive wave.]
translation: [失败] [她看起来有些失望，不以为然地摆了摆手。]

original: Why would you want to stay here of all places?
translation: 为什么你想呆在这儿?

original: [She frowns, makes a mock motion of loading a gun, then hefting it to her shoulder and taking aim at something in the distance.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，做了个假装给枪上膛的手势，然后抬起手，好像在瞄准远处的某个东西。]

original: [Then she pauses, makes a sweeping circle, then puts her arms in a circle around it, as if covering it.]
translation: [她停顿了一下，画出一个圆，又把手臂围成一圈，将那个圆包在了里面。]

original: Are you trying to break into the casino?
translation: 你是想要进入赌场吗？

original: So you're after the treasure then?
translation: 所以你是来寻宝的？

original: [She frowns, shakes her head... pauses... then tilts her head slightly, nods slowly.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，摇了摇头，停顿了一下，然后轻轻歪着脑袋，缓缓点头。]

original: You aren't going to leave.
translation: 你不走。

original: [She nods.]
translation: [她点了点头。]

original: Why can't you find your way back?
translation: 你为什么回不来?

original: [She slowly shakes her head. She points at the ground, then moves each leg outward, straddling the place where she's pointing.]
translation: [她慢慢摇了摇头，指向地面，随后两腿向外，横跨在她手指的地方上面。]

original: But not you.
translation: 但你不能。

original: [She nods once.]
translation: [她点了点头。]

original: ...to return here if I leave.
translation: …我走了就回不来了。

original: [She nods.]
translation: [她点了点头。]

original: I... have no idea what you're saying. Again.
translation: 我…还是不知道你在说什么。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She shakes her head, points at herself, then points at you, nods.]
translation: [成功][她摇了摇头，指了指自己，又指了指你，点点头。]

original: You're saying it'll be difficult to return here if we leave.
translation: 你是说如果我们离开，就很难再回来了。

original: [FAILED] [She looks frustrated, then makes a dismissive wave.]
translation: [失败][她看起来有些失望，不以为然地摆了摆手。]

original: So once the collars are gone, we can just leave?
translation: 那么一旦项圈拿下来了，我们就能走了吧？

original: [She nods slowly, as if thinking. Then she raises an eyebrow, looks skeptical, then shrugs.]
translation: [她若有所思地点点头，随后扬起眉毛，似乎显得有些怀疑，又耸了耸肩。]

original: [She points downwards, makes a circle around her, then back to the same spot... and then her finger drifts, circling, and she makes a mock-frown.]
translation: [她用手在自己身边画了个圈，最后回到原点…接着她假装皱着眉头，开始漫无目的地划圈。]

original: Do you know how to get out of here?
translation: 你知道要怎么离开这里么？

original: [She points in the direction of the main gate. Then points at your collar, shakes her head, and locks her hands around her neck.]
translation: [她指了指大门的方向，又指了指你的项圈，摇了摇头，用她双手掐住自己的脖子。]

original: [Then her hands lash outwards, fingers splayed and she rolls her eyes back. After a second she turns back to you shakes her head.]
translation: [然后她的双手向外摆动，五指张开，翻了个白眼。过了一会，她又转过来看着你，摇了摇头。]

original: I can't believe you'd want to stay here.
translation: 我不敢相信，你居然想呆在这儿。

original: You're not going to leave.
translation: 你不想走。

original: What about you?
translation: 你呢？

original: Are you saying it's one or the other?
translation: 你到底指的是这儿，还是那儿？

original: [She frowns. Glances in the direction of the casino, then the exit, then back in the direction of the casino.]
translation: [她皱皱眉，分别朝赌场和出口看了一眼，最后看向赌场的方向。]

original: [She shrugs... without strength or conviction. She isn't looking at you when she does.]
translation: [她有气无力地耸了耸肩，眼睛并没有再看向你。]

original: Me? What about you?
translation: 我？那你呢？

original: [She slowly shakes her head, then points at the ground.]
translation: [她慢慢摇了摇头，指着地面。]

original: If I could leave, I would.
translation: 我当然也想离开这里。

original: [She looks at you for a moment, glances at your collar, shrugs. She then lightly grabs her neck with both hands, holds it for a moment.]
translation: [她盯着你看了一会儿，又朝你的项圈瞥了一眼，耸耸肩，然后用两只手抓住自己的脖子，握了好一会儿。]

original: [Then her hands fall away. She looks at you, looks at the exit and nods.]
translation: [随后她放开了手，看着你，又朝出口点了点头。]

original: I couldn't even tell you why, I just... did.
translation: 我也说不出原因，我就是……想来。

original: Looking to start life as a Prospector, figured this place was a good place to start.
translation: 我想当一名淘金客，感觉可以先来这儿碰碰运气。

original: [She frowns, puts her hands on her hips and glares at you. After a second, she rolls her eyes.]
translation: [她皱起眉头，叉着腰看着你，随后翻了个白眼。]

original: [She then makes a mocking, slow intake of breath, and then winces. Then she glances at you, points in the direction of main gate.]
translation: [她深吸了一口气，表情颇为嘲讽。随后她往后退了一步，瞥了你一眼，指了指大门的方向。]

original: Thought I may have stumbled on an Old World treasure cache.
translation: 我以为来这儿兴许能发现什么旧世界的宝藏。

original: Needed supplies, thought it might lead me somewhere interesting.
translation: 我只是想搜刮点物资，心想着也许到了这地方能有所收获。

original: ...I was curious where it led.
translation: …我只是好奇它的来源。

original: [She looks at you for a second, studying you. Then nods.]
translation: [她看了你一眼，琢磨着。然后点点头。]

original: [She points at you, then points at the casino, and she slowly shakes her head - then points in the direction of the main gate.]
translation: [她指向你，又指向赌场，然后慢慢摇了摇头，最后指向大门的方向。]

original: <Raise an eyebrow back.>
translation: <扬起眉毛回应。>

original: [Almost against her will, she smiles. After a moment, the smile fades, and she points at the ground again.]
translation: [她极不情愿地笑了笑。过一会儿，她的笑容消失了，她又指着地面。]

original: None of your business.
translation: 不关你的事。

original: [She shrugs, then taps the back of her palm in the direction of the Fountain.]
translation: [她耸耸肩，朝着喷泉的方向敲敲手背。]

original: [She shrugs, then taps the back of her palm, pointing West and down.]
translation: [她耸耸肩，敲敲手背，指向西方。]

original: Followed a radio signal here, a woman's voice.
translation: 跟着一个广播信号来的，一个女人的声音。

original: [She waits. After a second, she raises her eyebrow again.]
translation: [她仔细聆听着，随后再次扬起了眉毛。]

original: I... don't understand.
translation: 我……没明白。

original: [SUCCEEDED] [She smiles, nods.]
translation: [成功][她笑着点了点头。]

original: You want to know how I got here?
translation: 你想知道我是怎么到这儿的？

original: [FAILED] [She makes a mock sigh.]
translation: [失败][她嘲弄地叹了口气。]

original: Did you circle the area, or...?
translation: 你在这地方画了一个圈，还是…?

original: What? What about my feet?
translation: 我的脚怎么了？

original: [She repeats the circling motion again. This time, she lowers her hand and circles her finger inward, until she's pointing at the spot between you.]
translation: [她重复了一遍画圈的动作。这次她放低一只手，手指向内弯曲，最后停在你和她之间。]

original: [Still pointing at the ground between you two, she raises an eyebrow.]
translation: [她扬起眉毛，手指依然冲着你们俩中间的地面。]

original: Now... wait, you're acting like you don't trust me or something.
translation: 等等，你这意思是不信任我咯？

original: [She continues to look at you for a moment, studying you, then her eyes fall to your collar, then your Pip-Boy.]
translation: [她又看了你一会儿，审视着你，随后她的眼神落到了你的项圈和哔哔小子上。]

original: [She glances back up at you, then she circles herself and points at the ground between you.]
translation: [她抬起头盯着你，然后围绕自己身边画了个圈，最后指向了你们俩之间的地面。]

original: You think I had something to do with this?
translation: 你觉得我和这件事有关？

original: I didn't bring you here.
translation: 抓你来的人不是我。

original: [She looks at you for a moment, studying you. She doesn't move. After a second or two, she frowns.]
translation: [她站在原地，似乎在审视你。过了一会儿，然她皱起了眉头。]

original: [She frowns, glances at your feet, then nods. She then raises an eyebrow, points at you, makes a circle, then points at your feet.]
translation: [她皱着眉头，看向你的脚，然后点点头。她抬起眉毛，指着你，画了个圈，然后指着你的脚。]

original: Did you get gassed like I did?
translation: 你和我一样吸入毒气了吗？

original: You were knocked out?
translation: 你被打昏了？

original: [She nods. She raises an eyebrow, points at you, makes a circle, then points at your feet.]
translation: [她点头，扬起一只眉毛，指向你画了个圈，然后指着你的脚。]

original: Now... back to the Suites. And we'll sing the lock open.
translation: 现在...回到套房去。我们用歌声把锁打开。

original: You have the last fragment, that is all I need. Now...
translation: 你找到了最后一个片段。这样就都齐了。接下来…

original: Go to the main lobby terminal, thread the music sequence together.
translation: 到门厅的终端那里去，把音乐片段拼接到一起。

original: Another fragment... good. Almost have the entirety of what I need from the music archives.
translation: 又一个片段…很好。我要的档案马上就要全部到手了。

original: Once you have the last fragment, you can thread the archives together at the main floor terminal.
translation: 等你拿到最后一个片段，你就可以利用大厅里的终端把所有档案拼接在一起。

original: Once you have the last fragment, you can thread the archives together at the main floor terminal.
translation: 等你拿到最后一个片段，你就可以利用大厅里的终端把所有档案拼接在一起。

original: You've gotten one of the floors re-established, good... accessing the music archives now. Two more to go.
translation: 你已经修好了这层楼的系统，很好…我现在接入音乐档案库。还差两个。

original: {Curious, distant}Oh... it seems the casino has uninvited guests... the Villa inhabitants were pounding at the doors - now they've found a way inside.
translation: 哦...看来有不速之客光临赌场了...别墅区的居民在撞门——它们找到进来的方法了。

original: {Cold, barking orders}Deal with them - and don't try and leave yourself, or I'll let the collar do its work.
translation: 干掉它们，别想逃跑，不然我就用项圈解决你。

original: {Curious, distant}Oh... it seems the casino has uninvited guests... the Villa inhabitants were pounding at the doors - now they've found a way inside.
translation: 哦...看来有不速之客光临赌场了...别墅区的居民在撞门——它们找到进来的方法了。

original: {Cold, barking orders}Deal with them - and don't try and leave yourself, or I'll let the collar do its work.
translation: 干掉它们，别想逃跑，不然我就用项圈解决你。

original: Watch out for the Villa inhabitants, they're... difficult to kill unless you chop them apart... if you can, blow them up or disintegrate them.
translation: 小心别墅区里的居民，它们很难被杀死，除非将它们肢解…有办法就炸烂它们，或者用能量武器把它们熔掉。

original: Outside, you may notice your vision'll pulse, get dizzy. It's the Cloud. Eats your insides, slowly. Too much exposure, death.
translation: 在户外时，你可能会感到视线模糊。这是由于毒云的影响，它在慢慢侵蚀你。如果暴露太久会致命。

original: Villa's comm speakers have aged poorly, like the Madre. Pre-War junk. The speakers emit a signal that'll set off your collar if you stay too long.
translation: 别墅区的扩音喇叭老化得很严重，赌场里的也一样。战前的垃圾就是不中用。如果你停留得太久，喇叭发出的信号就会引爆你的项圈。

original: Picking up signals near your location. Detonators. Watch for traps.
translation: 探测到你附近有信号源。是引爆器。小心陷阱。

original: Leave the Salida del Sol gate alone. You're not done with the Villa yet, so don't stray.
translation: 先别管日出镇。别墅区的事情还没完，不要开小差。

original: Don't go through the gate to Puesta del Sol yet - gather the others first.
translation: 现在还没必要进入日落镇——先去集合其他人。

original: This gate to the Sierra Madre's sealed, locked. For now. Do as I say, and it won't be locked for much longer.
translation: 通往马德雷山脉的大门锁住了。不过只是暂时的，只要你照我说的做，不久之后它就能打开。

original: That's the way out - after you break into the Sierra Madre's vault. Try to leave, I'll set off your collar.
translation: 这是出口，不过你得先打开马德雷山脉赌场的金库。想跑，我就引爆你的项圈。

original: Damn speakers at end of hall - red light means they're shielded. Must be a way to shut them off somewhere else.
translation: 走廊尽头有几个该死的喇叭——闪着红灯，说明它们有防护罩。一定有办法在别处关掉它们。

original: Picking up an emitter signature - watch for security Holograms, dangerous. {Beat}Don't shoot them - attacking them is useless.
translation: 探测到全息投影仪信号——小心全息保安，很危险。不要对它们开火——武器对它们一点用也没有。

original: I can hear the event firing off. Now get to the main gate of the Sierra Madre, quickly.
translation: 我听到盛世庆典启动的声音了。现在马上到赌场大门去。

original: Get there soon or the doors will seal, and you'll be trapped outside.
translation: 动作快点，不然大门一关上，你就会被困在外面。

original: Get there soon or the doors will seal, and you'll be trapped outside.
translation: 动作快点，不然大门一关上，你就会被困在外面。

original: Get the mute down the elevator and into the Manual Override Chamber.
translation: 带那个哑巴下电梯，进入手动控制室。

original: There - the Switching Station. That's where you'll need to bring the mute.
translation: 就是那儿了——开闭所。你要把那个哑巴带过来。

original: You're at the Ghoul's Gala area... now, make him stay.
translation: 你已经到达那个尸鬼该去的地方了…想办法让他待在这儿。

original: The bell tower. That's where you'll trigger the Gala Event. It's a ways up. I'm sure you'll find a way to climb up there.
translation: 钟楼，盛世庆典的操作台就在那里，你得爬到顶楼去，你应该能找到路上去。

original: {Grumbling to himself}And once you get near the top... look for a ladder. It's easy to miss.
translation: 等你快到顶楼的时候…注意找一架梯子。比较不起眼。

original: {Grumbling to himself}And once you get near the top... look for a ladder. It's easy to miss.
translation: 等你快到顶楼的时候…注意找一架梯子。比较不起眼。

original: You're at one of the Gala locations, you'll need to bring the mutant here. Only he has the strength to operate the levers, I've found.
translation: 你已经抵达了启动盛世庆典的关键地点，你得把那个变种人带过来。只有他有足够的力气扳动这里的开关。

original: [Christine nods at you, then the Ghost Person on the ground, makes a neck-chopping motion.]
translation: [克莉丝汀向你点点头，示意你看向倒在地上的鬼人，做了一个扭断脖子的动作。]

original: He's not dead... it's a trick. {Beat}Get an axe.
translation: 他没死…是装的。找把斧头来。

original: Better make sure he's dead. {Quiet, more to himself}Poke him with a stick or something.
translation: 最好确定他死透了再走。拿根棍子什么的戳他一下。

original: Must be a back entrance to the kitchen - check the main casino side corridors. Find it.
translation: 厨房一定有后门——检查一下赌场中心的侧面走廊，找到它。

original: Hurry up and deal with the FEV reject, he's of no use to us.
translation: 快去解决掉那个FEV病毒的残次品，他对我们已经没用了。

original: If that Ghoul's still alive... correct that. Or break him.
translation: 要是那个尸鬼还活着…干掉他，或者让他屈服。

original: Floor's buzzing with emitter signatures. Watch out for Holograms.
translation: 这层楼里到处是发生器的信号，当心全息影像。

original: Find the mute and deal with her. She's somewhere on this floor.
translation: 找到那个哑巴，干掉她。她应该就藏在这层楼里。

original: Your collar's ticking. Get out of that floor!
translation: 你的项圈在响！快离开这层楼！

original: The door to the vault is voice-activated. Which means we need the starlet's voice. Or recordings of it.
translation: 通往避难所的大门是声控的。我们必须借用那个女明星的声音，播放她的录音应该也行。

original: The elevator to the casino vault is locked, find a way to open it.
translation: 进入避难所的电梯被锁上了。想办法打开它。

original: Now get out, before your collar blows!
translation: 快出去，不然项圈就要爆炸了！

original: Get to the door before the collar explodes, move!
translation: 快跑向大门 ！不然项圈就要爆炸了！

original: Now, deal with the Ghoul. This has gone on long enough.
translation: 现在去干掉那个尸鬼吧。已经拖得够久了。

original: Door's sealed. Must be a key to the backstage. Hunt for it.
translation: 大门封住了。后台一定有配套的钥匙，找到它。

original: How did you get here from the Gala Event? And onto this floor?
translation: 你是怎么离开盛世庆典现场的？又是怎么来到这层的？

original: {Deliver this slow, thoughtful, seems like a dupe, isn't}The Gala went off, the Switching Station opened up - {to herself, rueful}thought the screeching in the Auto-Doc was bad, Station worse.
translation: {Deliver this angrier, seems like a dupe, isn't}庆典仪式结束后，开闭所的门就打开了。本以为自动医生的噪音已经很吵了，没想到开闭所里的更甚。

original: Got outside, saw the light show, and it was enough to make me run to the casino.
translation: 我刚走到外面，就看到了满天的焰火，于是赶紧冲向赌场。

original: Also... it seemed like the lights and speakers were helping to guide me... guess your master wanted a back-up in case you died.
translation: 而且…感觉那些灯光和喇叭在指引我…看来你的主子担心你会挂掉，特意留了后手。

original: As for being assigned to this floor... maybe it's because of my new voice. Your guess is as good as mine. {Beat, sarcastic}Maybe it recognized me as a guest.
translation: 至于被安排到这一层…也许是因为我现在的声音吧。我也不知道，可能它把我当成贵宾了。

original: How did you get to the main gate? Then get here?
translation: 你是怎么进入大门，又怎么来到这里的？

original: {Deliver this angrier, seems like a dupe, isn't}The Gala went off, the Switching Station opened up - thought the screeching in the Auto-Doc was bad, Station worse.
translation: {Deliver this angrier, seems like a dupe, isn't}庆典仪式结束后，开闭所的门就打开了。本以为自动医生的噪音已经很吵了，没想到开闭所里的更甚。

original: Got outside, saw the light show, and it was enough to make me run to the casino.
translation: 我刚走到外面，就看到了满天的焰火，于是赶紧冲向赌场。

original: Also... it seemed like the lights and speakers were helping to guide me... guess your master wanted a back-up in case you died.
translation: 而且…感觉那些灯光和喇叭在指引我…看来你的主子担心你会挂掉，特意留了后手。

original: As for being assigned to this floor... maybe it's because of my new voice. Your guess is as good as mine. {Beat, sarcastic}Maybe it recognized me as a guest.
translation: 至于我被安排到这一层…也许是因为我现在的声音吧。我也不知道，可能它把我当成贵宾了。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}How did you get from the Gala Event to here?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Hates player}你是怎么从盛世庆典的现场来到这里的？

original: {Sounds like dupe of another line, isn't, this one's angrier, smug}Me? I was halfway off the rooftop, through the service tunnel and bee-lining for the gate before the light show started...
translation: {Sounds like dupe of another line, isn't, this one's friendlier, more confused}灯光秀开始前，我就已经跑下了屋顶，穿过隧洞，准备冲向赌场大门了…

original: ...and before Vera finished her Gala speech... I knew what'd happen with "music" in the streets and lights in the sky... Ghost People. Lots of them.
translation: …在薇拉的演讲结束前…我就已经知道这满大街的“锣鼓喧天”和火树银花会带来什么后果…鬼人会如潮水一般涌来。

original: But that was your problem. {Beat}Anyway, front gate was open, no way I was letting {emph}you get in first. {Slight confusion}I walk in... there's a flash... and I'm here.
translation: 不过这事与我无关，反正大门已经开了，我可不能让你比我先到。于是我就走了进去…然后眼前一道白光闪过…醒来后我就到了这里。

original: Must have been Sinclair's security... he always had a thing about letting any threats into the casino. Security system's twitchy that way.
translation: 想必是辛克莱的安保系统干的好事…他这人老是千方百计地想把一切危险都隔绝在赌场之外。安保系统在这方面实在有些过于敏感了。

original: {Smug}Me, though, I'm a guest here, so I guess I got the royal treatment after all.
translation: {Smug}不过，现在我已经是这里的贵宾啦，看来我还是受到了优待的。

original: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}How did you get from the Gala Event to here?
translation: {THEATER: 1st Time, Likes player}你是怎么从盛世庆典的现场来到这里的？

original: {Sounds like dupe of another line, isn't, this one's friendlier, more confused}I was already was halfway off the rooftop, through the service tunnel and making a break for the gate before the light show started...
translation: {Sounds like dupe of another line, isn't, this one's friendlier, more confused}灯光秀开始前，我就已经跑下了屋顶，穿过隧洞，准备冲向赌场大门了…

original: ...and before Vera finished her Gala speech... I knew what'd happen with "music" in the streets and lights in the sky... Ghost People. Lots of them.
translation: …在薇拉的演讲结束前…我就已经知道这满大街的“锣鼓喧天”和火树银花会带来什么后果…鬼人会如潮水一般涌来。

original: Also meant the front gate was open, and no way was I missing it after all these years. Then... I walk in... and...
translation: 当然，大门也会打开。这么多年了，我可不能错过这个机会。于是我走了进去…然后……

original: {Snarling}I'm in control. The Master won't help Dog now... and it won't help you.
translation: {Snarling}我现在自己做主。主人现在帮不到狗……也帮不到你。

original: {Snarling}Not listen, {emph}Dog out of cage now.
translation: 不听，狗离开笼子了。

original: If you have the key in there, the "Old Man" can order Dog to open the cage.
translation: 如果你有钥匙，那个"糟老头"可以直接命令狗打开笼子。

original: Don't let him spot you! If he does, talk him down before he has a chance to ignite the gas.
translation: 别让他看到你！如果被发现了，就想办法说服他，不要让他有机会点燃煤气。

original: Shut off the gas valves, or that idiot'll kill us all.
translation: 关掉煤气阀门，不然那个蠢货会害死我们所有人。

original: That idiot's opened the gas valves! A single spark - or he sets off his collar, the casino's going to burn. Us along with him.
translation: 那个蠢货打开了煤气阀门！只要一丁点火花，或者他脖子上的项圈爆炸，整个赌场就都完了。他这是要和我们同归于尽。

original: What weapons are you good at?
translation: 你擅长什么武器？

original: Dog is better at the baser instincts than I... I merely have the brain for it.
translation: 狗在生存本能方面比我强...我基本什么都不擅长。

original: His sinew and muscle are difficult to move consciously... he's always hungry, clumsy, heavy.
translation: 我很难有意识地去控制他的关节和肌肉…因为他总是很饿，体态很笨拙。

original: What weapons are you good at?
translation: 你擅长什么武器？

original: Dog good at punching... hitting people with metal bear jaw until they go quiet.
translation: 狗擅长用拳头打人…拿铁质的熊夹子，打到他们没声音为止。

original: {Thinking}Dog sometimes pick up club when thing need to hit is big, need to punch in many places.
translation: 如果对手个头大，狗就会捡根棒子，因为要揍的地方多。

original: What weapons are you skilled with?
translation: 你擅长什么武器？

original: Not one for fighting if we can avoid it. Still, wasn't bad at the pistol range and over the years, I've learned how to handle a knife...
translation: 我最擅长避免与他人争斗。不过，我的手枪枪法还可以，这些年，我也学会了如何耍刀……

original: {Little quieter}...and explosives a bit. A bit. {To himself}Made a lot of mistakes along the way. Still have my fingers, though.
translation: ...炸药也会一点。一点而已。虽然犯过不少错，但我至少没有缺胳膊少腿。

original: Oh, is that all? Guess that'll do.
translation: 哦，就这些啊？还行，勉强能打吧。

original: [She makes a disapproving frown, shakes her head.]
translation: [她不以为然地皱皱眉，摇了摇头。]

original: You seem like you've been well-trained.
translation: 你看起来受过很全面的训练。

original: [She shrugs slightly, then waits.]
translation: [她轻轻耸了耸肩，等待着。]

original: Energy Weapons, Explosives, Melee, Unarmed, and Guns. Is that all?
translation: 能量武器，炸药，冷兵器，格斗，还有枪械。这不就是十八般武艺样样精通？

original: [She nods. Once.]
translation: [她点了一下头。]

original: What weapons are you skilled at?
translation: 你擅长什么武器？

original: [Christine draws a jagged lightning bolt in the air, pantomimes throwing a grenade, and then pulls an imaginary knife from behind her back.]
translation: [克莉丝汀比划了一个拉枪栓的动作，又做出了一个扔手雷的动作，然后假装从背后抽出一把刀。]

original: [Then she moves her feet shoulder width apart, holds hands up in a martial arts stance, then turns both hands into pistols, pantomimes rapid-firing.]
translation: [接着她双脚分开，与肩齐平，握紧双手，摆出了武术的架势，又将两只手比成手枪，用哑剧的风格表演快速射击。]

original: [She then holds one pistol up, takes aim as if sighting along the barrel and does a single shot, ends with a nod.]
translation: [她抬起其中一支手，仿佛在用眼睛顺着枪管瞄准，她假装开了一枪，并点了点头。]

original: Always in the mood for another drink. What's the recipe?
translation: 我就喜欢无事小酌一杯。这东西的配方是什么？

original: Sounds... interesting.
translation: 听起来...很有趣。

original: {Pleased}Good, well done... now, for the festivities, {colder}and your parts in all this.
translation: {Act 2 Start - Pleased}很好，干得不错……那么接下来，就该说说庆典仪式，以及你们几个的分工了。

original: The owner of the Sierra Madre... {disgusted, thinks this was an idiotic move}for whatever reason... keyed the Grand Opening to the Gala Event itself.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场的主人……不知出于什么原因……将赌场的开业仪式与“盛世庆典”绑定在了一起。

original: It needs to be fired off in order for the casino doors to open. {Grumbles}As I've discovered, {emph}one person can't do it.
translation: 想要打开赌场大门，就必须先启动这个盛世庆典。而我发现，这件事单凭一个人是做不到的。

original: So, get your team in position indicated on your Pip-Boy, then trigger it properly.
translation: 所以，你要带着队友，到哔哔小子地图上标记的地方，再用合适的方法启动仪式。

original: You're so close now, don't let me down. {Beat}Otherwise, I'll have to rely on the {emph}next team.
translation: 你离成功只有一步之遥了，别让我失望。{Beat}否则，我就只能指望{emph}下一支队伍了。

original: What do you need me to do now?
translation: 你现在需要我做什么？

original: Gather the three others needed for this job, return them here. After that, I'll have more instructions for you.
translation: 把其他三个能完成这项任务的人找到，带他们到这里。之后，我会给你们进一步的指示。

original: Take the others to their positions to trigger the Gala Event. After that, the doors of the Sierra Madre should open.
translation: 将他们带去各自的位置，启动盛世庆典。之后，马德雷赌场的大门就会开启。

original: Will exposure kill me?
translation: 暴露的话会让我丧命吗？

original: {Hardcore Only}No... while it will erode your health, {need to be clear, slow, here}it will only bring you to the point of death, no farther. At that point...
translation: {Hardcore Only}不……虽然它会逐渐损害你的身体， {need to be clear, slow, here}但它不会直接杀死你，只会让你命悬一线。到时候……

original: The air here is lethal only if you enter concentrated pockets of the Cloud. Too long inside one, you'll die, so be careful where you step.
translation: 只要你不钻进浓密的毒云里，这里的空气就不至于致死。在浓雾里待太久是会没命的，所以，前进时一定要小心。

original: I've seen some survive concentration of the Cloud for short periods of time if healthy enough - others were too weak.
translation: 我见过某些身体强壮的人，在浓雾里还能坚持一小段时间，但身体虚弱的人恐怕就没这样的好运了。

original: Rebreathers, chemical suits... there is no protection against it, it decays all it touches. {Beat, slight anger}I've found fighting it useless.
translation: 无论呼吸器还是防护服……任何措施都无法抵御它们，凡是接触过它的东西都会被腐蚀。我试过各种方法，都没有用。

original: Where is my gear?
translation: 我的装备在哪儿？

original: {Low anger, this is frustrating}The Sierra Madre has many... defenses, means of screening guests for illicit or dangerous items. Your arrival here, weaponless, was {emph}not my intention.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场配备了一套相当复杂的……安保系统，其中就包括检查来客身上是否有携带违禁品或有害物品。所以你才会手无寸铁来到这里，{emph}这并不是我的本意。

original: The Casino, this Villa... it takes anything with even a trace of radioactivity, traces of unknown substances... and returns it home. The bunker.
translation: 这个赌场，这片别墅区…但凡发现来宾身上的东西带有一丝核辐射或是不明成份…就会将它们没收，寄回原址，也就是地堡。

original: The process is automated, and the casino itself has other, similar "services." I was unable to find a workaround, except to send others in as tools.
translation: 这一过程是全自动的，赌场里也有许多类似的"服务"。我找不到变通的手段，只能想办法把人当成工具送进来。

original: Why is my vision blurring?
translation: 为什么我眼前雾蒙蒙的？

original: It is the Cloud covering the Villa. The longer you are outside, the more its toxins seep into your system... through the lungs {emph}and the skin.
translation: 是因为笼罩着别墅区的毒云影响了你的视线。你在户外逗留得越久，就会有越多毒素通过呼吸道和皮肤…渗入你的体内。

original: It will eat at you the longer you are outside... so wherever you go, move fast, or you'll soon find yourself too weak to move.
translation: 时间越长，你受到的伤害也就越严重...所以不管去哪儿，动作一定要快，否则用不了多久，你就会连腿都抬不起来了。

original: It is the Cloud that surrounds the Villa. It shouldn't prove lethal in the time you are here... prolonged exposure would be hazardous, however.
translation: 是因为笼罩着别墅区的毒云影响了你的视线。虽然你待的时间不长，吸入的毒素并不足以致命…但持续暴露在这样的空气中，也会对身体有害。

original: {Cold, serious/warning}Fall asleep... and you will not wake up.
translation: 千万别睡着…否则你可能再也醒不过来了。

original: Is there anyone alive around here?
translation: 这儿还有活人吗？

original: {Lower, apprehensive... even he's concerned about these guys}Yes... the inhabitants... avoid them if you can, they are difficult to kill.
translation: 是的…这里有不少本地住民…尽量避开它们。它们很难被彻底杀死。

original: {Be clear, slow in this second half, part of combat "rules"}Whatever has created them, bullets, explosions, energy... it can make them inert for a time, then they seem to crawl back up, restored.
translation: 不知道它们是怎么变成那幅模样的，无论子弹、炸药还是能量武器…都只能最多延缓它们的行动，就算它们倒下，过一会儿也能再度爬起来，恢复原状。

original: Perhaps it's the Cloud... perhaps something in their physiology.
translation: 也许是毒云…改变了它们的生理构造。

original: How did I get here?
translation: 我是怎么到这儿来的？

original: {Emph}I brought you here. {Beat}There are mechanisms in place once the traps across the Mojave are sprung.
translation: 是我把你抓来的。一旦有人掉进了遍布在莫哈维各地的陷阱，我就会用相应的手段把他送来这里。

original: For now, your sole focus should be the Sierra Madre, and how to get inside. Until then, you won't leave alive.
translation: 眼下，你唯一该关心的就是如何进入马德雷山脉赌场。在达成目标前，我不会让你活着离开的。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: {Amused}Unfamiliar with the legend of the Sierra Madre? {Cold, precise}The casino exists. You are one of the few who look upon it.
translation: 你居然不知道马德雷山脉赌场的传说？这赌场是真实存在的，而你是少数能够亲眼见到它的人。

original: Where you're standing is the Villa beneath the casino above. {Softer, more to himself}The wreckage... the Villa... lies in the shadow.
translation: 你现在所处的地方就是位于赌场山脚下的别墅区。这片遗迹…别墅区…鲜有人问津。

original: {Irritated/grumbling throughout}The Villa is a dumping ground of failed construction... Pre-War junk that has aged poorly.
translation: 别墅区里散落着许多破败的建筑…都是战前建造的豆腐渣工程，风化得十分严重。

original: {Elijah Hologram}I had other questions.
translation: {Elijah Hologram}我还有其他问题想问。

original: {Contemptuous, commanding}I am short on patience. And you are short on time.
translation: {Contemptuous, commanding}我的耐心不多，你的时间也不多了。

original: {Contemptuous, commanding}Ask.
translation: {Contemptuous, commanding}问吧。

original: No, I'm not helping you.
translation: 不，我不会帮你。

original: {Finality, cold, presses the button}Then you are of no use to me.
translation: 那你对我没有用处了。

original: I'm not going to help you.
translation: 我不会帮你的。

original: {Cold, imperious}When you came into the bunker, you saw a victim, their head blown off for disobedience.
translation: 你进地堡时，应该看见过一具尸体吧，那个人就是一个因为拒绝服从命令而被炸掉了脑袋。

original: The city is filled with other stories, {emph}many such stories. Is "no" your choice?
translation: 同样的例子在这镇上比比皆是，你确定要说"不"吗？

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要怎样？

original: {Imperious}That structure you see above the Fountain - the Sierra Madre Casino... {snide}you need to break inside. {Smile}A... heist. {Beat, to himself}Too many years in the making.
translation: 你看到喷泉上方那个建筑了吗——马德雷山脉赌场...我要你闯进去，执行一场……抢劫。我策划了很多年。

original: {Beat, here's the catch}But to get inside, avoid its traps... you'll need to gather the team. {Beat, frustrated}As I've found, one cannot do it alone.
translation: 不过想要进到里面，避开各种机关...你还需要一支团队。以我的经验，单凭一个人是做不到的。

original: {Cold, clear, these are the "rules"}Around the Villa are three other collars like yours - Collar 8, 12, and 14. Find all three and get them here, to the Fountain. Then, we'll talk more.
translation: 在别墅区周围，有三个像你一样戴着项圈的对象——8号，12号和14号。你要先找到这三个人，把他们带到喷泉这里来，我们再谈下一步计划。

original: {Lower, warning}And should you get any ideas about killing each other and taking the treasure of the Sierra Madre for yourself - a warning.
translation: 如果你们企图自相残杀，或者独吞马德雷山脉的宝藏——那么我有言在先：

original: {Emph}All your collars are linked... one of you dies, you {emph}all die. If that's what it takes to make you cooperate, so be it.
translation: 你们几个人的项圈是连在一起的...一人死，全都死。我也是迫于无奈才这么做的，希望你们能好好合作。

original: Collar? What are you talking about?
translation: 项圈？你在说什么？

original: {Slow taunt, contempt of Pip-Boy}It's like that Pip-Boy on your wrist, except filled with explosives. {Smug, to himself}A little radio of the Old World, just needed some tuning.
translation: 它和你手腕上的哔哔小子很相似，只不过里面塞满了炸药。这是旧世界遗留下来的无线电设备，我只是略微做了些改进。

original: Do what I say, and the collar won't go off... refuse, try and run, {emph}disobey me? I'll kill you and find someone else.
translation: 只要听我的话，项圈就不会爆炸……如果你拒绝、试图逃跑，或者违抗我的命令，我就会杀了你，再找其他人来。

original: There's no escape from here until I let you go. {Quieter, threaten}The sooner you accept your {emph}situation, the better.
translation: 除非我点头，否则你休想逃出这里。我建议你还是趁早接受这个事实吧。

original: {Contemptuous, commanding}Are you listening? Good. From now on, when I talk, {emph}listen - and follow my instructions.
translation: {Contemptuous, commanding}听得见吗？很好，从现在开始，我说话的时候，你得给我认真听——并且严格照我吩咐的去做。

original: Play stupid, play clever, make the mistake of saying "no?" That collar on your neck'll go off and take your head with it.
translation: 你要是敢装傻充愣，耍花招，或者胆敢说个"不"字，你脖子上的项圈就会立刻爆炸，让你脑袋开花。

original: That's all I needed to know.
translation: 我想知道的就是这些了。

original: {Slight smug}Good. {Colder}If {emph}necessary, I will guide you through the Villa's broadcast systems - if you get lost, return here, and I'll direct you.
translation: {Slight smug}很好。如有必要，我会通过别墅区的广播系统来引导你。如果你迷路了，就回到这里，我会给你指明方向。

original: I've downloaded instructions on an audio log to your Pip-Boy in case you can't read... if you {emph}forget why you're here, let my voice remind you.
translation: 为了避免你不识字，我已经把刚才的指令转成了音频文件，上传到了你的哔哔小子里了…如果你忘了该干什么，就让我的语音来提醒你吧。

original: Then go. The Sierra Madre may wait... I will not.
translation: 去吧。马德雷山脉也许可以等你…但我可等不了。

original: Who are these people I'm gathering?
translation: 我要集结的这些人都是谁？

original: {Slower here, doesn't want to reveal too much}One is a trusted ally... obedient, collar or no, {to himself}although the collar helps. {Beat, dismissive/cruel}The other two... well, we'll have to see what the traps caught.
translation: 其中一人是个可信的同伴…他很听话，无论戴没戴项圈都一样，虽然戴着更好。至于另外两个人……嗯，那就得看落入我陷阱的都是什么货色了。

original: All right. So find the other three people with bomb collars, bring them back here?
translation: 好吧。所以只要找到其他三个戴着炸弹项圈的人，把他们带回这里就行了？

original: I've downloaded the instructions and markers on your Pip-Boy... in case you forget. {Beat, contempt}And yes, I have access to that device on your wrist.
translation: 我已经把指令和路标传到你的哔哔小子上了…免得你忘记。别太惊讶，我确实可以直接访问你手腕上的那个装置。

original: Get the other three here, after that... I'll have more instructions for you.
translation: 把其他三个人带回来，然后…我会给你进一步指示。

original: Do this, I'll let you go. {Beat}I'll let {emph}all of you go.
translation: 只要乖乖听话，我就放了你，和其他人。

original: Radios and speakers can set off my collar?
translation: 收音机和扩音器喇叭会引爆我的项圈？

original: Yes. But not immediately. {Clear, slow here}You'll hear a beep from your collar's detonator - when you do, step back, scan the area, and find the signal source.
translation: 没错。但不会立刻引爆。 {Clear, slow here}项圈的引爆器会先发出刺耳的警报声，如果你听到这种声音，一定要赶快后退，然后再搜索整片区域，找到信号的来源。

original: There are damaged speakers, and shielded ones... the damaged ones you can destroy at range - don't get close, you {emph}can't switch them off like a radio.
translation: 有些喇叭是坏的，有些是带防护罩的...坏的你可以从远处开枪把它们打掉，但千万别靠近，你不能像关掉收音机一样关掉它们。

original: The damaged speakers are sparking, ha... hard to miss. The casings are resistant to vandalism - punching or hitting them will {emph}not destroy them.
translation: 这些破损的喇叭通常会冒火星，所以……容易辨别。它们的外壳采用了防暴材料，普通的拳打脚踢{emph}是砸不烂的。

original: Radios and speakers?
translation: 收音机和喇叭？

original: {Building irritation}Yes, music was intended to be broadcast all over the Villa... over time, however, the radio signal has decayed and emits a different frequency.
translation: {Building irritation}没错，本来它们的作用是在别墅区里播放音乐……但过了这么长时间，信号衰减，频率也发生了改变。

original: Speakers and radios interfere with the bomb collar frequency, and can trigger the detonators... prematurely.
translation: 收音机和喇叭的频率会干扰炸弹项圈，导致项圈……提前引爆。

original: It is an unfortunate side effect, one I did not anticipate. I was unable to calibrate the collars to block the signals - so you'll have to make do.
translation: 很遗憾出现了这样的副作用，完全在我的计划之外。但我也没办法校准项圈来屏蔽多余的信号——你只能自己多加小心了。

original: How are you speaking to me?
translation: 你是用什么方法和我说话的？

original: {Slight contempt}Confused? {Cold}Don't be. I'm commandeering the hologram technology of the Villa.
translation: 感到困惑吗？大可不必。我使用的是别墅区里的全息影像科技。

original: Numbers, equations, circuits... all can be controlled, provided there's a connection, and the knowledge to use it.
translation: 数据、方程、电路……只要它们之间存在联系，掌握了相应的知识，我就可以操控它们。

original: This Villa, the casino... a treasure trove of such devices. The Holograms included.
translation: 这个别墅区，这个赌场…汇聚了无数类似的装置，其中就包括了全息影像。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Someone who followed the call of the Sierra Madre, just as you did. Now that I've found it's more than a story... I intend to take what's inside.
translation: 一个听从了马德雷山脉赌场召唤的人，和你一样。我发现这里不只是个传说……所以我打算取走这里的宝藏。

original: Maybe that's why you came. Why you followed the Pip-Boy here... and straight into one of my traps. {Beat, cold}Now, this is your reward.
translation: 可能你也抱着同样的目的吧。你跟随哔哔小子的指引……一头栽进了我设下的陷阱。而你现在的处境，就是你的奖赏。

original: Is there any place safe to rest?
translation: 这里有可以安全休息的地方吗？

original: {Quicker, as if should be evident}Anywhere sheltered from the Cloud... inside buildings, tunnels... any place not exposed to the outside air.
translation: 只要是能避开毒云的地方都可以…无论建筑物内部…或是隧道…反正别暴露在户外就行。

original: Anything the Cloud has touched has preserved it one way or another... but only the Holograms in the Villa truly remain.
translation: 凡是被毒云碰到的东西，都会被腐蚀成类似标本的形态…但这里真正能称得上保存完好的，也只有别墅区里的全息影像。

original: What Holograms are you talking about?
translation: 你说的全息影像到底是什么？

original: The inhabitants? There's people alive here?
translation: 居民？这里还有活人？

original: What are the Vending Machines in the Villa?
translation: 别墅区里的自动售货机是什么？

original: {More matter of fact here, like detailing specs on a car or gun, respects the vending machine tech}Assembly stations. Schematics are stored within... dispensers with unlock codes.
translation: {More matter of fact here, like detailing specs on a car or gun, respects the vending machine tech}是一种自动生产装置。它内置了各类物品的蓝图…需要相应的兑换代码才能解锁。

original: They use the Chips scattered around as batteries... alloys and raw material embedded in the shell.
translation: 散落在别墅区周围的筹码就是它们的电池……合金和原料已经提前封装在机器里了。

original: They resemble the vending machines of the Mojave, but they are crafting devices of tremendous versatility. Once an Old World convenience, now...
translation: 它们虽然外表类似莫哈维废土的自动售货机，但它们能生产的物品种类却十分繁多。曾经在旧世界是个不错的便民装置，如今...

original: ...now, they are a means of survival. Use the Chips to power them. Select from the holographic display, the device will assemble it.
translation: …如今，它将成为你赖以生存的工具。你只要用筹码给它们充能，通过全息屏选择你想要的物品，机器就会自动进行组装。

original: What is the Cloud?
translation: 毒云是什么？

original: {Slight admiration as if for beautiful vista}The Cloud is what blankets the sky here... you may smell it in the air, copper and sulfur... burns the lungs and seeps into the skin.
translation: 毒云就是这里铺天盖地的红雾……你应该能闻到吧，一股铜锈和硫磺的气息……它会灼烧人的肺部，渗进人的皮肤。

original: As for its origins... I am not certain. Pre-War industrial pollutants... something in the Sierra Madre structure...
translation: 至于它的来源……我不清楚。也许是战前的工业污染…也许是马德雷山脉赌场建筑里的某样东西…

original: {Contemplative}It is unique across the wasteland... and deadly. It has kept this place preserved since the Great War.
translation: {Contemplative} 放眼整个废土，也只有这里存在着如此独特……而致命的物质。赌场正是依靠它才能在大战之后屹立数百年不倒。

original: Can you tell me about the Holograms in the Villa?
translation: 你能告诉我别墅区里的全息影像是怎么回事吗？

original: Why?
translation: 为什么？

original: Most Holograms perform specific functions. The Security Holograms, ever since the bombs fell, now perform {emph}their function.
translation: 大多数全息影像都有其特定用途。全息保安自从核弹落下之后，就一直在履行自己的职责。

original: {Cold, serious}They will kill anyone they detect. {Frustrated}They are immune to guns, weapons, EMPs... even energy weapons. Still, they have limitations.
translation: 它们会射杀侦测到的一切活物。而且它们刀枪不入，EMP也奈何不了它们……甚至能量武器都不行。但是，它们也有弱点。

original: Their design limits their field of view, enough to avoid detection.
translation: 由于设计原因，它们的视野范围十分狭窄，你完全可以躲开它们的侦测。

original: Each has an emitter - destroy or disable it, and they cease to be a threat.
translation: 并且每个影像都有一个对应的投影仪，只要摧毁或者关掉投影仪，它们就构不成威胁了。

original: {Less authoritative here, more reflective/rueful}Still... at least {emph}they still work as intended. Other technology here is more of a threat to you... notably, the Villa's radios and speakers.
translation: 但话说回来…至少它们的工作情况还算正常。那些坏掉的设备对你的威胁其实更大…尤其是别墅区里的收音机和扬声喇叭。

original: What are these Holograms?
translation: 这些全息影像是什么？

original: {Thinking}Ghosts... they fill the Villa. {Beat}More in the Casino... much more.
translation: 是幽灵…它们在别墅区里随处可见。赌场里的数量……更多。

original: They carry out the functions the dead once did. They cannot be harmed... they only perform the same rote tasks until their power dies.
translation: 它们会顶替那些死去的人执行原本的工作。它们不会受伤...只会机械地重复单一的动作，直到油尽灯枯。

original: They are of no consequence - except for the Security Holograms, the ones with the silhouettes of the armored Sierra Madre guards.
translation: 你用不着担心它们……全息保安除外，就是那些穿着马德雷山脉赌场原本警卫服的影像。

original: What's FEV?
translation: FEV病毒是什么？

original: {Dismissive, throw away the line}A long story. FEV... a virus with an even longer story... it gave birth to the docile one, turned him into a Super Mutant long ago.
translation: {Dismissive, throw away the line}这就说来话长了。FEV…这个病毒的历史比它的名字还要悠久…总之，很久以前，是它给了那个温顺的人新生，把他转化成了超级变种人。

original: Any suggestions for who I should get first?
translation: 我应该先去找哪一个？你有什么建议吗？

original: Yes... {Lower, dismissive, like talking about a mule}Collar 8, the FEV reject, the Super Mutant. He's docile, predictable, and provided he's not starving, should be easy to command.
translation: 有的…… {Lower, dismissive, like talking about a mule}先找8号项圈，FEV病毒的残次品，一个超级变种人。他性格温顺，容易掌控，只要不让他挨饿，他就会乖乖听你指挥。

original: {Frowning, not sure why this is}I lost contact with him some time ago... probably after he dragged you here from the trap. Find him, he'll follow you, collar or no.
translation: {Frowning, not sure why this is}我已经和他失去了联络……大概是从他把你拖来这里之后。去找他，不管有没有项圈，他都会跟着你的。

original: How am I supposed to find them?
translation: 我该怎么找到他们？

original: {Authoritative, contempt for RobCo tech}Your piece of RobCo trash will help you, I've ensured it. It can latch on to the signal of the collars...
translation: {Authoritative, contempt for RobCo tech}你手上那块罗科公司生产的垃圾可以帮你，我已经替你改装过了。它能辨识项圈发出的信号……

original: ...and tune into their frequencies. The bomb collars come with radios embedded in them. You can eavesdrop easily.
translation: ……并调节到与其一致的频率。每个炸弹项圈里都嵌有无线电收发元件，很容易进行监听。

original: It was part of their design... to listen in. They can even screen out white noise from the environment to allow greater monitoring.
translation: 这也是它原本的功能之一……窃听。它甚至可以过滤掉外界的白噪音，从而取得更好的监听效果。

original: You have got to be kidding. This place is filled with radio mines that can kill me?
translation: 你肯定是在开玩笑。你是说这地方的收音机一个个都能要我的命，而且还满地都是？

original: So I have to deal with them - or I explode?
translation: 所以我必须想办法毁掉它们，不然我就会爆炸？

original: Forget it, then. I'll be on my way.
translation: 那就别再说了。我这就上路。

original: I'll cooperate - if you can answer some questions for me.
translation: 只要你肯解答我的几个疑问，我就愿意合作。

original: I've decided I'm not going to help you.
translation: 我已经决定了，我不会帮你的。

original: {Cold, imperious}When you came into the bunker, you saw a victim, their head blown off for disobedience.
translation: 你进地堡时，应该看见过一具尸体吧，那个人就是一个因为拒绝服从而被炸掉了脑袋。

original: The city is filled with other stories, {emph}many such stories. Is "no" your choice?
translation: 同样的例子在这镇上比比皆是，你确定要说"不"吗？

original: Never mind, then.
translation: 没事。

original: I had questions.
translation: 我有些问题想问。

original: How did I get here?
translation: 我是怎么到这儿来的？

original: {Slightly amused, incredulous, emph on "get"}Hmm! Get here? {Beat, judging}You walked into one of my traps in the Mojave... following the Sierra Madre signal. Now, you're here, with that collar on your neck.
translation: 哼！怎么到这儿的？你是跟着马德雷山脉赌场的广播信号……一头栽进了我设在莫哈维的陷阱。所以你才会脖子上套着项圈，出现在这里。

original: Then maybe you better tell me why I'm here.
translation: 那你最好告诉我为什么我会在这儿。

original: I'm not alone, then.
translation: 看来我不是孤身一人。

original: You've caught others?
translation: 你还抓了别人？

original: Who's the woman Hologram in the Fountain?
translation: 喷泉上的女性全息图像是谁？

original: {Throw away line, he doesn't care}I do not know. A Pre-War icon, perhaps. {Beat, back to the matter at hand}It is of no consequence aside from being a circuit I can utilize.
translation: 我不知道。可能是个战前的某个明星吧。她是谁对我而言并不重要，我只是借用了她脚底下的电路设备。

original: If I can't punch them or smash them, that doesn't leave me many options.
translation: 如果我打不到它们，那我也没有什么办法了。

original: Aside from switching them off, what can I do?
translation: 除了关掉它们，我还能做什么？

original: How are they different?
translation: 为何它们有区别？

original: "Security" doesn't sound safe to me.
translation: "保安"这两个字对我来说可不怎么安全。

original: What is this rifle?
translation: 这把步枪是什么？

original: {Precise, then superior}It is a Holorifle, a weapon I constructed when I arrived... I have since made superior models - and modifications.
translation: {Precise, then superior}这是一把全息步枪，是我来这儿之后制造的武器…此后我又对它进行了一系列改进和调整。

original: {Dismissive}For now, that tool will have to do until you find other weapons... {warning}and I suggest you do, the Holorifle's ammo is limited.
translation: {Dismissive}在找到其他武器前，这是你唯一能仰赖的自卫手段……{warning}我建议你多留意一下四周，毕竟全息步枪的弹药有限。

original: Still, it should serve well enough. I fashioned it from the Holograms of the Villa {beat}and used it against the Villa's... living inhabitants.
translation: 不过，这把枪应该是够用了。我是以别墅区的全息影像为灵感将它设计出来的，{beat}我也曾用它来对付过别墅区里的其他……居民。

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你这话是什么意思？

original: {Less superior, more didactic in this}This place is well-preserved. Few who came here ever returned. All of the treasures of the Old World lie scattered about, virtually untouched.
translation: {Less superior, more didactic in this}这个地方保存得非常完好，毕竟很少有人能带着战利品返回。旧世界遗留下来的宝藏随处可见，而且几乎从未被人染指。

original: Search, hunt... craft what you can from what you find. The trash of the Pre-War era can keep you alive - food, knives, more. Use them.
translation: 多找找，多看看…你可以借助这些东西来制作各种生存物资。战前留下的垃圾是可以保命的，无论食物、刀子，还是别的东西。要善加利用。

original: Even the Villa's toxins... and the residue it leaves behind... can be shaped into tools and weapons. Gather it as well.
translation: 哪怕别墅区里的毒云…和它挥发后的残渣，都可以拿来制作工具和武器。务必多加收集。

original: Also... there is one more thing in your possession, a rifle that will keep you alive, as surely as the collar will.
translation: 对了……我还给你留了一样东西，一把可以用来保命的步枪。就和你的项圈一样。

original: Where is my gear?
translation: 我的装备在哪儿？

original: {Low anger, this is frustrating}The Sierra Madre has many... defenses, means of screening guests for illicit or dangerous items. Your arrival here, weaponless, was {emph}not my intention.
translation: {Low anger, this is frustrating}马德雷山脉赌场配备了一套相当复杂的……安保系统，其中就包括检查来客身上是否有携带违禁品或有害物品。所以你才会手无寸铁来到这里，{emph}这并不是我的本意。

original: {Irritated, then slow, final in end}The Casino, this Villa... it takes anything with even a trace of radioactivity, traces of unknown substances... and returns it home. The bunker.
translation: {Irritated, then slow, final in end}这个赌场，这片别墅区…但凡发现来宾身上的东西带有一丝核辐射或是不明成份…就会将它们没收，寄回原址，也就是地堡。

original: {Matter of fact}The process is automated, and the casino itself has other, similar "services." I was unable to find a workaround, except to send others in as tools.
translation: {Matter of fact}这一过程是全自动的，赌场里也有许多类似的"服务"。我找不到变通的手段，只能想办法把人当成工具送进来。

original: Still... I have not left you defenseless, and the Sierra Madre's security in some respects, can help you if you are resourceful enough.
translation: 但是…我也给你留了武器，而且只要你善于变通，马德雷山脉赌场的安保措施某种程度上也可以为你所用。

original: How many of these victims did you bring here?
translation: 你到底绑架了多少受害者？

original: {Sharp, frustrated}Too many. {Slower, more frustrated}This place is dangerous... and its quarantine measures, its hazards... have claimed many. Failures upon failures.
translation: 太多了。这地方过于危险…长期与世隔绝，环境又恶劣…已经有很多人命丧于此。而我也经历了无数次的挫败。

original: Do you think I wanted to place collars on you to ensure compliance? No... if robots could have done this, I would've sent them.
translation: 你以为我乐意给你套上项圈，逼你听话吗？不…如果这种事机器人也能办到，那我早派它们来了。

original: The Sierra Madre is a complicated lock. Cracking it open requires human hands.
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场是一把精致而复杂的锁，只有凭借人类的双手才能打开。

original: What's inside the Sierra Madre?
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场里面有什么？

original: {Disdain}That is for me to know. You get that far... you'll see for yourself.
translation: 我也想知道。如果你走得够远……说不定你也能知道。

original: Are they all dead?
translation: 他们都死了吗？

original: {Disgust, lower}The ones brought here live on only in what they've left behind, their marks - graffiti on the walls. And victims they've killed.
translation: {Disgust, lower}被带到这里的人只能依靠前人留下的蛛丝马迹活下去，他们做了不少标记——包括墙上的涂鸦和地上的尸体。

original: Some tried to help... left supplies and healing for others who came. Their reward? They were tracked down, killed by others with baser instincts.
translation: 有些人很慷慨…他们留下了食物和药品，想要帮助后来人。可结果呢？却是被那些生性丑恶的家伙当做猎物，遭到他们的屠戮。

original: Some of these murderers went as far as to leave traps behind them... turning markers for help into deathtraps for anyone following them.
translation: 一部分杀人狂甚至会布下机关……将原本用于帮助他人的标记变成夺命陷阱，等着后来人自投罗网。

original: It killed some of them when they forgot where the traps lay... or when they desperately needed the assistance they had cut others off from.
translation: 不过他们有时也会因为忘记陷阱的位置而玩火自焚……又或者为了坑害他人，切断了所有的逃生渠道，等到自己也被困时才发现求助无门。

original: I'll help. What do you want me to do?
translation: 我愿意帮忙，不过你到底想让我干什么？

original: Why would you do that?
translation: 为什么你要这么做？

original: {Theme of the game, clear, cold here}Because in some respects, breaking in to the Sierra Madre is easier than breaking human instinct. {Beat, explaining}Greed.
translation: {Theme of the game, clear, cold here}因为某种程度上说，攻克马德雷山脉赌场比克服人类本身的天性——贪婪——要更为容易。

original: The Villa is filled with corpses. Some killed by the dangers here, some by me. Others... turned on each other.
translation: 别墅区里早已遍布尸骸，有些是死于非命，有些是死在我手上。而剩下的人……都是死于自相残杀。

original: Once they realized the Sierra Madre could be theirs, they cared nothing for their freedom... their survival... or each other.
translation: 一旦他们意识到可以将马德雷山脉赌场的宝藏据为己有，自由…生存…同伴情谊，也就统统抛诸脑后了。

original: So I need others to pull off this... heist. Who?
translation: 所以我还需要别人来完成这场……抢劫。都有谁呢？

original: So how do I destroy the radios and speakers then?
translation: 那我要怎么才能摧毁那些收音机和喇叭呢？

original: Gunshots, energy blasts - {more to himself, quick}even spears thrown with great force - can puncture their exterior.
translation: 用枪，或者能量武器— {more to himself, quick}如果你力气够大，投矛也可以，这些武器都能刺穿它们的外壳。

original: Shielded speakers can't be destroyed at all. You'll need to avoid them or switch them off via a terminal. {Beat, disdain}I... I'll leave the method up to you.
translation: 带防护罩的喇叭没办法摧毁，你只能避开它们，或者找到控制终端，把它关掉。{Beat, disdain}至于办法，就交给你自己去想了……

original: What do you mean?
translation: 什么意思？

original: The real work? What was this, a warm-up?
translation: 真正的任务？难道我们之前做的这些只能算是热身？

original: Perhaps you think this is a simple robbery. A cheap casino heist.
translation: 你可能以为这只是一场简单的抢劫，只是随便劫个赌场而已。

original: No... this is a heist of the {emph}centuries. We're not plundering the Sierra Madre - we're plundering {emph}history, taking from the Old World itself.
translation: 但事实并非如此...这是一场世纪大劫案。我们要抢的并不仅仅是马德雷山脉赌场，而是历史，是旧世界本身。

original: It won't let its secrets go easily... not without a fight. I wouldn't expect anything less.
translation: 但它是不会轻易地将自己的秘密……拱手相让的。所以，我也绝不能掉以轻心。

original: We'll head out, then.
translation: 那我们这就出发。

original: {Start Act 2 Quests}I'd suggest taking the FEV reject to his position first... {more to himself, thinking of other dangers}although you may need his brutality and strength elsewhere first.
translation: 我个人建议，你可以先带那个中了FEV病毒的废物去他指定的位置……不过，你也可能需要依靠他的蛮力来穿过某些地区。

original: As easy as the Villa was to navigate... the outlying areas of the Villa are far more dangerous, thicker with the Ghost People, traps, and toxins.
translation: 虽然别墅区算不上危险…可它周围的地带就不一样了，你也许会遇到更多的鬼人、机关陷阱和毒气。

original: Use your team as I use you... listen to your collar, watch where you step. You're no use to me dead.
translation: 好好利用你的队伍吧，就像我利用你一样…仔细聆听项圈的声响，时刻留意自己的脚下。你死了对我可没好处。

original: What is the Gala Event?
translation: 盛世庆典是什么？

original: A display of lights, fireworks... music in the streets, a Pre-War festival to mark the casino's opening. The bombs struck first.
translation: 一场大型灯光秀加烟火表演…此外音乐也会传遍大街小巷，是战前用来庆祝赌场开业的一次庆典活动。可惜被落下的核弹给搅黄了。

original: It is of no consequence, only firing the event is - get the three in position, then travel to your position in Salida del Sol and trigger the Gala.
translation: 这些都无关紧要，关键是你要再次启动它。先让那三个人就位，你再到日出镇去，打开庆典活动的开关。

original: After that, the real work begins.
translation: 在那之后，真正的任务才正式开始。

original: How am I supposed to get to the markers on my map?
translation: 我该怎么抵达地图上的标记点？

original: {Slow}I've unlocked the West and East gates to Puesta del Sol and Salida del Sol...
translation: 我已经打开了东西两侧分别通往日落镇和日出镇的大门……

original: {Contempt}...now that you've survived the Villa, I need to get to my position, you don't need me to hold your hand anymore.
translation: …既然别墅区里的各类危险都奈何不了你，我看你也不再需要我手把手教你了，我还有别的事情要做。

original: {Contempt fades a bit}I'll keep monitoring you via the transceivers through the Villa... if I need to offer guidance, I will.
translation: 我会持续通过无线电监控你在别墅区里的一举一动...如果我觉得有必要给你指引，我会告诉你的。

original: Where can I find him?
translation: 我在哪儿能找到他？

original: Travel West, toward the Villa Police Station - follow the radio frequency and the alarms.
translation: 向西，往别墅区的警察局方向，跟着无线电频率和警报器的声音走。

original: {Thinking, reflective}Although there's a great deal of interference at the source. Perhaps that's why I lost contact with him.
translation: {Thinking, reflective}不过，信号源处存在相当大的干扰，这或许就是我和他失联的原因。

original: No matter, aside from Collar 8, there should be weapons, armor at the police station. Go West, avoid the Villa inhabitants, bring the mutant back.
translation: 无所谓，除了8号对象之外，警察局里应该还会有武器和护甲。向西走，避开别墅区的居民，把那个变种人带回来。

original: So after your speech about control, now you're going to use the collars like Elijah did?
translation: 你说了这么多，听你的意思，难道你要学以利亚，用项圈来逼人就范？

original: {Frowns, slow}You know what... you're right. I don't need to use the same methods to kill you, and I shouldn't... it would make me as bad as Elijah is.
translation: 有道理…你说得对。我不需要这样的手段，我也不应该这么做…这只会让我变得和以利亚一样道德沦丧。

original: {Cold, low}All right - forget the proximity frequency, we'll decide this ourselves.
translation: 好吧，那就别管什么频率了，咱们直接一决胜负吧。

original: When we were sneaking, you mentioned Lou... who's Lou?
translation: 之前我们轻声走路的时候，你提到了一个叫中尉的人……他是谁？

original: Lou... ten... ant? Long ago. Smart. {Beat}Gave us all things to do. Like watch. And kill. {Beat}Gone now.
translation: 中…中尉？那是很早以前的事了。他很聪明，吩咐我们做了很多事。比如站岗，杀人之类的。他已经死了。

original: Miss Lou. Miss the Base. Miss the Church. Don't like here. {Frowns}Don't want to talk about it any more, makes head hurt.
translation: 想念中尉，想念基地，想念大教堂。不喜欢这儿。不想说了，头疼。

original: Both Holograms are on now. It's safe for you to get to your position.
translation: 两个全息影像都打开了。你可以放心就位了。

original: So you're the one who knows how I got to the Villa.
translation: 所以你肯定知道我是怎么来到别墅区的咯。

original: {DUPE: Amused}Of course I know. {Snarling}Even if I don't see it happen - down in the cage, I hear echoes of the footfalls, the click of the collars.
translation: 当然知道。就算我关在笼子里，没有亲眼看见，我也听到了脚步的回声和项圈的响动。

original: {Furious}Every time I see one of you I know exactly how you got here - you couldn't help yourselves, anymore than Dog can help himself.
translation: 你们这种人，我不用猜都知道你们是怎么到这儿来的——因为你们无法压抑自己的欲望，就像狗一样。

original: {Accusing}You heard the voice, the promise, and then you walked right into one of the Old Man's traps. Then... then Dog comes for you, drags you here.
translation: 你听到广播里的声音，以为有利可图，就迫不及待地一脚踏进了那个老头设下的陷阱里。接着……接着狗就把你扛到了这里。

original: It's still out there, in the Wastes, preserved, just waiting for someone to crack it open. {Slow, "it" = Sierra Madre}But getting to it. {Beat}That's not the hard part.
translation: 但它依然矗立在废土之上，完好无损，等着有人前来将它开启。只不过，找到它并非难事。

original: {Bitter}The war froze it in time, like a big flashbulb going off. {Slow, bitter, downnote}The Grand Opening - one big ending of humanity.
translation: {Bitter}战争将它凝结在了时间的长河之中， 仿佛一盏巨大的镁光灯突然熄灭。{Slow, bitter, downnote}开业大典的当天，人类迎来了自己的结局。

original: Except - the Sierra Madre never opened.
translation: 然而——马德雷山脉赌场从未开幕。

original: {Quiet, to himself}A chance for anyone to begin again.
translation: {Quiet, to himself}任何人在这里都有机会重获新生。

original: ... but for {Elijah is thinking of himself when he says "all"}all who came to its doors.
translation: ……也针对{Elijah is thinking of himself when he says "所有"}所有来到它门前的宾客。

original: {Sarcastic, slight bitterness}The opening was supposed to symbolize a road to a brighter future, not just for the world...
translation: {Sarcastic, slight bitterness}这场庆典原本象征着一条通往未来的康庄大道，不只针对这个世界……

original: {Disgust}An invitation was a sign of... exclusiveness.
translation: {Disgust}能够受到邀请，就说明这个人必然……卓尔不群。

original: The world's most famous stars and entertainers were invited to its Grand Opening.
translation: 全世界最著名的巨星和艺人都被邀请来参加它盛大的开业典礼。

original: These Ghost People... they're the only ones alive around here?
translation: 这些鬼人…他们是这里唯一的活人了？

original: {Player attacked a companion}I warned you to cooperate. Now I'll have to begin again.
translation: {Player attacked a companion}我警告过你要相互合作的。现在我只能重新开始了。

original: Speakers and radios interfere with the bomb collar frequency, and can trigger the detonators... prematurely.
translation: 收音机和扩音器的频率会干扰炸弹项圈，造成项圈……提前引爆。

original: It is an unfortunate side effect, one I did not anticipate. I was unable to calibrate the collars to block the signals - so you'll have to make do.
translation: 很遗憾出现这样的副作用，完全在我的计划之外。我也没办法校准项圈来屏蔽多余的信号——所以你只能多加小心了。

original: How did you get me here again?
translation: 再说一遍，你是怎么带我来这里的？

original: Everyone asks that. {Emph}Should be asking how they plan on leaving.
translation: 每个人都会问这个问题。{Emph}你不妨问问他们是怎么想方设法离开的。

original: It only takes putting a collar on one to begin the chain. One with a collar may chain another. And that one, another. Had traps all over the wastes.
translation: 我只是把项圈套在了一个人的脖子上，就引发了连锁反应。戴项圈的人会给其他人也套上项圈，如此周而复始，循环往复。我在废土各处都布下了陷阱。

original: The chain ends with the super mutant. Although with him... the collar wasn't even necessary. He only needed... guidance.
translation: 这个连锁反应到那个超级变种人那里就结束了。不过对他来说…项圈是可有可无的。他会听从一切……指示。

original: Dog... just calm down... there's no need to keep fighting.
translation: 狗...冷静下来…不必一直使用武力。

original: {Getting more and more angry}No... Dog no listen to you, no listen to your voice anymore - will tear you apart, feed on you.
translation: 不...狗才不听你的，再也不听你的了——狗要撕碎你，吃了你。

original: There are damaged speakers, and shielded ones... the damaged ones you can destroy at range - don't get close, you {emph}can't switch them off like a radio.
translation: 有些喇叭是坏的，有些是带防护罩的...坏的你可以从远处开枪把它们打掉，但千万别靠近，你不能像关掉收音机一样关掉它们。

original: There's 3 collars in the Villa: 14, 12, 8 and the volunteers attached to them. I need all 4 of you.
translation: 别墅区里还有三个套着项圈的家伙，分别是14号，12号，和8号.我需要你们4人通力合作

original: Quest completed.
translation: 任务已完成。

original: Trigger the Gala Event
translation: 启动开幕庆典

original: Quest completed.
translation: 任务已完成。

original: Get to the Gala Event control panel at the top of the belltower in Salida del Sol North and activate it.
translation: 前往日出镇北部的钟塔顶层启动开幕庆典控制面板。

original: Get to the Sierra Madre Main Gate and enter the casino.
translation: 前往马德雷山脉赌场的大门并进入赌场。

original: Heist of the Centuries
translation: 世纪大劫案

original: Quest complete.
translation: 任务完成。

original: Quest Failed.
translation: 任务失败。

original: Thread Vera's music sequence together at the Receptionist Terminal in the Lobby.
translation: 在大厅的接待终端中组合薇拉的演唱片段。

original: Escape the Sierra Madre Vault before your collar explodes.
translation: 在项圈爆炸前逃离马德雷山脉赌场避难所。

original: Discover the secrets of the Sierra Madre at the Vault's central chamber.
translation: 前往避难所的中央金库，解开马德雷山脉赌场的秘密。

original: Gain access to the Sierra Madre Vault.
translation: 进入马德雷山脉赌场避难所。

original: Defeat Elijah.
translation: 击败以利亚。

original: (Optional) Sneak out of the Vault's chamber area undetected, trapping Elijah when he opens the vault.
translation: (可选) 在不被发觉的情况下悄悄溜出金库，并在以利亚打开金库时将他困住。

original: Dean Dialogue
translation: 迪安谈话

original: Christine Dialogue
translation: 克莉丝汀谈话

original: Dog/God Dialogue
translation: 狗/神谈话

original: Father Elijah Dialogue
translation: 以利亚长老谈话

original: Sierra Madre Grand Opening!
translation: 马德雷山脉赌场盛大开幕！

original: Track down the source of the Sierra Madre invitation.
translation: 追查马德雷山脉赌场广播的来历。

original: Scripting Support for Hologram Features
translation: 全息影像外貌特征的脚本支持

original: Bomb Collar Quest
translation: 炸弹项圈任务

original: Script Functionality for Toxic Clouds
translation: 毒云的功能性脚本

original: Script Functionality for Global Toxic Damage
translation: 毒性总伤害功能性脚本

original: Dog's Collar Radio
translation: 狗的项圈电台

original: Christine's Collar Radio
translation: 克莉丝汀的项圈电台

original: Dean's Collar Radio
translation: 迪安的项圈电台

original: Vera Radio Dialogue
translation: 薇拉电台谈话

original: Elijah's Collar Radio
translation: 以利亚的项圈电台

original: Elijah Signal Established
translation: 以利亚通讯已建立

original: You sure have filled your Pip-Boy's archives with garbage.
translation: 你的哔哔小子文件夹里塞满了垃圾。

original: Mitchell... that your name, Mitchell? No, wait... previous owner, Vault 21. Vegas.
translation: 米切尔…你叫米切尔？不，等等…这是上一任用户的名字，来自维加斯的21号避难所。

original: Followed the Gala radio signal, just like I did, hoping to strike it rich?
translation: 你也像我一样，听到开业典礼的广播，就跑到这儿来，想大捞一笔？

original: Cooperate with me, follow along, we'll crack the Sierra Madre. Together.
translation: 那咱们合作，只要你听我的，我们就能一起解开马德雷山脉赌场的秘密。

original: There were others like you... turned on each other, even before the collars.
translation: 之前也有你这样的人…但他们只会自相残杀，甚至不需要项圈。

original: Wake up.
translation: 该醒了。

original: On your feet, before I set off your collar.
translation: 站起来，别让我引爆你的项圈。

original: Look at your Pip-Boy. Listen to the audio log, follow the instructions.
translation: 打开你的哔哔小子，仔细收听音频日志，照里面的指示去做。

original: From now on, do as I say. It's the only way you'll leave the Sierra Madre alive.
translation: 从现在起，你听我指挥，这是你活着离开马德雷山脉赌场的唯一方法。

original: Try and run, disobey me? I'll set off your collar and find someone who knows how to listen.
translation: 想逃跑，想违抗我？不妨试试，我会立刻引爆你的项圈，再找一个愿意服从我命令的人来。

original: ...and no sleeping, no waiting around, not even for an hour. Waste my time, you're useless to me.
translation: ……不许睡觉，也不许原地晃悠，一小时都不行。敢浪费我的时间，你对我来说就没用了。

original: Picking up signals near your location. Detonators. Watch for traps.
translation: 我在你周围接收到了一些信号，是引爆器，小心陷阱。

original: Villa's comm speakers have... aged poorly, like the Madre. Pre-War junk.
translation: 别墅区的喇叭已经……年久失修，就像马德雷赌场一样。都是战前留下的垃圾。

original: The speakers emit a signal that'll set off your collar. Too close, too long, you'll lose your head.
translation: 喇叭里播放的信号会引爆你的项圈，如果你离得太近，又待得太久，你的人头就会不保。

original: Some speakers may be damaged, blue ones, sparking - you can destroy those. Others, red, too well-shielded.
translation: 有些喇叭是可以摧毁的，它们的指示灯是蓝色的，还冒着火星。如果下面亮红灯，说明有防护罩。

original: Don't be stupid. Pay attention, keep moving. Hear your collar beep, look around.
translation: 别莽撞，集中精力，千万别停下来。注意项圈的响声，仔细观察四周。

original: Don't go through the gate to Puesta del Sol yet, gather the others first.
translation: 别急着打开日落镇的大门，先把其他人集合起来。

original: Leave the Salida gate alone. You're not done with the Villa yet, so don't stray.
translation: 先不用管日出镇的大门。你在别墅区还有事没做完，不要浪费时间。

original: You sure have filled your Pip-Boy's archives with garbage.
translation: 你的哔哔小子文件夹里塞满了垃圾。

original: Mitchell... that your name, Mitchell? No, wait... previous owner, Vault 21. Vegas.
translation: 米切尔…你叫米切尔？不，等等…这是上一任用户的名字，来自维加斯的21号避难所。

original: No matter, not important. Probably stole this Pip-Boy from him, didn't you.
translation: 算了，这不重要。也许这台哔哔小子是你从他那儿偷来的，对吗。

original: Don't worry, if you're a thief, a thief is just what I need.
translation: 别担心，我正好需要一个小偷，你很合适。

original: Followed the Gala radio signal, just like I did, hoping to strike it rich?
translation: 你也像我一样，听到开业典礼的广播，就跑到这儿来，想大捞一笔？

original: Cooperate with me, follow along, we'll crack the Sierra Madre. Together.
translation: 那咱们合作，只要你听我的，我们就能一起解开马德雷山脉赌场的秘密。

original: There were others like you... turned on each other, even before the collars.
translation: 之前也有你这样的人…但他们只会自相残杀，甚至不需要项圈。

original: Play your cards right, be smart, you'll live through this. Be dumb...
translation: 只要你办事得力，够机灵，就能活下来。如果你犯了迷糊……

original: ..well, your head wasn't much use anyway, was it?
translation: …哼，那你的脑袋也没多大用处了，对不对？

original: The Villa's toxic. The more you're outside, the more you breathe...
translation: 别墅区满是毒气。你在户外待得越久，吸入的也就越多…

original: ...then the Cloud wins. So move fast, don't stay outdoors too long.
translation: …那样会被毒死。所以动作一定要快，别在外面停留太久。

original: Outside, you may notice your vision'll pulse, get dizzy.
translation: 在户外，有时你会感到视线模糊，头昏脑胀。

original: It's the Cloud. Eats your insides, slowly. Too much exposure, death.
translation: 这就是毒云，它会慢慢将你吞噬。如果暴露在毒云中太久，那必死无疑。

original: Damn speakers at end of hall - red light means they're shielded. Must be a way to shut them off somewhere else.
translation: 该死的喇叭在大厅尽头，红灯亮着，说明它们有防护罩。这里肯定有什么方法能关掉它们。

original: Collar 12's near you, in the building.
translation: 12号项圈就在你附近，在建筑物里。

original: Getting an odd signal near your location. Some kind of emitter, hunt for it.
translation: 我在你附近接收到了一个奇怪的信号。是某种发射器，找到它。

original: Lost the emitter signal. Your work, I presume?
translation: 发射器信号消失了，是你干的，对吗？

original: Picked up another emitter signal, then lost it.
translation: 接收到了另一个发射器的信号，然后又消失了。

original: Maybe you think I wanted to send people here. To inhale toxins. Die. Kill each other.
translation: 也许你以为我乐意把人抓来这里。乐意让他们吸毒气，自相残杀。

original: Hardly. If robots could do this, I'd have sent them in.
translation: 你错了。如果这个任务机器人也能干，那我早派它们来了。

original: That collar around your neck is because people are unreliable. Even chains of command - unreliable.
translation: 人是靠不住的，即便有命令约束也一样。所以你脖子上的项圈很有必要。

original: These collars, with adjustments, work much better.
translation: 这些项圈经过了调整，功能更加完善。

original: Watch out for the Villa inhabitants.
translation: 小心别墅区的原住民。

original: The Villa's inhabitants seem obsessed with Holograms. Use it to distract them.
translation: 别墅区的原住民似乎对全息影像很是敬畏，用全息影像来分散他们的注意力。

original: Picking up an emitter signature - watch for Security Holograms, dangerous.
translation: 我接收到一个发射器信号，小心全息影响保安，它们很危险。

original: Main power's down. How troublesome.
translation: 主电源断了，真伤脑筋。

original: The ventilation system controls should be located in that building.
translation: 通风系统的控制器应该就在那栋建筑里。

original: They should help with the Cloud.
translation: 它们应该能够帮助清理毒云。

original: Good, ventilation's back online.
translation: 很好，通风系统已经重新运作了。

original: Deciding to explore? Curiosity kills, get back to the main path.
translation: 你怎么到处乱晃？好奇心害死猫，给我回到正事上来。

original: I mean it - if you die here, then this starts all over again.
translation: 我是认真的，如果你死了，一切就得重新开始。

original: Collars weren't always linked to each other. A mistake.
translation: 没有早点把项圈连在一起，真是个错误。

original: Others who came, kept killing each other. Now, I've fixed that by linking them to each other.
translation: 其他来这儿的人只会自相残杀，为了解决这个问题，我把他们的项圈连接在了一起。

original: Keep heading West, that's where you'll need to leave the mutant.
translation: 继续往西走，你得把那个变种人带去那里。

original: Damn power station levers need his strength to operate.
translation: 发电站的操纵杆只有靠他的力气才能拉得动。

original: You're at one of the Gala locations, you'll need to bring the mutant here.
translation: 你已经发现了启动庆典的一处关键地点，你得把那个变种人带过来。

original: Only he has the strength to operate the levers, I've found.
translation: 据我所知，只有他有力气拉动操纵杆。

original: Head north, get to the bell tower. There is where you'll trigger the event.
translation: 到北边的钟楼上去，你得在那里启动开幕庆典。

original: Provided you have everyone in place.
translation: 前提是每个人都已经各就各位。

original: Toxins are thick in your area. Move East, avoid the clouds.
translation: 你那里的毒云很浓，向东走，避开它们。

original: Don't test me or the Cloud... both will kill you without a second thought.
translation: 别考验我的耐性，也别和毒云过不去……因为这两样东西都可以轻易杀死你。

original: Covering a lot of ground, good. Still a ways to go.
translation: 覆盖了一大片地方，很好，继续努力。

original: Stay focused. Only one chance to do this.
translation: 集中注意力，你只有一次机会。

original: Salida del Sol... now a maze of toxins.
translation: 日出镇……现在已经是一座满是毒云的迷宫。

original: Entire Villa is a deathtrap.
translation: 整个别墅区都是死亡陷阱。

original: Keep north - that's where you'll find the bell tower.
translation: 向北走，你就可以看到钟楼。

original: Everyone needs to be in place, or it'll be a wasted trip.
translation: 每个人都必须就位，不然只是浪费时间。

original: You're resourceful. Had a daughter, foster daughter, like you.
translation: 你很聪明。我曾经有一个女儿，一个义女，跟你一样。

original: She was willful, stubborn. But clever. She's gone now. Lost to me.
translation: 她很任性，很固执，但也很聪明。如今她已经不在了，我失去了她。

original: We don't have time for you to explore the Villa, stick to the Gala.
translation: 没时间给你探索别墅区了，专心搞定开幕庆典。

original: Are you paying attention? Roam the Villa, and you'll die.
translation: 你有认真听我说话吗？继续在别墅区瞎晃悠的话，你就死定了。
